datosGenerales.descripcion: It is a four-star hotel located in a modern and restored building with an avant-garde decoration. It is situated in front of the lawcourts and close to the Guggenheim, the Old Town, Teatro Arriaga Theatre and the Euskalduna convention centre. The hotel is equipped with double and single rooms provided with strongbox, the Internet, heating, air-conditioning, cable television, mini-bar and hairdryer. The hotel offers room service and facilities such as laundry, banquet room, meeting hall, social hall, library, sauna, gym and a shop.

Luxury hotel, built in the 19th century in romantic style and with the most modern facilities. The hotel is situated in La Concha Avenue, in front of the beach and in the city centre of San Sebastián. Its seaside terrace is a meeting point for people from the city and visitors during the whole year.

 

It consists of 167 double, single and suite rooms with fully-equipped bathroom, television, piped music, telephone, air-conditioning and mini-bar. It offers all the services of its category hotels, such as launderette, ironing, 24-hour room service, page, courier company, trip sale, foreign exchange, Internet WiFi, cyber corner, garage, bar and restaurant.

It consists of 40 double and single rooms equipped with heating and cable television.

The hotel also provides WI-FI Internet free connection and telephone service. Moreover, it has a bar-cafeteria, a dinning-room and a social room.

Two star guesthouse located near the RENFE station, Court, Congress Centre, Kursaal Auditorium and La Concha and Zurriola beaches. It has 9 rooms equipped with Internet access, heating, air conditioning, cable television and a hairdryer. The guesthouse also has a lounge.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Aida Guesthouse

datosGenerales.descripcion: Modern hotel situated next to the FICOBA fairground. It consists of 19 rooms with bathroom, Internet, room service, heating and cable television. In addition, it provides a coffee-bar, restaurant, restaurant, dining room, lounge and laundry. Green areas surround the hotel.

Two-star guest house situated in the town of Gernika-Lumo. It is equipped with 17 double and single rooms, all of them provided with bathroom, television, heating, telephone and Internet. Social hall and launderette also available.
Two-star guest house located in the centre of San Sebastián. It has a lounge and rooms with heating, cable television, minibar, hairdryer and Internet access.

galeria.titulo: The interior of Alameda Guest House

datosGenerales.descripcion: This hotel is located in a beautiful town a few metres from the Zarautz beach. It consists of 40 rooms (double and single) with fully equipped bathroom, heating, air-conditioning, Internet, cable television, a mini-bar and a hairdryer. There are also available a coffee-bar, a restaurant, a garage, a lounge, a meeting room, a garden-terrace and a solarium.

Hotel located in the border town of Irun, in the town centre, surrounded by gardens and a wooded area of 3,500 square metres. It boasts 48 double and individual rooms with views of the greenery outside and which come equipped with full bathroom, television, telephone and hair-dryer. In addition, the hotel provides WiFi at no additional cost, both in the bedrooms and in communal areas, and has two meeting rooms, free parking and a restaurant with an outside terrace. It is located 300 metres from the FICOBA exhibition centre.
Two star guesthouse located in Donostia-San Sebastián. It has 10 double rooms equipped with complete bathroom, television, direct phone, safe-deposit box, a mini-bar and Wi-Fi connection.

Two star hotel located next to La Concha bay. It has 20 double rooms with complete bathroom, direct phone, television, mini-bar, hairdryer, jean ironing service, magnetic card access, work teams and Wi-Fi Internet connection. The hotel also has a bar.

galeria.titulo: Outside of the Pensión Alemana guesthouse

datosGenerales.descripcion: The two-star hotel is located in a service area to Vitoria-Gasteiz, on the road towards Murgia. It is a perfect spot to relax. The hotel is equipped with 20 sounproofed rooms provided with telephone, satellite television, fully-equipped bathroom, heating, strongbox, Internet and room service. It is also provided with coffee bar, restaurant, social room, a shop, laundry and newspapers for the stay to be comfortable. Garden and green areas surround the hotel.

servicio.nombre: Member of National Consumer Arbitration Board

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Altube Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion:
Hotel and hostel located in Artzentales, in a very quiet rural area surrounded by greenery. The well-tended gardens, the forests of autochthonous trees and the green meadows that surround it that surround it make it an ideal place to relax and disconnect from the hustle and bustle, whether you plan to come alone, as a family or in a group.

 

The rural resort offers single and double rooms. The rooms are spacious and bright with en-suite bathrooms. Some have a balcony overlooking the garden. 

 

The establishment has a wellness centre, sauna, massage service, cold water pool and swimming pool during the summer season.

 

It also has a cafeteria and restaurant with high quality cuisine prepared with local produce (km0), as well as spacious multifunctional rooms. An inspiring environment for events and meetings both indoors and outdoors, which favours connection, wellbeing and enjoyment.

Hotel located in the heart of the city of Vitoria-Gasteiz, in a very busy commercial area.

It offers rooms separated into three floors, all of them equipped with heating, telephone, satellite TV and fully-equipped bathroom.

Ametzagaña guesthouse is located between neighbourhoods Loyola and Martutene (Donostia-San Sebastián), 4 km far from La Concha beach, in the southern slope of Ametzagaña mountain and surrounded by country houses.

 

The rooms (all of them outer rooms) have heating and hot water. The guesthouse can accommodate groups. Ametzagña is divided in five independent villas. Two of them have 12 rooms with bathroom, the other two have multiple rooms and the fifth offers general services. In addition, the guesthouse has a 1,500 square metre gym and a pelota court.

Three star hotel situated in next to the Anoeta stadium, close to Donostia-San Sebastián city centre and the beaches. 26 rooms equipped with a safe-deposit box, heating, air-conditioning, cable television, a mini-bar, piped music, telephone, fax, Internet WiFi and hairdryer available. In addition, the hotel also consists of meeting rooms, banquet rooms, lounge, coffee-bar, restaurant and laundry service.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Anoeta Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: The Ansotegi Hotel lies in a valley that is close to the Etxebarria area, within a marvellous landscape. It is part of the best-kept ironworks area. The region is composed of the palace-house -apart from, the ironworks that is nowadays the Ansotegi Hotel-, part of its hydraulic structure, an associate mill and a simple bridge. The 14 hotel rooms are meticulously decorated and equipped with bathtub or hydromassage bathtub, heating, television, telephone and Play Station rental also available. Moreover, there is also room connection. Restaurant.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Ansotegi Errota Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: Two-star guesthouse situated in the capital city of the province of Alava. It offers four rooms including bathroom, heating and satellite television. Because of its location, it is the ideal accommodation for business visitors. Car park also available. Special prices for groups, firms and long stays.

The hotel is located in the Zamudio Technology Park, in Bizkaia. This quiet place is surrounded by green areas. It provides 30 rooms with air-conditioning, heating, telephone, television, pipped music, terrace, PC connection, minibar and Internet. Besides, the hotel is equipped with room service, meeting hall, wine cellar, "txoko" (society), restaurant for 200, coffee-bar, car park and gardens.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Aretxarte Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: Two-star boarding house situated in Basauri, it is equipped with five double rooms and two single rooms equipped with strongbox, heating and cable television. Social hall and laundry service.

servicio.nombre: Member of National Consumer Arbitration Board

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Ariz boarding house

datosGenerales.descripcion: A three-star hotel located in Basauri, very close to Bilbao. It has 21 double and 4 single rooms with a fully equipped bathroom, telephone, satellite TV, minibar, safe and air conditioning. The hotel has room service, a restaurant, a coffee bar with terrace and an indoor car park.

galeria.titulo: Interior view of the Hotel Armiñe

datosGenerales.descripcion: Accommodation located in the centre of the seaside town of Plentzia. It has double rooms with bath or shower, television and heating. Its location, by the beach but very handy for Bilbao, makes it ideal for both holidays and business trips. It has a restaurant and cafeteria.

Three star hotel situated in the town centre of Eibar. It consists of different style rooms equipped with heating, telephone, cable television, hairdryer, safe-deposit box and room service available. In addition, the hotel also has a coffee-bar, a restaurant, a lounge and a laundry. The hotel is located next to the main bus station.

The Arresi hotel is located on a hill next to the Armintza fishing port, from where it is possible to admire the incomparable landscape of the Cantabrian sea and the coast of Bizkaia. It is equipped with 10 rooms with bathroom and 8 of the rooms overlook the sea. Surrounded by a wide garden with a swimming pool and furnishings, it constitutes the ideal place for relax. Moreover, it is also a good place for business trips as there is also a meeting room, and a lounge and a library are also available. To complete the facilities, there are a coffee bar, a dining room and the necessary equipment to play tennis, enjoy the sauna and go to the gym.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Arresi Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: The hotel is located in the city centre, next to the popular Teatro Arriaga Theatre. It is a modern building situated in the centre of the Old Town, in an area of busy trade and cultural activity. It is equipped with 21 rooms with a fully-equipped bathroom, heating, telephone and television. The hotel is provided with lift and a car park.

galeria.titulo: The hotel and the rear of Arriaga Theatre

datosGenerales.descripcion: This hotel is located in Neguri. It is a small villa with a garden that was built in 1952 by the regional architect J.M. Smith. The building is classed as historical-artistic monument by the regional council of Bizkaia and lies next to a 14,000-sq. metre park. The hotel has 7 rooms (single and double rooms), with fully-equipped bathrooms, television, telephone, fax and room service. Meeting rooms, private car park, coffee bar and a restaurant available for banquets.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Artaza Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: Guesthouse located in the centre of Donostia-San Sebastián, 50 metres far from La Concha beach. Eight rooms with complete bathroom, television and heating available. Stands out for its privileged location and the kindness of the staff.

galeria.titulo: Inside of the Pensión Artea guesthouse

datosGenerales.descripcion: The hotel is located in a Zamudio mill dating back to 1777. It is equipped with 12 double rooms and one single room, which provide heating, cable television, and hairdryer. Moreover, there are a coffee bar, a restaurant, a meeting room and a social hall available. Green areas and a garden surround the building right at the entrance of the Bizkaia Technology Park. That is why this is the perfect accommodation for both business tourism and relaxing.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Artea Errota Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion:
Two-star boarding house located in a beautiful country house 2 kilometres from Bilbao in a rural area with nice views of the city. Two apartments for four on the ground floor with living room-dining room and equipped kitchen.

 

Six rooms: two double rooms and four single rooms on the first floor. Both apartments and rooms are provided with a complete bathroom service, hairdryer, heating,  television  and Wifi Internet access. 

 

It has free guarded parking, exclusive parking for motorbikes and an electric recharging point.

This is a familiar hotel of recent construction. It is located in a rural setting, on the Artxanda Mountain, 2 kilometres from Bilbao. Spectacular panoramic views of the whole city from the hotel. It is equipped with double and single rooms with bathroom, telephone, television, heating and Wi-Fi connection.

 

Besides, there is also a boarding house.  Car park available. Pets allowed.

The Hotel Restaurante Atalaia project was born from the illusion and passion of a couple for gastronomy; Ignacio and María. In 1998 they opened the doors of the restaurant and six years later the hotel.

The house has two floors with 29 rooms and a terrace with views of Mount Jaizkibel.

It also has a garden and private outdoor parking where guests can charge their Tesla electric cars.

It is a PETFRIENDLY hotel where animals are accepted.

Two-star hotel in a singular English-style building erected at the beginning of the 20th century. It is located in front of the vantage point of Mundaka, a paradise for surfers that enables enjoying views of the river from its big viewpoints and glass balconies. It is equipped with eleven rooms with bathroom, telephone, satellite television and mini-bar. Besides, it is provided with a meeting hall, restaurant and a coffee bar with terrace.

Palacio Atxega, the historical monument of Usurbil, holds this hotel consisting of 12 rooms of country décor with bathroom, heating, air conditioning and television. The combination of stone and wood gives the hotel a cosy and country touch, according to the mountainous environment. We will also find Internet, lounge with television, restaurant and a cafeteria. Cider is produced in Usurbil, where the visitors will have the chance to taste the drink accompanied by a chop in the restaurant of the hotel.

Hotel Avenida is located in Donostia-San Sebastián, near the Ondarreta beach. From its windows visitors can enjoy beautiful views of the city and the bay. 52 outer rooms with complete bathroom, hairdryer, phone, television, safe-deposit box and mini-bar available. The hotel also has a garden, a swimming pool, free car park.

Located close to La Concha Beach, Bahía guesthouse was totally restored in 2008. All the rooms consist of fully-equipped bathroom or bathroom with toilet, shower and sink, air conditioning, TV with flat screen display, WIFI free Internet access, radio, telephone, safe box, hairdryer and so on. Lounge to serve breakfast ¿living room also available. Groups or sports teams can have lunch or dinner at Europa Hotel, which is located right next to the guesthouse. What is more, guests at Bahía guesthouse are allowed to play golf without green-fee charge at the Basozabal Golf Club. Pets allowed (contact the accommodation for conditions).

Two-star guesthouse located in the municipality of Zumarraga. It has 11 rooms equipped with heating, air conditioning and pay per view TV. There is the possibility of bike renting and room service. It is surrounded by gardens and it has restaurant and laundry.

Four-star hotel located in the capital of Bizkaia. It is equipped with 189 double and single rooms and suites. All of them are provided with strongbox, heating, air-conditioning, cable television, mini-bar and hairdryer. The hotel offers all the necessary services for business tourists and well as for those who seek leisure. There are also available a meeting room, a restaurant, a coffee-bar, a social room, a sauna and a gym also available.

servicio.nombre: Member of National Consumer Arbitration Board

datosGenerales.descripcion: The hotel Barceló Bilbao Nervión**** has re-opened its doors after a complete refurbishment of its facilities. The hotel is located in the heart of Bilbao next to the town hall, just 10 minutes from the Guggenheim Museum, the Old Town (Basque tapas bar area), and Gran Vía (the shopping district). In addition, to ensure maximum comfort, the hotel offers a new concept in sleep with its fully-equipped B-rooms. The Barceló Bilbao Nervión offers a wide variety of gastronomic options and the full range of facilities and services required to host conferences and conventions. The building extends over 1,000 m2 and boasts 10 lounges which can hold up to 1,000 people.

servicio.nombre: Member of National Consumer Arbitration Board

datosGenerales.descripcion: Hotel located in the industrial park of Gamarra, on the ring road around Vitoria-Gasteiz, which is an easily accessible area. It is equipped with 13 double rooms (can also be used by individuals), with fully-equipped bathroom, air-conditioning, TV, telephone and free Internet ADSL connection and WIFI connection. The hotel is particularly focussed on business travellers. Open 24 hours a day, except the cafeteria, which is open from 6am to 2pm. Private car park.

servicio.nombre: Member of National Consumer Arbitration Board

galeria.titulo: Outside view of the Hotel Barrachi

datosGenerales.descripcion: Guesthouse located in the centre of Donostia-San Sebastián in the old part, in a pedestrian area full of life with bars, restaurants and shops. 3 rooms with hydromassage shower, television, DVD, mini-bar, heating and safe-deposit box. In addition, the guesthouse offers laundry service, ironing, towels for the beach, Internet connection, room service, cafeteria, bar, restaurant, dining room and lounge. Owners have a bigger guesthouse 200 metres away.

galeria.titulo: Inside of the Basic Confort guesthouse

datosGenerales.descripcion:
The hostel is located on the second floor of a building in the old quarter of San Sebastian, 5 minutes from the La Concha beach, the Kursaal building and the city centre. The decoration of the rooms is inspired by different cities from around the world: Provence, Glasgow, Atlanta, Amsterdam, Rio de Janeiro and San Sebastian.

 

All have the following services: hydro-massage bath and shower, TV-DVD, safety deposit box, mini-bar and hand towels. Free Wi-Fi throughout the hostel. Beach towels and DVD movies available for hire.

 

Its recommended to check prices directly with the establishment before the reservation.

Boarding house founded in 1920 and completely restored in 2002. It is located at the heart of Bilbao, between the Gran Vía and the old quarter, shopping and social centres. It is equipped with 15 rooms with complete bathroom service, mini-bar, satellite television, hairdryer. It has free WiFi Internet connection throughout the establishment and a private library with over 1,000 books of all genres.

Two star guesthouse located in Ergobia neighbourhood (Astigarraga), near the town centre and 6 kilometre far from the beach. 7 double rooms with heating and television available. The guesthouse also has a lounge and a dining room. Own parking.

Guesthouse located in the centre of Donostia-San Sebastián. 10 double, single and triple rooms with bathroom and heating available. In addition, the guesthouse has a lift, laundry service, Internet connection and is accessible for handicapped people.

Two-star accommodation located in the small town of Berriatua. It is equipped with five rooms with heating and cable television. It is also provided with social hall, dining room, coffee bar and restaurant. A garden and green areas surround it.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Berritxu boarding house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Three-star hotel of Best Western chain. It is located in a quiet area in the city centre of Bilbao, in front of a tree-lined avenue, the ria and the Calatrava footbridge that leads to the Guggenheim Museum. The rooms are fully equipped, with bathrooms, piped music, heating, air-conditioning, television and strongbox. Besides, it provides five lounges fitted out with fax for conferences and meetings, the Internet, videoconference service, lap top rental, and all the necessary things for business tourists. Thanks to its excellent location the hotel is the perfect place to visit and enjoy Bilbao and its surroundings.
Two star guesthouse located in Irun which has double and single rooms, equipped with pay per view, safe and heating. It also has coffee shop and bar and living room.

Innovative design defines the new hotel that is located in a perfect spot, which enables to tour the city on foot and to visit the most interesting places according to the tourists.

 

It is near the ria, in the city centre of Bilbao, to be precise. A charming place as it is situated very close to the hotel. In fact, the visitors will find the Cathedral of Santiago within a walking distance of two minutes, and the celebrated Guggenheim Museum and the Fine Arts Museum are 10 minutes' walk from the hotel. The guests will have the advantage of staying just 15 minutes from Euskalduna Convention Centre. The hotel opened its doors in March of 2005. It is equipped with air-conditioning, free Internet access and 21-inch TV in the rooms. Alarm call service from the reception.

 

The hotel also provides continental breakfast supplement included.

One-star hotel located in the town of Gernika-Lumo, Bizkaia. It is equipped with 11 double and 5 single rooms provided with heating, cable television and mini-bar. Coffee bar, restaurant, dining room and social lounge also available.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Boliña Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: Two star hostal located in the border town of Irun. It has 16 rooms with heating and pay per view. It also has coffee shop and bar, conference room and feast room.

Two-star guest house located in the little town of Alegría-Dulantzi in Alava. It has 20 double and single rooms, equipped with heating and pay per view. It also has coffee shop and bar, dining room and car parks.

Two-star hotel located in the new district of Miribilla.

 

It has 41 double and single rooms equipped with safe, Internet access, heating and cable television. It also has bar-coffee shop, conference room and living room. The hotel is surrounded by green areas.

Carlton Hotel, one of the most emblematic buildings of the city, is situated in the city centre of Bilbao. It is classed as architectural, historical, artistic and cultural monument.

 

Totally restored, it is constantly being updated. It is equipped with 141 rooms decorated in classical style and provided with the latest technological advances.

 

Some of the most important business and social events of Bilbao take place in Carlton Hotel rooms. High-quality service, as appropriate for a five-star hotel.

Guesthouse located in the commercial and pedestrian area of Alava's capital city, next to the old cathedral and the medieval town. It offers 8 spacious rooms, decorated with wooden frieze frames, duvets as bedding and equiped with telephone, TV, Internet and heating. Rooms are accessed through an electronic card system.

This hotel is located in Olaberria, a town of Gipuzkoa, in the Goierri region. It consists of 30 rooms all of them provided with fully equipped bathrooms, air-conditioning, telephone, television and mini-bar. 24-hour reception service, laundry, WiFi and a coffee-bar. Moreover, the restaurant offers two wide dining rooms very appropriate for celebrations.

servicio.nombre: Member of National Consumer Arbitration Board

datosGenerales.descripcion: This exceptionally beautiful castle has been converted into a charming boutique hotel which dates back to the twentieth century (1900) and is nestled in one of the most privileged places in the village of Laguardia. The first owner, Mr. Tapia, was a respected landowner in the area and founder of the well-known brand of soap "Chimbo". The castle was built using the original stones from the barracks which date back to the twelfth century, known as "el Cuartel del Rey" (the King's Barracks). As a tribute to the magical world of the fabulist Samaniego, Castillo El Collado offers us the chance to step into this universe, experiencing this world in the ten rooms that have been decorated with exquisite taste and which afford superb views. The bedrooms, each one individually decorated, are equipped and superbly appointed. The original features and style have been maintained as far as possible. The coffered ceilings are dream-like. In the hotel lobby, a chapel with an altarpiece from the seventeenth century, in silver and gold leaf, is a pleasant surprise for visitors. There is a games area and a bar located on the main floor for you to use at your leisure and is flanked by beautiful art nouveau stained glass.

Neo-Gothic tower made of limestone and Ereñu marble located at the heart of the Urdaibai Reserve. It was restored respecting its original characteristics. It is equipped with fourteen original rooms with hydromassage bathtub or shower, telephone, air-conditioning, Internet and television. It offers excellent views both from the rooms and the terrace-solarium up in the tower. Gardens surround the tower. Menu à la Carte. From big banquets to small business lunches.

Three-star hotel located just a few metres from Ondarreta beach, close to the city centre. Outward-facing bedrooms equipped with en-suite bathroom, air conditioning, telephone, plasma TV, safe-deposit box, minibar, and ADSL and Wi-Fi connections. The hotel has a lounge with a television and coffee shop, as well as a garage where hotel guests can park their vehicles. Currency exchange, dry cleaning and a bedroom pizza-delivery service are also available. In addition, the hotel also rents out its halls, which can be used for a variety of purposes.

Four star hotel located in the residential area of Ondarreta, near the beach of the same name and next to the gardens of Miramar Palace. 203 rooms with bathroom, mini-bar, air-conditioning, heating, telephone, safe-deposit box and hairdryer available.

 

In addition, the hotel is also equipped with an outdoor swimming pool with garden, tennis courts, 5 lounges, cybercorner and a garage. They also offer money exchange service, car rental, trips, bike rental and medical services if needed. Basque and International Cuisine Ulia Showcooking Restaurant.
Two-star guesthouse in the capital city of Euskadi. It offers 15 double rooms equiped with heating, cable TV and hairdryer. It is surrounded by a garden and green areas.

galeria.titulo: The interior of Dato 2 guest house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Hotel located in the city centre of Vitoria. It holds up to 28 clients, that is the reason why the customer service is friendly. The rooms have fully-equipped bathrooms, direct telephone service, satellite television, piped music and WIFI Internet connection. Its decoration is full of original and unique items, what make of the hotel a singular place. Special service for companies is offered.

This hotel is located in the city centre of Vitoria-Gasteiz. Double and single rooms equipped with heating and cable television. The hotel also consists of a social lounge and Internet access. This is the perfect place to arrange business trips due to its location.

servicio.nombre: Member of National Consumer Arbitration Board

datosGenerales.descripcion: Two-star hotel located in the Lakua area. It is very close to the main communication links with Vitoria-Gasteiz, thus very appropriate to accommodate business travellers. It offers single, double and triple rooms, all equiped with air-conditioning, heating, magnetic lock, TV, hairdryer, telephone, ambient music, safe, standard telephone line and work desk. The hotel is surrounded by garden areas and has its own car-park.

galeria.titulo: Outside view of the Hotel Duque de Wellington

datosGenerales.descripcion: This one-star hotel situated in the urban centre of Lantarón, offers 10 rooms equiped with Internet connection, safe, cable TV and heating. It also has a cafeteria and is surrounded by green areas with amenities for children.

galeria.titulo: Outside view of the Hotel Durtzi

datosGenerales.descripcion:
Minimalist style hotel, located in a strategic location, at the foot of the AP8 and A63 and N121 motorways, with direct access to the motorway. 

It has 54 exterior rooms, some of them family rooms, with everything necessary to guarantee maximum comfort.

It also has a restaurant, cafeteria, games room and private car park with electric car charger. 3 kms from the FICOBA exhibition centre.

Two star-rural hotel located in a privileged environment within the Gorbeia Natural Park. It is equipped with double and single rooms provided with heating, air conditioning, cable television, bathroom and Internet access. Meeting hall and access for the disabled. Restaurant and bar available. It is possible practising golf and horse riding in the surroundings. Trees encompass the hotel, as well as green areas and a garden. An ideal hotel to enjoy nature and relax.

The hotel is situated in the urban centre of the coastal Mundaka, very close to the port. It provides 11 rooms with fully-equipped bathrooms, satellite television, heating, telephone and room service. Besides, there are also available a bar, a terrace, and a garden surrounding the hotel.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the El Puerto Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: Modern-style hotel located on the outskirts of Elorrio, in Bizkaia. It consists of 27 rooms, all of them very comfortable, with heating, fully-equipped bathrooms, telephone, Internet, mini-bar and satellite television. Meeting room, restaurant with wide dining room and gardened areas also available. It is the right hotel for business meetings and leisure tourism due to its geographical location within the heart of Euskadi.

Hotel located on the dock of Las Arenas (Getxo) overlooking the sea. This building reminds us of the typical Basque country houses but with a modern and minimalist decoration. Its rooms are equipped with Internet access and flat panel television. Besides, there is a meeting hall with a capacity of up to 50, car park, garden, restaurant and coffee bar with terrace in front of the sea. It is the ideal place for business trips due to its proximity to business centres as well as for holiday relax.

Three-star hotel located over the Palacio de Uribarren Palace. It is equipped with 42 rooms. Wifi connection, mini-bar, television with worldwide channels and strongbox. Moreover, there are rooms available for all type of meetings, conferences, business lunches, press conferences, weddings and so on.

 

This is located in the incomparable setting of the fishing town of Lekeitio, on the shores of the Bay of Biscay. Just over Isuntza beach, it has the best views of the harbour, the sea, the beach and the island of San Nicolás.

 

Fine food is one of the hotel's strongest points: it has a café serving pintxos made with local produce, from the most classic to the most cutting-edge, and a restaurant, Ebisu, where you can try traditional and avant-garde dishes, again cooked using local produce.

Four-star hotel located in the heart of Bilbao, very close to the Palacio Euskalduna and the Guggenheim Museum. It boasts more than 300 rooms, comprising double and single rooms, suites and mini suites, all equipped with full bathroom, air conditioning, direct telephone, wifi, mini-bar, safety deposit box, hair-dryer and interactive television with 18 channels. The hotel also boasts a disco, coffee shop-bar, restaurant, meeting rooms, banquet room, gymnasium and laundrette. It is one of the city¿s social hubs, and is used to stage a multitude of events.

New construction hotel situated in the Bizkaia town of Ea. Located between the sea and the mountains, it is equipped with 9 rooms with heating, air-conditioning, cable television, bathroom with hairdryer. All of them overlook the sea and the mountains. The hotel is surrounded by green areas with playgrounds. The hotel also consists of a meeting room, a terrace, a car park, a restaurant and a coffee-bar. It is the perfect place to visit the Urdaibai Reserve, Laga and Laida beaches and the villa of Gernika.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Ermintxo Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: One-star hotel located in a valley of Ayala castle. It is equipped with 19 double and single rooms with complete bathroom service, heating, television, piped music, Wifi connection to the Internet, phone and telephone exchange. One double room is fitted out for the disabled. Coffee bar available. Gardens and green areas surround the hotel. Ideal accommodation to enjoy nature.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Errekagain Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: Errota boarding house with nine outward-facing rooms with heating, television, bathroom and extra bed if requested. It is located in Durango, close to the old quarter, in a quiet atmosphere. Dining room available, reservation is necessary. Access to gym Kirolerrota with fitness centre, aerobics, sauna, tennis and paddle courts totally free. Rooms for conferences, meetings or activities for rental. It is also a hostel.

galeria.titulo: The inside of a boarding house

datosGenerales.descripcion:
Etxe Aundi Hotel Boutique is located in the valley of Oñati, in a 13th century building that stands out for its special architectural value. Its fully renovated rooms combine design, comfort and style to offer an unforgettable stay. 

Oñati, located in the heart of Gipuzkoa, offers a natural environment and a unique artistic and cultural heritage.

Hotel of classic and familiar atmosphere in the centre of Gipuzkoa and surrounded by mountains. 38 fully equipped rooms, a restaurant for big events with dining rooms and lounges. The hotel also consists of terrace, gardens and a car park.

Three-star hotel situated in the Amorebieta-Etxano neighbourhood of Euba, very close to Durango. It is equipped with 35 outward-facing and climatised rooms provided with strongbox, Internet, cable television and hairdryer. It is a modern and functional decoration hotel, which is perfect for business tourism as well as for leisure tourism as it is located in the middle of the Basque Country near the Urkiola Natural Park. It is equipped with 3 lounges, a coffee bar, a restaurant and a pelota court. Green areas surround the hotel.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Hotel Euba

datosGenerales.descripcion: Two-star guest house situated in a recently-restored building and one kilometre far from the town centre. Double and single rooms with heating, cable television and hairdryer available. The guest house also has a bar, a lounge, a launderette and a dry cleaner's.

Totally restored neoclassical building that is situated 50 metres far from La Concha bay. 68 double and single rooms with safe-deposit box, heating, air-conditioning, Internet, cable television, mini-bar and hairdryer available (room service included). The hotel also has a coffee-bar, a restaurant, a dining room, a banquet hall, a meeting hall, entertainment programme and launderette.

Two star hotel located in La Concha bay, right beside the beach. 30 double and single rooms available with bathroom, hairdryer, television, telephone, air-conditioning and background music. The hotel also consists of a meeting hall with the following services: Wi-Fi connection, air-conditioning, mobile panels and audio-visual facilities. Moreover, there are also a restaurant and a coffee-bar, laundry service and a private car park.

Two star hotel situated in a 19th century French-style building. It is located next to Ondarreta beach, with outstandings views to La Concha Bay. 23 double and single rooms with Internet connection, safe-deposit box, heating, air-conditioning, cable television, mini-bar and hairdryer available. The hotel also has a coffee-bar and they rent bikes. It is surrounded by trees and green areas.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of La Galeria Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: Small rural accommodation overlooking the magnificent sea on the coastal Bakio, close to the popular hermitage of San Juan de Gaztelugatxe. It is equipped with 8 outward-looking double rooms, totally equipped and decorated in rustic style. It should be noted that the very rooms overlook the breathtaking San Juan de Gaztelugatxe, one of the most favourit spots of the tourists. It is provided with Internet access, heating, social hall, bar, coffee bar, restaurant and private car park.

Modern three-star hotel located in the centre of Vitoria-Gasteiz, next to the Palacio de Congresos Europa convention centre and just 8 minutes away from the airport. It consists of 114 rooms with air-conditioning, fully equipped bathroom, safe-deposit box, Internet Wi-Fi, satellite and pay-per-view TV, hairdryer and telephone. Moreover, its facilities also include a restaurant, six rooms to hold meetings, interviews, conferences and banquets with a capacity of between 12 and 150 people.

servicio.nombre: Member of National Consumer Arbitration Board

datosGenerales.descripcion: Recently restored three-star room located in the historical town of Gernika. It is equipped with 40 rooms, Internet, heating, air-conditioning, cable television and hairdryer. Besides, the hotel also consists of 4 social rooms, a coffee bar, an Internet coffee bar, a garden, a terrace and a car park. Thanks to its location it is the ideal place to stay for business as well as to visit the town of Gernika and the Urdaibai Reserve. Completely adapted for the disabled.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Gernika Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: The hotel is situated next to the Atxabiribil beach, in a quiet area on the outskirts of Sopelana, in front of the cliffs. It is equipped with 12 rooms, all of them with telephone, television and heating. It provides a homemade cuisine restaurant and a coffee-bar with terrace, very pleasant both in summer and winter.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Goizalde Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: Friendly, family-run hotel in Ariznabarra, opposite the new Zabalgana neighbourhood. Only five minutes by car from the centre, the hotel is situated in a quiet area with easy parking and excellent connections. For a small surcharge you can also use the hotel's private indoor car park. We accept pets free of charge, but please advise us in advance. All rooms have central heating, TV, full en-suite bathroom and free Wi-Fi connection, and they are all sunny and overlook the gardens.

Situated in the heart of San Sebastián, right in the Old Town with its typical bars and restaurants, where pintxos are among the star dishes. Two minutes’ walk from La Concha beach, the harbour and the Aquarium, the location is an ideal base from which to explore the city without any need for a car. The rooms have fully-equipped bathrooms, TV and free Wi-Fi.

galeria.titulo: Outside of the Pensión Gran Bahía guesthouse

datosGenerales.descripcion: Four-star hotel situated in a beautiful building of Bizkaia's town of Durango, close to the Urkiola Natural Park. Modern and functional decoration, it is equipped with 69 rooms, all of them provided with heating, air-conditioning, cable television, Internet, mini-bar and hairdryer. A gardened area surrounds the hotel and a coffee bar, a restaurant and a car park are available. It is situated in the town centre but overlooking the mountains.

Gran Hotel Lakua, the first 5-star hotel to open in Vitoria-Gasteiz, offers 109 rooms, 24 apartments, 9 studio apartments and 2 suites. It is located near one of the most modern shopping centres in town, and provides its own and generous parking facilities. Due to its privileged location and services, it is ideal to host all kinds of gatherings and events.

Three-star hotel situated in Portugalete, near the hanging bridge and a historical building dating back to the 19th century but totally restored. It is equipped with 74 rooms with Internet, strongbox, room service, heating, air-conditioning, cable television, mini-bat and hairdryer. Coffee bar, restaurant, meeting hall, banquet room and social hall also available.

Picturesque four star hotel built in traditional Basque architecture and located in a beautiful spot, next to Igeldo mountain, with views to La Concha bay. 43 rooms with bathroom, television, phone, mini-bar, hairdryer, air conditioning and safe-deposit box available. In addition, the hotel has a living room equipped with television and fireplace. Several halls (for meetings and banquets) with a capacity between 25 and 300 people and restaurant service available. Other facilities of the hotel include a swimming pool, a billard and game club and a bar with terraces. It is surrounded by a garden and children's facilities. It offers special conditions to play golf in Basozabal Golf Club (9 holes).

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Gudamendi Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: Cosy, traditional three-story Basque house with a stunning, rustic design. The house was built in 1971 and was refurbished in 1991. Located in the centre of Getaria, a coastal town where you can enjoy excellent cuisine and incomparable landscapes.

galeria.titulo: Mount San Antón - Mouse of Getaria

datosGenerales.descripcion: Two-star boarding house located in a historical building of the Bilbao old quarter. It is equipped with double and single rooms provided with Internet, heating and cable television.

Hotel and restaurant located in a natural setting that is 11 kilometre from Donostia-San Sebastián. It consists of 36 rooms provided with bathroom, television and telephone. The hotel houses a prestigious restaurant of the same name with a capacity of up to 300 guests. Large car park.

servicio.nombre: Member of National Consumer Arbitration Board

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Gurutze Berri Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: Sweet English style hotel built in 1910 and restored in 2000. It is located in the old quarter of Amorebieta-Etxano and surrounded by gardens, which convert it into the perfect accommodation to visit the area, both on business and tourism grounds. It is equipped with 12 rooms with bathroom, television, mini-bar, meeting hall, restaurant, private car park and Internet.

Four-star hotel located in the Bilbao city centre, in front of the San Mamés stadium. It is a restored historical building equipped with 82 rooms with heating, air conditioning, Internet Wifi connection and digital television. It is provided with several rooms for conventions, a glazed big top over a panoramic terrace overlooking the Nervión, a car park, bar and restaurant.

Hotel Santuario de Arantzazu is located in a beautiful and natural setting on the edge of cliffs and ravines. Rebuilt in 2008, the hotel still keeps its ancient hostel touch and local tradition. Its style is the resulting combination of rustic, traditional, avant-garde and latest technologies. It consists of 52 rooms, one suite, a space for relaxing and care called Therma Hydrotherapy, a restaurant, a cafeteria, a game area and a wide meeting room decorated with fine materials where glass, ashlar stone and wood stand out.

Four-star hotel, belonging to Husa hotel chain. It is located in the commercial and business area of Bilbao, 5 minutes from the Guggenheim Museum, the Euskalduna Congress and Music Palace and the Old Town. It consists of 138 rooms with TV, air conditioning, heating, safe, hairdryer, radio and mini-bar. Gym, Jacuzzi, living room with TV, conference room, business centre, WIFI internet access, cafeteria, 24 hour room service, launderette, lobby bar, car park and the restaurant-grillroom Zuria. Its SPA is remarkable.

Overlooking the Urdaibai Biosphere Reserve, this hotel is inspired by the Basque architecture. Gardens, arcades and terraces surround it. It is provided with outward-facing soundproof rooms with telephone, heating and television. There are also rooms for families as well as meeting halls of different capacities.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Ibaigune Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion:
The hotel is located within a traditional architecture rambling house in Zalla, in a rural setting.

 

It provides 14 rooms equipped with bathroom, Internet, strongbox, satellite television and heating. The hotel is surrounded by green areas and a garden.

 

A coffee-bar and restaurant available, as well as an itinerant exhibition of new artists whose works will be on sale.

This hotel, located in front of the trade fair Bilbao Exhibition Centre and near the shopping centres Max Centre and Mega Park, belongs to the IBIS chain. It is equipped with 94 climatised rooms, three are adapted for the disabled. Restaurant, 24-hour bar, closed free car park on the outside and one meeting room available. Internet WiFi connection.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Ibis Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: This hotel is located in Irun frontier municipality. It consists of 76 rooms with bathroom, heating, Internet, safe-deposit box, air-conditioning and cable television. It also has Internet WiFi, a 24-hour coffee-bar, restaurant, meeting room, indoor car park and laundry service.

galeria.titulo: The interior of the Ibis Irun Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: Modern and recently built hotel with an an uptodate, comfortable and functional design. It is mainly dedicated to business tourism, as it is equipped with a work area with a projector and connection for computers and the Internet. The hotel is located in Gipuzkoa. 25 rooms with bathroom, television, safe-deposit box, air-conditioning, mini-bar and piped music also available. There are also a coffee-bar and a private garage.
Guesthouse located in the centre of Zarautz, next to the beach. It has 7 double rooms, living room with TV and heating.

galeria.titulo: Inside view of one of the rooms

datosGenerales.descripcion: Completely restored 16th century Basque farm house that keeps its original architecture made of stone and wood. Located in Galdako, a very quiet area close to Bilbao, it is equipped with 9 outward-looking rooms with fully-equipped bathrooms, satellite television, telephone, heating and Internet access. Moreover, the hotel is fitted out with sitting rooms, bar exclusive for clients, terrace, a car park and a small garden.

galeria.titulo: Exterior view of the Iraragorri Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: Two star guesthouse located next to the beach. Four double rooms with bathroom, heating and cable television available. Restaurant within the hotel.

Two-star boarding house located in the upper area of the fishing town of Elantxobe. It is equipped with 12 rooms overlooking the sea, with central heating, complete bathroom service, television and telephone. The restaurant of the same name is at 20 metres.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Itsasmin boarding house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Boarding house located in the Bilbao city centre, in the old quarter. It is equipped with bathroom, central heating, television, telephone and Internet. Despite being totally restored, it still keeps the stone walls and oak beams that give the building a rustic atmosphere. It is provided with a beautiful interior garden to access the dining room, where breakfast is served. It displays pieces of work from local artists and objects. Owners attend clients and the reception is open 24 hours.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the boarding house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Located in the old part of Donostia-San Sebastián, with views to the sea and near La Concha and Gros beaches. 5 rooms with bathroom, Internet connection, heating, television and terrace available. They offer breakfasts in the rooms, ironing, fax service and 24-hour attention. This is the right place to arrange visits to the city and for business tourism (is situated in front of Kursaal Congress Hall).
Two-star guesthouse located in the interior of Gipuzkoa. It has 24 rooms with telephone and air conditioning.

Modern and minimalist four star hotel, surrounded by gardens and very close to the centre of Hondarribia. 24 rooms with air-conditioning, bathroom, Internet connection, satellite television, hairdryer and digital safe-deposit box available. In addition, the hotel consists of a solarium, a restaurant, a coffee-bar, a library and a lounge with fireplace. Four meeting halls available for video conferences, presentations, etc. with safe-deposit box, free mini-bar, television, private videos and WIFI connection. They also offer room service, laundry service, pillows à la Carte, 24 hour reception and a garage. Agreements for clients with golf clubs.

servicio.nombre: Member of National Consumer Arbitration Board

datosGenerales.descripcion:
Hotel located in the centre of Hondarribia, in the La Marina area, close to the beach and the marina. It is located in a strategic area, between San Sebastián and Biarritz (France).

Renovated bedrooms, complete with mini bars, TV LCD, satellite and a special safe for laptops, and also a complete bathroom with hair-dryer, air conditioning and telephone. The apartments are equipped with the same services as the rooms, as well as having a fully equipped kitchen.

Free Wi-Fi in the entire establishment, which also boasts the Enbata bar-restaurant, two meeting rooms, function room with plasma TV, DVD and computer, as well as garage spaces.

Rural hotel situated in the quiet neighbourhood of Zierbena port and close to La Arena beach.

It is also 15 minutes far from Bilbao and 10 minutes from the Bilbao Exhibition Centre. It is equipped with 6 double and 1 single rooms with heating, bathroom and television. It also provides a nice lounge with television, dining room and Basque cuisine restaurant.

The whole hotel can be hired.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Kaia rural-hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: Guesthouse located in the old part of Donostia-San Sebastián, near the port, the beach and the typical "pintxo" (culinary masterpiece) area. 7 rooms with bathroom, television and heating available.

galeria.titulo: Outside of the Pensión Kaia Guesthouse

datosGenerales.descripcion: Smart hotel-restaurant situated next to the port of coastal Plentzia. It is equipped with 7 rooms overlooking the sea and with all the services and mod cons available: air-conditioning, mini-bar, television, telephone and Internet access (ADSL). Its location is ideal to enjoy the coast of Bizkaia in a peaceful environment, but with the advantage of staying in the centre of the town.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Kaian Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: Modern building of typical Basque style with three floors. Located in a rural area, near the Sanctuary of Loyola it offers beautiful views. 2 single rooms and 10 double rooms with fully-equipped bathroom, television, telephone and balcony available. Moreover, the hotel has two terraces overlooking the sea and the mountain, a meeting hall, a coffee-bar and a dining room. Special services for companies.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Kanal Itziar Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: This four-star hotel belongs to the popular Basque chef Karlos Arguiñano. It is a restored castle located next to the beach of Zarautz. It consists of 12 double and single rooms equipped with bathroom, safe, room service, heating, air-conditioning, via satellite TV and hairdryer. Besides, the hotel also consists of a coffee bar with terrace, a prestigious restaurant, a meeting room and a terrace-solarium.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Karlos Arguiñano hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: Newly-built, modern farmhouse located in the heart of the Urdaibai Reserve. 9 bedrooms, each with complete bathroom, shower and bathtub (some of the bathtubs also have whirlpools), under-floor heating, air conditioning, wireless Wi-Fi internet connection, satellite television, DVD/CD player (only available in some of the bedrooms), and minibar and safe-deposit box (available in all bedrooms). In addition, the hotel runs a coffee shop and restaurant in an adjoining building, as well as a social lounge in which guests can choose from a selection of books, newspapers and music. From the terraces, guests can also enjoy views of the hotel gardens and beautiful natural surroundings.

The hotel is situated in the centre of Amorebieta-Etxano, in a peaceful area. The Amorebieta agreement was signed in 1972 in the historic building, that is why it was named after it and the reason for its original structure to be untouched along with its typical Basque style. It is equipped with 9 rooms with bathrooms, Internet WIFI, television and hairdryer. Sitting room with television, reading room, coffee bar with two gardened terraces and a car park also available.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Hotel Konbenio

datosGenerales.descripcion: Guesthouse located in the centre of Donostia-San Sebastián, next to the beach and in front of the Kursaal Congress Palace and Auditorium. 10 rooms with bathroom, hairdryer, heating, iron, satellite television and Internet (WIFI) connection available. The also offer breakfast service in the rooms, laundry service and launderette and 24 hour-attention. In addition, the guesthouse has a living room with Internet connection, video-conference, fax and phone. They rent bikes.

The beautiful sunny house that dates back to the 16th century is located in the centre of Mundaka, within the Urdaibai Biosphere Reserve. It is completely restored and in all, it is equipped with 22 rooms with bathrooms, television, heating and telephone. Moreover, it is provided with a bar, a terrace, a lounge and 24-hour room service. Thanks to its location in the centre of Mundaka, the access to any service is easy in a few minutes, and also guarantees the quiet offered by the coastal town, birthplace of surfing.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Branka Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: Hotel located in the town centre of Vitoria-Gasteiz. It has 29 rooms with bathroom, TV, telephone, radio and heating. It also has restaurant, bar and coffee shop.

galeria.titulo: Outside view of La Bilbaina hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: Elegant rustic building from the early 20th century, completely refurbished. It is located in the Valley of Zuia, at the foot of mount Gorbea in the province of Alava, and just 15 minutes from Vitoria-Gasteiz. It offers single, double and triple rooms, all of them with fully-equiped bathrooms, satellite television, air-conditioning, telephone and WI-FI Internet Connection. (Triple room 71.69 Euro at low season and 78.11 Euro at high season). It is also equipped with a coffee bar and restaurant where you will be able to taste the delicious local cuisine.

Two-star hotel located in the Bilbao old quarter. It is equipped with double and single rooms with bathroom, heating and television. It is also provided with room service, shop, meeting room and coffee bar. It is very close to business area and shops due to its proximity, which is also ideal for leisure and business tourism.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of La Estrella boarding house

datosGenerales.descripcion: This 2-star guesthouse is located in the heart of the city, with easy access to its main attractions. It offers rooms with bathroom, TV, safe, ambient music and mini-bar, meetings room, heating, 24 hour room service, simultaneous translation service and bar-cafeteria. Animals welcome. Discounts for groups, associations and companies.

galeria.titulo: Outside view of Pensión La Paz

datosGenerales.descripcion: Located in one the best areas of Donostia-San Sebastián and near all the important points: the beach, the harbour, monuments and the gastronomical area. The rooms are equipped with bathroom, TV and heating. The guesthouse has living room, room service and internet access.

Two-star guesthouse in the capital of Alava. It offers double and single rooms with bathroom, room service, heating, air-conditioning and cable TV. It also has a restarurant and the green areas next to it are ideal for picnics or gatherings when the weather is good.

galeria.titulo: Outside view of Pensión La Zuyana

datosGenerales.descripcion: Three-star hotel member of the Aisia chain. It is located in the Bizkaia Technology Park between Derio and Zamudio. The hotel is equipped with 38 rooms (31 double and 7 single) with hydromassage bathtub or shower, ADSL Internet access, mini-bar, television, strongbox and ecological air conditioning. Besides, the hotel is provided with an hydromassage vapour room, sauna, Jacuzzi, infrared cabin, solarium, enveloping shower system, massage cabin and gym. The hotel is fitted out for business tourism, as well as for leisure as it offers dinners with live music in a restaurant and a peaceful environment to enjoy nature, among other things.

One-star hotel and restaurant located in a totally-restored 18th-century country house of great architectural interest. It consists of 8 double and single rooms provided with bathroom, Internet and heating. Moreover, it also has a lounge with pool, coffee-bar, terrace and a restaurant with traditional Basque cuisine. The hotel is surrounded by green spaces with children's facilities. Four kilometres from the Sanctuary of Loyola.

galeria.titulo: The hostel originated in the early 14th century

datosGenerales.descripcion: The Lauaxeta former house was turned into a hotel located in the middle of the urban area of Mungia. It is equipped with 17 rooms provided with bathroom, telephone, heating, Internet, minibar and cable television. A coffee-bar, a restaurant, a dining room, a meeting room and a lounge are also available. Green areas surround the hotel.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Lauaxeta Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion:
Two-star hotel located on Mount Igeldo. A green area next to the Bay of Biscay and 10 minutes from San Sebastián city centre. 18 rooms with fully equipped bathroom with hair dryer, television, telephone and free Wi-Fi Internet access available. In addition, the hotel also consists of a living room overlooking the sea and the cliffs of the Igeldo Mountain, a dining room and a garden with the children's facilities.

 

Expert advice is given on routes of nature and lanscape, gastronomic and historical and artistic interest around the Basque Country. They will also inform us about cultural events, leisure, as well as activities and sports in the open air. Leaflets of all sorts at the clients' disposal.

Two-star hotel located in the town of Urnieta. It consists of 6 double and 1 single room equipped with Internet, heating, air-conditioning, television, mini-bar and hairdryer. The hotel is surrounded by trees, green spaces and a garden. Private car park.

galeria.titulo: The inside of the Ler Argi Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: The hotel is located in a peaceful environment 11 kilometres far from Donostia-San Sebastián and near the old frontier. It consist of 132 rooms with bathroom, hairdryer, TV and telephone. It has several restaurants and dining rooms for 450 guests. Besides, it is also equipped with bar and coffee bar with terrace. The hotel offers alarm clock service, safe, buffet breakfast, laundry service and conference rooms.

Two-star hotel located next to the Sanctuary of Loiola that was founded in 1996. 36 modern and comfortable rooms with fully equipped bathroom, Internet connection, heating, telephone, mini-bar and television available. In addition, the hotel consists of a restaurant fitted out for banquets, a dining room and a meeting hall for 25. Due to its location, this is the right place to enjoy the history and the monuments of Azkoitia and the surroundings.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Loiola Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion:
Recent construction hotel situated in the surroundings of the Bilbao airport. It is equipped with 21 double rooms and 3 single rooms with fully-equipped bathrooms, television, piped music, telephone, Internet and views to the exterior.

It is located in a rural and peaceful area but close to business centres and leisure areas (5km from Bilbao).

It is provided with a restaurant for 120 guests, reservation for business lunch, wedding receptions and banquets.

Set in a 14th-century palace, the hotel has been recently restored.

 

It is surrounded by gardens in a pleasant and picturesque municipality in the Valley of Ayala.

 

It offers 16 double rooms with bathroom, heating, telephone and TV, and the hotel also has a lounge with fireplace, meeting room and dining room, as well as a restaurant, terrace and car-park.

Very well situated guesthouse, next to the Renfe train station and the commercial area of Irun. 27 rooms with bathroom and television with earphones available. The reception opens all-night and the hotel has a bar and a lift. Dogs are allowed.

galeria.titulo: Outside of the Pensión Los Fronterizos Guesthouse

datosGenerales.descripcion: Rural hotel and restaurant located in an old harvest house of the Roturos lands of crop. It is next to Izki Natural Park, 15 minutes from Vitoria-Gasteiz. It is equipped with 7 double rooms and a single one with bathroom, apart from a living room with self-service breakfast. There is tourist information available about the area.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Hotel Los Roturos

datosGenerales.descripcion:
Three-star hotel located in front of the Ereaga Beach in Getxo, between the picturesque old port of Algorta and the marina with its catering, cinema and leisure sources.

It is equipped with laptops, ipod docks abd hydromassage showers in all the rooms. Bicycle rollers available in high-quality rooms. Moreover, it also consists of a coffee bar with a covered terrace and a restaurant with a banquet room. Besides, there are several meeting rooms, a business centre, free Internet Wi-Fi access in the whole hotel, a gameroom and a social lounge. Bikes to go for a ride as well as cradles and pushchairs for the children free of charge.

Green areas surround the hotel.

Right in the heart of Bilbao, this is the ideal base for visiting some of the city’s top tourist attractions on foot, including the Guggenheim museum, the Arriaga theatre and the cathedral of Santiago. It is also just 200 metres from the Arriaga tram stop, 300 metres from the Casco Viejo metro station and less than 10 minutes’ walk from Abando railway station. The establishment can provide tourist information, look after bags and print out boarding passes.

Hotel situtated in the centre of Donostia-San Sebastián, in Amara neighbourhood, between the bus station and Anoeta sports area. Rooms with bathroom, television, fridge and heating available. It has a parking and next to the guesthouse there is a bar-restaurant.

galeria.titulo: Inside of the Pensión Maite Guesthouse

datosGenerales.descripcion: One-star hotel set in the municipality of Laguardia, in Rioja Alavesa. It is equipped with 9 double and one single rooms fitted out with heating, TV, telephone, Internet and hairdryer. Other facilities are a convention hall for meetings or banquets, and a social lounge. Vineyards that produce the popular and valued Rioja-Alavesa wine surround the hotel, that is why it is the perfect place to visit these lands and its endless wineries.

servicio.nombre: Member of National Consumer Arbitration Board

datosGenerales.descripcion:
Prestigious five-star hotel designed by the French architect Charles Mewes, creator of the Ritz hotels in Paris and Madrid.

It is located a few metres from the beach, overlooking the Cantabrian Sea and the Urumea river, and surrounded by gardens. Its classic façade, made of carved stone, is the calling card for an interior with all the luxury of the Belle Époque. The rooms and their bedrooms and suites are decorated with elegance typical of its times and a modern touch.

Each September, the great figures invited to the International Film Festival stay in the Maria Cristina hotel.

It houses the Easo restaurant, one of the best restaurants in the city, the Asian restaurant Tse Yang San Sebastian and the bar Dry San Sebastian.

Restored farmhouse located in a rural and calmed area, close to the airport and the Bizkaia Technology Park. It is equipped with ten double rooms and three single rooms with bathroom, television and Internet WIFI. Besides, there is a living room with a chimney, as well as table games for guests, and a private car park. It is surrounded by a forest and the hotel has a huge garden. Locally grown products can be purchased. Contiguous rural house.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Matsa Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: The hotel is located within the palace of "Elorza Enea" and built in 1920. It has been classed historical and artistic interest by the regional council of Gipuzkoa. The hotel is situated in the Valle del Hierro (Valley of Iron), in the geographical centre between the Basque capitals, that is why this is the perfect accommodation for leisure and business tourism. It consists of 12 rooms with bathroom, satellite television, telephone, Internet and heating. Moreover, there are also conference rooms with equipment, coffee bar, restaurant, social lounge, terrace, laundry service, car park and Internet WiFi.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Mauleón Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion:
Farmhouse located on the Urko mountainside, between Mallabia, Eibar, Markina-Xemein and Ermua. It was built in the 18th century and was restored keeping its characteristics and traditional style untouched. It is equipped with 7 double rooms, one single room and an apartment for 4.

 

It provides a car park, a terrace with views and fruit trees. Homemade bread and baking. It organises business meetings with lunch and catering service, as well as barbecue meat cooked over firewood oven. Journey service negotiable.

A hotel situated on top of the Igeldo mountain, at 170 metres. It offers a panoramic view of the city and the Bay of Biscay.

 

It is located on a green area 3 kilometres away from the city centre of San Sebastian, next to the lighthouse and the funicular that goes down to the Ondarreta beach. It has 125 fully-equipped bedrooms, a common lounge, 5 meeting rooms, a restaurant, outdoor swimming pool and a car park.

 

It stands out because of its excellent view on the Bay of Biscay.

The two-star coastal hotel provides nine bright rooms with fully-equipped bathrooms -hydromassage bathtub and hairdryer. Television, telephone, Internet connection and heating also available. There is a room fitted out for the disabled. Terrace solarium over the sea and a beautiful garden surrounded by flowers at the backside. Metrokua hotel is located by the Karraspio beach with wonderful views of the sea, a few minutes on foot from Lekeitio.

Stylish boutique-hotel located in the city centre of Bilbao, between the Guggenheim Museum and the Museum of Fine Arts. Designed by the fashion designer Antonio Miró, it consists of 50 rooms of original and functional style with fantastic views of the city. 

 

It has meeting rooms, a library, a bar and a magnificent contemporary photography collection of some 40 works. It also offers all kinds of massages through its wellness service.

Hotel situated in a building dating back to the early 20th century in the town centre of Arrasate/Mondragón, birthplace of cooperativism and spot of value in terms of tourism. It consists of 43 outward-facing rooms with bathroom, safe-deposit boxes, telephone, television, air conditioning, mini-bar, Internet WIFI access and DSL modem available. It also has a coffee bar -piano bar with "pintxos" (culinary masterpieces), a big winery, a terrace where to relax, meeting rooms and a private car park.

Hotel situated in a quiet area of Donostia-San Sebastián suburbs, 4 minutes from Gros beach. It consists of 46 outward-looking rooms with a terrace, television, telephone, heating, ventilator, safe-deposit box and fully equipped bathroom. In addition, the hotel has a coffee-bar, restaurant Kukua, a car park, a left-luggage office, telefax and Internet connection.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Monte Ulía Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: Mundaka Hotel is located in the Urdaibai Biosphere Reserve. Inaugurated in 1995, it occupies a building of historic interest in the old part of the municipality and next to the beach. The building keeps its original facade and the inside has been fully restored. It provides 19 rooms with bathroom, satellite television, telephone and piped music. Moreover, the hotel also consists of a coffee-bar, a lounge with DVD, a garden with a playground and Internet WIFI.

Muskiz Hotel is a construction that was built in 1928 so that Treasury from Bizkaia would draw taxes. Its rustic architecture is made of stone, nozzle and wood. The hotel is located in an exceptional setting; 200km from the A-8 motorway, on the boundary between Bizkaia and Cantabria. The spot enables enjoying the nearest beaches and mountains, as well as art, culture and leisure due to its closeness to the city centre of Bilbao. The hotel provides 20 outlooking rooms with bathroom (hydromassage available if requested), hairdryer, heating, telephone and digital television. Moreover, there are also fax service, a coffee-bar and a free car park.

The three-star hotel member of the NH chain is situated near the University of Deusto, between the Guggenheim Museum and Euskalduna convention centre. It is equipped with 70 rooms with bathroom, hairdryer, mini-bar, air-conditioning, television, telephone and Wi-Fi Internet service. Moreover, the hotel offers laundry service, indoor car park, fully-equipped convention rooms, coffee-bar and restaurant. It is a perfect place for leisure and business tours due to its equipment and location.

Four-star hotel in a beautiful palace dating back to the beginning of the 20th century. It was classed as historic monument. The hotel is located up on a high ground overlooking the Abra bay in the town centre. The palace was restored but its interior patio and the chapel were kept untouched. It is equipped with 69 double rooms, 9 single rooms, 2 suites and 3 lounges that hold from 10 to 500 guests.

All the services available, such as laundry, Internet access, business centre, air-conditioning, pillows à la Carte, coffee-bar and room service, among others. Restaurant "El Palacio."

Country house from the Lea-Artibai region that dates back to 1764. It was totally restored looking after the interior decoration to the maximum by combining tradition, design and comfort.

 

It is located near the Urdaibai Reserve and close to beautiful beaches. It is equipped with 8 rooms with bathroom with hydromassage, telephone, television, Internet WIFI, mountain excursions. Moreover, the hotel also consists of a lounge and a garden with terrace.

 

Basque paintors' works on display in common areas.

Centrally situated hotel, very close to Ondarreta and La Concha beaches. 180 rooms with telephone, television, DVD, video games, Internet Wi-Fi connection, modem, mini-bar, air-conditioning, hairdryer and background music available. In addition, it consists of 6 lounges that can hold up between 10 and 300 people, a business centre, a restaurant, a bar and a car park. The hotel offers multiple services such us different pillows à la Carte, breakfast (buffet), laundry and dry cleaner's services, ironing for jeans, shoe cleaning and cloakroom service, among others.

Hotel located in the centre of Vitoria-Gasteiz, in front of the Cathedral, the Basque Parliament, Florida Park and Plaza de la Virgen Blanca Square.

 

Its rooms are equipped with telephone, TV, pay per view films and video games, WIFI Internet access, air conditioning, hairdryer piped music. Moreover, it has 7 living rooms that can hold up to 350 people and equipped with the latest technology, a restaurant, a cocktail-bar, a coffee shop, a business centre, a car park, hairdresser's and a night club.

 

Among other things, the hotel offers laundry service, cloakroom, nannies, safe, rent a car service, pillows à la carte, breakfast-buffet and 12 hour-room service.

This four-star urban hotel was restored in 2002. It is equipped with 142 rooms, 3 of them are suites. It offers guests an entrance hall with a lift and a reception hall open 24 hours with strongbox service and foreign exchange. A bar, a restaurant, non-smoking area, Internet connection, garage, sauna and a gym available, as well as room and laundry services. It is located in the city centre of Bilbao, in front of the Euskalduna convention centre.

datosContacto.direccion: Gran Vía Don Diego López de Haro  87

datosGenerales.descripcion: This modern hotel is situated in Murgia, in the province of Alava. It offers 4 apartments with a fully-equipped kitchen, 16 double rooms and 7 single rooms. Rooms also have fully-equipped bathrooms, telephone, digital television, WI-FI Internet Access, heating and safe. The hotel is located at the gates of the Gorbeia Natural Park, 10 minutes from Vitoria-Gasteiz. A restaurant service is also available in the premises.

galeria.titulo: The interior of the Hotel Nagusi

datosGenerales.descripcion: The hotel is located in a mansion built in 1932 by Rafael de Garamendi, constituting one of the most faithful exponents of the English architecture. The owners take care of the house, who give the hotel a distinguished and totally personalised treatment. Easily accessible, it is halfway between the quiet beaches, the coast of Bizkaia and the busy business, management, cultural and tourist life of Bilbao. Not in vain, the tube is located 2 minutes from the hotel. Both the capital city and the Bilbao Exhibition Centre area easily accessible by tube. It provides 10 rooms with bathroom, television, telephone and Internet WIFI in the whole accommodation. Moreover, there are also meeting rooms to hold conferences. Breakfast, strong box service and therapeutic massages also at clients' disposal (by appointment).

Hotel located in the mountain, a few minutes from the centre of Donostia-San Sebastián and its beaches. It consists of 42 rooms with balcony overlooking the sea or the garden. All of them have fully equipped bathroom, heating, telephone and TV. Moreover, there is an independent apartment in the garden.

Hotel situated right next to the beach, in La Concha bay and near the main tourist attractions of the city.

 

35 double and 6 single elegantly decorated rooms equipped with bathroom, telephone, television and wireless Internet connection. Many of the rooms overlook the sea. The hotel also has a garage, a safe-deposit box, a bar and a restaurants of Italian cuisine. The hotel is also equipped with a garage and a safe-deposit box. Narru Bar and Restaurant, run by the young chef Iñigo Peña, sits at the promenade entrance to the hotel.

This hotel is located in the Old Town of Zarautz, just 500 metres from the beach and very close to the Pagoeta Natural Park. It consists of 8 double and single rooms equipped with bathroom, telephone, Internet, heating and cable television. Moreover, it is also provided with a coffee bar, a meeting room and Internet access.

This hotel is situated within the Old Town of Durango, close to the Urkiola Natural Park, in between the three capitals of the Basque Autonomous Region. It is equipped with 19 double and single rooms with bathroom, television, strongbox, heating and terrace. Moreover, the hotel is provided with a restaurant.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Ocamiño Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: Obispo of Hondarribia (Fuenterrabia) is a hotel within a palace built between the 14th and the 15th centuries and situated next to the walls of the town, in the old part with great views to the Txingudi Bay. It consists of 14 double rooms and 2 single rooms with air-conditioning, dvd and video, satellite television, Internet WiFi and mini-bar. Moreover, the hotel also has fireplace, meeting room, terrace-garden. Among many other thigs, babysitter services, breakfast in the bedroom, bikes at clients' disposal and sale of locally grown products available.

The hotel is located in the beautiful town of Oñati, in the middle of nature, where guests will be able to enjoy some days to relax in a familiar and close environment.

 

It consists of 18 rooms with bathroom, telephone, television, air-conditioning and heating. There is also a coffee bar.

Located in the town centre of Tolosa and founded in 1997, Oria Hotel offers 30 double and 4 single rooms separated into two different style buildings: the first one is avant-garde and modern and the second one, (located in a gardened area) keeps its original architecture of the beginning of the century. The rooms are provided with bathroom, heating, satellite television, hairdryer, background music, telephone and mini-bar. Moreover, the hotel has a coffee bar, laundry service, car park and Oria restaurant-grillroom.

Small hotel located in an old beautiful building in the Bergara town centre. 14 rooms decorated with old furnitures, some equipped with fireplace and all of them with bathroom, heating, television and telephone. Moreover, the hotel offers fax service, laundry service, lounge with fireplace, breakfast hall and a coffee-bar.

galeria.titulo: The interior of the Ormazabal Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: Beautiful restored medieval palace located in the historical centre of Hondarribia. It was classed Monumental Historical Site. It consists of 9 rooms with bathroom, hairdryer, telephone, heating and via satellite television. Among its facilities its sunny terrace, where you can take an appetizer, is remarkable. Safe and free Wi-Fi connection also available.

This 18th century palace, of magnificent appearance, with cut stone masonry bearing the coat of arms of the family that built it, used to be the residence of the local parish priest before becoming a hotel. Its terracota floors and period style furniture provide character to its spacious, luminous and cosy bedrooms.

 

The palace's restaurant serves the best red wines in the region. It is set in the outstanding environment of the municipality after which it is named, and surrounded by a beautiful scenery and vast vineyards.

galeria.titulo: Outside view of Hotel Palacio Samaniego

datosGenerales.descripcion: Palacio de Aiete Hotel, named after the palace, is one of the most famous monuments of San Sebastián, built in 1878. Important figures like Alfonso XII and the Queen María Cristina spent their holidays there. The urban hotel has touches of avant-garde style and is located in a privilege spot, in the upper area of the city. A peaceful area with easy access to any area of San Sebastián. Close to the hotel we will finf Miramón Technology Park, Zuatzu Business Park and two of the most beautiful monuments of the city: Aiete Palace and Miramar Palace. Close to the area we will find the Basozabal Golf Course as well. It consists of a wide free car park with security service outdoors, an indoor car park and garage. Fitness centre with panoramic views and new area to relax. What is more, the hotel has all the necessary services for leisure or business tourism: meeting halls with audio-visual systems, WIFI connection, gym, solarium, restaurant and cafeteria.

Palacio de Elorriaga Hotel is set in a refurbished 16th-17th century building catalogued as historical heritage by the Vitoria-Gasteiz City Council. It is equipped with all mod cons to turn the accommodation into a nice and unforgetable stay: a private car park, original quiet rooms, a unique cafeteria and a reputed restaurant. Due to all these features, Palacio de Elorriaga stands as an obliged stop when it comes to travelling and getting to know the character of Vitoria-Gasteiz.
