This sunny manor house, completely restored to keep its original architectural characteristics, is decorated with period furniture providing the good conditions of current services.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Palacio de Elorriaga Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: Hotel Parador set in the Larrea Palace, a Renaissance building overlooking Alava plains, the Gorbeia mountain range and the Ullibarri Gamboa reservoir. An ideal lodging to enjoy nature and the small municipality of Argomaniz, which is 12 kilometres from Vitoria-Gasteiz. The palace, where Napoleon stayed before attacking Vitoria-Gasteiz, bears the coat of arms of the Larrea family on one of its facades. It is outstanding the elegant interior with spacious lounges, as well as period style floors and furniture. Among other services, the place is equipped with a conference room, a car park and a restaurant where guests will be able to taste traditional dishes of the province of Alava.

Roadside hotel located in the Old Town of Hondarribia, within a castle founded by Sancho Abarca (king of Navarre) in the 10th century. Denfesive fortress with thick walls and outstanding views to Bidasoa stuary. It consists of 32 double and 4 single rooms, all of them with telephone, heating, television, safe-deposit box and mini-bar. The castle's interior has been recovered and its elegant decoration combines old elements with modern ones. In addition, it has a lift, a terrace, a conference room and a bar. Private car park available.

Hotel located next to the old part of Donostia-San Sebastián, between Zurriola beach and Urgull mountain. Due to its location, this is the right place for tourist and professional tours. 27 rooms with bathroom, direct telephone dial, television, air-conditioning, safe-deposit box and free ADSL wireless connection (WI-FI). It also consists of a living room with television and a coffee-bar.

The hotel is located in one of the best areas of the picturesque fishing town. It is ideal to enjoy relax stays and holiday due to its location regarding the closeness to the beach, as well as business trips. The hotel is equipped with 12 rooms with bathroom, television, telephone and minibar. Car park and a coffee-bar also available.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Piñupe Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: Two-star guesthouse located in the outskirts of Vitoria-Gasteiz. This 9 room accommodation (4 double and 5 single rooms) offers television and telephone services, as well as central heat in every room.

galeria.titulo: Exterior view of Pensión Portal de Vergara

datosGenerales.descripcion: This hotel is located in the Palace of Viana, a manor house from 1619 of Barroque style. Due to its architecture, quality and situation, it is considered one of the best hotels in the north of the peninsula. It is equipped with 6 double rooms and one single room, each of them with its own character and identity. It is ideal to enjoy both holiday and weekends, and for business meetings, conventions, seminairs, etc. The palace's underground wine cellar can be visited in organised tours and wine tasting sessions are also available. The restaurant holds up to 150 people.

servicio.nombre: Member of National Consumer Arbitration Board

galeria.titulo: Outside view of Posada Mayor de Migueloa

datosGenerales.descripcion:
The Hotel Centro Vitoria has a modern reception system where a scanner and self check-in machine allow you to enter the data needed to allocate you a room.

 

The machine gives you the key to access the hotel and your room (for a personal reception service check out the reception times on the hotel website). Rooms come with 32 TV and free Wi-Fi. This is a smoke-free area as all rooms and common areas are non-smoking.

Its location in the city centre near the beach enables guests to have the most attractive places of Donostia-San Sebastián at hand. With an easy beach access, the guesthouse is situated at less than 10 minutes on foot from the old quarter.

galeria.titulo: Inside of the Pensión Regil guesthouse

datosGenerales.descripcion: Residence for students, tourists and professionals staying in Bilbao both for long and short stays. It is located next to the Nervión and the University of Deusto, close to the Guggenheim museum, the Euskalduna convention centre and the Maritime Museum. It is equipped with rooms provided with bathroom, telephone, heating, Internet access and strongbox. The building is totally restored and offers services such as Internet, fax, safekeeping, rent a bike service and private garden. Car park available.

One-star hotel located in a strategic place, as it is situated next the old quarter, Plaza Circular Square and the Arriaga Theatre. It is equipped with double, single and triple rooms provided with complete bathroom service, heating, telephone and Internet.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Ripa Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: Two-star hotel located in a small town next to Vitoria-Gasteiz. It is a newly built hotel equipped with all the new technologies. 75 double rooms with bathroom, safe-deposit box, Internet, heating, television and hairdryer availble. In addition, it has halls for banquets or business meetings. It is surrounded by green spaces with children playground.

localizacion.nombreLocalidad: Subijana de Álava/Subillana-Gasteiz | Subijana de Alava/Subillana-Gasteiz

datosGenerales.descripcion: This hotel is located in the frontier municipality of Hondarribia. It consists of 40 double and four single outward-looking rooms that are equipped with direct telephone dial, air-conditioning, mini-bar, television and Internet WiFi. In addition, there are also a meeting room, a social lounge, a garden, a swimming pool and a restaurant. The hotel also offers laundry service and dry cleaner's. It is surrounded by green spaces and all the relax that customers need.

This hotel is located in a natural setting, in the interior of Gipuzkoa. Fourteen double and single rooms with bathroom, heating, television and room service available. In addition, it consists of a meeting room, a restaurant and a coffee-bar. It is surrounded by green spaces and trees. The hotel is the right place for those who want to enjoy nature and look for relaxing, as well as for those who approach Gipuzkoa on business grounds.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Salbatore Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: The hotel is located in an Abadiño peaceful setting close to the Urkiola Natural Park. It has a capacity of 32 guests and the rooms are equipped with air conditioning, heating, terrace-garden, car park and medical service. Dogs and cats allowed.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the San Blas Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: San Jorge is a hotel located in the fishing area of Santurtzi, 20 minutes from Bilbao and 15 minutes from the beach. It consists of 30 rooms with bathrom, heating, television, telephone and background music. Moreover, there are a car park, lounges with a capacity of between 35 and 90, a coffee-bar and a restaurant fitted out for banquets.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the San Jorge Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion:
Boarding house located in the city centre of Bilbao, it is equipped with double and single rooms with individual bathroom.

Breakfast service available, as well as laundry, WIFI, safekeeping, television and magnificent communications.

It is situated in the city centre next to the San Mamés stadium and Termibus bus station.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the San Mamés boarding house

datosGenerales.descripcion: The hotel is located within a beautiful building of typical Basque style in the Old Town of the border municipality of Hondarribia. It consists of 13 rooms with bathroom, piped music, telephone and television. All the rooms overlook the sea or the mountains. There are also a meeting room, a lounge, a coffee shop with terrace, Internet access, fax service and a car park.

Built in 1666 next to the annexed convent church and vicarage, the San Roque Hotel is the former historic monastery of Santa Clara. This incomparable setting, with the stay in any of the 20 rooms with complete bathroom service, telephone, heating and satellite television make the visit unforgettable.

 

We are talking about a dwelling opened 340 years ago used by cloistered nuns.

 

The place enables guests enjoying the calm of its garden and discovering treasures such as the interior patio well containing drinking water as well as the potter's wheel and the stairs dating from the 17th century.

galeria.titulo: The hotel's cloister and picture window
The top floor of the hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion:
Modern four-star hotel located in the town centre and a few metres from Ondarreta beach.

 

79 double rooms and 11 single rooms with bathroom, television, telephone and heating available. In addition, there are 4 different lounges of different sizes with audio-visual systems and offer a complete service to organise events. The hotel also has a terrace-solarium on its fourth floor and a restaurant of Basque and International cuisine.

Five-star hotel located in a key area of Bilbao.

 

Ricardo Legorreta designed the building, which was inspired by Eduardo Chillida. All the rooms are provided with a fully-equipped bathroom, Internet, strongbox, air-conditioning, television, mini-bar, hairdryer, all the technological advances and services that any hotel of this category should offer. Rooms are outward-facing and fitted out for the disabled.

 

A restaurant, a banquet room, a meeting room, a laundry and a dry cleaner's also available. If clients wish to do exercise there is a gym and an indoor swimming pool.

Four-star hotel located at the entrance of Donostia-San Sebastián, in the city centre and near the beach.

 

Of modern achitecture and masterpiece of the architect Peña Ganchegui. In addition, the establishment has a private art collection of 160 pieces of modern art distributed throughout the hotel. It consists of 163 rooms with bathroom, mini-bar, TV,  WiFi and strongbox. The rooms are soundproofed and climatised.

 

In addition, the hotel has a restaurant, meeting rooms for conferences, cafeteria-bar and garage. Breakfast available as well as room service. It has adapted rooms.

galeria.titulo: En-suite double room and double room for single use

datosGenerales.descripcion:
Four-star hotel belonging to the Silken chain located in the heart of city after which it is named.

 

Inspired by French hotels of the 19th century, the establishment offers 149 rooms which are accessed from a lobby with a vast skylight that fills the space with sunlight and shows off the panoramic lifts and classical lines of the architecture.

 

The Hotel Silken Ciudad de Vitoria is renowned for its friendly service and quality. The range of facilities offered include breakfast, room service and WiFi internet access, as well as a café, piano-bar with live music, a restaurant that serves traditional Basque dishes and signature cuisine, and a garage.

datosGenerales.nombre: THE ARTIST GRAND HOTEL OF ART
datosGenerales.descripcion:
The Gran Hotel Domine Bilbao, located in front of the Guggenheim Museum Bilbao, is a five-star hotel and authentic flagship of Preferred Hotels & Resorts L.V.X.

It is equipped with 120 rooms and suites, all of them climatised with telephone, television, sound system and Internet access. Each room has a detail that makes it different from the others. GHDB is not only a hotel to stay but also a colourful microcosmos that opens its doors to those who want to have a coffee in the coffee bar or have lunch in the restaurant. There are also meeting rooms, sauna, lecture room and several halls available.

It is also equipped with a car park with access for the disabled.

galeria.titulo: THE ARTIST GRAND HOTEL OF ART

datosGenerales.descripcion: Silken Indautxu Hotel is located near by the cultural and gastronomical offer of Bilbao city. There is just a 10 minutes walk between Indautxu Hotel and the Guggenheim Museum and it is just 100 meters from the nearest metro station to reach the surfing beaches of Sopela, Larrabasterra, Ereaga (Getxo) and Plentzia. 184 rooms fills out this English style building with a large gastronomical variety of pintxos , a good choice before reaching the Biscay coast and its waves. Enjoy the Basque cuisine restaurant and the open air terrace, the best cocktails and coffee in town, a place to relax in a good atmosphere surrounded by green.

This hotel is located next to the Sanctuary of Aranzazu next to Aizkorri mountain. It consists of 35 double and 4 single rooms equipped with bathroom, heating and cable television. Besides, there are also a restaurant, a coffee bar, a banquet room and a meeting room. The hotel is the right place to rest and enjoy the nature and it is situated in the middle of nature, near the Urbia Natural Park.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Sindika Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: Sirimiri is a newly built small and familiar hotel but it keeps the charm of the Bilbao old quarter buildings. It is located in a quiet area of the Siete Calles zone, in the city centre and easily accessible from the motorway and the rest of the city. The hotel is equipped with 28 cosy rooms with bathroom, telephone and television. It also offers breakfast service and a private car park. Moreover, a living room, a gym, sauna and hydromassage also available.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Sirimiri Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion:
Typical Basque country house located on the outskirts of Oñati, near the Sanctuary of Aranzazu.

 

Twelve rooms with bathroom, heating and television available. It is surrounded by green areas and meadows.

 

The hotel is the perfect place to stay if you want to relax and be a little isolated but with all the services needed. It is only 2 kilometres from the town centre. It also consists of a restaurant and a coffee bar.

This hotel-spa is located in the seaside town of Zumaia. 26 rooms with fully equipped bathroom, telephone, television, radio, air-conditioning, heating and hairdryer available. It also consists of a restaurant overlooking the sea, a meeting hall, a bar-cafeteria, a television room, a car park and a garden overlooking the cliffs of the beach.

The hotel is located in the city centre of Donostia-San Sebastián, close to the beach. 18 outward-looking rooms with fully equipped bathroom, heating, television and telephone available. Moreover, the hotel also consists of a coffee bar where to have breakfast and taste "pintxos" from Donostia-San Sebastián.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Terminus Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: The boarding house is located on the first floor of a totally restored historic building in the old quarter of Bermeo, in a beautiful setting and with all the necessary services available for a quiet and nice stay.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Torre Ercilla boarding house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Three-star hotel situated in the Old Town of the capital. It provides 36 double and single rooms equipped with bathroom, air-conditioning, satellite television, Internet access, mini-bar, strongbox and room service. Moreover, there are also a coffee bar and meeting room available. This is the ideal place to stay on leisure and business journeys due to its location in the very city centre surrounded by shops and interesting spots for tourists.

Four-star modern hotel situated next to La Concha beach, with beautiful views to the bay. It consists of 64 rooms equipped with bathroom of marble, air-conditioning, via satellite TV, Internet WiFi, telephone, mini-bar, piped music, stongbox and room service. Some rooms are specifically designed for visitors on business trips, for those who want to keep fit (running machines or bikes) and for families. It also has a conference room which holds up to 80 people. Bufet with breakfast and coffee-bar.

Situated next to the Real Club de Golf de Donostia-San Sebastián golf club, the hotel is located 5 minutes from the Hondarribia beaches. It consists of 115 rooms, with satellite television, air-conditioning and all the necessary details to make guests' stay more pleasant. Moreover, the hotel also provides conference and banquet rooms with a capacity of up to 450 guests, as well as a restaurant, a coffee-bar, a social lounge, Internet WiFi and a car park.

This cosy hotel in the centre of the picturesque town of Bermeo is close to the hermitage of San Juan de Gaztelugatxe and the Urdaibai Natural Reserve. Nice staff and comfortable facilities. It is equipped with 12 rooms with bathroom, television, telephone and minibar. Garage also available.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Hotel Txaraka

datosGenerales.descripcion: This hotel is located in the town of Lasarte and very close to the hippodrome of Donostia-San Sebastián and 6 kilometres far from the capital. It consists of 58 rooms with fully equipped bathroom, air-conditioning, television, heating, Internet access and telephone. In addition, the hotel also has a meeting room, a banquet room, a restaurant, a cofee bar, as well as laundry service and car park.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Txartel Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: Two-star hostal located in the coastal municipality of Zarautz. It has rooms equipped with bathroom, television and heating. It also has coffee shop-bar, restaurant which holds up to 150 persons, conference room, feast room and living room. It also has sandwichs shop.

Hotel located in Hernani (Gipuzkoa), source of the cider houses of the Basque Country. 20 rooms available, two are single rooms. All of them are provided with television, telephone, fully equipped bathroom, connection for computers and fax service. The hotel is located on the outskirts of Hernani; that is why this is the perfect place for the guests who want to visit the Basque Country or do business in the nearby firms.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Txintxua Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: Two-star boarding house located in the fishing town of Plentzia, close to the beach. It is a perfect place both for summer stays at the beach and weekend and bank holiday getaways. Due to its strategic location at 100 metres from the metro station, it is an ideal place to tour around Bizkaia comfortably. Uribe is equipped with 8 double rooms in two floors. There are 2 extra beds and cots available to give response to clients' needs.
Two-star guesthouse located in the municipality of Arrasate-Mondragón, in the fortified old town. It has 9 rooms with heating, telephone and TV.

galeria.titulo: Outside view of the Pensión Urizar

datosGenerales.descripcion: Recently constructed two-star hotel, located in the middle of nature and next to the golf course of Urturi. It has 9 double rooms and a single rooms, all equipped with heating, television and Internet access. The hotel is surrounded by green areas and it has a swimming pool.

Usategieta hotel is located in Oiartzun, in the middle of nature. It consists of 13 rooms with views, satellite television, mini-bar, direct dial telephone, Internet connection, heating and air-conditioning. This is the perfect place to arrange trips to the mountain or visit Donostia-San Sebastián, which is 12 kilometres far from. Restaurant available for banquets.

Uxarte is a 19th century Hamlet that was rebuilt as a guesthouse in 1968. It is located in Arrasate-Mondragón, by the side of the Udalatx Mountain. The establishment overlooks the valley and the mountains and its terrace offers wonderful views of the sunset. Its restaurant offers typical Basque cuisine elaborated with products from the local area and its own garden. You’ll have the possibility to enjoy the set menu or to eat à la carte. It has 5 double rooms with en suite bathroom, satellite TV, heating, free Wi-Fi, terrace, coffee bar, restaurant, outdoor swimming-pools and free parking site.

The hotel is situated in the village of Llodio, 5 minutes from Bilbao and 20 mintutes from Vitoria-Gasteiz. It is equipped with 21 rooms (single, double and triple rooms) with a classical decor, fully equipped bathroom, television, telephone, WiFi connection, piped music and heating. Its facilities include a private car park and a restaurant with a capacity of 120 guests and special menus for groups. Dogs are allowed.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Hotel Valle de Ayala

datosGenerales.descripcion: Hotel set in the old town of the picturesque municipality of Elciego, next to the Plaza Mayor square and behind the Virgen de la Plaza hermitage. It is equipped with 18 rooms, 16 double and two single rooms, all of them fitted with bathroom, heating, telephone and TV. Situated among ancestral big houses, it is the perfect accommodation to visit the wineries in the Rioja Alavesa region and get to know the treasures that can be found in the area. Besides, it is just a few kilometres away from the Monasteries' Route.

galeria.titulo: Outside view of Hotel Villa Elciego

datosGenerales.descripcion: Located in a lordly environment, Hotel Villa Soro arises from the restoration of a 19th century villa, classed Historical Heritage of Donostia-San Sebastián. The hotel is surrounded by beautiful gardens and consists of 25 rooms equipped with independent shower and bathtub, hairdryer, strongbox, air-conditioning, television with international channels and Internet connection. Moreover, the hotel has several lounges, a dining room for breakfast, a bar, room service, a laundry and a car park. It is situated very close to the most prestigious city restaurants.

Four-star hotel located in the heart of the Rioja Alavesa, a zone of vineyards and wineries.

 

It has 84 rooms; equipped with heating, air conditioning, direct dial telephone, via satellite television, safe, Internet access, free WIFI and mini-bar. The hotel, recently constructed, offers the necessary services not only to relax, but also to hold conferences and do business.

 

In 2009 the hotel has broaden its establishment with the appearance of the Wine Oil Spa Villa de Laguardia, which bases its treatments on wine and olive oil. Each of its corners and treatments seek body harmony by means of stimulating the organism and the spirit-mind connection. Thanks to hand techniques, music, noses, colours, candles and the best cosmetics you will be able to relax and renew yourself. Hairdresser's and beauticians available to complete your outer beauty.

 

Has received, among other awards, Best Of International 2011 Great Wine Capitals.

galeria.titulo: Exterior view of the Hotel Villa de Laguardia and the dome of its spa

datosGenerales.descripcion: Two-star guest house located in the town of Urnieta. 5 rooms available and accessible for the handicapped people.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Villa de Urnieta guest house

datosGenerales.descripcion: The Vista Alegre hotel is located next to the Bilbao bullring of the same name. It provides 35 rooms with fully-equipped bathrooms, telephone and television. The Internet is optional. Moreover, the hotel offers car park service, laundry service, 24-hour reception, coffee bar, a lounge and bike rental. This is a good choice to visit the city or stay on business trip.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Vista Alegre Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: Guesthouse located in Orio seaside municipality. Double and single rooms with bathroom, heating and Internet available. In addition, it has a restaurant and a bar.

galeria.titulo: Outside of the Pensión Xaloa Guesthouse

datosGenerales.descripcion: Guest house located in Cruces neighbourhood (Barakaldo) and a few metres from the hospital. Large rooms with television, telephone, heating and bathroom available. Unequalled location, by the tube station.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the guest house

datosGenerales.descripcion:
Accommodation in the neighborhood Zorroza, with very good transport connection, a mile from the San Mames stadium and two Guggenheim Museum Bilbao.

 

All rooms have private bathroom, television, heating and WIFI Internet.

Two-star hotel located in the Bilbao city centre with easy access. It is equipped with 38 rooms with bathroom, heating, television, telephone and Internet connection. Rooms for non-smokers also available. Moreover, the hotel provides a pleasant lounge, as well as a private car park, a meeting room and strongbox service, Internet and fax.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Hotel Zabalburu

datosGenerales.descripcion: This hotel is located near Lasarte-Oria racecourse, surrounded by mountains and 5 minutes far from the beach. 4 double rooms and 3 single rooms equipped with air-conditioning, heating, radio, hairdryer, telephone, television and Internet WiFi. The hotel also offers free Internet connection, safe-deposit box and money exchange service. In addition, a bar, a restaurant, a garden and a wide terrace as well as a private car park are available.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Zaldua Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: Cosy hotel that was opened in 2000, next to La Concha bay, in the centre of Donostia-San Sebastián. 19 rooms available; one of them, accessible for the disabled. All the rooms are equipped with telephone, fax and Internet service, television, mini-bar, heating and air-conditioning. There is also a nice lounge.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Plaza Zaragoza Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion:
The hotel is located 100 metres from Zarautz Beach, in a manorial house that since the 40's has been the summer residence of important figures.

 

The hotel has one living room, a large meeting room and Internet WiFi in communal areas.

A two-star boarding house located in a rural area in the inland part of Gipuzkoa. Newly renovated, it has 10 rooms with bathroom, heating, telephone, television and internet access. Moreover, it has a bar and a restaurant with home-made traditional Basque food where you can taste the daily menu or the à-la-carte menu.

Guesthouse located in the centre of Zumarraga municipality (Gipuzkoa).

 

Visitors can enjoy green spaces, practise mountain-related sports and relax at the beach (only 50 kilometres far from the guesthouse).

galeria.titulo: Outside of the Pensión Zelai Guesthouse

datosGenerales.descripcion: Tiny and cosy boarding house located in the rural area of Mendexa, between Lekeitio and Ondarroa at 2 kilometres from the beach. It is equipped with 5 double rooms and 2 single rooms with bathroom. In addition to this, there is a sitting room with a television and a terrace. Breakfast service, Internet access, heating, telephone and laundry service.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Zelaigane boarding house

datosGenerales.descripcion:
Four-star hotel located in Indautxu neighbourhood (Bilbao). It is situated in a privileged area, near the bus station, next to the Euskalduna Convention Centre, La Casilla Pavilion and San Mamés Stadium.

 

Rooms equipped with bathroom, hairdryer, air-conditioning, heating, satellite TV, telephone, fax, Internet WIFI, piped music, safe-deposit box and mini-bar.

 

Moreover, there are also laundry service, a restaurant, a car park, a meeting hall and a social lounge available.
Guesthouse located in the centre of Hernani; it is easy to get to Donostia-San Sebastián from there. 7 double rooms with heating available.

galeria.titulo: Outside of the Pensión Zinkoenea Guesthouse

datosGenerales.descripcion: The hotel is located in the seaside town of Zumaia. It consists of 16 rooms with air conditioning, fully equipped bathroom, television, telephone and Internet. It offers 24-hour room service, car park, meeting room and a bar-restaurant with menu and à la Carte. This hotel is the perfect place for leisure and business tourism.
Picturesque guesthouse located in Deba town centre, a few metres away from the beach. Nine rooms with bathroom, heating and television available. The price of the rooms doesn't include VAT.

galeria.titulo: Outside of the Pensión Zumardi Guesthouse

datosGenerales.descripcion: One key apartments located in the town of Usurbil. Seven apartments available; five of them can hold up to 2 or 4 people and the other two with a capacity of 3 or 5 people. Apartments equipped with one or two rooms, living room, dining room, kitchen with washing machine, fridge and terrace. Moreover, heating, radio, television and telephone also available.

Eight apartments with a capacity of up to 3, 4 and 6 guests. A beautiful setting overlooking the magnificent sea and the cliffs surrounds the apartments. The complex is located in the campsite that bears the same name.

 

Departing from the area, visitors can go on trips and for walks, as well as descend to the creeks and to the wild beaches of Aitzuri and Sakoneta. This area has been classed as protected biotope due to its ecological, biological and marine value.

galeria.titulo: Located in the protected biotope at the coastal line between Deba-Zumaia

datosGenerales.descripcion: The apartments are located in the neighbourhood of Lakuabizkarra, to the north in Vitoria-Gasteiz. A capacity of 71 guests. Each apartment consists of kitchen, television, bathroom and one or two rooms.

The apartments are located in Muskiz, at 25 kilometres from Bilbao city and very close to the area of Encartaciones, which offers a wide range of possibilities to enjoy leisure actively. Eight apartments with a capacity of 4 persons each. Lovely place with green areas and walks along the sea. The apartments have also a restaurant decorated in rural style where to taste typical and economic dishes, so that visitors can approach the lands' flavours.

The three-star Hotel Seminario, which is located in the old Seminario de Derio building, offers its guests a free shuttle service to Bilbao airport (this must be booked in advance).

 

Its rooms are equipped with an en-suite bathroom, heating, television and desk, and hotel guests can also avail of meeting rooms with capacity for up to 400 people. The hotel also boasts a restaurant - Txoko Ona - which includes a spacious, sun-kissed terrace.

 

The hotel is surrounded by green areas and, thanks to its location - in close proximity to Bilbao airport and the Bizkaia Technology Park, in a rural and peaceful setting - it is ideal for both business and leisure trips.

New rural apartments with a capacity of 2-3 people. They are located in the quiet town of Amarita, only 8 km from Vitoria and 2 km from Ullibarri Reservoir. Totally equipped, they consist of room, bathroom, kitchen, lounge with fireplace and porch. There is a cycling lane around the reservoir on the old railway tracks route.

Recently opened accommodation, which is halfway towards apartments and traditional hotel. It consists of 50 individual apartments of 25 sq metres each. One or two large rooms, living room and kitchen available. The rooms are equipped with bathroom and TV set. Half of them have supply for Internet access. Fifty double rooms, 16 rooms have a capacity for three persons and 2 rooms can hold 2 guests. Located in the neighbouring Lakua, at 10 minutes from the city centre of Vitoria-Gasteiz and situated in between two shopping centres and the Basque government headquarters.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of San Fermin Apartments

datosGenerales.descripcion: The 18th century hotel Zubieta has been restored adapting each of its rooms to the comfort of a three-star hotel. It is located in the gardens of the Palacio de Zubieta Palace, which is a historic spot with magnificent views and close to the Lekeitio town centre. It consists of 20 rooms with bathroom, satellite television, telephone and strongbox. Besides, there are 4 apartments. The hotel is also equipped with a private car park, a library, a meeting room, a terrace and a coffee-bar.

Apartments located in the urban centre of Zumaia, ideal to enjoy the coastal town and its surroundings with the freedom and comfort that enables accommodation with bedrooms, bathroom, kitchen, living room and terrace. The complex consists of 6 apartments with a capacity of 4-6 persons each.

These rural apartments are located in an ancient 18th century house. It's a neoclassical house built in masonry. The building has been refurbished according to its original structure and consists of three apartments of different measures with bathrooms, kitchen and dining room, garden, car park and private wine cellars.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Solar de Quintano Apartments

datosGenerales.descripcion: Ibaiondo is a complex consisting of 16 apartments with a capacity of 48 persons. Located in the city centre, they are divided into two blocks. Eight apartments form Ibaiondo I and another eight make up Ibaiondo II. Each apartment is equipped with hot water, heating, television and fridge.

galeria.titulo: The interior of Ibaiondo II Apartments

datosGenerales.descripcion: Ibaiondo is a complex consisting of 16 apartments with a capacity of 48 persons. Located in the city centre, they are divided into two blocks. Eight apartments form Ibaiondo I and another eight make up Ibaiondo II. Each apartment is equipped with hot water, heating, television and fridge.

The apartments are next to La Arena beach, in Zierbena, an ideal place to enjoy the beach and surfing, as well as walks across mountains in the surroundings. These 15 apartments are separated into three floors with independent lift. Each apartment is provided with living room-dining room, television and digital television satellite channel, double room, kitchen, bathroom and terrace overlooking the sea or mountain and, WIFI area.

A house located in the small hamlet of Urdaneta, 5 km from the coast. It is set in beautiful natural surroundings, ideal for hiking, rambling or just relaxing. Its rooms have a bathroom and TV and its apartments are suitable for families or groups. Play area, garden with barbecue, breakfast and bar service.

Farm located in Galdonamendi neighbourhood, in Mutriku, in a natural setting where enjoying beautiful views of the sea is possible. It consists of 6 double rooms fully equipped with bathroom, television and heating. Ideal place to get away from the busy city and practise many activities such as hiking. Pets allowed.

Totally new, it was built with the typical materials and style in the area, a combination between stone and wood. It lies on the countryside with beautiful views. The rural house is equipped with six double rooms with bathroom and two sitting rooms with fireplace and television, apart from one car park and a garden. It is located two kilometres far from the Oñati town centre, in the countryside.
Country house located in Zarautz, 400 metres from the beach. It has 6 double rooms with bathroom and living room with TV for the guests. It also has an apartment for four, completely equipped.

galeria.titulo: The interior of Agerre Goikoa rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Refurbished farmhouse located in Zarautz, near the coast. Six double rooms equipped with bathroom. It also consists of a lounge for the guests with television and kitchen and a bar-restaurant that serves home-made cook.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Berazadi-Berri rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Newly built farmhouse located in a rural area two kilometres far from Zarautz. It consists of six double rooms with bathroom and an apartment with a capacity of 4 people available. In addition, there are also one living room for the guests with television and one kitchen-dining room. Farmhouse products on sale.

The farmhouse is located in the mountain, in a very calm scenery within the valley of Aizarna (Zestoa). One double room with bathroom, four double rooms with 2 bathrooms and living room for the guests available. Grillroom. The farmhouse is situated near Zumaia and Zarautz beaches, the Sanctuary of Loiola and the Zestoa spa. The customers can participate in farm activities: orchard, sheep, picking up grass, reaping, calves and cows to obtain milk.

galeria.titulo: The interior of Agiña rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Recently built farmhouse. It is located in Zestoa, between the coast and Andutz and Izarraitz mountains and Pagoeta National Park. Six double rooms all of them with television. Large separate kitchen-dining room with television and video. The farmhouse is surrounded by gardened area and beautiful green where the guests will be allowed to participate in different farm activities such as taking care of rabbits, hens, calves and cows, cleaning the stable, picking fruit and grass and making cider.

Restored farmhouse situated in the thermal villa of Cestona, 4 km from the spa. Six double rooms with bathroom, heating, Internet and cable television available. Moreover, the guests will have lounge and dining room at their disposal. The house is surrounded by green areas, gardens and trees. It also provides an apartment that can hold up to 4 people. There is easy access to the accommodation. It is located 4 km from the beach and 20 min from San Sebastián. Bilbao and Vitoria are 60 and 90 km far respectively. In short, this is the ideal place for those who want to discover Euskadi's richness.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the rural accommodation

datosGenerales.descripcion: Karakas Zar is the typical farmhouse that was built in 1800 and dedicates its activities to arranging agritourism activities since 1999. The farmhouse is located on the coast in the valley of Urola, next to the mouth of the river of the same name at 1 kilometre from Zumaia town and 800 m from the main road and the beach. It is the perfect place for leisure and to take a break. Karakas Zar consists of 6 double rooms with bathroom, access to the kitchen and living room with television. Moreover, there is an apartment for 4 persons with 2 double rooms, fully equipped bathroom, kitchen and dining room with television.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Karakas Zar rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: House located in a rural environmet, next to the Leitzaran biotope. It consists of a kitchen (dining room) and two double rooms with living room, television and bathroom. 12 Euro for an extra bed. Rooms or the whole house for rent.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Zabale rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Located in Leizaran Valley, Txertota was inaugurated in 1997 following the long restoration process of the family farmhouse that dates back to the 18th century. It consists of 6 comfortable rooms with one bathroom each, hairdryer and television. Restaurant with a capacity of 100 guests and winery available. An extraordinary setting with 3000 sq metres parcel that provides Txertoa with an exceptional area of green landscape and cosy peace for tourists.

17th century farmhouse located in the mountain. It has been totally restored, keeping its original wooden structure. Six double rooms with bathroom and heating. Five extra beds available (10.5 Euro low season, 14.7 Euro high season). It also consists of television, kitchen, board games and one billiard table. Moreover, heating available in the whole house as well as a beautiful garden with barbecue and firewood oven. Owners have sheep, cats, dogs and horses. So, this is the perfect place for people who love nature and animals.

galeria.titulo: Inside of the Saskarate rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion:
16th century farmhouse classed cultural heritage thanks to its cider winepress. The rural house is situated in a separate building, within a restored granary with all mod cons.

 

It has three double rooms with private or shared bathroom. The house has a fully-equipped kitchen and living-dining room. Varied breakfasts are served, using home-made food. The house can be rented WHOLE or by ROOMS.

 

It is located in an attractive setting, surrounded by 20 hectares of meadows, woods, orchards and a river with trout in it. Visitors can join in with the farm work (cattle, sheep and chickens). Cider houses in the surrounding area.

 

Activities available in the area include walking (the Leizarán Biotope, the Pagoeta Nature Park, the Ernio massif), mountain biking, a riding school (1km away) and visiting the weekly market in Tolosa and its confectionery museum, among others. Public transport is available 100 metres from the house.

Farmhousenamed cultural heritage of Gipuzkoa. Six double rooms with bathroom and heating available. It also consists of a living room for guests with television. A shop, where they sell homemade products such us walnuts, cider and cheese available. Customers are allowed to participate in agricultural and cattle activities. Very close to the house it is possible practising golf and horse riding. Green spaces surround the house.

galeria.titulo: The interior of Arraspiñe rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Newly built farmhouse that is located in a natural setting at 3 kilometres from town. Six double rooms with two bathrooms available. They provide breakfast and dinner. Typical farmhouse products on sale, such us cheese with the Idiazabal protected designation of origin.

galeria.titulo: The interior of Alustiza rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Restored farmhouse situated in a calm area and surrounded by mountains. It is equipped with an independent entrance to the house. Four double rooms with two bathrooms, living room for the guests and outdoor terrace available. It also consists of an apartment that can hold up to 6 persons, with 3 double rooms, 2 bathrooms, kitchen and dining room with an exit to the porch. 120 Euro during low season and 156 Euro during high season.

galeria.titulo: Outside of the Urresti rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Farmhouse involved in growing ecological vegetables, with a separate building that serves as an accommodation. The rural house consists of four doble rooms with bathroom and television, as well as a terrace with beautiful views. It is located in Igeldo, in a quiet area on the upper ground of Gipuzkoa's capital. Breakfast available.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Aristondo rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Restored farmhouse equipped with 6 double rooms with bathroom, balcony, cable television and central heating. A dining room, social lounge and green spaces with a garden and a playground for children also available. Customers will have the chance to participate in different agricultural activities such us flower-growing, horticulture and stable cleaning. They sell home-made cheese. The farmhouse is located next to Peñas de Aia Natural Park and close to Artikutza and Jaizkibel. San Marcos Fort is an interesting spot that should be visited. Many cider houses in the area.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Añarre Zarra rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion:
Belazarte is a wooden rural house. It is surrounded by wide green gardens and a big swimming pool.

 

Guests will have the chance to enjoy the calm and the beautiful setting, where the children will play and have fun without risks. It consists of 4 double rooms with one bathroom each. One of the rooms is equipped with a small living room.

 

A wide lounge with fireplace also available.

15th century ancient farmhouse that has been totally restored keeping its original walls and structure. It consists of five double rooms with bathroom, heating and television. All the rooms are different: each one has a different style and decoration. Dining room available as well as a lounge with fireplace. Green spaces and a garden surround the house.

Beautiful rural house located between Jaizkibel mountain and the Cantabrian sea. 6 double rooms available (breakfast service included). It also has a market and is situated in a perfect setting to relax. They keep booking 20 hours, if there is no notice. Smoking in the rooms and pets not allowed.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Artzu rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Newly built farmhouse of traditional Basque style. It is situated two kilometres far from the town centre and the beach. 5 double rooms available (each extra bed costs 17,50 Euro). Outward-facing rooms equipped with one bathroom each. The house also consists of a living room with television for the guests and it is surrounded by a garden with a swing. Access for disabled people.

galeria.titulo: The interior of Iketxe rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Restored big farmhouse located 1.5 kilometres from the town, on the side of the Jaizkibel mountain and near the Sanctuary of Guadalupe. Beautiful views of the bay from the spacious covered terrace. It consists of 6 double rooms with bathroom, a living room with TV and a fully-equipped kitchen. Garden with barbecue for guests.

galeria.titulo: The interior of Postigu rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Typical Basque farmhouse situated in Barrika, close to Sopelana and its beaches. It consists of 6 double rooms provided with heating, fully equipped bathroom, room service and television. Terrace-garden and a wide room ("txoko") with chimney and exclusive for clients.

The rural house is located near Peñas de Aia Natural Park. Peluaga is a traditional Basque farmhouse that was built in the 15th century and totally restored in 1999. The house was built in stone and wood, and painted with colours that give a special charm to the building. The 1,100 square metre farmhouse consists of three floors. Reception, television, reading room, kitchen, bathroom, dining room and porch available on the ground floor. Six double rooms, each of them with a bathroom and central heating on the second floor and. An attic and a wood-covered terrace are located on the third floor.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Peluaga rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Refurbished farmhouse located very close to the beach. Six double rooms equipped with heating, Internet connection and cable television available. Cafeteria, restaurant, dining room and lounge also available. The house is surrounded by green spaces and gardens. They sell home-made cider.

galeria.titulo: The interior of Aizperro rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: The refurbished farmhouse is located very close to the coast. Six rooms with bathroom and a living room with TV exclusively for the guests. It is possible to buy typical country products.

galeria.titulo: The inside of Amalur rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Newly built traditional style Basque farmhouse. The guests can admire the valley and La Concha bay from the house, which is located in the mountain. Six double rooms with bathroom and television available. It also has a lounge with television and boardgames and a dining room with fireplace. In addition, it is possible to buy home-made biological food and natural cider. Restaurant and cider house within the house.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Kostegi rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: This farmhouse is located in the mountain, at the foot of the Adarra Mountain (820 metres) and 5 km from the town centre. Five double rooms with bathroom, heating and cable television. Moreover, a meeting room and a living room are also available. The rural house is surrounded by green spaces, trees and a garden.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Typical Basque country house built in 1665, but it was totally restored in 1999. It is located 10 minutes far from the city centre of Donostia-San Sebastián, next to the racetrack. It consists of 5 double rooms with fully equipped bathroom, television and heating. In addition, there are also a meeting hall and a lounge. The house is surrounded by green areas and trees.

galeria.titulo: Exterior of the Barazar rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Seventeenth century refurbished farmhouse in the heart of nature. Located in Zizurkil, 2.5 km from the town center and only 20 minutes from San Sebastian. Lovely environment full of tranquility and surrounded by mountains. 2 double bedrooms sharing bathroom. Living room with TV, Wifi signal and terrace. Besides farming and agriculture, you can enjoy the animals and the rural environment.

Lete rural house is located in Tolosaldea, in a rural setting. It is a restored farmhouse that is considered cultural heritage. It consists of old furniture and will delight those guests who seek nature and quiet. Four double rooms with one bathroom each, 2 double rooms with no bathroom and a lounge with board games, a library and television at the guests' disposal. Outdoor garden, green areas for leisure and children's playgrounds. Pets allowed.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Lete rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Refurbished rural house located in Valdegovía, in Alava, near Valderejo Natural Park and surrounded by green spaces. Four double rooms with bathroom, heating, TV, guests room and meeting room. Internet access and fax services also available.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Herranetxe rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: New Basque farmhouse situated within Aralar Natural Park. It consists of 6 double rooms with fully equipped bathroom, heating and cable television. Breakfast is served. Kitchen-dining room at clients' disposal. In addition, a lounge is also available. A garden and green areas surround the house.

galeria.titulo: Exterior of the Haundikoa rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Refurbished Basque farmhouse, located in a rural and quiet area perfect to relax. Four double rooms with bathroom, kitchen and living room with TV at the guests' disposal. Sale of typical farmhouse products.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Aldarreta rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: The refurbished typical Basque farmhouse is classed as Historical Heritage. It used to be a cider-mill in past times. It is equipped with 6 double rooms with heating, cable TV and bathroom. Moreover, its facilities include a lounge with TV and a wide dining room and a shop. Garden and green areas in the surroundings. The whole house for hire. 280 Euro per day.

galeria.titulo: The interior of the rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Situated at the foot of Ernio mountain. The house is 500 years old and was refurbished 3 years ago. Four double rooms available, two of them equipped with one bathroom each and the other two share a bathroom. Extra beds (12 Euro/each) and cots available.

galeria.titulo: The interior of Etxeberri rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Refurbished Basque farmhouse located between Tolosa and Azpeitia. One single and five double rooms, all of them equipped with bathroom, television and central heating. A terrace, a restaurant, a car park and swings for the children available.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Letea rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Located in a rural area and surrounded by green spaces, the house is situated on the mountainside of Lazkaomendi. It is a newly built house with 5 double rooms and one single room equipped with bathroom. Living room-dining room for guests with television and low fireplace. The customers are allowed to participate in agricultural activities (they have hens and cows). Guests can hire the entire house or separate rooms.

galeria.titulo: The interior of Lizargarrate rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Restored Basque farmhouse located in the middle of Aralar Natural Park, with clean rivers ideal for fishing. It consists of 6 double rooms with bathroom and an apartment that can hold up to 4 people. It is surrounded by green spaces and there is a garden with pigs, sheep and hens.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Lazkaoetxe rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Restored farmhouse located on the slope of Aizkorri Natural Park. One single and five double rooms. Four extra beds available. Three bathrooms, kitchen and living room-dining room with television and fireplace. In addition, the farmhouse also consists of a gardened green area, porch and barbecue. The guests area allowed to participate in agricultural activities: ecological garden, cultivation of small fruit, jam and "pacharan" production. The visitors can hire single rooms or the whole house. This is the right place for hiking, mountain bike rides, climbing and paragliding. The town, situated one and a half kilometres from the farm, has a public swimming pool, a restaurant, a pelota court, bars, and cider houses in the surroundings, where you will have the chance to satisfy your hunger. Thanks to its location and features, this is the ideal spot to take in groups with children, meet friends and family members or hold business meetings.

Totally refurbished Basque farmhouse made of wood and stone. It was built in 1792 and consists of six rooms with fully equipped bathroom, heating, Internet and cable television. In addition, there are three living rooms, two of them with low fireplace.

galeria.titulo: The interior of Tellerine rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Totally restored house built in the 16th century with stone, brick and wood. It is situated next to the river Oria overlooking the mountains of Aitzgorri, the old part of Segura and Oria Valley. It consists of 5 double rooms and one single room with bathroom, television and heating available. An attic with reading area, television, dining room, kitchen and terrace. Visitors can taste typical products of the Basque Country such us Idiazabal cheese.

galeria.titulo: The interior of Ondarre rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: The totally refurbished 15th century construction is one of the most ancient buildings in the region. It consists of 5 double bedrooms with bathroom, heating, Internet and cable TV. One meeting room, one banquet hall, one lounge, one restaurant and one coffee bar also available. The house is surrounded by green spaces and a garden.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Iruraitz rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: This recently built rural house is set in the town of Lezama. It consists of one single and two double rooms with bathroom, heating, air conditioning, Internet and telephone. One meeting room and a lounge also available. Outdoor swimming pool, tennis court and and green areas with a playground for the children.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Usko Rural House

datosGenerales.descripcion: Typical Basque farm located in an exceptional area as it is near Sierra de Orduña mountain range and close to Maroño Reservoir. Six double rooms with bathroom, Internet, air conditioning, TV and heating. Restaurant providing traditional Basque cuisine. Green areas surround the house together with facilities for the children. The perfect place to relax, avoid the hurly-burly of the city and go on mountain routes in Sierra Salvada mountain range.

A 16th-century farmhouse located within Gorbeia Natural Park.

 

It is totally refurbished and consists of four double rooms with a bathroom, heating, Internet and cable TV. Moreover, the guests will find a large living room-dining room and a kitchen at their disposal.

 

Outdoors, there is a garden with barbecue area and other green spaces to enjoy the landscape.

galeria.titulo: The interior of Gorbeia Bide rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Rural house located near the golf course of Urturi. It consists of 5 rooms with bathroom, heating, air-conditioning and cable TV. It also has restaurant, meeting room, lounge, library and entertainment activities programme. It is possible to practise a number of sports nearby, like golf, fishing, horse-riding and hiking. Green areas in the surroundings and children's playground also available.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Biltegi etxea rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Rural house located in Elosua, in front of a water reservoir where it is allowed to practise canoeing. It consists of 5 double rooms with bathroom, heating and cable TV. Moreover, a cafeteria and a lounge are also available for all the visitors. Outwards, the guests will find a terrace and garden area with children's playgrounds for the little ones to make sure they enjoy the landscape and the days off.

Restored farmhouse located in the middle of nature. It is equipped with 2 double rooms and another two with shared bathroom. Dining room-sitting room with television with fireplace, social hall and meeting room. There are also a restaurant and a coffee bar. Green areas surround it. The whole house for rental 116 Euro/day. Rooms with shared bathroom 32 Euro High Season, 29 Euro Low Season.

Rural house located in Laguardia, which is the centre of La Rioja Alavesa region, famous for its wine cellars. Building of new construction and surrounded by Cantabria and Toloño mountain ranges. It consists of four rooms with one bathroom each -one for individual use-, and a living room-dining room overlooking the beautiful mountain ranges with a TV set for the guests. The farmhouse offers several activities like visiting its winery, tastings, lunch...

Vineyards surround the rural house that is situated in Laserna (Laguardia). Six double rooms with bathroom, heating, Internet and television available. It is also equipped with lounge, swimming pool and restaurant with banquet hall. In addition, Señorío de las Viñas also consists of a winery with Rioja Designation of Origin.

galeria.titulo: Interior view of the rural accommodation

datosGenerales.descripcion: Rural house set in the Valle de Laminoria valley, in the heart of the mountains of the Alava region. It features 5 double rooms, one single room and a restaurant.

Rural house located in Campezo, Alava. It is situated near Santa Lucía Natural Park and close to Urturi golf course.

 

It consists of four double rooms equipped with heating, shared bathroom and TV. Library, lounge with low fireplace also available. Pigs, rabbits, hens, horticulture and an ecologic orchard.

galeria.titulo: The interior of Marivi rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion:
Refurbished old mansion located within the historical fortified complex of Salinillas de Buradon, at Rioja Alavesa, to 8 km of Labastida.

 

It consists of rooms with bathroom, lounge for the guests with a real log fireplace, TV and board games. Home-made products are available and the house owns a wine cellar.

 

It offers guests the possibility of participating in the farm's activities and visiting the wine cellar.

galeria.titulo: Palacio de los Condes de Oñate

datosGenerales.descripcion: Arruan Haundi is a refurbished building listed historical heritage and surrounded by trees and mountains. Its main activity is ecological farming but it also has a cheese-making centre and they sell homemade products. You can also go hiking along several marked trails designated for that purpose and which have won first prize in the Active Tourism Competition in the NATURE category at FITUR 2011 (Biodiversity Route, Reconstruction of Natural Resources, Visit to the Renewable Energy Park).

This flour mill dating from 1778 has been refurbished as a lodging keeping its original mill and bakery on the ground floor. The mill is powered by the waters from a spring that emerges in front of the house. It features four double rooms -two extra beds available, 14 Euro/bed- with bathroom, television and a dining room. It is located at the foot of the Sierra Toloño-Cantabria mountain range, an ideal place to go hiking and cycling by mountain bike (for hire at the house), and close to the Urturi golf course and Izki Natural Park. It offers the possibility of participating in farming activities and trips are arranged for the guests by mini-bus. The whole house is available for hire.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Errota Rural House

datosGenerales.descripcion: Recent construction rural house located near the cliffs, the beach and the park in the small and peaceful area of Barrika. It is equipped with six double rooms with bathroom and access to the garden from where impressive views and sunsets can be admired. It is also provided with sitting room with television and fireplace.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Zearreta Barri rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Arribeiti rural house is located in Erandio, in a beautiful landscape scenery. Ideal place to enjoy the spectacular sights of Txorierri valley, Abra and Bilbao harbour. The house is a little remote from the city centre but with an easy access. It consists of one single and five double rooms, all of them with fully equipped bathroom, television and heating. Car park and wide dining room also available.

galeria.titulo: The interior of Arribeti Zarra rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion:
Erdikoetxe farmhouse was built in 1890 and has been totally refurbished keeping its original architecture. The house is located in a calm area and very close to Urkiola and Gorbeia Natural Parks and Urdaibai Biosphere Reserve. The visitors will be able to enjoy the quiet of the place and practise many outdoor activities.

The rural house consists of three double and four single rooms equipped with bathroom, television, heating, air conditioning and telephone. In addition, it has a lounge for the exclusive use of guests, as well as car park and terrace. The visitors will have the chance of purchasing homemade products such as honey, cider and txakoli.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Erdikoetxe rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Rural house built in 2000 and located between the sea and the mountains, in Mendexa. Front line beach house perfect for lovers of the sea and the mountains since the mounts surround the area. Six double rooms with fully equipped bathrooms, heating and TV. Dining room, meeting room, entertainment programme, coffee bar and shop also available.

galeria.titulo: Interior view of the Itxas Ertz rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: The Urbide rural house, located in the Biscayan town of Ubide, is a suitable rural house to spend some days in the middle of nature. 2 double rooms and 2 single rooms with a fully equipped bathroom each. Ubide is a small town lying just on the limit of Bizkaia and Álava, in the nature reserve of Urkiola. In addition, there's a restaurant that offers home-made food and regional cuisine.

galeria.titulo: Exterior view of the Urbide rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Casa Rural Altzuste is located in Zeanuri, beside the Gorbeia Nature Park. Set in beautiful surroundings, this is the ideal base both for relaxing and for visiting Bilbao and Vitoria-Gasteiz, provincial capitals which are just half an hour away, or San Sebastián, which is an hour and a half away. It consists of six double rooms, six bathrooms, a kitchen and a living room with a television and a fireplace. It also has a beautiful garden with a barbecue. Visitors can join in farm work. It can be reached by public transport as La Unión bus company runs a service to Vitoria-Gasteiz.

galeria.titulo: Views of Gorbeia from Altzuste Rural House

datosGenerales.descripcion: Located near Pagoeta Natural Park, the rural house is surrounded by nature and situated near Zarautz beaches. Leku-Eder also consists of a grill specialised in charcoal-grilled meat and fish. Four double rooms with bathrooms, one reading room and television. A perfect place for mountain trips and cultural visits. Capacity of 8 people.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Leku-Eder Rural House

datosGenerales.descripcion: Eleizondo is a farm consisting of two dwellings for four and seven people respectively. The whole building for hire. Two extra beds available if requested. Guests will enjoy nature with all mod cons and the equipment needed. The house is surrounded by several sorts of landscapes such as rocky summits overlooking the sea, Elorriaga cliffs, Sakoneta coves, neighbourhoods with farmhouses and hermitages, Lastur Valley where it is possible enjoying bullfights with young bulls, as well as Lastur mills, caves to practise speleology, privileged locks to practise paragliding, the Sanctuary of Itziar and Ekain cave -important site of cave paintings.

Basque farmhouse overlooking Durangaldea, Aralar and Aitzgorri. It consists of four rooms with a small single lounge, heating and all the mod cons. (Extra beds available, 13 Euro/ech). It is located in a quiet area in contact with the nature.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Eguzkitza Etxea Rural House

datosGenerales.descripcion: The rural house was built in 1995 remaining faithful to the Basque rural style. Its privileged location makes of Itsas Lore an exceptional viewpoint overlooking the Cantabrian sea. Surrounded by vineyards and natural parks. Perfect for lovers of tourism linked to nature and relax.

galeria.titulo: The interior of Itsas Lore Rural House

datosGenerales.descripcion: This is a completely renovated palace of the 17th century, which is located in the very same Urdaibai Biosphere Reserve of. The landlords devote themselves to the ecologic agriculture and let the hosts participate in it. The palace is equipped with six double rooms consisting of a bathroom, a TV set and a telephone. There are also a living room with a fireplace and RDSI connection, cook, dining room and a terrace available.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Aristieta rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: The Endeitxe Rural Lodge is situated in a dreamy setting: Ereño, a small town surrounded by winding vales and mountains, from where you can admire a view of the sea, into which the waters of the Urdaibai estuary flow, passing through the truly magical Biosphere Reserve. It lies 15 minutes from the villages of Lekeitio and Gernika, and just 10 minutes from the beaches of Laga and Laida. Sea and mountain are the setting for this rural lodge, making guests feel a part of the surroundings. Its thick walls, combined with the warm wood of the rooms, provide both comfort and authenticity, while the windows invite us to gaze at one of the most majestic landscapes in all Euskadi. The cottage has both double and single rooms, with internet, heating, cable TV, ocean views, and on the outside offers guests a pleasant garden with a barbecue.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Endeitxe rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: A combination of rural house and cider house located in the neighbourhood of Santiago Mendi, Astigarra. Beautiful views of Donostia-San Sebastián. It consists of 5 double rooms with bathrooms. Living room with television, kitchen and heating available. It provides dinners with the typical cider house menu during cider season (from January to May).

galeria.titulo: The inside of Artola rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Familiar, quiet and peaceful farmhouse dedicated to the agricultural production, mainly cider. It is located at the foot of Itziar, surrounded by meadows and mountains. It consists of six double rooms provided with bathrooms, low energy consumption heating and television. Decorated with refurbished old furniture. A separate exit to a porch overlooking the little valley where the farmhouse is located. Besides, it has an apartment with two bedrooms, living room, kitchen and terrace. It offers the possibility of buying handmade products and cider. It has a cider house where it serves the typical menu with cod, chop and cider.

This is a new farmhouse that is located in a rural area at 3 kilometres from the city centre of Donostia-San Sebastián and the beaches of Ondarreta and La Concha.

 

It is situated in Ibaeta and equipped with five double rooms with bathroom and separate access to the dwelling. Living room with television, as well as a wide garden overlooking mount Igeldo also available.

House of typical architecture located very close to Ullibarri reservoir and Garaio Park. It is the perfect place for walks and bike rides. The rural house consists of five double rooms with bathroom and heating. Living room and terrace available for the guests. Green areas and gardens surround the house. The guests are allowed to participate in farm activities.

galeria.titulo: The interior of one of the rooms

datosGenerales.descripcion: This is the typical Basque farmhouse that dates back to the 17th century. It is totally refurbished and located in the middle of nature. It consists of four double rooms with bathroom, heating and telephone. It is also fitted out with library, kitchen, and sitting room for guests. Its outdoor facilities include a recreational area where the children will have the chance of enjoying. There is a playground located in the place.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Ozollo rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Totally restored farmhouse of over three centuries old. It is one of the numerous inns located on the Roman paved roads to connect close towns. The rural house keeps its origins but with modern touches. Thus, it is equipped with double rooms with the Internet, heating and cable television. Besides, it is also provided with a restaurant for 50 guests, a coffee bar, social room, meeting room and entertainment programme. Green areas and a garden surround the farmhouse.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Bentazar rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Farm located in the Valley of Aramaiona, in the neighbourhood of Gantzaga. Thanks to its location, this is the perfect house for business trips since Arrasate-Mondragón, birthplace of cooperatives, is a few kilometres far. It consists of double rooms with heating and cable TV. In addition, the guests will find a playground and a meeting room. It is surrounded by a garden with playground. 'Txoko' and porch also available.

galeria.titulo: The interior of Muru rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Located 1 kilometre from Santa Cruz de Campezo, the rural house is by the hermitage of Nuestra Señora de Ibernalo, a temple dating back to the 15th century and built on the place where the remains of a 13th century hermitage stood. It consists of 8 double rooms with bathroom. A lounge with television, another multipurpose lounge with billiards, table football, and varied boardgames are also included. Outdoors there is a recreational area overlooking the magnificent valley.

galeria.titulo: The interior of the rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: House located in the centre of Tuyo. It has been refurbished but keeping its original structure. It consists of 5 double rooms equipped with heating and cable TV. Kitchen, "txoko" with television and pool and terrace for the exclusive use of the guests. Green areas, a garden with threes and trees surround the area.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Toki Eder rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Historical building dating back to the 17th century, located in the Valley of Ibaizabal. It is equipped with six double rooms with bathroom, TV, telephone, heating and Internet access. It is surrounded by green areas, gardens and trees. Its location makes it the ideal place to relax or for business trips.

galeria.titulo: The interior of Murueta Baserria rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Refurbished rural house that is located in the area of Gorbeia Nature Reserve. Six double rooms equipped with heating, Internet, cable TV and telephone. Lounge, meeting room and entertainment activities also available. The rural house is situated in a natural park; thereby, surrounded by green areas, garden and trees. An exceptional spot to enjoy nature. The guests can participate in farming activities.

Typical Basque farmhouse that has been recently built. It is located in a rural area, surrounded by green meadows and near the coast.

 

Close to Ondarroa, Lekeitio and Simón Bolivar Museum. It consists of six double rooms with fully-equipped bathroom, Internet access, TV and individual heating. 7 extra beds in all and 6 cots for babies. 12 Euro/bed.

 

It is possible to participate in farming activities such as feeding hens or sheep, working in the green garden, cleaning the stable, picking up fruit or grass.

 

There is also a wide range of local products on sale.

Andutza farmhouse dates back to 1502. It has been recently refurbished and it is located in a privileged area, near Urdaibai Biosphere Reserve and the beaches of Laida, Laga, Ea and Lekeitio. Green areas surround the place turning it into the perfect place to relax and admire the sea. It consists of four double rooms equipped with heating, telephone and television. What is more, the guests have at their disposal several facilities, such as a lounge with television and board games, bar and terrace overlooking the beautiful sights of the region. Customers will have the chance of practising sports (Basque pelota, tennis) and purchase natural products such as fruit, vegetables, potatoes, cider and txakoli wine. Car park available as well as swings for the little ones.

galeria.titulo: The interior of Andutza rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: First rural house to be built in Euskadi. Completely restored, it is located on coastal Ibarrangelu, with its beautiful Laida and Laga beaches and one kilometre off the fishing harbour of Elantxobe. It consists of 6 double rooms overlooking the mountains or the sea with fully-equipped bathroom, television and WIFI. Living room-dining room on the ground floor with breakfast service, kitchen for the exclusive use of the guests, terrace with barbecue and a wide garden with furnishings overlooking the sea. Friendly atmosphere in the rural house. A very quiet place.

Refurbished rural house located in Munitibar, near Urdaibai Nature Reserve and close to Gernika-Lumo. Five double rooms (with the possibility to have 3 extra beds), two bathrooms, kitchen, dining room, living room with fireplace, TV and toilet. Terrace and garden also available. The house for hire as a whole.

galeria.titulo: The interior of Astorki Goikoa rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: 15th century farmhouse with typical defensive elements of that period and overlooking Uribarri Plain. It consists of six double rooms with bathroom, satellite television, telephone, heating, living room with television and library as well. Meeting room, terrace, coffee shop and a car park also available. There is also a Basque modern cuisine restaurant.

galeria.titulo: The interior of Arteaga Rural House

datosGenerales.descripcion: The rural house is located in front of the Bakio beach, surrounded by green spaces and overlooking the sea. It is equipped with two double rooms and two flats for two people each, with kitchen and bathroom. TV set, Internet, fireplace, barbecue and garden.

Irigoien is a refurbished ancestral farmhouse, whose most representative features remain intact. It is located in an ideal area for walks on foot, by bike or on horseback. It is situated near the beaches of Donostia-San Sebastian, Orio and Zarautz. Due to its features, it is a suitable place to arrange group activities and courses. It consists of five double rooms with bathroom and television. Next to the farmstead is a traditional cider house and a grill restaurant.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Irigoyen Rural House

datosGenerales.descripcion: The rural house is located in a natural scenery at 3 kilometres from Donostia-San Sebastián. It was inaugurated in 2002 and consists of 6 double rooms with bathroom, television and an apartment for four persons. It offers the possibility of having breakfast in the very house and enjoying the terrace and the pelota court. It is a good reference point to go on a trip to the coast or to the mountain. It is open the whole year and the guests can participate in the daily tasks of the vegetable garden.

galeria.titulo: The interior of  Laskin enea rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Traditional 16th-century farmhouse labelled as historical monument. It keeps the features of the tradicional farmhouse, but it is equipped with all type of comforts in its four double room and one big living room. Cosy atmosphere. To recover ecologically the Mountain Urko, the owners devote themselves to agricultural activities: they have an vegetable garden with biological agriculture. It is possible for guests to participate in agricultural activities.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Sosola rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: The farmhouse os located in the mountains at 3 kilometres from Elgeta and 18 kilometres from the coast. The house consists of 6 double rooms with one bathroom each. Possibility to add 6 extra beds, 12.15 Euro/bed. It is completely refurbished and surrounded by open fields to go for walks.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Barrenengua rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Totally refurbished beautiful farmhouse located in a valley. Rooms are distributed across two floors that also consist of fireplace, information point and lecture room, television and a wide window overlooking the garden. Extra beds available (15 Euro). Gardened areas surround the house and a small river goes around it.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Endara Rural House

datosGenerales.descripcion: Farmhouse located in the neighbourhood of Lierni in Mutiloa, between the mountains of Aralar and Aizkorri, in a rural scenery. It consists of four double rooms and four single ones. Heating, living room with TV, garden with facilities for the children and bar-restaurant.

galeria.titulo: The interior of Lierni Garakoa rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Recently built house located in Zubieta. It is close to the racetrack and the headquarters of Real Sociedad football team. This is a quiet area with excellent views and very close to Donostia-San Sebastian. A capacity of 12 persons in 6 double rooms equipped with shower, television and terrace in three of them. As it is situated 8 km off the coast the location enables to enjoy La Concha, Ondarreta and Zurriola beaches.

galeria.titulo: The interior of Karobi rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion:
Farmhouse that dates back to the end of the 18th century built in stone from the quarry of the mountain Ua and wood from the forests of the surroundings. It is located between large grasslands, which makes it the perfect accommodation for leisure and nature lovers.

 

It consists of five double rooms with television and heating, kitchen for the guests and living room. The guesthouse offers guided tours to the bodega belonging to the cider house of the same name. There are also guided tasting sessions for groups, at which you will be able to sample natural cider

Recently built farmhouse that includes the most typical construction elements of the rural architecture of Las Encartaciones. Located in the central area of the Valley of Carranza, it enjoys the beautiful views of Ordunte mountains. Four rooms with bathroom (three double and one single), fully equipped kitchen and dining room, living room, central heating and entertainment area. If offers information on the Valley and its surrounding area. Guided tours are also available.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the El Avellano-Urritza rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Rural house located beside the Nature Reserve of Gorbeia, a magnificent place for practising several outdoor sports. 5 rooms, 3 bathrooms, kitchen, garden with barbecue, and a big meeting room ('txoko') with fireplace and TV set, which is very suitable for group meals, meetings, etc. The house is to be rented as a whole.

galeria.titulo: The interior of Angoitia rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Izpiliku is a rural house located within the former stables and barns of a 19th century farmhouse in the Gorbeia Natural Park. It consists of two double rooms, of which one has access for disabled people and there are two apartments both of them equipped with bathroom. Moreover, it is also equipped with kitchen, living room with fireplace and reading room. The house owns a garden surrounded by nature. It operates with solar power. The stay enables participating in farming activities.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Izpiliku rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion:
Rural guesthouse located in a natural setting, in close proximity to Bilbao.
