Ordaola guesthouse is characterised by its homemade dishes and friendly service. It offers six double rooms (with the option of adding two extra beds), equipped with TV and full bathroom. It also boasts outdoor terraces, a living/dining room with a chimney, and a car park. Ordaola rural guesthouse, in addition to running a bar and the Potxolo grillroom, rents out a dining room with a kitchen to groups. A meeting room is also available for hire.

 

Guests will have the chance to take part in agricultural and farming activities.

Xabin Etxea is a recently-built rural house consisting of six double rooms with bathroom and a living room with a small library and TV. It also has a restaurant with terrace. It is located between the towns of Zumaia and Getaria, surrounded by vineyards of txakoli, and not far from the beach. It is possible taking part in agricultural activities related to the vineyards.

Recently built farmhouse located in a natural scenery in the neighbourhood of Legarreta (Villabona). It is surrounded by land cultivation of vegetables. It consists of three double rooms with bathroom, living room and dining room where breakfast is served.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Akulebi rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Restored 16th century farmhouse with a 17th century coat of arms on the facade. It consists of a large covered terrace overlooking Zarautz, Orio and Donostia-San Sebastián beaches. Mountains and green meadows surround it. The rural house has six double rooms with a bathroom each (possibility of 4 extra beds), kitchen with access to the terrace and a large living room with low wooden ceiling, TV and heating. It is located 300 metres from the centre of Aia and two kilometres from Pagoeta Natural Park.

galeria.titulo: Outside view of Azkue rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: The typical farmhouse dating back to 1800 but has been totally refurbished. The total house for hire. It consists of four double rooms with three extra beds, two bathrooms, kitchen and two living rooms with fireplace and the Internet. The farmhouse is located on the hillside of Murumendi mountain and close to Beizama biotope, which is the largest oak wood in Gipuzkoa. Nineteen hectares of forest, ecological orchard and animals (deer, sheep, goats and hens). Sale of products.

galeria.titulo: The inside of Pagorriaga rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion:
17th century rural building, completely restored and full rented.

 

It is equipped with rooms for 6-8 in three spacious rooms with heating. Also available 2 bathrooms and a toilet, a living room with TV, a fully-equipped kitchen, an area to park the car and a private garden with barbecue and garden furniture.

 

It is located in a rural setting surrounded by nature.

galeria.titulo: Outside view of the rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: 17th century refurbished farmhouse that is located in a privileged place, halfway between the mountains and the beach, in Ispaster. Six double rooms with bathroom, dining room, living room with TV and fireplace, terrace with bar and garden. Internet, heating, sale of typical products and tourist information.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Kurtxia Baserria rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: This 16th century typical Basque farmhouse, annexed to the tower-house of the Lords of Maturana, is set in the heart of a neighbourhood at 12 km from Vitoria and 2 km from the N-I (Autovía del Norte). The house is surrounded by an enclosed green area, which is appropriate for the children. Located at the entrance of Garaio Park and next to Ullíbarri-Gamboa Reservoir, this is a privileged setting to go hiking, practise cycle tourism, water sports, go for walks, sunbathe, and so on. A route skirts around the 45-km reservoir, only for the pedestrians and cycle tourists. Bikes for hire, ornithological park, ecological-cultural routes¿ All the rooms consist of bathroom and TV, one of them with fireplace and another one with an iron heating stove. Its facilities include kitchen, dining room, reception area and porch. Breakfast and dinner service with local produce.

Country house located in the town of Elgeta and next to the 15th century Church of Santa Maria de la Asunción. It consists of 6 double rooms with bathroom and Internet access. It is located at 473-m height and surrounded by mountains such as Intxorta, Azkonabietia, Goikomendi, Sierra de Elgeta and the Eguarbitza Hill. That is the reason why it is the ideal place to go hiking. Besides, it is sitting on the border between the three Basque capitals and 30 minutes from Deba and Mutriku beaches.

galeria.titulo: The interior of Elgeta Rural House

datosGenerales.descripcion: Farmhouse located between the coastal towns of Lekeitio and Ondarroa, overlooking the sea. Three double rooms with and without bathroom, two single rooms and a flat of 70 square metres with two rooms (two extra beds available, 12 Euro per bed). It is also possible participating in farming activities.

Abaienea offers you a country guest house and two apartments in Ariñez, 3.8 kilometres from Vitoria-Gasteiz. The house has seven rooms, all of them with bathroom, television and wifi. The apartments have two bedrooms each, plus bathroom, kitchen-dining room and garden with barbecue. Outside there are facilities for children plus a fronton court, football pitch and car park.

Palace located in the former mining area of San Narciso, nowadays Olaberria neighbourhood. Once the mining production stopped the place was left in ruins. The palace has been restored keeping its old and valuable facade and renovating the inside. It consists of six double rooms with bathroom and TV, an apartment for four people, a living room with fireplace and a kitchen at the guests' disposal.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of San Narciso Palace

datosGenerales.descripcion: Erretegi Haundi consists of six double rooms with bathroom, living room and dining room with fireplace, TV and kitchen at the guests' disposal. It has also an apartment for four persons. It is located in a suitable scenery to enjoy nature and get to know the Basque Culture and Gastronomy.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Erretegi Haundi rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: The farmhouse is an old cattle farming dating back to 1897 which now is run by members of Arrizabalaga family. Thanks to their contribution, the bulls of Marques de Saka keep being the main stars at the bullfighting festivities of the regions of Gipuzkoa, Bizkaia and Navarre. Perlakua rural house has been refurbished and turned into a rural house, bar and restaurant but keeping its rural atmosphere with its beams and furniture. It consists of six double rooms with bathroom and TV, living room with TV, fireplace and another living room. Breakfast, lunch and dinner is served in the Saka restaurant, with the products they produce. The guests can participate in agricultural activities.

Recently built house located at the foot of the Jata mountain, very close to the Urdaibai Biosphere Reserve. It consists of 5 rooms with bathroom, TV set and Internet access via ADSL (cable and WIFI) in each room. In addition, there is an exclusive lounge for clients and a private car park. It was awarded the UNE-EN-ISO 9001:2000 certification thanks to its great quality and customer service.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Ibarrondo Etxea rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Rural house located in Behekoetxezaharra farmhouse. It was restored in 2004 consisting of seven double rooms with a bathroom each, as well as heating and a large flat of 70 square metres with one double bed, three single beds and a sofa bed. Extra bed: 15.75 Euro. This is a healthy house to live in as the walls are breathable. They are built with double clay panel, without any toxic materials such as polyurethane, solvents, undersealers etc. Moreover, they produce ecological products. It is in a purely rural environment, in a region of 500 inhabitants who keep alive the customs of the Basque Country. Discounts for long stays. Agricultural and cattle activities available.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Ekoigoa rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Rural house for rental, minimum two nights. It is located in Luyando, village of about 700 inhabitants that is ideal to practice hiking, riding a mountain bike and visiting the old quarters of Artziniega or Urduña-Orduña. It is equipped with two double rooms with a fully equipped bathroom, four double rooms, two convertible lounges to create one double room, four communal bathrooms, garage for four cars, a children's playground, table tennis room, fully equipped kitchen, 1,200-square-metre garden with two porches and a barbecue. The house is completely equipped and consists of four televisions, DVD and CD.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Urdinetxe rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Farm that focuses on providing accommodation and producing txakoli and cider. It is equipped with three double rooms with bathroom and a sitting room for the guests. Breakfast, lunch and dinner available. Possibility to participate in livestock and agricultural activities. They sell their own products.

galeria.titulo: The interior of El Txakoli farm

datosGenerales.descripcion: Restored stone house, located in the Urdaibai Biosphere Reserve and surrounded by green areas. Good views and cosy atmosphere. 6 double rooms with a bathroom each, living room with fireplace and fully-equipped kitchen. Room and laundry service.

galeria.titulo: The interior of Iturbe rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion:
18th century rural house situated in Navaridas, within the Rioja Alavesa.

 

It was restored keeping its architectural elements, its ancient cave, the press and the stables. 4 double rooms and 1 apartment for two people available.

 

Apart from the accommodation, the owners provide tastings of the wine they produce, with the possibility of visiting the vineyards, the cellar and observing the typical vineyard tasks.

 

There is a pelota court next to the house, as well as a multipurpose court and swimming pools. Private car park.

Recently-built modern house located in the small town of Legutiano, on the shore of Santa Engracia reservoir. It is equipped with 4 double rooms, living room with television and music system, 3 bathrooms one of them with hydromassage bathtub, rustic dining room with fireplace and a capacity of 16 guests. An attic with terrace and pool also available.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Urkiola Enea farm

datosGenerales.descripcion: Country house completely restored and located in the valley of Leniz, the geographical centre of the Basque Country. The environment is suitable to go for a walk and to practice sports related to nature. The house has four double rooms with TV. Possibility of two additional beds. Besides, it has heating, chimney, getting online, fax, finish sauna, turkish bath and hydromassage, relax room, massages and living room with minibar.

This rural house offers five double rooms with bathroom, TV, WiFi connection, heating and hairdryer. It is located on the mountainside of the mount of Las Muñecas, overlooking the Sopuerta valley and very close to the beach of La Arena. It is an ideal place to go hiking, keep fit in the gim or relax in the jacuzzi, both facilities available on the premises.

galeria.titulo: Exterior of Casa Rural Urrezko Ametsa
Exterior of Casa Rural Urrezko Ametsa
Exterior of Casa Rural Urrezko Ametsa
Exterior of Casa Rural Urrezko Ametsa
Exterior of Casa Rural Urrezko Ametsa
Exterior of Casa Rural Urrezko Ametsa

datosGenerales.descripcion:
This typical Basque farmhouse was built in the 17th century. It is totally restored keeping its old wooden and ston structure.

 

The rural house is situated in Etxano, overlooking the mountains and just a few kilometres from the town centre of Amorebieta-Etxano. It is equipped with five double rooms, two single, and a meeting room. The rooms consist of a terrace, fully-equipped bathroom, television, telephone and Internet connection.

Ancient building dating back to 1800 made of stone and wood. It consists of six double rooms with bathroom, kitchen, living room-dining room. Possibility of hiring three extra beds (10.5 Euro/bed). It os located near Mirandaola park, where there is a wide range of routes to go hiking, sightseeing and enjoying the Basque gastronomy. The guests can participate in agricultural activities.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Pastain rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Recently restored and located next to the ancient Martindegi farmhouse, the house is sitting on the outskirts of Lezo, in the Oarsoaldea region. The house can be hired as a communal accommodation. It was built in 1975 and restored in 2004 to be open to the guests that same year. Credit cards are not accepted. The building consists of 6 double rooms with fully equipped bathroom, a living room-dining room with communal television. The accommodation is adapted for the disabled.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Juan Martindegi farm

datosGenerales.descripcion: Farm located in Zumaia, next to the ancient Way of St. James. The house was both a hermitage and an inn before 1771, although it has been completely restored. Besides, it consists of 6 double rooms and an apartment for four people. Kitchen-dining room, lounge and terrace. It is located in the countryside and it enjoys beautiful views over the sea and the Bay of Biscay, what makes it the ideal place for those who want to enjoy mountains and the beach.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Santa Klara farm

datosGenerales.descripcion: This house is restored but it keeps the typical architecture. It is located in the Urdaibai Biosphere Reserve, at the foot of the Sollube mountain. Two double rooms with a bathroom each, one flat for two people and kitchen-dining room with a fireplace and independent entrance. In addition, there are a garden with hammocks, a terrace to have breakfast, a private car park and central heating.

Farmhouse of the typical Basque architecture placed in the middle of nature. 6 double rooms with a bathroom each, kitchen for guests, dining room and garden. Breakfast service and ecologic products available.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Iketza Goikue rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Montañenea is a 15-century farmhouse set on the hillside of Jaizkibel, 800 metres from the centre of Hondarribia and 500 metres from the beach. It is is a suitable place for resting. Large rooms with bathroom, heating, TV and breakfast service in the porch or in the garden available. Internet access.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Montañenea rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Rural house located in the neighbourhood of Urdaneta, in Aia, between the countryside and the beach. Very close to Pagoeta Natural Park and Zarautz Beach, the accommodation consists of 5 double rooms.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Ancient mill in the middle of nature, in a quiet area of sparse population. It was restored respecting its essence and is still in operation. It is equipped with 5 double rooms with bathroom and television. One of them with access for the disabled, fully equipped with wheelchair, living room-dining room, television, video and kitchen. In addition to this, there are services as follows: a car park, a heating, fireplace and green gardened areas.

Newly built Basque farmhouse located in a rural area and fitted out with modern technologies. It offers five double rooms with bathroom, and one double room adapted for the handicapped. They all consist of in-floor radiant heating, Internet connection (ADSL) and air-conditioning. Its facilities include a lounge with fireplace and TV, and green areas for the exclusive use of guests. Outdoors, in a two hectares orchard, the owners grow typical products of the area, such as tomatoes and peppers, which guests will be able to taste in the meals served in the house.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion:
19th century farmhouse, restored in 2004 and located in the very centre of Meñaka, just 20 kilometres from Bilbao.

It consists of 6 double rooms with bathroom and TV, and a suite including a lounge. In addition, there are two living rooms and there is the possibility to celebrate social events and enjoy catering service.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Txabardi rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion:
Rural stone and wooden house built in 2004. It consists of 5 rooms with TV, background music, bathroom, terrace and beautiful views. It also has a shared lounge with TV and chimney for the guests. It is located 5 kilometres from the city centre of Donostia-San Sebastián and surrounded by garden areas and land for pottokas (native pony).

 

It is allowed feeding the animals and riding horses. Underfloor heating. In the rural house you will find several services such as a living room for the guests, video and music players, tourist information, board games, agricultural activities, a SPA area where to relax with jacuzzi service, sauna and massages.

Recently-build country house following the Basque traditional style of wooden structure. It is located in a peaceful place, surrounded by a wide garden area, trees and a small stream. On the hillside of Mount Jaizkibel and the Sanctuary of Guadalupe, it is situated 2 km from the urban centre and the beach. Three double rooms with bathroom and a living room-dining room with fireplace and TV available. (Possibility of hiring additional beds, 15 Euro/bed in low season and 18 Euro/bed in high season). To the rear of the house there is a pelota court. It exists the possibility of going there to learn Basque language.

galeria.titulo: Outside view of Artizarra rural house.

datosGenerales.descripcion: Restored rural house turned into a farm, it is located in the middle of nature, in the neighbourhood of Goiburu and in the small town of Urnieta, to be precise to 1km from town. It consists of 6 double rooms with TV and bathroom and an apartment for two people with kitchen, bathroom and living room. There is also a meeting room with fireplace and a capacity of 15 people. It is the ideal place for those who enjoy the peace and being in contact with nature and animals, as in the surroundings there are cows, hens and cats. A vegetable garden also available where working in there is allowed, as well as buying the produce. ¡WE ENCOURAGE YOU TO TRY A NEW EXPERIENCE IN OUR VEGETABLE GARDEN, WITH THE CHANCE TO TRY SOME FRESHLY-PICKED PRODUCE!

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Enbutegi rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion:
Refurbished ancient house. It is still built in stone with its interior of oak wood.

 

The farmhouse is located on the hillside of the Oiz mountain, near Mercedarias convent in Berriz, in a perfect place to rest and to enjoy nature. Four double rooms with bathroom, lounge with low fireplace and fully equipped kitchen available.

 

Large terraces and green spaces, car park and playground for kids. The house is to be hired as a whole and for a minimum of two nights.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Karteruena rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Patxi-Errege is the typical wooden farmhouse that is located 10 minutes from Elorrio town centre. It consists of three double rooms equipped with heating and all mod cons to guarantee a comfortable stay: lounge-dining room, kitchen, two bathrooms, living room with television, terrace, car park and garden.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Patxi-Errege rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion:
Rural house built in 1894 and totally restored in 2004.

 

It has two flats (one of them holds the rooms). 3 double rooms with complete bathroom, 2 double rooms with shared bathroom and 1 room with hydromassage bathtub available. In the first floor there is a living room with fireplace, a library, a television and a dining room.

 

Green spaces and gardens in the surroundings of the house.

Rural house located in the seaside town of Plentzia. 5 double rooms adapted for handicapped people. Central heating, air conditioning, TV, telephone, safe and bathroom. In addition, there is a meeting room, porch and terraces to enjoy the nature, for this house is in the middle of nature. Restaurant and private forest with native trees.

galeria.titulo: Interior view of the Larrakoetxea rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Museum House dating from the 18th century. Five double and two single rooms with bathroom, heating and TV. Lounge, entertainment programme and shop where home-made products are sold also at clients' disposal. The house is surrounded by green spaces, fruit trees, vineyards and garden. There is a 'txakoli' museum.

localizacion.nombreLocalidad: San Juan | San Juan de Muskiz

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Labeondo rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Restored farm of rustic style located two kilometres far from the centre of the city of Zarautz and the beach. It consists of 6 double rooms with bathroom, TV and a living room for the guests with TV as well. Besides, it also has an apartment for four people with kitchen, lounge and a separate entrance. The owners of the farm dedicate themselves to agricultural work and cattle farming. They offer the possibility of buying their products.

The rural house provides the chance of staying and enjoying the incomparable scenery, far from the noise and surrounded by nature on the hillside of Ordunte mountain.

 

It consists of 6 rooms, all of them equipped with bathrooms decorated in different styles.

 

Gailurretan is a good alternative for those who seek relax.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Gailurretan rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Ancient farmhouse dating back to the 17th century, which kept its former structure of wood and stone and its rustic style. It is equipped with a living room with a chimney, kitchen-dining room, 6 double rooms with bathroom, two apartments with kitchen-living room, hydromassage, vapor bathtub, television and WIFI area. Mountains, fruit trees and horses, goats and sheeps in the surroundings of the house. Located in the area of Gautegiz-Arteaga, in a rural setting.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Urresti rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Separate farmhouse that can be rented totally or just rooms. It is located in the countryside, 5 kilometres from the Lekeitio beach and close to the Urdaibai Biosphere Reserve. It is arranged in two floors, it has 5 double rooms with bathroom and television, two fully-equipped kitchens and an apartment for two. Besides, it is equipped with a porch, barbecue, swings and gardened area.

Restored farmhouse located in Ispaster, between Gernika and Lekeitio and near the beach. It is equipped with six double rooms with bathroom, sitting room with fireplace and sitting room-dining room with television. This is an ideal place to practise water sports, fishing as well as going for walks across the nearby mountains. Chance to participate in farming activities. Local products on sale.

galeria.titulo: The interior of the Legortza rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Restored country house. Two rooms fitted out with bathroom and four double rooms with bathroom outside of it. Rooms equipped with television. Besides, the hotel consists of a lounge with a chimney and games. Access for the disabled. It offers the chance to participate in farm works. Country products for sale.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Matsa rural hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: The house is located in a rural setting within the neighbourhood of Urberuaga in Markina-Xemein, at 5 kilometres from Ondarroa and 11 kilometres from Lekeitio. It consists of 5 double rooms with television. Local products for sale.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Amamana rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: This farmhouse is located in a peaceful setting that is ideal to relax, within the Lea-Artibai region. It consists of three double rooms, one single room, extra beds, two fully-equipped bathrooms and one kitchen, a rotisserie with a restored ancient wood oven, sitting room with fireplace and terrace with garden access at the back. Season products available. The whole house for hire.

galeria.titulo: The interior of the Monte rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion:
Bekoabadene is a country house located in the village of Meñaka . A strategic location very close to the coast and perfect beaches to go surfing such are Mundaka, Plentzia, Sopela ... and Bakio, the closest one, just 5 minutes away by car.

 

This is a quiet accommodation, very suitable for surfers , which also offers the best access to the local restaurants and best “Txakoli” wineries in this known area.

Restored farmhouse located between the Urkiola Natural Park and the Urdaibai Biosphere Reserve. It consists of three double rooms with the possibility to hire an extra bed. There are also two bathrooms, a sitting room with a fireplace and a television. A wide garden with a playground also available as well as animals -goats, cows, cats, dogs, one horse, and so on. Restaurant service is offered. What is more, it is well connected with Durangaldea region and Bilbao.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Astei Farm

datosGenerales.descripcion: Former mill totally restored. It is located in Muxika, within the Urdaibai Biosphere Reserve, 20 minutes from Bilbao and 15 minutes from the beach. It consists of 6 double rooms and 1 flat for 4 guests. All of them are equipped with bathroom as well as television and central heating. Adapted for the handicapped. A terrace and green areas surround the building. A "txoko" available as a meeting room with a capacity of up to 50. Guests can participate in farming activities.

galeria.titulo: The interior of the Iberreko Errota rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: The building is built onto a 17th century mill, between the Urkiola and the Gorbeia Natural Parks. It consists of five double rooms with bathroom and television, sitting room with fireplace, dining room and fully equipped kitchen. Free Internet access in the whole house and there is also a garden with barbecue and deck chairs. Special offers for firms.

Olazabal Azpikoa is a former farmhouse that has been refurbished in order to enjoy perfect stays in the countryside with the family or friends. The house consists of three apartments: one for 2 guests, the second for 6 persons and the third for 8. Each apartment has fully equipped kitchen and living room-dining room with fireplace and television. Moreover, there is a wide green area to relax and observe spectacular views of the valley of Atxondo on the hillside of Anboto mountain (Urkiola Natural Park).

galeria.titulo: The interior of Olazabal Azpikoa rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: The farmhouse is located in the mountains, between Urkiola and Gorbeia Natural Parks. It consists of one single and three double rooms, living room with television, kitchen and garden. It is situated in a perfect place to enjoy the landscape and discover the gems of nature in the area. Rooms or the whole house for hire.

galeria.titulo: The interior of Makaztui rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: The farmhouse is located next to the border with Gipuzkoa. It consists of 5 double rooms provided with fully equipped bathroom, television, heating and Internet, as well as a living room-dining room. Green areas surround the house together with children's playgrounds and domestic pets -donkeys, dogs, sheep and hens. Familiar treatment. Planned activities also available. They produce their own bread and sell farm produce.

This typical farmhouse was built in 1845 but it is totally restored nowadays. It is located at the foot of Gorbea Mountain, near the Gorbeia Natural Park. It consists of 5 double rooms (extra beds for rental) with bathroom and television. 3 flats for 2 people. Guestroom, kitchen, barbecue, open field for games, tennis court and a car park. Production and homemade products for sale.

galeria.titulo: The interior of the Garai rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Farmhouse located in the small town of Otxandio. It consists of a separate flats for four guests. Fully equipped with a large "txoko" (lounge) and fireplace. The main dwelling has 4 double rooms with fully equipped bathrooms. They can be turned into 2 separate flats with bathroom, 2 sitting rooms and 2 kitchens (TV in the sitting rooms). Moreover, it also consists of 2 double rooms with bathroom and a lounge included in the room (TV).

galeria.titulo: The inside of a rural house room

datosGenerales.descripcion: New construction farmhouse located in the middle of nature and overlooking the sea. It consists of two double rooms with one bathroom each and another two rooms with no bathroom. All of them are equipped with heating and TV. Additional bathroom and exclusive access to the kitchen-dining room for the guests. Green areas with a leisure area surround the house to enjoy the calmness and the sights over the sea when the weather is nice. It is possible to participate in the farm activities. There are also horses and cows.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Agerre-Soro Haundi rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Restored country house of the beginning of the 17th century which keeps its original oak structure. It consists of six rooms with bathroom and TV, kitchen and dining room with fireplace, barbecue, two terraces. One of the terraces is partly covered and overlooking the sea. There is also has a living room. A 110 square metre apartment. Green areas surround it within the Gorbeia Natural Park. This fact and its proximity to Zarautz is what makes it a suitable place for those who want to enjoy both the sea and the mountain. You can take part in farming activities such as cleaning the stable, harvesting, taking care of cows, and so on. The whole house can be rented.

Mountains surround the farmhouse that is located close to the Pagoeta Natural Park and 5 kilometres from the beach. It consists of 6 double rooms with bathroom and TV. Two extra beds available, 6 Euro/bed. There are also one living room for guests with TV, kitchen and dining room, porch with furniture and a wide green area. Moreover, it is equipped with heating, table games and WIFI Internet access. Pets are allowed.

galeria.titulo: A room at the Olaskoaga Goikoa rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Accommodation and steakhouse located in the Old Town of Lapuebla de Labarca, in the centre of Rioja Alavesa. It consists of 3 double and two singe rooms with bathroom, television and a sitting room for the guests. It is decorated in seafaring style in the memory of the boatmen of the River Ebro, whose descendants are the owners. Nowadays, the family in charge of the rural house also produces wine and allows the guests to participate in agricultural activities and visit their wineries. Besides, in Barquero Etxea Farm there is no room for boredom, as the farm owners have people carriers to take the guests to practise several leisure activities close to the accommodation such as paintball, horse riding or relaxing in a spa.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Barquero Etxea Farm

datosGenerales.descripcion: Pagoederraga is located amongst mountains, in the surroundings of the Pagoeta Natural Park. It consists of six double rooms (possibility of two extra beds, 15 Euro/bed) with bathroom, TV, kitchen and a living room with fireplace and a library. Moreover, one of the rooms is fitted out for the disabled with electronic crane, big bathroom, hydromassage and a kitchen adapted for their needs. A barbacue and a large terrace also available. The old country house with cows and other animals is situated at 100 metres. Guests are able to participate in agricultural activities. Products from the country house, the vegetable garden and the homemade cider for sale. A traditional cider house is situated at a distance of less than one kilometre.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Pagoederraga rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion:
New farmhouse overlooking the sea and located between Zarautz and Pagoeta Natural Park.

 

It has a flat for 8 people, an apartment for 6 people and two double studios. It also has a multifunctional room. It has a living room, a guest kitchen and two flats for 6 and 8 people respectively.

 

Guests are allowed to participate in agricultural activities such as harvesting, reaping and milking cows.

Restored farmhouse with stone facade and oak beams. It consists of 6 double rooms (possibility of two extra beds, 9.47 Euro each high season and 8.41 Euro low season), three bathrooms, living room with firewood heater and kitchen for clients. Green areas surround it and overlooking the sea. It is located amongst meadows and forests far from the city centre, what makes its setting quiet and peaceful.

Beautiful restored farmhouse located a few metres from the Old Town of the little town of Antzuola. Despite its closeness to the town, its inhabitants live a rural life with vegetable gardens and livestock. The farm consists of eight rooms with one bathroom each, television and Internet access. Living room with fireplace, television, telephone and a communal kitchen also available. Garden with tables, leisure area with a playground and private car park. Moreover, a restaurant serves fresh and natural handmade meals. It is a suitable place not only for work since it is equipped with meeting rooms and Internet access, but also to rest, as nature surrounds the area.

New farm which keeps the traditional style and the typology and the rustic materials typical of that region, combining stone and wooden beams. It consists of six double rooms with bathroom, living room with TV and video player, and a large kitchen-dinning room (like a 'txoko') suitable for meetings as it is equipped with television, sound system and fireplace. Breakfast consisting of home cooking fresh products (milk, jam, cheese, butter, sponge cake...) Home cooking products on sale. The farm is surrounded by green areas with a playground. It is an ideal place for those who enjoy nature, going for walks and climbing mountains. It is located 1.5 kilometres far from the town centre.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Lamaino Etxeberri farm

datosGenerales.descripcion: Restored farm located in a mountainous area next to the coast. It consists of two double rooms, a bathroom and a lounge for the guests with TV. It is surrounded by green areas and taking part in farming activities is allowed. Farm produce on sale.

Restored farm, separate from the family housing with a large terrace where breakfast and meals are served overlooking the sea. It is located 3 kilometres far from the beach and from the town centre. It consists of 6 rooms with bathroom, TV and piped music, and a lounge for the guest with TV and fireplace. Homemade lunch, breakfast and dinner are served.

galeria.titulo: The interior of Arriola Txiki farm

datosGenerales.descripcion: It is situated in the coastal area of the Way of St. James, also known as the Road to Santiago. It is a new country house located two kilometres from the town centre of Deba. A tourist and summer area overlooking the beautiful sea. Rooms with bathroom and another one to share. There are also a lounge and kitchen at the guests' disposal. Home-made products are sold. Three additional beds available. Kitchen use: 4 Euro (Estimated cost. Add 7% VAT).

Country house located in the neighbourhood of Lastur in Deba. It consist of six double rooms, three bathrooms and two kitchen-dining rooms. Fireplace in the lounge and a meeting room also available. Idiazabal cheese is produced in the farm and taking part in agricultural activities is possible. Green areas and a garden with a barbecue surround the house. It also has tennis and pelota courts.

Santuaran Bekoa is an agro-tourism facility comprising six en-suite double rooms, TV, central heating, free WiFi and a restaurant and bar with a terrace area. It is located in Itziar (Deba), just five minutes away from the A8 motorway and 15 minutes from the Flysch cliffs. It has an excellent motorway connection to Donostia/San Sebastián (20 minutes) and to Bilbao and Vitoria-Gasteiz (both 45 minutes away). Situated on the coastal stretch of the Way of the Saint James.

galeria.titulo: Exterior view of Santuaran Bekoa rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Restored farm made of stone and keeping its rustic features. It is located on the slope of Andutz, by the sea and near some spectacular cliffs. Separate access to a farm consisting of five double rooms with bathroom and television, four extra beds, kitchen-dining room, lounge with television and video. Besides, a gardened area and barbecue are also available. Rooms or the whole house can be rented. The beach is accessible going for a walk along paths surrounded by green meadows where mares and pottokas graze.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Txerturi Goikoa farm

datosGenerales.descripcion: Farm located 3 kilometres far from the town of Getaria, in Askizu neighbourhood, surrounded by country houses dedicated to vegetable gardens, cattle farming and vineyards of txakolí. It is overlooking the sea and located next to the 13th century church of San Martín and the Way of St. James. It consists of six rooms, three bathrooms and one living room. It also has a bar where breakfast, meal and dinner consisting of home cooking products are served.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Agote Haundi farm

datosGenerales.descripcion:
New country house overlooking the sea. It consists of three double rooms with bathroom and another three without it. Heating also available. Besides, a living room with TV for the guests, meeting room, entertainment activities and shop also at the guests' disposal.

 

Practising golf and horse riding is possible. It is surrounded by green areas and garden. You can take part in the agricultural activities.
Restored country house located in the mountains. Three double rooms with bathroom and another three without. Besides, there is a lounge for guests with TV. Green areas surround the place.
Located in the middle of nature, it is a restored house declared historic monument. Situated in front of the Assembly House and the Avellaneda museum, it consists of 6 double rooms with bathroom.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Batzarkide rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: New beautiful spacious country house. It is located in an excellent rural environment. One can enjoy the typical activities of the country house as it has apple trees, greengarden, hens, rabbits, etc. Besides, one can practice different sports. The beach and the leisure harbour are 2-3 kilometres far from here. This area has a wide range of pubs and restaurants of high level.

Camping located on the bay of Gorliz, 500 metres from the town, in a beautiful natural setting surrounded by trees and close to the beach. Offers a wide range of amenities but no bicycle or caravan rental. Besides, it is equipped with games for children, hot water, taps and electricity socket, washing machines, a bar, a supermarket, bungalows and many more services. It offers discounts for long stays.

Campsite located in Cape Higuer, in a privileged location between the sea and the mountains and very close to the town centre of Hondarribia. Faro campsite has a capacity of 416 people in plots of land with electricity connection or bungalows. It also consists of a swimming pool, a bar and a nightclub.

First class Igeldo campsite is situated 5 kilometres from San Sebastián, in a beautiful place between the sea and the mountains. It consists of bungalows, plots of land of 70 square metres and 20 square metres. Besides, the campsite is equipped with several facilities and equipment such as bar-restaurant, supermarket, washing machines and dryers, a playground and car washing. Urban bus service from the campsite to the city centre of San Sebastián. Recommended route for all types of vehicle via San sebastián-Ondarreta.

Itxaspe campsite is set in the neighbourhood of Itxaspe, in Deba. It is surrounded by a beautiful setting with beautiful views of the sea and the cliffs.

 

Apart from a campsite area, there are also apartments, bungalows and ranches. The campers will enjoy wide green areas, a solarium, recreational areas with barbecues, food shop, table tennis, a playground and a swimming pool.

 

Just 1 kilometre from the sea, the campsite is a base for a host of walks and excursions, including going down to the rugged coves of Sakoneta and Mendata or discovering the Flysch rock formations.

Campsite located on the watershed line of the river Lea, near the seaside. It combines an atmosphere both rural and coastal. It offers: lawn plots 30-60 m2 with electricity; 7 wooden bungalows fitted out with kitchen, two bedrooms, a fully equipped bathroom, dining room/lounge, porch, hot water, heating, TV, and so on. Its facilities include restaurant, coffee-bar, shop, laundry, social lounge and childrens' playground. Pets allowed in lawn plots, not in bungalows.

Campside located at the edge of the N-1 road. It can hold up to 235 guests in green plots of land surrounded by trees. Moreover, mobile homes rental available. Swimming pool and green areas. It is the perfect place to enjoy nature in an excellent setting. Since the campsite is very close to Donostia-San Sebastián and the frontier of France, it is very common to find worldwide tourists.

First-class campsite located next to Orio Beach, surrounded by mountains and just one kilometre from the city centre. It can hold up to 712 people in lawn plots of land. Its facilities and services include a bar-restaurant, a supermarket, a txoko (lounge), barbecue, two swimming pools, launderette, washing machines, sports facilities and children's playground. It also offers a currency exchange service, valuables safe deposit box, mail, medical attention and car washing, among others. Pets not allowed.

First category campsite located within the Urdaibai Reserve, on the outskirts of Mundaka.

 

It is equipped with three camping areas, one for caravans with plots of lands provided with water, drainage system and electricity socket. The second area is for single tents with/without bikes, but cars are not allowed. The third area consists of larger plots of lands with/without electricity socket. Bungalows also available.

 

Moreover, the campsite is also equipped with an outdoor swimming pool, showers, sinks, washing machine, barbecues and a "txoko" with all the necessary equipment to cook and have lunch in rainy days. In addition to this, there are also a txakoli wine cellar and a restaurant.

This camp site is located at the top of one of the mountains that surround Mutriku, in the middle of nature and overlooking the sea. It is equipped with 120 camping plots surrounded by green spaces and provided with a supermarket, laundry, playground, meeting room, and a first aid post, among others.

Campsite located in the seaside town of Zarautz. Space for caravans and tents available. It consists of many services such as a bar, a restaurant, a supermarket, showers, plugs, and so on. It is located on the side of a mountain, close the town centre and its long beach.

Camping located very close to Mutriku's urban centre on the mountain and overlooking the sea. It holds up to 360 people and is equipped with the following facilities: bar, restaurant, supermarket, laundry, electricity socket, hot water showers, spacious green area with trees, public telephone and individual WC.

Campsite in the middle of the mountain and close to the sea, between the fishing towns of Lekeitio and Ondarroa. It has a capacity of 238 in a wide wooded area. It is equipped with bar, public telephone, automatic washing machines and individual bathrooms. Mail service, first aids and electricity socket.
Camp site in the middle of a tree area and green spaces where to camp. All services are available and pets are allowed. Very suitable for practising several sports and for paying cultural visits.

Campsite located 5 kilometres from Vitoria-Gasteiz in a peaceful setting where practising many activities in the open air is possible. It can hold up to 250 people in grass plots of land and also consist of coffee-bar, playground and social lounge. Moreover, it is equipped with the basic services and it provides much shadow. Special discounts for long stays.

Campsite located on the coastal town of Sopelana. It situated 150 metres from the beach and consists of 150 plots of lands and 7 bungalows with a capacity of 6, provided with kitchen, bathroom, individual rooms, hot water and television. The following services are available: restaurant, supermarket-hardware store, playground, football pitch and basket court, swimming pool for adults and children, Jacuzzi and laundry.

Campsite located in the rural area of Aia, between the Pagoeta Natural Park and the Zarautz and Orio beaches. 30,000 sq. metres of camping area (about 500 guests) and another 30,000 sq. metres of beechtrees. There is also a hostel that can hold up to 34 and a restaurant totally equipped for 100 guests, a porch with a capacity of 200, a bar and a car park. A supermarket and a playground also available.

The Gran Camping Zarautz Campsite is situated on the slope of the Talai-mendi mountain, in the Eastern area of Zarautz, from where it can be admired the panoramic view of the beach and its surroundings offer.

 

Due to its location, it is a perfect place to enjoy the sea and the mountain. It is also a perfect starting point to visit the Basque Country. It is equipped with modern facilities as well as fittings and a high-quality restaurant. Open the whole year.

This campsite is surrounded by green and 100 metres from the beach. It enables enjoying nature and the beautiful walks encompassing the coast. The campsite holds up to 100 guests in grass plots of land. Moreover, it is equipped with social facilities. Pets are not allowed.

galeria.titulo: The interior of the Saturrarán campsite

datosGenerales.descripcion:
First category campsite located in Alava's Valdegovía Valley, close to Valderejo Natural Park. It consists of plots of land for tents and bungalows for 4 or 6 people.

 

Besides, the campsite offers numerous services, such as playground, indoor swimming pool, restaurant, bar and supermarket.

 

The reception point ofe the Valderejo-Anana MTB Centre is located in the camping

Renovated 16th century farmhouse equipped with all amenities and the latest technologies.

 

Located in the Urdaibai Natural Park in the Biosphere Reserve, it is surrounded by vineyards and forms part of a peaceful, intimate rural hub consisting of a group of traditional buildings. The location of the guesthouse offers splendid views. It sits just a few minutes away from the Laga and Laida beaches and is strategically positioned to enable guests to discover the Basque Coast's villages and landscapes.

 

It boasts three double rooms and three apartments, a lounge, a txoko (a kitchen area), two porches and a garden. All of the rooms come equipped with a full bathroom, heating, WiFi coverage and digital terrestrial television, while the apartments also boast a kitchen-breakfast room.

 

It is surrounded by 20,000 square metres of land, with a small winery and a cluster of vineyards for the production of Txakolí Merrutxu, as well as gardened areas and parking zones.

This 14th century farmhouse was restored and located in a rural setting, under the shelter of the Oiz mountain and close to the Zenarruza collegiate church. It was the birthplace of the General Officer Longa. It consists of 6 double rooms with bathroom, television and heating. Besides, it is also provided with a sitting room with low fire and kitchen-dining room. The whole house also available for rent.

Accommodation situated in Usurbil and surrounded by nature and encompassed by mountains. Beautiful views and fully equipped. An apartment adapted for the disabled and 4 double rooms with fully-equipped bathroom and chip card lock. Internet (WIFI) also available, individual heating, telephone switchboard, television and a playground. Cider is produced and sold.

Totally restored 16th Century farmhouse with an ashlar with coat of arms and half-point arch located in the town centre. It is equipped with kitchen, dining room for 10 and table game area, living room with chimney, television, DVD and 5 double rooms with fully equipped bathroom, television and DVD. Two of them have chimney and air conditioning. Besides, there is a relax area with a sauna for 4 and a hydromassage bathtub for 3. They offer massage services, pedicure, and manicure by previous appointment, as well as laundry, adventure activities and wine sale. Possibility to participate in agricultural and livestock activities as well as in harvesting.

It is a new construction four-storey building of traditional style. It is equipped with 14 apartments for 2-4 guests with kitchen, living room-dining room with cable television and a fully-equipped bathroom. The apartments were inaugurated in May 2006 and are situated in the town centre overlooking the sea.

New building in the centre of Bilbao offering 35 one or two room apartments -18 and 16 respectively- with a surface area of between 50 and 75 square metres and a duplex flat. They are all decorated in classical style and fitted out with a fully-equipped kitchen, hydromassage cabin and air-conditioning. They combine the intimacy of an apartment with hotel services, such as cafeteria and restaurant with terrace, gym, computer room, dry-cleaning service, room service, WiFi and ADSL Internet connection, car park and solarium.

17th-century farmhouse of typical architecture located in the middle of nature. After its restoration it has been equipped with two apartments and five double studios. All of them with fully-equipped bathroom, kitchenette, television and heating. Besides, the apartments are provided with living room-dining room. Communal kitchen (for the whole house rental) on the ground floor, living room with fireplace, television and board games, vantage point, and a wide garden with furnishings and barbecue. Internet also available. The whole house can be rented.

Apartments located next to the Laga and Laida beaches, near gernika-Lumo and the Biosphere Reserve of Urdaibai. It is a classic-style building, with 7 apartments. Special waters, hair-dryer, television, Internet access, heating, and a balcony overlloking the sea or the mountain. In addition, there is a social room, meeting room with capacity up to 30 people, fully equipped with audiovisual systems, garden, car park and playground. Hotel in the other building.

It is a complex that comprises four wooden huts with 5-7 vacancies each and a common central hut with 'txoko'. The bungalows are 40 square metres big and have two rooms, a bathrooms, a lounge, a kitchen and a terrace. They are all equipped with sheets, towels and kitchenware. The complex is located near the river Bayas, at the foot of the Tejera pass, in the middle of nature and surrounded by trees. Naturlan offers the chance to book multi-adventure programmes.

Recently restored tower house, located one kilometre from the centre of Mungia, in the area of Belako, near the beaches of Bakio and Plentzia.

 

It has two apartments totally equipped, conference room which can hold up to 12 persons, WIFI Internet access and via satellite television. the house is surrounded by green areas.

 

It is full rented.

Restored 15th century country house, typical wooden and stone architecture and considered as cultural heritage. It is located in Natural de Peñas Park of Aia, 5 kilometres from the centre of Oiartzun and 7 from Donostia-San Sebastián. It can hold up to 9 persons in apartments for four and five with two bathrooms each. Besides, it has kitchen, living room with TV, heating, parking, garden with furniture and swings. It is full rented.

Country house of the beginning of the 12th century that keeps its original structure of oak wood. It has two apartments with bathroom and kitchen-dining room. It is surrounded by green areas in Pagoeta Natural Park. As it is near Zarautz, this is the suitable place for those who want to enjoy the mountain and the sea. One is allowed to take part in agricultural activities, such as cleaning the stable, harvesting, cows. The building is shared with a rural house which offers 6 double rooms, but it has its own independent entrance.

New building located in the neighbourhood of Karrika, in Oiartzun. A green area next to Peñas de Aia Natural Park and the forest of Artikutza. It consists of a two-room apartment, living room-dining room with TV, kitchen and bathroom, apart from a studio with one room, kitchen, bathroom with hydro massage shower, living room-dining room with TV and Wi-Fi Internet access are also available. Communal living room. The house is decorated in rural style with wooden and traditional details. A garden surrounding the house. The whole house can be hired. Typical gastronomic products for sale.

Country house named after the two traditional crops of the Rioja Alavesa: the vineyard and the olive.

 

The house can hold up to 10 persons and is equipped with lounge with TV and chimney, kitchen, conference room for 15 persons, terrace, porch and parking. Besides, it has a 4000 square-metre garden with olives and vineyard to elaborate the wine of Guzman Aldazabal,that is sold in the house.

 

It is possible to take part in the agricultural activities and to visit the winery.The rural house is full rented.

galeria.titulo: Room with views of the vineyard

datosGenerales.descripcion: 18th century restored stone and wooded country house named Zubiaurretzu. It is located in Derio, 3 kilometres from the airport of Bilbao (Loiu) and next to the Parque Tecnológico de Zamudio. It is in the middle of nature, surrounded by mountain and meadows. The family devote itself to the agriculture, especially to the apples, and cows and pigs raising. Actually part of the house is used as a rural house with three double rooms and three single ones, equipped with TV, Internet access and heating. Besides, it has kitchen, living and dining room, porch, terrace and parking.

Restored country house, easy access, located two kilometres from the town centre, in a rural area. It has 5 double rooms and two single rooms with bathroom and TV. Besides, it has a lounge with TV and a dining room.

New building, with a country décor and a modern touch. It is located in Akartegi neighbourhood, near Hondarribia's town centre and the beach. Every room is equipped with WC and television. The house also includes two sitting-rooms just for guests and a wide land, ideal to enjoy nature.

16th century restored farmhouse situated in the Aizarna Valley, in the inner area of Gipuzkoa. It is surrounded by mountains and only 10 kilometres from the coast, close to the Zestoa resort and the Pagoeta Natural Park. It consists of 6 double rooms with bathroom, television, Internet (WIFI) access and living room exclusive for the clients. Besides, a bar, a restaurant, a terrace, a car park and a playground are also available. Familiar atmosphere and homemade meals in a rural and calm environment.

The hotel is located next to the beaches of Laga and Laida, near Gernika-Lumo and Urdaibai Reserve. It is a classical architecture building with 18 rooms. Each room is equipped with a bathroom that consists of a cabin of water spurts and hairdryer. TV, Internet access, heating, terrace or balcony overlooking the sea or the mountains also available. Likewise, the hotel has living room with a capacity of 30 and equipped with audio-visual systems, a garden, a car park and children facilities. Apartments in the annexe building.

Refurbished rural house found in the area of the Gorbeia Natural Park, in the quiet municipality of Gopegi (Zigoitia). It offers 7 rooms, 5 double and 2 single rooms, all including bathroom (with hydromassage shower). It also provides a fully equipped communal kitchen, a lounge-dining room, WiFi Internet connection free of charge and a garden. There is a children's playground some 300 metres from the house. It is possible to rent the whole house.

Four-star hotel situated in a 17th century palace, it was moved stone by stone from its original location. It is surrounded by a golf course with 9 holes of Pitch & Putt modality (Par 3). The hotel is located less than 15 minutes from the Bilbao city centre and very close to the Zamudio Technology Park and the airport. It is equipped with 43 outward-looking rooms, all of them facing the golf course, with PDP television, Wi-Fi and ADSL. Besides, the palace is also home to four meeting rooms that hold from 5 to 200 guests. A heated swimming pool and a gym.

The hotel is situated in the middle of nature, within the Valle de Carranza and surrounded by a 10,000-sq. metre garden. It is equipped with 7 double rooms, one single room, and all of them with hydromassage bathtub, Wifi free connection, telephone, television, DVD, mini-bar, hairdryer, magnified mirror and natural cosmetics. Besides, some of the rooms have terrace and living room. A sitting room with computer and a dining room that offers breakfast and dinner. Presents shop.

This hotel is situated near a 15th century tower house located in the old town of Getaria, next to the Gaztetape beach. It consists of 17 rooms with bathroom, air-conditioning, piped music, telephone, Internet ADSL WIFI, telephone, television, mini-bar and hairdryer. Besides, there are also meeting rooms with television, slide projectors and computers. The hotel is also equipped with television, dining oom and a terrace overlookin the sea.

Two-star hotel at the Andamur-San Roman service station offering 45 rooms including TV, air-conditioning, heating, telephone and WiFi Internet connection. Other facilities are lift, restaurant, laundry service and car park.

Two-star guesthouse located in a peaceful environment, the little rural municipality of Etxebarria. It has 3 exterior rooms with bathroom, TV and heating. Daily room cleaning service and breakfast is offered.

Guesthouse located in a classical building in the town centre of the city, next to the commercial area, the pubs and the restaurants.

With avant garde decoration, it has 6 double rooms and a single one with bathroom, internet access, heating and TV.

datosGenerales.nombre: MARQUES DE RISCAL THE LUXURY COLLECTION
datosGenerales.descripcion: Exclusive hotel designed by architect Frank Gehry, a symbol of modernity and innovation of this old winery. It belongs to the hotel chain Starwood Hotels & Resorts under its prestigious trade mark The Luxury Collection. It features 43 rooms in contemporary style decor, equipped with LCD TV, CD and DVD player, coffee and tea service, bathrooms in marble and high speed Internet connection. It is also part of a complex including the wine cellars, two restaurants, and the first wine therapy spa in the State, which allows visitors to enjoy the sensations and the revitalising benefits of grapes and wine; other facilities are a meeting and conference centre holding up to 100 people with the most advanced audiovisual and translation systems, as well as two shops selling souvenirs, local products and wines from Marqués de Riscal wine cellars.

Cosy guesthouse located in the centre of the coastal municipality of Zarautz, near the beach and the pub and restaurant areas. It has 7 rooms with bathroom, TV, heating and Internet access. Discounts for groups, companies and long stays.

Country house built over 150 years ago. Recently restored, it is located in a beautiful rural area, in the Urdaibai Biosphere Reserve, to be precise, and it is surrounded by green areas, indigenous trees and fruit trees. It consists of two double and three single rooms, living room with fireplace and TV, living room-dining room, central heating, fully-equipped kitchen, separate access and a car park. Visitors can take part in agricultural activities. What is more, there are products such as eggs, nuts, bread and confectionary in sale. The Basque Government certifies that the rural house operates in compliance with the Standards of Good Practice.

El rincón de Adana is a rural house located in the Salvatierra-Agurain region. It was a stable before and keeps its original wooden structure but is also has all mod cons for a nice stay. It is equipped with 5 rooms with bathroom, sitting room and television. It also has a bar-restaurant and a terrace with marvellous views.

galeria.titulo: Casa Rural El Rincón de Adana

datosGenerales.descripcion: Etxegorri Landetxea is a perfect place for people wanting to lose themselves among meadows and woods, but who also want to be close to the bustle of the city. It is at the gateway to the Gorbeia nature park, near the protected biotope of Itxina and just 25 minutes from the centre of Bilbao. It has 6 double rooms with bathroom, television, hairdryer, WIFI Internet access, fireplace, shower or hydromassage bath and heating. The common areas are on the ground floor: two spacious lounges with fireplaces.

Rural house located in the municipality of Aia, next to the centre of Orio, and surrounded by a cosy and peaceful environment.

 

Its location is privileged as it is 5 minutes from Zarautz and 20 minutes from Donostia-San Sebastián. It has 5 double rooms equipped with bathroom and air conditioning. It also has a living room with TV and fireplace, terrace, garden and a parking area.

 

Breakfast is offered.

Rural house located in the neighbourhood of Urigoiti (Orozko), close to the Gorbeia Natural Park, and so it is an ideal place for nature lovers.

 

It offers three double rooms and one single room, all with fully fitted bathroom, heating, hairdryer, TV and WiFi Internet connection. Every room has its own access to the exterior areas. Furthermore clients have at their disposal a table and a bench to be used on the room's wooden terrace. Other facilities include lounge-dining room, terrace and porch with barbecue.

 

It is surrounded by a garden and green areas and has a private car-park.

Apezetxea rural house is located close to the reservoirs of the province of Alava and to the Natural Park of Aitzkorri. It consists of two houses, one of them called Casa Aratz, with capacity to lodge between 6 and 8 people, features 3 double rooms, 2 bathrooms and a garden with barbecue. The other house, Casa Aizkorri, can lodge up to four people in two double rooms, with a bathroom and garden with barbecue. Products from their own kitchen garden available.

Located in a beautiful natural setting, Gaztelubidea rural house consists of two houses that are connected from the interior. One of them can hold up to six people and the other can hold up to four. The first one offers three double rooms and the second one two double rooms. In addition, the house has a wide living room-dining room with heating, fireplace and television. The accommodation is situated in a quiet area that is perfect for families with children.

Situated in Markina-Xemein's Atxondo neighbourhood, Intxauspe Landetxea is an old Basque Country house built in the 17th century and restored in 2005. It is located on the slope of Mount Santa Eufemia and surrounded by green areas. Five double rooms available: three of them with fully-equipped bathroom and the other two with communal bathroom. It also offers heating, totally-equipped kitchen, lounge-dining room, terrace, garden and car park. They rent the whole house.

Hotel located in the mountains surrounding the coastal Getaria, which shelter its vineyards from the wind. The vines produce year after year the transparent and sparkling txakoli wine.

 

It is a traditional wooden and stone building consisting of 19 rooms with bathroom, telephone, heating, TV, WIFI Internet access and hairdryer. There are also a lift, a conference room for 16 people, a living room with fireplace and a library, a terrace, a private car park, a garden, a bar and a restaurant for 80 guests.

Artxanda hotel is located high up in Bilbao, surrounded by mountains and with an easy access to Bilbao. It consists of 7 double rooms and 4 single. A sitting room also available where breakfast is served. Television and Internet connection.

Modern hotel located on the outskirts of Vitoria-Gasteiz, ideal for bussiness or pleasure. It has 40 exterior and air-conditioned rooms with bathroom, safe, TV, radio, internet access, telephone and hair dryer. Likewise, the hotel has coffee shop, restaurant, conference room which hold up to 130 people, laundry service, private pay parking, and WIFI. There is computer and audio-visual equipment renting service as well as printer, photocopier and fax, translations, hostess, secretaries...

Rural house found in the municipality of Errezil, in the heart of inland Gipuzkoa, where traditional Basque customs are still quite alive. It is in the centre of the municipality, but surrounded by green areas. This rural house offers 6 double rooms fitted with bathroom, and serves breakfast, lunch and dinner.

Hotel located in a restored medieval tower, with stone and wooden structure and considered as a part of the Historical and Cultural heritage of Gipuzkoa. It is a familiar and cosy hotel. It has 12 rooms, 10 double and 2 single ones. All of them are equipped with bathroom, hair dryer, heating, telephone, Internet access and plasma screen TV. Besides, it offers breakfast and dinner service and it also has a coffee shop where one can taste the typical pintxos and large servings of local specialties. The hotel has terrace, garden and parking.

Hotel found in inland Bizkaia, between green valleys. It provides 14 rooms with bathroom, digital TV, Internet connection, minibar, telephone and piped music, as well as another room also with a Jacuzzi. Other services and facilities include 24-hour room service, private car park, nightclub, lounge and restaurant.

This hotel is situated in Beasain, in a petrol station hotel of the group Gureak. It consists of 10 rooms with bathroom, telephone, television, heating, air conditioning and Internet WiFi connection. A cafeteria-restaurant also available in the accommodation.

Four-star hotel located near the Bilbao Exhibition Centre (BEC), close to the Max Center shopping centre and only 5 minutes away from Bilbao. It offers 203 rooms including bathroom, air-conditioning, safe-deposit box, minibar, telephone, TV, ADSL Internet connection, Wi-FI and hairdryer. Other facilities available at the hotel are a bar, a restaurant, 6 function rooms with a capacity of 300 people including all the necessary services for business tourism. Tours for tourists, children's facilities, outdoor swimming pool and indoor car parking.

This hotel is located in the historical quarter of Bilbao, opposite the Arriaga Theatre and surrounded by shops, bars and restaurants.

 

It occupies a 19th century building, with typical glazed windowed balconies on its facade, which contrast with its interior decor of Modern or Art Deco style. Free wi fi connection and hydromassage showers available in all the rooms. Business rooms have been fitted out with personal computer, ipod dock and bicycle rollers. Other furniture and fittings available at the hotel are a bar, restaurant, business room, business centre and free ciber corner at the reception.

 

Bicycle rollers and cradles for the children at the clients' disposal free of charge.

servicio.nombre: Member of National Consumer Arbitration Board

galeria.titulo: Room adapted for use by people with reduced mobility

datosGenerales.descripcion: Guest house/ B&B located by the Anoeta stadium, at the entrance to Donostia-San Sebastian. It offers a friendly atmophere and comfortable accommodation in any of its 8 rooms fitted with complete bathroom, heating, air-conditioning, TV and WiFi Internet connection. It also provides fax services and its facilities include a private car-park.

Guest house / B&B located in the heart of Bilbao's commercial and business area, with excellent transport links. It offers bedrooms including bathroom, TV, heating and hair-dryer; some of the rooms have double glazind and king sized beds. 24 hour room service available. Paid car-parks in the area.
Guest house / Bed and Breakfast in the centre of Barakaldo, close to Bilbao Exhibition Centre and the underground/tube station. It offers bedrooms including bathroom, heating and TV.

Rural house located in the beautiful Arratia valley, between Urkiola and Gorbeia Natural Parks. It consists of 5 double rooms fitted out with bathroom, heating, satellite TV and Internet connection. Other facilities are a private car park, a lounge and children's playground. Guests are welcome to participate in farming activities. Typical local products on sale.

Farm located between the coastal municipality of Orio and San Sebastián, overlooking the sea from Mount Igeldo. It consists of 6 rooms with bathroom and TV, living room with fireplace, barbecue and WIFI Internet access. Breakfast is served. Ideal fields for paragliding are quite close to the house.

Farm located in the small village of Ziortza-Bolibar consisting of 4 double rooms and a restaurant which can hold up to 110 diners. The farmhouse was built in 1975. They serve different menus (also menu) and an extensive menu, with meat specialties of the region, the grilled fish and homemade desserts.

Restored farm located in Urdaneta neighbourhood in Aia, very close to Zarautz, its beach and Pagoeta Natural Park.

It consist of 6 double rooms with bathroom and TV as well as two apartments. Besides, lounge, kitchen and dining room with fireplace, TV and access to the terrace also available.

It is surrounded by green areas and overlooking the sea.

Locally grown produce on sale.

Restored farm located on the slope of Mount Izarraitz, in the middle of nature and three kilometres from Azkoitia. It consists of 6 rooms with bathroom, heating and TV. Living room with fireplace and TV, kitchen and porch with table and barbecue also available. The house can be entirely rented.

Restored country house located in Meagas neighbourhood, 3 kilometres away from Getaria and the beach, in a natural environment. It features 4 double rooms, two bathrooms, living room with television, kitchen-dining room and porch. It also has central heating, independent entrance and breakfast service. They rent the full house. In addition, it has a 90 square metre apartment with an independent entrance, terrace, two double rooms, bathroom, lounge with television and DVD and 2 sofa beds.

Four-star modern hotel member of the Hesperia Hotel chain. It is located in an area of recent urban development expansion and strong business growth. The hotel consists of 45 rooms equipped with bathroom, heating and air-conditioning, plasma television, mini-bar, Internet Wi-Fi and strongbox. Moreover, the hotel also offers room service, laundry, bike rental and reception. One coffee-bar, 5 meeting rooms and a business centre.

La Molinera Etxea is a renaissance house dating from the 17th century and it has been renovated in 2022. Located in Samaniego, on the Rioja Alavesa Wine Trail, just 5 minutes from Laguardia. A peaceful village surrounded by vineyards in an exceptional setting at the foot of the Cantabrian mountains.

 

This country guest house has all the comforts, spacious double rooms with bathroom, an apartment for two person, a large lounge with a fireplace and plenty of peace and quiet.

 

It also offers a free Wi-Fi Internet connection.

Hotel and thalassotherapy centre located in Orio, next to the beach. It is equipped with 50 rooms overlooking the sea; two of them with Jacuzzi and sitting-room. There are two floors for treatments, swimming pools, saunas, Jacuzzi, and so on. Besides, there are a coffee bar and two restaurants, one of them with a capacity of 225 guests.

Three-star hotel situated in the city centre of Bilbao near the shopping and business area and close to the Palacio Euskalduna Convention Centre, the Bilbao Guggenheim Museum and the San Mamés stadium. Due to its location and services this is the ideal place for business visits as well as doing tourism in Bilbao and its surroundings.

 

It is equipped with climatised rooms, with fully equipped bathrooms, television, mini-bar and Wi-Fi. Besides, it is fitted out with fitness, Turkish baths with aromatherapy and panoramic solarium.

This modern two-star hotel is situated in the town centre of Elgoibar. It consists of 18 double rooms and 4 single rooms with bathroom, television (DTT and satellite), heating, telephone and Wi-Fi Internet connection. Besides, there is an ideal multipurpose room to organise every type of meetings, as well as a sitting room, a coffee bar and a private car park.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Txarriduna Hotel

datosGenerales.descripcion: Recent-construction rural house situated in the old part of Salinas de Añana. It is divided into two floors and consists of 3 double rooms, two bathrooms, a living room-dining room with chimney, television and DVD player, and a fully equipped kitchen. It has a capacity of 8 people and the entire house is for rental. The rural house owns a garage and it is close to the municipal swimming pool and the well-known Valle Salado.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Casa Rural Gesaltza Etxea

datosGenerales.descripcion: Sorginetxe is a rural house that was built in 1690. It is restored in detail and surrounded by nature in a calmed environment in the interior of Alava. It is equipped with three double-rooms, three bathrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, "txoko" with chimney, sitting room with television and table games.

Aitzkomendi is a rural house that was built in 1690. It was restored in detail and surrounded by a quiet environment in the interior of Alava. It is equipped with four rooms, three bathrooms, a fully-equipped kitchen, a "txoko" with fireplace, a sitting room with television and board games.

Two-star hotel situated in the Sanctuary of Urkiola. It is equipped with five double-rooms and two single, as well as four apartments with kitchen-dining room, a bathroom and two rooms with three or four beds. Television, telephone and Internet connection also available. There is a chapel and a Bible and an agenda in every room for the sanctuary activities. The hotel completes with a dining room with a capacity of fourty and a meeting room with panels for about a hundred visitors.

This farm is situated in an agricultural setting surrounded by beautiful natural landscape. It is a new-construction house of rustic style but with all mod cons. It consists of four double rooms and a single one all of them with bathroom, television, heating and wi-fi connection. Apart from the kitchen, there are also a living room-dining room with television and a rest area with a bar. It offers the possibility to have daily menu or à la carte. Besides, in winter the rural house offers handicrafts courses for the guests.

This farmhouse was founded over 400 years and totally refurbished in 2007 with its walls constructed in ashlar of masonry and providing magnificent views. It is situated in a perfect place to practise hiking and two kilometres from Getaria Beach and 4.5 kilometres from Zarautz Beach. It is equipped with 6 double rooms with bathroom, television and Internet, apart from an apartment with two double rooms, bathroom and terrace.

Charming hotel situated in a privileged area of the capital of Gipuzkoa in front of the Kursaal Convention Centre and the beach. It is also close to the old quarter and the city centre. The hotel is located in a building that dates back to the last century but it was inaugurated in July 2007. It is equipped with 11 double rooms and a single one. All of them with bathroom, air-conditioning, hairdryer, safe, plasma television and free WI-FI connection. The hotel is equipped with parking spaces at the Kursaal Convention Centre.

A new farm keeping its traditional architectural structure. It is located in a rural and remote setting that is surrounded by vineyards to produce txakoli wine. 10 minutes from Ondarroa. The accommodation is equipped with five double rooms with bathroom. The rooms overlook the sea and the mountains. Bathroom, extra beds, heating and television also available. Besides, it also consists of a living room-dining room with fireplace and terrace, kitchen, car park, vegetable garden and green with a playground. Leisure activities, mainly those related to the sea, are managed from the very facilities.

Tourist apartments in avant-garde style located in the coastal village of Zarautz, between sea and mountain landscapes. It has 16 apartments for 4 guests, one for 2 guests and other one for 6 guests.

 

Each one is equipped with dining room, kitchen with washing machine and microwave, bathroom, terrace, heating and television. They offer facilities such as Wi-Fi Internet access, covered car park and lift.

Farm situated next to the Aralar Natural Park overlooking Mount Txindoki in the middle of nature. It is a restored farmhouse sitting 4 kilometres from the town centre and consisting of 5 double rooms with bathroom, one of them adapted for the disabled. Moreover, we will also find a kitchen, a living room, a terrace with garden furnishings and wide green areas. Breakfast, lunch and dinner served.

New farm sitting in Sopuerta, in Las Encartaciones region and surrounded by green and 8 km from La Arena beach. It consists of 6 double rooms with bathroom, heating, hairdryer and access to a communal terrace with beautiful views. WIFI, kitchen-dining room, fireplace, TV, piped music, Digital Channel, sitting room with television and a wide recreational area. Taking part in agricultural activities is allowed. Produce from the vegetable garden on sale.

A hundred-year-old traditional building that was restored to hold a comfortable guest house. The house is situated very close to the harbour and the beaches of Malkorbe and Gaztetape. The name of the guest house makes reference to the sound of the artillery batery situated in the current location of the guest house, on the bay and on the ancient walls surrounding the town. The house consists of 8 outward rooms, some of them with terrace. All of them are equipped with bathroom, television and heating. Moreover, the guest house has a living room with terrace where breakfast is served. The terrace overlooks the sea and "the mouse of Getaria", which is a small peninsula finishing in San Antón Mountain to where gaining access takes 5 minutes on foot.

Farmhouse located in a rural area. The vineyards that produce the region's typical txakoli encompass the place. The house consists of five double rooms and offers breakfast service. Five minutes from Bakio town centre.

This rural house is located on the outskirts of Tolosa, in the middle of nature.

 

It consists of 6 double rooms with bathroom, heating, as well as two lounges, one of the with fireplace and the other with television. Likewise, the rural house is equipped with reading room, kitchen, dining room and a wide garden.

 

Internet WiFi connection and farmhouse products on sale.

Immense palace dating back to the 18th century that is located close to La Arena beach and surrounded by green. It consists of 13 outward-looking rooms with bathroom, heating, television and Internet. Moreover, there are also a coffee bar, a terrace for events and celebrations, as well as a private car park. Its location, close to the BEC and the motorway access, turns it into an ideal place for leisure and business tourism.
