A house with garden and the typical architecture located close to Barinatxe and Arrietara beaches. It consists of six double rooms with bathroom and some of them with balcony access. The accommodation is also equipped with lounge with fireplace, outdoor terraces and private garage.

A rural house of traditional architecture located in the small town of Meñaka on the hillside of Sollube and just 20 km from the Bilbao city centre. It consists of two flats with a capacity of up to 5 and 2 people, with separate accesses, kitchen, dining room, bathroom and 4 rooms. Outside, garden and private car park available. Ideal to go hiking or climb Mount Sollube.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Barturen rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: The boarding house is situated in the town centre of Urnieta, which is surrounded by mountains and 12 kilometres far from Donostia-San Sebastián. It consists of 9 double and one single rooms, all of them provided with a fully equipped bathroom each, television, safe-deposit box, HVAC and Internet Wi-Fi. Moreover, laundry, photocopier and fax service also available.

This farmhouse was built in the 15th century at the foot of Mount Ibisasi and just 10 kilometres from San Sebastián. It was restored keeping its former beams and the building consists of a flat for four with separate entrance, two rooms with Internet access, a large porch, a fully-equipped kitchen and a sitting room. Television, DTT and the possibility to hire an extra bed also available. A gardened area surrounds the farmhouse with a playground and a barbecue turning it into the ideal place to rest, practise sports in nature and enjoy nearby cider houses. Guests are allowed to take part in farming activities -feeding rabbits, hens, looking after the vegetable garden, producing cider. Farmhouse products for sale.

Surrounded by vineyards and overlooking the mouse of Getaria, Iturregi is situated in a peaceful and quiet setting in the middle of nature. Every detail has been chosen with care to provide guests with light and spacious rooms with magnificent views. All the rooms are equipped with bathroom.

Restored rural house located on the slope of Mount Ogoño in the picturesque town of Elantxobe and overlooking the sea. Consisting of 5 rooms with television, lounge and dining room where breakfast is served, Internet wifi is also available. Due to its location, it is ideal to enjoy the mountains as well as the beach and the beautiful region of Busturialdea.

galeria.titulo: Views of Ogoño Mendi rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Located in the town centre of Mutriku, the hotel is situated in a privileged spot towering above the fishing port and overlooking the harbour and the sea. All the rooms consist of PDP TV, air-conditioning, heating, telephone, Internet WIFI, piped music and fully-equipped bathroom. Familiar atmosphere.

The rural house is over 200 years old. It has been refurbished with bioconstructive materials and located in a farming neighbourhood near the Old Town of Salvatierra-Agurain, through which the Way of St James passes. The accommodation consists of 5 double rooms with bathroom, satellite television and WIFI. Kitchen-dining room for the exclusive use of guests, wide car park and garden.

 

The house is situated close to Aitzkorri-Arantza and Entzia Natural Parks and Mendixur Ornithological Park (near Garaio beaches).

A beautiful 16th century farmhouse is home to Angiz hotel. The building has been recently restored and is located in Busturia, in a privileged setting surrounded by mountains and very close to the beach and the Urdaibai Biosphere Reserve. Six double rooms, one single room, a double room with living room. All the rooms consist of fully-equipped bathrooms and heating. Moreover, it consists of two apartments for four people. One living room with fireplace at the guests' disposal, car park and WIFI Internet connection. Thanks to its location the visitors will have the chance to tour some of the most emblematic spots of the area and practise activities.

The farm is located in Aizarnazabal, a small town in inner Gipuzkoa, at 8 km from Zumaia and Zarautz. The wooden farmhouse was recently built and is surrounded by a garden overlooking the mountains. The two-floor building consists of three apartments, garage, lift and land with Pygmy goats, sheep, hens and ponies. Two of the apartments are equipped with two rooms each with terrace and the third block consists of one room accessible for disabled people. Each apartment has a kitchen, dining room, bathroom with bathtub, television and heating. Telephone, fax and Internet access also available, as well as a furnace to cook ecological bread so that guests will have the chance to see how bread is made.

The Hotel Lazkao is situated in the Zubierreka Business Park in Lazkao, near a hamlet and surrounded by green areas. This quiet, peaceful place is ideal for relaxing and enjoying nature or for conducting business in the area.

 

The hotel has 10 double rooms and 2 singles, all with television, en-suite bathroom and central heating. The other amenities for guests are an in-house restaurant, lounge and Wi-Fi internet connection.

Apartment-hotel consisting of a room with breakfast service in a historic building of extraordinary interest in terms of architecture. This is the first neo-Basque villa, built in the late nineteenth century.

 

It has been restored to guarantee the comfort that every client should expect from a three-star apartment-hotel. They have done a humble musealization of the Hotel to highlight the architectural values ¿¿of the building and the relevance that it meant for the beginnings of Sea Tourism on the coast of the Basque Country. 

 

It is located by the sea above Karraspio beach and 5 minutes on foot from the medieval and fishing town of Lekeitio. Light spacious rooms overlooking the beautiful sea.

 

Double room apartments with living room, television, the Internet, heating, air conditioning, fully-equipped kitchen, fully equipped bathroom with bath. Over 50 square metres. Several gardens, terraces, private car park, "txoko" (lounge), library and Internet WIFI access also available. A promenade leads to the beach.

New farmhouse of typical structure and surrounded by green areas. It is located in a rural area situated between mountains and 5 kilometres from the beaches of Zumaia with their magnificent flysch and the beach of Zarautz, which is the perfect place to practise surfing. The farmhouse consists of 4 double rooms with bathroom, television and piped music. Moreover, it also consists of living room, kitchen, and dining room for guests and a large green area to sunbathe and enjoy barbecues. The house is also equipped with heating and a private car park.

17th century farmhouse built in stone and wood. It has been restored keeping its features. The house is located in Astigarraga, where there are several cider houses. Donostia-San Sebastián is very close. It is also situated on the Way of St. James and 750 metres from the hermitage of Santiago on Santiago Mendi Mountain. The farmhouse consists of three-floors, living room with fireplace, music player, television and DVD player, dining room, kitchen, four bathrooms and four rooms of which one is also equipped with a terrace. Mountains and forests surround the building together with a beautiful garden with swings, a barbecue and tables.

Dream Park opened their doors in 2008. The apartments are located in Salburua residential neighbourhood in Vitoria-Gasteiz. Within easy reach of the city centre and the industrial estates. 48 apartments of 50 square metres each consisting of one room, one fully equipped bathroom, kitchen-dining room with electrical appliances, air-conditioning and television. Internet access also available. Private car park.

Beautiful refurbished farmhouse dating back to the 18th century. It is located in a rural area 110 m above sea level and at the foot of Peñas de Aia Natural Park (Aiako Harria). Three kilometres from Hendaya¿s beach and 2 km from Irun city centre. The accommodation consists of central heating, three floors with 5 rooms, 3 bathrooms a living room-dining room with fireplace, television, DVD player and fully equipped kitchen. Surrounded by 12 ha of green areas and trees. Private car park also available.

Restored farmhouse located in the mountains on coastal Orio. The building consists of a large terrace overlooking the mountains and the river Oria. The accommodation is situated 1,000 metres from the town centre of Oria and 1,500 metres from the beach. The whole house for hire. Guests will also find 4 rooms, two bathrooms, fully equipped kitchen, living room with television, as well as a garden consisting of a large terrace with sunloungers, table and chairs for great meals.

The farm is located in the green area of San Sebastián, Igeldo. Mar y Mar offers the chance to enjoy the exceptional landscape in front of the Bay of Biscay. Two double rooms and two apartments, all of them with fully-equipped bathrooms, heating, television and Internet access. A wide terrace outside with a garden, a vegetable garden and a car park.

Restored and sitting in the quiet neighbourhood of San Lorenzo in Berriz, the 16th-century mill in inland Bizkaia is very close to Urkiola Natural Park and Durango. The building is made of wood and stone from Mount Oiz, surrounded by green, fruit trees and bonsais. It consists of 3 double rooms with one fully equipped bathroom each. Besides, there are also a completely fitted kitchen and a wide and comfortable living room-dining room with television that works as a meeting room. Heating, fax service, private car park and garden available.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: A beautiful 18th century building is home to Ortulane rural house. It keeps both its ancient structure and the architectural elements but at the same time the guests will find all the necessary mod cons. The house is located in a rural scenery of great beauty and very close to the town centre of Urduliz. This is the ideal place to enjoy tranquillity and go for walks. The tube station is also quite close to the rural house, as well as a couple of beaches (Plentzia and Atxabiribil). To sum up, it is very comfortable visiting the most representative places of the area. The house consists of three double and two single rooms. All of them with fully equipped bathrooms, heating, television and Internet access. Dining room and private car park at the clients' disposal. A wooded garden surrounds the building.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Ortulane rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Traditional structure farmhouse located in a rural area inland Bizkaia, in the beautiful region of Las Encartaciones. The house is divided into two and consists of ten single and double rooms in all. One room adapted for people with reduced mobility. Each part of the house is equipped with three bathrooms, a kitchen and a "txoko" with television. Moreover, Taboada is surrounded by a 20,000 sq-metre terrain with garden furnishings, two garages and a wide parking area.

Halfway between Bilbao and San Sebastián lies the municipality of Deba, home to Zelaieta Berri. From here visitors can go to the beach to see the cliffs that run from Deba to Zumaia and the famous flysch rock formations.

 

They can also easily get to different must-see spots such as the lighthouse at Lekeitio, Monte Larrun and so on, as well as discovering the area’s cuisine. Apart from seeing the landscape, visitors can enjoy fully-equipped accommodation with a full range of amenities - all this without sacrificing its rustic setting, blending perfectly into the countryside: spacious rooms, fully-equipped kitchen, garden area and lounge with fireplace.

Enkartada is a rural house located in Las Encartaciones region and consisting of 4 double rooms with heating, bathroom and television. In addition, the building is equipped with a living room-dining room, reading area and the chance to watch DVDs on the ground floor. An outdoor wide terrace available with a vegetable garden and a parking area as well.

Modern hotel of avant-garde design situated over the bay of Arbe. The location has been thoroughly selected so that the big windows in every room make the guests feel the sensation of being right over the Cantabrian sea. The hotel consists of a meeting room equipped with the latest technologies in order to hold business meetings, talks, presentations, and so on. In addition, there is sauna service available on the ground floor with two new design thermal deckchairs.

The hotel is situated near Aia Natural Park. It provides a warm and comfortable shelter where to enjoy the beautiful town of Oiartzun. Light rooms with telephone, television and excellent communal areas. Free private car park and buffet breakfast also available.

Farmhouse surrounded by mountains. Double rooms with bathroom, heating and television. Library, dining room and sitting room with television and games. In former times, straw was stored in the upper part of the house, whereas grain was stored on the ground floor. For those who love animals and plants there is a wide range of flora and fauna in the surroundings.

The Ibis Bilbao Centro Hotel is located just in the city centre of Bilbao. All its rooms are soundproof and have air conditioner. The hotel is also equipped with 2 meeting rooms for 15-20 people and a private covered car park (with charge). The hotel's bar, Rendez Vous, is open 24 hours.

The hotel is located in Encartaciones. It provides 15 beautiful rooms with bathroom, television, telephone and a wide bed each. Six rooms are situated in the main house whereas the remaining nine can be found in a joined building with private terrace. Moreover, the house consists of a living room and a coffee shop.

Located in the centre of Alava's capital city, La Casa de los Arquillos is located on the second floor of a-hundred-year-old building. This is one of the most emblematic structures of the city built aiming to prevent the difference in floor level between the primitive medieval area ¿on the upper ground of a hill- and the new contemporary city that began to grow in the 18th century. It consists of 8 double-rooms of a unique design. All of them are equipped with bathroom and television. Furthermore, there is also a common area where the guests can rest, read or just have a good breakfast. Wi-Fi system at the guests' disposal.

Villa de Ermua is located only 5 minutes from Ermua within a modern hotel consisting of 38 rooms with fully equipped bathroom, television, telephone and Internet access. Breakfast is served in a wide coffee bar where there is the chance to relax and read. Parking spaces also available.

Zaballa is a farm located in a privileged natural setting. It consists of four double rooms with one bathroom each. The lounge is exclusively for the guests, very cosy, comfortable, where to read, relax and watch TV. Besides, there is also a dining room with kitchen at the guests' disposal. Private car park.

A beautiful landscape full of trees surrounds the small but cosy campside that is situated in the interior of Gipuzkoa. It consists of toilets and sinks, kitchens, an indoor dining room and three caravans. Surface area of 700 sq-metres with a capacity of 20 guests.

Located a few metres from the Abatxolo tube mouth (Portugalete), El Metro ApartHotel consists of 4 apartments of 42 sq-metres ideal for holidays, business trips and medium or long-term stays. All of them have double bed, living room-dining room with couch and fully-equipped kitchen and bathroom, air conditioning, television and Internet connection.

Located in Asparrena, it is the ideal place both for mountain sports enthusiasts and for those who prefer gentler walks. From here you can climb the mountains of Arbarrain (1,118 m) and Aratz (1,142 m) in the Aizkorri-Aratz nature park, as well as the Urbasa hills. Nearby you can also find the cave of La Lece, the source of the river Zirauntza, the castle of Marutegui and the ancient Calzada de San Adrían (part of the Santiago trail).

galeria.titulo: The waterfalls are part of the source of Urederra, where it is possible to walk and enjoy wonderful landscapes at the same time.
The bathrooms consist of basin, toilet bowl, shower and towels
Potholing in Los Cristinos Cave. Natural caves where 'akelarres' (ritual meeting of witches)
Legaire Fields. At 900 metres of height over Ibarguren town, where Legaire rural house is situated. The fields roll on as a large and green carpet.
La Tobería Waterfalls, found in a mountainous area called La Tobera. A snowy day in winter.
Wide lounge with TV and an access to a small garden ideal for barbecues and picnics.
All the rooms are equipped with television and bathroom. Most of them overlook La Lece Cave

datosGenerales.descripcion: This is a 16th century typical Basque rural house that was totally restored in 1998. It consists of 4 double rooms with fully equipped bathrooms, hairdryer, heating and TV. Moreover, its facilities include a totally equipped kitchen-dining room, an 80 sq metres activity room, a lounge and a library. Outdoors we will find a garden with terrace, green areas and a car park. The group responsible for the rural house organises courses on natural treatments and aromatherapy. Most of the natural products are on sale in the facilities as well as many locally grown products. Pets are a curious attraction in the rural house. The children will be delighted with Vietnamese pot-bellied pigs.

Country house located near Sakoneta wild beach, which is declared biotope due to its high ecological and marine value. A place suitable for surfing. It consists of 3 double rooms with bathroom and TV, lounge with fireplace and a Basque restaurant specialising in charcoal-grilled meat and fish. Special menu for the rural house guests. It is surrounded by a perfect setting for walks with magnificent cliffs. A park for the children and a picnic area available in the surroundings.

galeria.titulo: The interior of the rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion:
Rural house located near Izki Natural Park.

 

It provides 6 double rooms with bathroom and heating. An apartment for four persons. Lounge, restaurant, dining room and shop also available. Green areas and trees surround the house that is very close to Urturi golf course.

Located in the town centre of Getaria within a picturesque four-storey building, the hotel rooms are equipped with all mod cons. Desk, television, heating and bathroom.

 

Moreover, the hotel also consists communal areas, such as a lounge for delicious breakfast, a reading room and a gardened area overlooking the spectacular sea where to relax sunbathing or enjoy the landscape.

Restored farmhouse declared historical heritage. It is located in a quiet setting in the Valley of Urola, 3 km from the town centre. Jesuskoa house consists of 6 double rooms with bathroom and one apartment that can hold up to 4 people -ideal for two adults and two children. All of them equipped with centralised heating, fully-equipped bathroom, television and two large meeting rooms with fax service, telephone and Wi-Fi connection. Extra beds available and the right to use the kitchen.

galeria.titulo: The interior of Jesuskoa rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: The rural house is located in the Old Town of Laguardia. Legado de Ugarte consists of four double rooms with television and bathroom. The living room-dining room is exclusive for the guests. Very cosy and comfortable where it is possible to relax, read and have a good breakfast.

galeria.titulo: The interior of the rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Neithea is located in a privileged setting. The rural house consists of six double rooms with one bathroom each. One of the rooms is a suite and is fitted out with hydromassage. Moreover, there is a beautiful living room with fireplace, television, terrace, as well as a wide garden. Private car park also available.

Located in a privileged natural environment, Erreka-Alde hotel provides the guests with 30 excellent rooms equipped with bathroom, television and telephone. Besides, it has magnificent communal areas where it is possible to rest, read or watch TV. Free private car park and breakfast included.

The rural house is located in Valderejo Natural Park, within the small area of Lalastra. The building dates back to 1700 but was restored maintaining the architectural features of the area. It consists of two single and 4 double rooms, all of them with bathroom. Lounge with television and fireplace also available. Heating, room service, board games, bar and old-style restaurant offering breakfast. Gardens in the surroundings and a car park available.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of Valderejo Etxea Rural House

datosGenerales.descripcion: Aldori is a new rural house located in Zabale, a neighbourhood belonging to the municipality of Muxika just in the middle of the Urdaibai's Biosphere Reserve. Therefore, it is a perfect place to rest far from the madding crowd of big cities. Aldori's original rooms have a cosmopolitan and modern decoration and all of them are equipped with complete bathroom, television, Internet and heating. Besides, two rooms have private terrace (one with jet stream bath and other with jet stream bath and jacuzzi) and three are equipped with minibar. One of the most popular spots in the house is the living room or "txoko" known as the "chill-out" room. There, guests can take some drinks or coffee, watch TV or even play the famous Wii. Furthermore, the rural house has swings for children, a car park and offers visitors the chance to participate in agricultural and ranching activities. Delicious all-you-can-eat breakfasts including fresh fruit, house-made eggs, cold meat or "morokila" (a sort of "talo") and diners are served. To sum up, Aldori rural house offers not only the charm of its natural surroundings, but also all the necessary commodities to guarantee its guests a pleasant stay.

galeria.titulo: Suite of the Aldori rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Two-star guest house situated in the capital city of Gipuzkoa and consisting of one sigle and 7 double rooms with bathroom, FPD TV and safe with a capacity of a ordinary-size laptop. They also provide you with Internet Wi-Fi and a computers in a communal area with free Internet access for the clients.

Located on the sides of the Jaizkibel Mountain, Art and Relax is an excellent place to spend some relaxing days in a unique spot. The amazing views to the Txingudi's marshlands and the Peñas de Aia rocks will delight its guests. Furthermore, its workshop "Laboratorio de papel" offers elementary and advanced courses on how to elaborate sheets of paper; thus, guests have the chance to enjoy arts surrounded by nature. Art and Relax is equipped also with a social room (with Internet and television) and kitchen. There are two different sorts of double rooms - with and without bathroom - and a single room. Summing up, those who decide to stay in Casa Rural Art and Relax will enjoy with all five senses.

Lur-Deia is located in the Artike neighbourhood, in Bermeo, a wonderful natural spot, five kilometres away from San Juan de Gaztelugatxe and the Urdaibai Biosphere Reserve.

 

It has six double rooms named as follows: Hontza, Haizea, Itxaso, Haritza, Harri and Eguzki. All of them are equipped with heating, bathroom and television. Besides, the room "Eguzki" is ideal for those couples who want to enjoy a romantic evening. The house has also two apartments or suites (Amalur and Ilargi) with living room, bathroom and all necessary commodities. The whole building has Wifi Internet connection. Furthermore, Lur-Deia has an spacious living-room with television (that can be used also as meeting room), reading room and fireplace and a kitchen/dining-room that can be used by two different groups at the same time. Guests can participate in farming activities and taste the fantastic breakfasts, consisting of ecological and vegetarian products.

 

It is worth mentioning that both heating and hot water supply work through renewable energy.

A farmhouse from the 14th century, built in stone and wood and restored respecting its original structure, hosts the Pagaigoikoa rural house. It is located in one of the most emblematic spots in Bizkaia: the Urdaibai Biosphere Reserve. Centenary oaks and fruit trees stretch out around the house. It has six double rooms equipped with television, heating and WiFi. Besides, guests will have at their disposal a living room (with fireplace, television, music...), a kitchen-txoko/dining-room (6 Euro pro person), terraces and porches. Furthermore, there is a wide meeting room with WiFi, ideal for business meetings. Guests can participate in farming works if they want to, and buy top-quality typical products such as honey, cider, txakoli, cheese or wine. Excellent breakfasts (consisting in natural juice, coffee, toasts, buns...) are served and they also provide tourist information to discover the most beautiful and important places in the area.

Zelai Rural House is located in the Goitia neighbourhood and consists of six double rooms with bathroom, television and Internet connection. Specially fitted out to take in groups. There are also a lounge with fireplace and television included. Outside, a wide garden features swings for the little ones. Firewood oven to make bread. Guests are invited to make and taste it.

galeria.titulo: The interior of the rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Located in the centre of Derio, Udondo guest house is the perfect place to relax. The small and charming accommodation consists of five rooms with bathroom and WiFi access in the whole house. Besides, free car park and launderette service are also provided.

Zubeltzu Torre is a completely-restored farmhouse surrounded by mountains, meadows and trees situated 6 km from the sea. The farm consists of 5 double rooms with built-in bathroom, 2 apartments and a studio. What is more, there are a lounge, a kitchen and a dining room for the clients. The impeccable appearance of the rooms is remarkable.

Sercotel Hotel Boulevard Vitoria-Gasteiz is located in the quiet locality of Zaramaga, next to El Boulevard shopping centre and close to the Gamarra and Betoño business parks. It is also just over a kilometre from the cathedral of Santa María and the old town, making it a good option whether you are travelling on business or holidays.

 

All its rooms have natural light. The hotel's junior suites also have a fully-equipped kitchen to make guests to feel at home.

Restored farmhouse located in a rural area, surrounded by fields, mountains, forests, vegetable gardens and animals. It consists of 8 double rooms with television, bathroom and heating. Extra beds and cots for babies also available. In addition, the rural house is equipped with two living rooms with fireplace and television, a kitchen, a 50 square-metre "txoko", a garden and a car park.

galeria.titulo: The interior of Agerre rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Recently restored farmhouse located in the small town of Munitibar. It consists of six double rooms with bathroom, heating and television. In addition, it also provides a social lounge and a shop available for guests. Green zones and wooded areas surround the house.

galeria.titulo: The inside of one of the rooms

datosGenerales.descripcion: Located in Granada industrial estate, Ortuella consists of 18 double and two single rooms with bathroom, television and telephone. The accommodation caters for both tourists falling for local attractions and businesspeople attending meetings. To carry on their issues, the hotel has meeting rooms with all sorts of latest technologies such as WiFi, which will enable guests implement their job inside the accommodation.

The rural accommodation consists of five apartments named as follows: Los Rosales, Los Avellanos, Las Palmeras, La Acacia and Los Nogales. El Rincón de Aiara is situated in Menagarai (Aiara) and the combination of traditional and rural charms and all the mod and cons ensure that guests will have a pleasure stay. Each of the apartments has a different look and is decorated in great detail. Television, DVD player, bathroom and kitchen with the necessary items available in every apartment. Moreover, Los Rosales has been equipped with a jet shower system. As for Los Avellanos, it has a Jacuzzi and Las Palmeras is adapted for the physically handicapped people and has a cascade shower. Guests are allowed to have barbecues inside. Its location turns the hotel the perfect place to escape from the busy city and enjoy nature.

galeria.titulo: The interior of one of the apartments

datosGenerales.descripcion:
Restored farmhouse located in the port of Trabakua.

 

It is equipped with four double rooms, three bathrooms and a sitting room for guests.

 

The farmhouse is provided with a separate entrance.

House located in the Reserve of Urdaibai, near the beach and surrounded by green spaces.

 

8 vacancies to be fulfilled in two appartments, each with two double rooms, kitchen, bathroom and the chance to have 2 additional beds.

galeria.titulo: The exterior of the Ugalde Barri rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Farmhouse restored in July 2008 combining the charm of a rural house with warm and cosy facilities and the latest systems and technologies. Six double and 4 sigle rooms with television, telephone and Internet access.

This is a traditional style rural house located in the interior region of Bermeo, in the pass of Sollube. Suitable for 12 people in double or single rooms with central heating. Extra bed also available for 10Euro/night. This is a perfect place to spend some days in the middle of nature, halfway between the sea and the mountains, enjoying gastronomy with special menus and à la Carte service. Moreover, the clients will have the chance to purchase the typical locally grown products.

Emblematic Oxangoiti was erected in the 17th century and restored as a hotel in the year 2008.

 

Located in the centre of coastal Lekeitio, the palace is quite close to the harbour and the beach.

 

It consists of seven rooms -one single, one suite and five double rooms- with the following equipment: fully equipped bathroom with hairdryer, television, Internet connection and heating. Moreover, one of the rooms is adapted for the disabled.

 

A lovely lounge at the clients' disposal with WIFI included.

Belaustenea rural house is located in a lonely area where enjoying peace and nature is possible. The building consists of three rooms with bathroom, kitchen and living room-dining room. In the open air, a large garden plays host to swings, a wide swimming pool and a barbecue to get pleasure from an unforgetable experience with your family.

Located in the town centre of Villanañe, which is one of the main tourist areas of the Valley of Valdegovía, Orlegy House consists of three rooms with bathroom, a fully-equipped kitchen and a living room-dining room with French windows connecting with the porch. The latter is the ideal place to enjoy unforgettable moments of relax.

Located in the town centre of Laguardia, Erletxe is a two-storey rural house providing a nice accommodation. Large dining room with kitchen, double room with bathroom and "eztigela" (room to extract honey as apiculture is one of the many passions of the owner) on the first floor. As to the second floor, there are 4 double rooms with bathroom and a large meeting room for exclusive use by guests.

The farm is located in the neighbourhood of Urdaneta in Aia, between mountains and the beach, next to the Pagoeta Natural Park and the beach of Zarautz. It consists of 5 double rooms with bathroom and a dining room with fireplace and television.

The farm is located in the south of Rioja Alavesa, in Elciego, to be precise. Casa Rojanda is the name of a heavenly farm for viniculture lovers. In fact, the region is famous for its many top quality wineries whose offer is unbeatable. The house consists of five double rooms with heating and living room-dining room with kitchen, where it is possible to watch TV, read or play different board games.

Located in Lakua neighbourhood, the original block of apartments is a three-storey modern construction surrounded by gardens.

 

The compound consists of 52 wide apartments decorated in a refined style by the celebrated designer Almudena de Villar. Apartments of varied size and completely equipped with the latest technologies and mod and cons: LCD television, DTT and wired internet connection.

 

What is more, all the apartments have fully-equipped kitchen and a wide lounge to feel like home with the comforts of a hotel.

Madarian farm combines rustic and modern styles. Six double rooms with bathroom, television, heating and Internet connection. Also, a cosy lounge with fireplace and television for the exclusive use of clients and a wide dining-room with access to the open air. The house is supplied with the necessary elements to hold meetings of up to 16 people. Varied layouts also possible. Private car park, garden and green area also available.

The hotel, located in the middle of Urdaibai Biosphere Reserve, is nowadays a small hotel consisting of 8 rooms.

 

A building with history, Urune has been able to adapt to modern times. A cosy and comfortable house with modern and functional decoration.

 

Heating, television, lounge with fireplace and garden also available.

Located in a gardened farm in the town centre of Amurrio, Aldama Restaurant Hotel consists of 8 cosy rooms, one of them adapted for the disabled and all of them equipped with heating, bathroom, television, telephone and Internet access. What is more, there are two comfortable lounges available with a capacity of 36 guests where to enjoy a business meal, a friends' gathering or any other sort of celebration.

Located in Askizu neighbourhood, Urki Farm is situated in a privileged spot surrounded by vineyards and overlooking the sea. It consists of 3 broad, smart and cosy rooms with views of the vineyards especially for those who love enjoying nature. The farm is part of a complex that includes a restaurant, a winery and wide fields that are also at the clients' disposal for visits.

Dating back to the 18th century and located close to the Town Hall and the church of Muskiz, the hotel has been restored in 2009.

 

It is equipped with all the necessary services such as heating, TV in the rooms, telephone, fully-equipped bathrooms and Internet. A wide car park outside with a green area consisting of fruit trees and palm trees.

 

The perfect place for holidays with your couple or to arrange conventions and business meetings.

localizacion.nombreLocalidad: San Juan | San Juan de Muskiz

datosGenerales.descripcion: Azala is a rural accommodation sitting in the town of Lasierra, in Ribera Alta and 4 km from Lapuebla de Arganzón that consists of five wooden huts, each of them with kitchen, living room and bathroom. In addition, two more buildings can be rented: a "txoko" wit fully-equipped kitchen, bookcase, television and a wide and bright lounge with sound system, projector, changing room. Ideal to make group plans. Communal areas have WiFi Internet access. The accommodation is located in an environment of great beauty that enables the visitors to get away from the busy cities.

The Zinema 7 hotel, built on the foundations of the Astoria 7, which was the largest cinema in Donostia for 4 decades, is a reflection of the passion of the people of Donostia for cinema.A film hotel, where every room and every corner pays tribute to the stars who have passed through the Festival, our film festival

Located in the quiet neighborhood of Amara, its privileged location invites you to take a pleasant 10-minute walk along the recently remodeled green avenue of Sancho el Sabio to the romantic area, as well as to walk down the river along the banks of the Urumea river towards its mouth in the Kursaal or cycle to the epicenter of the bustle of the old town in 5 minutes. A walk with attention to detail will reveal the most authentic Donostia.

Family friendly services: Bottle Warmer Set / Children's stool / Crib / Folding bathtub / Bed barrier / Connecting rooms / Private parking /

Built in 1858 and totally restored in 2008, Arrizurieta Farm is located on the coastal town of Bermeo, by Urdaibai Biosphere Reserve and in a setting surrounded by nature and easily accessible at the same time.

 

The upper floor consists of double rooms with bathroom, whereas on the ground floor we will find a kitchen-living room-dining room and a bathroom. Central heating also in the rooms, TV, DVD player and fireplace in the lounge.

 

Totally-equipped kitchen for the clients, Wifi connection, bookcase/library, board games, recreational area-green area and a car park. In addition, outdoors we will enjoy a sunny terrace with a green area and a garden. Also a meal area available and a large table where to have a snack, lunch or just talk.

Iriarte Jauregia is a palace dating back to the 17th century and completely restored in 2009. All the rooms consist of telephone, Internet, television, fully equipped bathroom and minibar. In addition, the beautiful garden enables to hold large events, commercial presentations, catwalk shows, cocktails or banquets, among other things. The palace is ideal for business people who want to combine meetings with leisure and peace.

Located in Hueto Arriba Los Huetos Rural House has five rooms with bathroom, a wide sitting-room and a charming kitchen, which is also used as dining-room.

Outdoors we can find a wide private car park and an entertainment area with barbecues, table-tennis tables, garden and fruit trees. The house is situated in an area rich in varied fauna and besides it is a perfect place for hiking.

Nearby we can also find Los Goros cave.

A restored farmhouse takes in Argiñenea Farm, located in Eldua neighbourhood (Berastegi) and nearly 30 km from San Sebastián. This is the ideal place for mountain-lovers as it is sitting close to Leitzaran Protected Biotope and Txindoki, Aralar and Ernio summits. The farm is equipped with a lounge for the guests and each of the rooms has its own personality and consists of a bathroom, heating and Internet connection. Materials such as stone and wood have been used in the decoration. Nowadays, the owners focus on horse breeding, Euskal Pottoka breed, in fact. To sum up, this is a good chance to get away from the busy areas and relax in a rural spot in contact with nature.

Located by the main road leading from Urnieta to Andoain and on the upper ground of Irurain, Oianume Sagardotegia is a complex providing several services such as cider house, restaurant, weddings, accommodation, nightclub and winery. If you decide to visit Oianume premises you will enjoy the peace and silence of a luxurious environment. All the rooms are equipped with bathroom and decorated with rustic style, and in harmony with the setting it is located in. Extra bed available. For the guests, Oianume Restaurant serves breakfast, lunch and dinner. In addition, Oianume consists of 3 car parks only for the guests and a glazed terrace open throughout the day where lunch and dinner are served.

galeria.titulo: The rooms are equipped with bathroom and decorated with rustic style

datosGenerales.descripcion: Larrago Rural Apartments are situated in Busturia, in the very heart of Urdaibai Biosphere Reserve. An unparalleled setting where it is possible to visit different towns nearby. The ancient farmhouse made of stone is the ideal place to enjoy the family and relax. Four apartments and three studios make up the complex. The apartments consist of a double room, totally-equipped kitchen, dining room-living room with sofa bed, TV with DTT, fully-equipped bathroom and underfloor heating. As to the studios, they have a fully-equipped kitchen, dining room-living room, TV with DTT, fully-equipped bathroom and underfloor heating. Both the apartments and the studios provide bed linen, washing machine, over-microwave, crockery, fridge, iron and hairdryer. In addition, the farmhouse also has a terrace, a car park, a Wifi area, barbecues and a beautiful gardened area and a recreational area for the little ones.

Berri Versalles is a hotel-restaurant located in Errenteria, 10 minutes from San Sebastián. It consists of all the services necessary to ensure a nice and pleasant stay. Twenty-four cosy rooms with all mod cons so that the client feels like home: Internet access, bath with shower, television, air conditioning and telephone. One of the rooms is adapted for use by disabled people. Minimalist decoration and classical decoration go hand in hand in the accommodation that also owns a terrace, a free car park and WIFI connection in communal areas. The restaurant, with more than 65 years of experience, provides a modern cuisine with traditional touches.

Located in the very heart of Tolosaldea, Anoeta guest house consists of 5 rooms with bathroom, television and Internet access. It is remarkable that the ground floor is home to the restaurant named after it, where the visitor will have the chance to taste delicious dishes.

Arriaga Suites is sitting in the emblematic old quarter of Bilbao, named after the theatre whose location is near and even very close to the main tourist attractions. It consists of six suites, each with its own details and named after celebrated composers such as Pablo Sorozabal, Jesús Guridi, Andrés Isasi, Emilio Arrieta, J.M. Usandizaga and J.C. Arriaga. Lounge, fridge, microwave, hairdryer, iron, television with DVD player, Wifi access, heating and strongbox available in every room. Daily cleaning service at the clients' disposal. A charming corner, ideal for those who want to be familiar with the heart of Bizkaia's capital.

The old and big house built in traditional style is sitting in the centre of Laguardia, capital of Rioja Alavesa and the heart of the Wine Route, opposite the Church of San Juan (12th c.). Following a detailed restoration respecting the fine materials and the nature of the dwelling, the structure is a pleasant place. The ground floor consists of a wide living room-dining room with fireplace, television and toilet, whereas the first and the second floors house the rooms. The first floor has three rooms, all of them with fully-equipped bathrooms, television and DVD player. As to the second, there are three more in the shape of an attic. Details are paid great attention to.

galeria.titulo: One of the rooms overlooking the exterior

datosGenerales.descripcion: Eguzkilore Rural House is situated in an exceptional location, very close to Plentzia and Sopelana Beaches. All the rooms consist of bathroom and television and one of them is adapted for use by disabled people. A lounge, fully equipped kitchen, garden with barbecue and Internet access in the whole house available.

galeria.titulo: The interior of the rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Completely restored mill-farmhouse located at the base of Mount Jata, Errota-Barri Rural House consists of high-quality equipment. Its exquisite decoration combines the modern style with a hundred-year-old furniture. Bathroom and television available in all the rooms. Lounge with television, fully equipped kitchen, and Internet access in the whole house. A cosy porch at the entrance and a garden with barbecue.

Iturritxo Rural House is located in Igeldo, nearly 4 km from San Sebastián, which enables to see the horizon of the Bay of Biscay as well as Gipuzkoa's inland mountains. Nowadays, the rural house keeps the structure of the ancient farmhouse, dating back to 1894, but has been totally restored and adapted for the current needs. It consists of rooms overlooking the sea and the mountains, all of them with individual bathroom, heating and air conditioning, television and Wifi connection. In addition, the whole house is for rental and discounts are available for those who decide to stay longer. Situated in an unparalleled setting for rural tourism, the place is perfect to enjoy long walks in the mountains, ride by bike, apart from the local tasty gastronomy. What is more, it is possible to easily access either the surrounding beaches in Gipuzkoa's capital or Orio Beach.

Located between Deba and Mutriku. Pikua Rural House consists of 6 double rooms with bathroom, television and a beautiful lounge of communal use. It is possible to taste delicious dishes at the restaurant located on the ground floor. Free car park and garden available.

The farmhouse maintains its traditional Basque style. The rear, used as stables, has been restored to hold the rooms that the house consists of. Thus, during one's stay, the visitor will have the chance to enjoy the rural world's peace and silence, only interrupted by the typical sounds of the rural and farming area. The rooms, with fully-equipped bathroom, have heating and Wifi connection as the rest of the farmhouse, whereas the "txoko" area is ideal to hold meetings and business groups who need peace as well as closeness to urban areas and good transport systems. If you want to hire the whole house, contact the responsible to study the options available.

Mendieta Etxea is a restored farmhouse located in the heart of the Valley of Ayala and by Quejana Tower-House, which is a historical-cultural point of interest. The structure consists of 4 totally-equipped apartments with living room-dining room, kitchen, bathroom, heating, TV, Internet and communal area with access to the garden. Outdoors we will find a barbecue, a vegetable garden, a garden and a terrace. Its unparalleled setting is a point of reference for green-tourism and culture lovers. Outstanding plans would be the visit to Artziniega, which is remarkable due to its Old Town's beauty, the value of the Ethnographic Museum and the charming Medieval Market. In addition, the visitors will find many trips at their disposal, such as the chance to go hiking in Salvada Mountain Range, a magical environment with one of the major and riches flora and fauna reserves in Europe. We should also highlight the Golf Course and the Old Town of Orduña. La Aduna, an ancient building sitting in Orduña, is remarkable as it is a hotel-spa nowadays.

galeria.titulo: The interior of one of the apartments

datosGenerales.descripcion: Located by Parque de Miramón Park, this is an unusual and modern apartment complex of three-storeys surrounded by gardens. The block consists of wide apartments exquisitely decorated by the designer Almudena de Villar. Apartments of different size, totally equipped and with all the latest mod cons in terms of technology: LCD television, satellite platform with a variety of channels and Wifi. What is more, all the apartments have fully-equipped bathroom, furnished kitchen and a wide lounge to feel like home but with all the mod cons of a hotel.

La Avanzada Hotel is located in Leioa, opposite Artaza Palace and very close to the University of the Basque Country (UPV). All the rooms are equipped with WIFI access, fully equipped bathroom, hairdryer, plasma display television with satellite, telephone, air conditioning and piped music. In addition, there are also meeting rooms, a restaurant and launderette service. It should be noted that the hotel is accessible to people with reduced mobility.

Situated in the town centre of Labastida, in the very heart of Rioja Alavesa, Osante Rural House provides the visitors with the necessary services to enjoy an unforgettable stay. It is equipped with 8 double rooms with bathroom, television and one of them has been adapted for the disabled. What is more, there are also very complete communal areas: kitchen, dining room and lounge.

galeria.titulo: The interior of a rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: Olatu Hotel is a completely-restored building dating back to the 19th century and located in the Old Quarter of Zarautz, on a very busy street between Plaza de la Música Square and the beach. The rooms consist of WIFI connection, fully equipped bathroom, plasma TV with satellite channels, telephone, air conditioning and piped music. The upper floor owns a sunny terrace. The hotel is accessible to people with reduced mobility and there is a room adapted for use by disabled people.

Situated in Mutriku and overlooking the beautiful sea, Haitzalde Farm consists of six double rooms totally equipped with bathroom, television and Internet access. In addition, a wide dining room and a lounge are also available. Outside, the visitor will have the chance to enjoy a pretty gardened area and a car park.

Located at the side of the legendary Gorbeia Summit, Ellauri is a small hotel providing a personalised assistance in a familiar atmosphere. All the rooms consist of bathroom, television, large windows and Internet access. What is more, the guests will also find a cafeteria, a lounge with fireplace, a garden and a wide car park. Besides, Ellauri Hotel has a wide range of activities for the guests who want to combine relaxing days with different options such as to go for walks in the mountains, around farmhouses and neighbourhoods, ride bikes, visit mills, meadows, and so on.

galeria.titulo: The hotel is surrounded by nature

datosGenerales.descripcion:
Holiday Inn Express Vitoria is a modern and comfortable accommodation that is ideal for either business or leisure tourism.

 

It is located by Jundiz Industrial Estate, 6km from the city centre of Alava's capital. The city has endless tourist attractions, such as the Cathedral of Santa María, which inspired Ken Follett in World Without End.

 

The accommodation is situated close to Gamarra, Ali-Gobeo and Betoño Industrial Estates.

 

The hotel is equipped with 85 rooms providing air conditioning, plasma display television, WIFI Internet connection, coffee free service, mini-bar, telephone and bathroom.

Amets Etxea Rural House is sitting in Bernedo, Montaña Alavesa, only 15 minutes from Rioja Alavesa and by Izki Natural Park. Due to its location, those who stay at the rural house will have the chance to practise several sports such as golf, horse riding and hiking, among others. The house has two rooms with plasma display television, hydromassage cabin, oven, microwave, smooth-top range, dishwasher and washing machine. In addition, the clients will also find a cosy lounge with fireplace and plasma display television at their disposal. To sum up, Amets Etxea provides you with all the necessary services to guarantee a nice and unforgettable stay.

galeria.titulo: Room at Amets Etxea Rural House

datosGenerales.descripcion: Located in the centre of Lapuebla de Labarca, in La Rioja Alavesa, the completely restored Kandela Etxea is a rural house that keeps both its original structure and materials. It consists of all mod cons to guarantee a pleasant stay: kitchen, dinning room, several bathrooms, heating, fireplace, washing machine, microwave, television and terrace. Extra beds also available. Information supplied about the main local spots of interest and they also sell local products. The area is perfect to go hiking and practise activities in connection with the countryside, as well as visit the wineries that have raised Rioja Alavesa to fame.

galeria.titulo: The interior of the rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: The Atxurra hotel is green accommodation which holds the European Ecological Label. It lies at the foot of Monte Sollube, just a few kilometres from the locality of Bermeo and set right in the heart of the Urdaibai nature reserve. The establishment is committed to responsible management of natural resources, caring for the air, water and soil, keeping them clean and healthy to ensure complete protection for nature. It consists of 11 double rooms, 1 single room and 4 totally-equipped apartments divided into 2 floors. Each apartment has a kitchen, one living room and two double rooms with private bathroom in 75 square metres. All the rooms and apartments are outward-looking and most of them have a terrace from where the clients will enjoy the beautiful landscape of the area.

Located on the side of Gorbeia Natural Park, the hotel sits in Areatza, 20 minutes from Bilbao. It consists of 65 rooms with bathroom, television, heating and mini-fridge. In addition, it is also equipped with a coffee-bar with terrace and a magnificent restaurant with a capacity of over 150 people. The privileged location along with its complete features such as free Wifi in all the facilities make of it the ideal place for business and leisure stays.

La casa Vieja is located in Maturana, a small town 15 km from Alava's capital city. It consists of 6 rooms with bathroom, television and Internet connection. One of the rooms has been adapted for use by disabled people. The kitchen is equipped with all the electrical appliances and the ground floor features a large dinning room and a living room with fireplace. Gardened area and a barbecue for dinner in the summertime.

Located in a privileged setting, Torrea Farm consists of four double rooms with bathroom and heating. In addition, there are also two beautiful living rooms and a dining room. Outside, apart from the parking spaces and the garden, the farm features a climatised swimming pool where we will have the chance to dive in, and enjoy good reading under the shelter of fruit trees or taking cover in the porch. It should also be noted that Torrea is fitted out to take in disabled guests. The ramp outside and by the lift enables a good access to it.

A modern colonial-style building houses the hotel Joshe Mari in Bakio. It consists of half a dozen rooms, each named after one of the old neighbourhoods of the town: Basigo, Benta Alde, Goitisolo, San Pelaio, and Zubiaur Urkizaur. All of them have their own bathroom and are equipped with air conditioning, heating, desk and television. The hotel offers car park, restaurant, café, terrace and WIFI Internet. Due to its location the place is perfect to enjoy good Basque gastronomy and practise water activities.

Satzu is a beautiful farmhouse dating from the 16th century that has been recently restored putting some modern touches to its style. The building has two floors and an attic flat as well as a 80 square-metre long all-purpose room, which is equipped with fireplace, kitchen and bathrooms. It is located within the Ubilla-Urberuaga neighbourhood, that is, three kilometres away from the town centre of Markina-Xemein. Its natural surroundings are quiet and pleasant. Satzu rural house offers six rooms equipped with heating, Internet, television and telephone. One room is even adapted for disabled people. In Satzu you will find an interesting exhibition room as well, where temporary and permanent collections are exhibited. The most adventurous ones can even practise a wide range of sport activities in its surroundings, e.g. hiking, speleology, climbing, etc.

Aingeru is a tourism in farm located in the Valley of Carranza, a beautiful natural setting in the very heart of Las Encartaciones. It consists of four double rooms all of them fitted out with heating, television and bathroom. Besides, one of the rooms features a hydromassage cabin, another one has a hydromassage bathtub and a third one has been equipped with a hydromassage and a large balcony to enjoy magnificent views. The house also features a lounge ¿with fireplace and television. There is a special room for gastronomy in the accommodation as breakfast is served as well as lunch and dinner made of the typical local produce. They also prepare bean meals, txarribodas (the killing of the pig to eat) and roast lambs. Quality products such as good cheese, chorizo, beans, tomatoes, and peppers are seasonal products on sale. A total luxury for lovers of good food. This is, in short, the ideal place to regain energy ¿massages are also given-, escape from the hub of the city and practise endless activities in connection with nature.

Located by the urban centre of Sabando (Arraia-Maeztu) and in the heart of Montaña Alavesa, El Manzanal is a rural accommodation whose surroundings are a privilege as it is encompassed by nature and situated by the Izki Natural Park. This is, in short, the ideal place to enjoy with your family and practise activities in the open air such as hiking, climbing, golfing and horse riding, among others. The house consists of four double rooms with bathroom and heating. One room adapted for use by disabled people. In addition, there are a totally-equipped kitchen, a lounge with television and fireplace, solarium, a wide garden and Internet WIFI connection.

Kolitza Farm was named after the location as it is located under the shelter of Mount Kolitza and by the brook of the homonym stream. The mentioned structure was built 270 years ago and restored for the first time in 1965. As to its appearance, 2004 was the year in which it was transformed but keeping its original structure and adapting it to the tourists. Directed by the designer Issac Díez Inoriza, the restoration works led to a combination of warm and rusticity. It consists of five double rooms with their own bathroom ¿one of them is located outside the room-, divided into three floors. In addition, there are also a totally-equipped kitchen, a lounge with television and fireplace, a car park, a wide garden and Internet WIFI connection. The guests will have the chance to buy farmhouse produce such as fruit and honey.

Natura Sobrón is the name of this rural house located in the middle of nature. Consisting of 4 double rooms and 2 single with bathroom and television, there are also a beautiful living room-dining room and a garden with magnificent views. It should also be noted that each room has name, elements or decoration related to nature. Rooms on the top floor have sloping ceiling. The whole house or only rooms for hire.

galeria.titulo: The interior of the rural house

datosGenerales.descripcion: The Atxuri apartments, located in the capital of Biscay, combine the services of a hotel with the comfort of home. They are especially designed for medium or long stays, for leisure or business travels. These 26 moderns apartments, with different capacities (for 3, 4 or 5 persons as a maximum), were designed with a meticulous attention to detail and have a fully-equipped kitchen, a living room with a sofa-bed, one or two bedrooms and a bathroom. They also have a 300 meter square solarium terrace, its own car park, Wi-Fi Internet and catering services, dry-cleaner, laundry, hairdressing, luggage room and cleaning facilities.

galeria.titulo: Interior of one of the apartments

datosGenerales.descripcion:
The Ibarrola Bekoa farmhouse, recently renovated, is located at Pagoeta Natural Park, a beautiful natural environment surrounded by an autochthonous wood. It is located between the Agorregi forge and Altxerri caves, listed as World Heritages by UNESCO.

 

The area is perfect to practice activities linked to nature such as hiking, surfing, horse ridding and canoeing. During summer and autumn, mycology lovers can pick mushrooms and porcini in the surrounding woods. It has a wide living room, a dining room for breakfast, four double rooms with bathroom and a flat adapted for disabled people.

 

It is also possible to make barbecues in the outside. 10 minutes from the beaches of Zarautz and Orio and from the centre of Aia, 20 minutes from San Sebastian and 50 minutes from Bilbao. The Way of Saint James (from Orio to Zarautz, via Laurgain) crosses its lands. It is possible to rent the entire farmhouse or to rent per room.

Located within a 2 minute walk from Zurriola and Kursaal conference centre. The town centre with its many shops, and the Old Town with its Pintxo bars, restaurants and bustling night life are just a five minute walk away. Kitchen facilities for self-catering, where guests find basics like tea, coffee, milk, cereals, biscuits, etc. There is also a fridge, toaster, kettle, a micro wave and coffee maker (but no cooker). It is also the common area where guests meet while preparing their own meals. The kitchen is open 24 hours and there is no extra cost for its use.

The Eguren Ugarte hotel, in the centre of Rioja Alavesa, provides the opportunity to sleep in a winery, in the middle of barrels and vineyards. It is a very original and innovating building, integrated in the Eguren Ugarte winery, in which you will enjoy the fascinating world of viticulture. The rooms are perfect for relaxing, resting and enjoying this special environment. The hotel provides: free Wi-Fi access, strong box, writing desk, phone, minibar, television, air-conditioning and heating, among other services. There are two restaurants in the hotel; Martín Cendoya, for lunch, and Victorino Eguren, for dinner (It offers arranged services). There is also a cafeteria, a lounge with views, a room for tasting, an audiovisuals room and a shop. They organise fantastic tourist tours to discover Rioja Alavesa.

The Hospedería de los Parajes inn is located on the Plaza Mayor square of Laguardia (Rioja Alavesa), a municipality which is known as the capital of the Spanish wine. The accommodation is divided into five floors and each spacious bedroom has its own personality. Seven of the bathrooms have a jacuzzi and one of the rooms is adapted for guests with disabilities. The glass-roofed courtyard is worth a special mention. The inn has a cellar and two dining rooms: one is dedicated to traditional cuisine, and the other to a more innovating one. Besides, the best wines can be enjoyed with the dishes. Guests can relax in the wine-and-oil-therapy spa, Jacuzzi, Turkish baths, Scottish showers, ice fountain... In the wine cellar, wine tasting sessions are organised.

The Viura Hotel is made up of whimsically superimposed cubes. It is located in Villabuena de Álava (Rioja Alavesa), at only 20 minutes from Haro and Logroño and near the famous wineries Ysios and Marqués de Riscal.

 

It is a spectacular and avant-garde building which contrasts with the environment, but at the same time fits perfectly with it. Each room has its own personality, and all of them have original decorative and technological elements.

 

It is a place where peace and quite reign, perfect to discover the attractions of Rioja Alavesa. The Viura Hotel has a restaurant with menus based on Basque and Riojan cuisine in which the wine is very present.

 

The restaurant also provides areas for different kinds of events.

The Punta Monpás Hotel in San Sebastian stands in the Gros district, next to Zurriola beach and at a distance of barely 500 metres from the Kursaal Congress Hall. Of modern architecture, the hotel features a revolutionary design, with rooms down to the last detail. Bedrooms include their own sitting room area, a bathroom and incredible views of the beach. Besides, they all are equipped with heater, air conditioning and Wi-Fi connection.

galeria.titulo: Entrance to one of the bedrooms
Lounge in the standard bedroom, with views of the beach

datosGenerales.descripcion: Zelaikoetxe is located in the mountain range of Gorobel-Salvada. It is a 300 years old building, entirely renovated. A quiet place in which you can enjoy wonderful views into the nature of the region. The house is surrounded by a garden and has 12,000 square meters of land. In the house, functionality and warmth are mixed. There is a large and welcoming lounge/dinning room with a chimney and Wi-Fi connection. You can buy local products and get all the information you need about the area (interesting places to visit, activities and sports you can practice...).

The Holiday Inn Express Bilbao is a hotel with a modern and functional design, ideal for leisure and business trips.

 

It is located beside the Loiu Airport and the Zamudio Technology Park, just 10 minutes from Vizcaya's capital and 15 minutes from the Bilbao Exhibition Centre. It boasts more than 100 bedrooms, spread over three floors. All rooms come equipped with LCD television, Wi-Fi connection, en-suite bathroom, telephone, air conditioning and a desk, as well as other services. The hotel also has a bar where breakfast is served (continental buffet) and two fully-equipped meeting rooms.

 

The hotel has a free external car park, as well as a transport service which brings its guests to the airport free of charge.

Santa Ana Hotel is an old farm that has been entirely renovated in order to meet the guests' needs. The cosy and warm environment will make you feel like home, but with the usual hotel services. All the rooms are large and offer you the possibility to enjoy beautiful views of the nearby mountains. The hotel also has television, air-conditioning and telephone. In the hotel's restaurant you will enjoy delicious seasonal dishes, full of creativity and innovation. The hotel also has a multipurpose hall, ideal for business meetings or other kinds of events.

The Naval hotel is located in Sestao in an environment closely linked to the shipping industry. That is why both the building as well as the rooms bear relation to that world. The rooms are equipped with the following amenities: bathroom, television, telephone, safe, Wi-Fi connection, heating and air conditioning. Some of the rooms are adapted for persons with a physical disability. In addition, the hotel has a car park, cafeteria, restaurant, buffet and two large rooms to hold all manner of events.

Endara is the perfect accommodation to enjoy nature in a quiet environment, but it is close to the city, at the same time. And Endara is located in the Sagasti valley (Lezo), only 3 kilometres from the centre of the town and 10 minutes by car from San Sebastian. It has several newly built apartments with kitchen, lounge-dining room and bathroom and equipped with all the necessary amenities to meet the needs of the guests.

The Zubibarriaga cottage is ideal for those who love nature.

 

In fact, it is located in Ibarrangelu, at the heart of the Urdaibai Biosphere Reserve and just one kilometre away from the Laga beach.

 

All bedrooms have a television and a bathroom. The cottage also has a living-dining room, a furnished terrace, kitchen, internet connection and heating.

Located in the historic centre of Portugalete, in a distinctive building dating from the late 19th century. Very nearby is the Bizkaia bridge, listed by UNESCO as a World heritage Site. The area has large numbers of pintxo bars and restaurants. The guesthouse has rooms with TV and bathroom, as well as a lounge with free Wi-Fi.

Usotegi is country holiday accommodation a beautiful, fully-refurbished farmhouse surrounded by Txakoli vineyards. It is in a natural setting just five minutes from Getaria, ideal for relaxing and getting away from it all. It has several rooms, two apartments and a luxurious studio flat with a hydromassage bath. It also has a shared kitchen, heating, living and reading room (with television and DVD player), wifi internet access and a sun terrace. The owners are farmers and stockbreeders.

galeria.titulo: Exterior view of the agritourism farm accommodation

datosGenerales.descripcion: The Welcome Gros hotel is in the heart of the capital city of Gipuzkoa, very close to some of the most characteristic places of the city, such as the Kursaal Congress Centre, the old quarter, the Boulevard and Kontxa and Zurriola beaches. Thanks to its excellent location, it is ideal for those who visit the city for work, as well as for tourists. It has double and single rooms with en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning, hair dryer, safe, flat-screen TV and free WIFI connection. Also, there are several 35 square metre suites in Welcome Gros, with a bedroom, living room, bathroom, mini-kitchen with household appliances, heating, flat-screen TV and free WIFI connection.

A lovely seventeenth century farmhouse converted into a luxury hotel. This is how we can define the Dolarea hotel, set within the monumental heritage site in Igartza (Beasain) and in the heart of the Goierri region. While the exterior structure has been maintained, the interior of the hotel has undergone complete reconstruction with modernity and tradition going hand in hand at Dolarea.

 

Offering different room types, guests can avail of the following services: air conditioning, television, telephone, safe, bathroom, WiFi access and heating. There is also a café, restaurant, lounge, gym, jacuzzi, sauna and exclusive parking facilities for guests.

galeria.titulo: A room with a living room
The hotel was built in the 17th century

datosGenerales.descripcion: Garabilla rural farmhouse is in the neighbourhood that shares the same name, in the village of Llanteno, in the heart of Valle de Ayala. It was built as a house-tower in the seventeenth century and today it maintains its original structure, although it has undergone renovation to meet the needs of tourists. The house is surrounded by nature and from each of the rooms (all with en-suite bathrooms) we can enjoy the views of different mountains. The farmhouse has three lounges and two kitchens and outside there is a sauna and hydromassage shower, a paddle court, barbecue and organic vegetable garden. Notably, if they wish, visitors can take part in the agricultural work. Additionally, the area offers numerous nature-related activities for the visitor to take part in.

The San Ignacio guesthouse is located in privileged surroundings, in the centre of San Sebastian, at a short distance from the magnificent beaches of La Concha and Zurriola, from the Tabakalera Centre and from the RENFE train station, which, at the same time, is near the Kursaal Auditorium and Convention Centre. The single and double rooms are modern and welcoming and all have private bathrooms, heating, mini-bar, TV and Wi-Fi. In addition, you can have additional beds in each room. This establishment offers a delicious breakfast every morning. It also has a laundry service.

AliciaZzz Bed and Breakfast Bilbao (B & B Bilbao) is themed around the adventures of Alice in Wonderland. The property has six spacious, bright rooms each with a private bathroom. Guests can people-watch, observing the daily life of the Bilbao locals from each of the rooms. Additionally, they have television and Internet.

Casa Lafuente offers the visitor an opportunity to enjoy some relaxing days in a natural environment. Two tourist holiday apartments equipped with all services form this pleasant house, in which guests will feel like at home, since it has all necessary kitchen tools. Besides, one of the apartments is adapted for disabled people. Located in an exceptional spot, visitors can carry out tours around the Sierra Brava de Badaia, Peñas de Oro or the Gorbeia Natural Park.

In the heart of Vitoria-Gasteiz's Green Ring, a stone's throw from the Mendizorroza stadium and very close to the city centre.

 

Combining the facilities of the best hotels with all the comfort and space of home. It has a hundred apartments of different sizes, all fully equipped with a kitchen, living room and one or two bathrooms, among many other amenities.

 

Guests can also enjoy some spectacular views there. This is the ideal place to stay with the family, as well as to organise work meetings or special events. There is a cafeteria, SkyBar, in the viewpoint, offering the finest views of the city, the Vertical Garden, the Glass Patio, a gym, car park and a range of rooms for meetings and functions.

The Roble Verde (Green Oak) campsite is located in the south of Alava, between the villages of Pobes and La Puebla de Arganzón.

 

Visitors can enjoy a quiet, family atmosphere and given its location they will have the chance to visit some of the most emblematic spots in Alava and do numerous sports and activities while surrounded by nature.

 

There are mobile homes and bungalows, as well as pitches for caravans, campervans and tents. Facilities include a restaurant with a terrace, a cafe, a shop, a swimming pool and a games area. There is also a forest where visitors can go for a walk and unwind.

 

The prices quoted above are peak season rates. For further details, please contact the campsite manager.

 

Access recommended by A-2622.

The Komentu Maitea hotel and restaurant is located in Gordexola, in the heart of Las Encartaciones, in a peaceful and beautiful setting a short distance from Bilbao. It sits in the old Santa Isabel convent (erected in the 17th century), which has recently been restored and redecorated. Its original structure has been maintained. It offers individual and doubles rooms as well as suites, which have been decorated in a French rustic style. It also boasts a restaurant, several halls (one of which holds up to 250 people), a lounge, a coffee shop and restaurant, a multi-purpose room, a carpark and a dance hall. It is an ideal location for hosting all types of events.

Located in the neighbourhood of Lierni, Troi landetxea guesthouse has three rooms with en-suite bathrooms, heating and television.

There is also a common room where guests can relax and enjoy the silence that permeates this magnificently breathtaking Gipuzkoan landscape. On the outside there is a small porch with a garden and a large car park.

This house is an ideal spot to enjoy nature.

Etxe Lore is a farmhouse located in the village of Egino (Asparrena), between the mountains ranges of Aizkorri and Entzia, in the very midst of the Aizkorri-Aratz Natural Park.

 

It is close to the Ullíbarri and Urrunaga reservoirs and La Lece cave, in a natural environment, which is very conducive to getting involved in all sorts of physical activities: trails, rock climbing, caving and water sports.

 

The property has double rooms with en-suite bathrooms (one room is adapted for disabled persons), a kitchen and a txoko (traditional Basque gastronomical society) with a fireplace. They provide breakfast, lunch and dinner.

Built in 1735 by the family that shares the same name, this beautiful three-storey house is located on the outskirts of Orduña. The first floor houses the fully equipped kitchen, the spacious lounge/dining room, a shared bathroom and one room for guests with reduced mobility. Three spacious rooms, all with en-suite bathrooms, are located on the second floor. One of the rooms has a small room equipped with extra beds. The third floor attic accommodates one room with a balcony and has magnificent views across the whole valley. There is a library and study area for the leisure and relaxation of guests.

Newly built hotel set right opposite the Guggenheim Bilbao museum and close to the commercial and business area of the city. It features 151 exterior rooms fitted out with bathroom, safe, and mini-bar, LCD TV with satellite channel connection, air-conditioning and heating. The hotel also includes a car park, bar, restaurant and a wide range of services, such as bicycle rental, WiFi Internet connection, room service and laundry.

The modern Gran Hotel Bahía Bernardo is located in a privileged position in San Sebastián, 200 metres from Zurriola beach and from the Kursaal Conference Palace and it¿s a 5 minute walk from the tapas bars in the historic centre. The elegant rooms have air conditioning, free WiFi, balconies and flat screen TVs. Additionally, all rooms have wooden floors, central heating and a safe. The elegant en-suite bathrooms include complementary toiletries and hair dryer. The hotel also offers a quiet lounge area and a bar for guests.

galeria.titulo: Interior of one of the guest rooms

datosGenerales.descripcion: The San Marcial Apartments are located in the historic centre of the Gipuzkoan capital, 200 meters from the Cathedral of the Good Shepherd and La Concha beach and a10 minute walk from Old Town. The property consists of four luxury apartments, one of which is completely adapted for people with disabilities. All apartments are fully equipped and feature, among others, the following services: wireless internet connection, a kitchen with washer / dryer and dishwasher, TV and air conditioning. In short, guests will feel like they're in a home away from home.

galeria.titulo: Interior of one of the apartments

datosGenerales.descripcion:
Argoin Txiki is a renovated country house located 2 km from Zarautz town centre. The house offers stunning views from where guests have views over the whole of Zarautz and you are invited to enjoy the tranquillity of the surrounding landscape.

 

The agritourism country house accommodation comprises six very spacious double bedrooms, one of which is wheelchair accessible. All guestrooms are equipped with heating, en-suite bathroom and television. The house also has a restaurant with a capacity for ninety diners, with a spacious terrace in summertime.

Olagi, the agritourism farmhouse, located in Altzaga, close to San Sebastián, has everything you could need to make your stay an unforgettable one. Rooms have WiFi and television. One room is adapted for reduced mobility guests and the farmhouse features a lounge with television and DVD, a terrace, a library, bar, kitchen and a grill where guests can cook their own food. It also has a wine cellar and a restaurant where you can choose between a typical cider house menu, a la carte menu and a daily menu. Nestled out in the countryside, you can see and learn firsthand how cider is made and how farm hens are bred.

The Coliseo Albia building, formerly the venue for ABAO (Bilbao Association of Friends of the Opera) concerts, houses the Sercotel Coliseo. This building has been completely restored, preserving its two impressive facades, which date back to 1916. Its central location is a bonus, as it is located very close to some of the most emblematic spots in the Biscayan capital, such as the Guggenheim Museum, the Euskalduna Palace and the Museum of Fine Arts. It has almost one hundred rooms, fully equipped and decorated in an avant-garde style. The property shares the building with the Grand Casino Bilbao and the Ibaigane restaurant, which specializes in Basque cuisine.

The Txanka Erreka hotel is located not only in a stunning countryside, near the beach, but also in an easily accessible area, close to the town centre. All guestrooms are equipped with a bathroom, mini-bar, television, heating, wireless internet access and a desk. Additionally, one of guestrooms is accessible to persons with disabilities. The hotel is very close to San Sebastian and is suitable for both business and leisure travellers.

Teileri house is located in Berrobi, 5 kilometres away from Tolosa. Built from wood and divided into two apartments, it is noteworthy as a result of its innovative design. Each apartment boasts three double rooms, two bathrooms, a fully fitted kitchen, dining area, living room with television and a porch on which you can enjoy the tranquility of the surroundings. Situated on one of the slopes of Mount Uzturre, close to the Protected Biotope of Leitzaran and the natural parks of Aralar, Aizkorri-Aratz and Pagoeta, it is the ideal place in which to carry out activities relating to nature.

The San Ignacio Centro guest house is right in the centre of Donostia-San Sebastián, near the railway station and the well-known beach of La Concha. Its rooms have their own bathroom, heating, minibar, television and WIFI access.

 

They also boast attractive views of the city. Breakfasts are available and extra beds can be added. TRANSFERS, BUS AND ASSOCIATED RESTAURANTS FOR GUESTS’ LUNCH AND DINNER.

A modern and functional hotel surrounded by mountains and farmhouses. Situated in Elbarrena neighbourhood in Zaldibia, it is ideal for both business and leisure breaks.
