All rooms are outward-facing and include, among others, the following amenities: television, minibar, bathroom, telephone and fax service. The property also features a restaurant, bar, terrace and a secure car park.

The Aparthotel Jardines de Aristi offers furnished apartments, all comprising lounge-dining room, television, a fully equipped kitchen (fridge, microwave, oven, washing machine, clothes line), bathroom and outdoor terrace.

 

The property offers free Wi-Fi. There is free outdoor parking and optional on-site private parking in the garage.

 

It is located in Vitoria-Gasteiz, near Salburua Park and Fernando Buesa Arena.

A recently renovated farmhouse houses the Otxoenea rural hotel. It is located in the rural area of Irun. The ground floor has a reception, dining room, kitchen and living room with fireplace. On the first floor we can find the room, in different colours and sizes, all with names of mountains of the area. All the rooms have underfloor heating, television and Wi-Fi.

galeria.titulo: Exterior view of the rural guesthouse

datosGenerales.nombre: VICENTE PALLOTTI CASA DE ESPIRITUALIDAD Y ACOGIDA
datosGenerales.descripcion:
Casa Vicente Pallotti, a retreat and shelter run by the Pallottine Fathers, is located in the mountains of the Carranza Valley, not far from the sea.

 

The 19th-century building has a capacity for 100 guests and the facilities include several multipurpose and meeting rooms, a dining room, a television room, a reading room, a txoko or gastronomic club, and a car park.

 

The retreat shares its premises with the Termas de Molinar spa, which offers a wide range of treatments.

The property is situated in the old town of Bermeo, at a distance of three and twelve kilometres respectively from Mundaka and Bakio, towns known for their waves and surfing tradition. All rooms are outward-facing and have heating, bathroom and television.

The property is located in the heart of the Old Town in San Sebastian. Guestrooms are equipped with a television, heating, mini bar, Internet (Wi-Fi), safe and hairdryer. In addition, the guesthouse has a lift and guests can avail of a pillow menu and cots including other services.

 

Some guestrooms have private bathrooms while other rooms have access to shared bathroom facilities.

Basagoiti guesthouse is located in the heart of Getxo, very close to the Plaza San Nicolás.

 

Also, please note that both Algorta and Bidezabal metro stations and the bus stop are very close to the guesthouse. Each of the guestrooms are named after an area in the town and all rooms have en-suite bathrooms, heating and Wi-Fi access. The reception is located in Cafeteria Jolas-Aurre, just a few metres from the property.

Zezilionea Hotel is located in the heart of Goierri in Olaberria, a town surrounded by the Aralar and Aitzgorri mountains. Rooms are equipped with all amenities; heating, bathroom, television and telephone to ensure a pleasant stay for guests. Guests can also enjoy magnificent views from the rooms. 

 

Zezilionea also offers a laundry service and has a function room suitable for hosting business meetings; there is also a restaurant which offers traditional cookery with modern touches

Goiko-Benta is an old inn that has been taking in travellers, pilgrims and mountaineers for hundreds of years. During the construction of the famous Arantzazu Sanctuary, Jorge Oteiza stayed there, turning the location into a meeting place for artists. Nowadays you can admire some works and sketches by famous artists (Oteiza himself, Lucio Muñoz, Ibarrola...).

The inn conserves its original structure but the rooms have been refurbished and now have bathroom, heating and television. The establishment also has a restaurant, lounges and a terrace during the summer.

Musika Plaza guesthouse is located in the heart of Zarautz, just 100 metres from the landmark beach. The property has Wi-Fi access available and guestrooms (doubles and singles) have television with international channels and fully equipped bathrooms. Guests can avail of special breakfast and lunch prices at the Txiki Polit restaurant located 10 metres from the guesthouse.

The Easo guesthouse is located in the centre of San Sebastian, close to the City Hall, the Old Town and the La Concha beach as well as the train and bus stations. All the rooms have their own bathroom and TV. The guesthouse also has WIFI and heating.

Accommodation located in Labastida, in the Rioja Alavesa region.

 

Its single and double rooms have a full bathroom, TV and air conditioning, among other services. Half of the rooms also have a terrace overlooking Labastida. Its restaurant-grill menu is based on traditional cuisine with highlights such as potatoes a la riojana, roast lamb or lamb chops with vine shoots.

 

The price of the room includes breakfast.

The Mélida guesthouse is located in the centre of Ermua, only 3 kilometres from Eibar.

 

It offers clients double and single rooms with ensuite bathroom and the following services: cable television, free WI-FI, heating and hairdryer. The establishment also holds the Tourist Accessibility Seal and is located close to bus stops and train stations.

 

The highlight: the friendly and personal service.

Rural establishment with stone façade that combines rustic and modern styles: its rooms have bathroom and TV and they all have views of the sea.

 

The establishment also has two apartments as well as a living-dining room with TV and chimney, a kitchen for guests and swimming pool. Located close to the mountains and the sea.

A farmhouse dating from the 16th century renovated and converted into tourist apartments. It is located in a rural area of Bakio, only 5 kilometres from San Juan de Gaztelugatxe and 11 from Bermeo.

 

It offers studio-apartments equipped with full kitchen, bathroom, TV and WIFI.

 

The facilities include a gastronomic txoko for 30 people and two outdoor terraces.

This rural house is located in a renovated 18th-century manor which still boasts the original wood and stone structure.

 

The accommodation is situated deep in the mountains, 2 kilometres from the centre of Usurbil. All rooms have an ensuite bathroom, central heating and a television. Guests can purchase homemade products and participate in the farming activities.

Rural house located in Santiago Erreka neighbourhood in Aia. Surrounded by green areas, the residence boasts a salon-dining room with a chimney as well as board games, a porch and car-park facilities.

 

The bedrooms are equipped with heating, television sets, and en-suite bathrooms. Guests are also offered the possibility to hire sports equipment. Among the facilities, the residence boasts a pelota court.

An agritourism hotel with easy access from the AP-1 motorway.

 

Rooms with television and bathroom with hydro massage shower, all exterior with views over the Zadorra River and the countryside.

 

The common areas include the modern, fully-equipped kitchen, lounge-dining room and terrace.

 

The establishment has its own horse riding facilities.

This is a guesthouse situated in the historic centre of Tolosa, in a building which is almost 200 years old.

 

The Karmentxu guesthouse has single, double, and marital bedrooms, and each one of these is equipped with a television and en-suite bathroom.

The Arati agritourism hotel is located in a peaceful natural environment, surrounded by mountains and animals. Its double and single rooms have television and en suite bathroom. The rustic-style establishment is equipped with underfloor heating and Wi-Fi Internet connection, as well as a kitchen and lounge-dining room with fireplace. It also has a terrace and car park and you can practise several sports in the surrounding area.

As well as a rural hotel, Ea Astei, set in a privileged natural enclave in the Urdaibai Biosphere Reserve, has two houses: Okana and Vita. The first has 150 m2 and a fully-equipped kitchen, spacious conservatory, garden, terrace and two bedrooms, both with en suite bathroom and one with dressing room.

 

As for the Casa Vita, it is the first accommodation built in the Basque Country that generates its own green energy. The single-storey building has over 170 m2, conservatory terraces overlooking the forest, kitchen, spacious 80 m2 lounge and two bedrooms, each with an suite bathroom.

Luarri is located on the road up Mount Igeldo, a 10 minute drive from the centre of San Sebastian. It is a privileged natural setting, close to the sea. Its rooms have full bathroom, balcony, television and heating. The hotel also offers Wi-Fi connection and private guest parking.

Family hotel located in a quiet area of San Sebastian, well connected with the city centre. Each room (named after emblematic streets in San Sebastian) has its own personality, but they are all exterior and have the following facilities: flat screen TV, DVD, heating and en suite bathroom with hydro massage shower.

 

The common areas include a library with fireplace, bar and chill-out terrace.

Agritourism hotel at the heart of the Aiako Harria Natural Park, in a peaceful location half way between San Sebastian and Hendaye. Guests can enjoy wonderful views from the terrace. They offer three different types of breakfast, and lunch and dinner with duck products made according to tradition at the farmhouse itself.

Hotel Gran Bilbao is located just a few steps from the Old Town, the main historical, cultural and commercial area of Bilbao, where you can find museums, the Cathedral of Santiago, the emblematic Plaza Nueva, the famous La Ribera market and a multitude of pintxo bars. 

 

It offers more than 150 parking spaces and charging points for electric cars.  For cycling enthusiasts, there is a bike room, a repair area and a washing area with a hosepipe.Its rooms, all exterior, are avant-garde in style and decorated with murals, all different.   All rooms are air-conditioned, have Wi-Fi and cable connection and are fully equipped. 

 

The hotel restaurant offers international cuisine, with local touches and healthy cuisine and the breakfast buffet features live cooking. In addition, for meetings and congresses, the hotel has its own Auditorium with capacity for almost 300 people, and 10 fully equipped meeting rooms, spread over more than 1,800 square metres, to organise any type of event.

All the Hotel Araba rooms are exterior, sound-proofed and have the following facilities: safety deposit box, flat screen TV, mini bar, telephone, air conditioning, desk, Wi-Fi Internet connection and bathroom (with hair dryer).

 

The hotel also offers a private garage and has small gardens and a terrace outside.

Mañarinegi is a hotel located in an 18th century farmhouse, fully refurbished and surrounded by nature. It is close to the capital of Gipuzkoa and has five apartments. All have en suite bathroom. The decor at Mañarinegi combines rustic and minimalist elements.

Guesthouse located close to the Vista Alegre bullring in Bilbao.

 

It offers single and double rooms with television, heating and Wi-Fi Internet connection.

 

Washing machine and dryer also available for guests.

Artiñano Etxea is a traditional farmstead converted into a country guest house, located in the Orozko valley (ten minutes walk from town), at the foot of the Gorbeia nature park. It has two large living rooms (one of them with a glass wall), kitchen, an old doorway, a library and a chapel where masses used to be held.

 

The house is surrounded by a spacious garden where guests can have barbecues and there is also a swimming pool.

The La Salve guesthouse is just 15 minutes away on foot from the centre (Plaza Federico Moyua) and old quarter of Bilbao.

 

It has parking facilities for guests and the room price includes breakfast.

Valdelana is a rural guesthouse located in Elciego,  home to Rioja Alavesa wine.

 

The guesthouse sits adjacent to the winery-museum of the same name. It is housed in an old building, steeped in history, which has been completely renovated.

 

Visitors will be able to enjoy what the world of wine has to offer. The guesthouse boasts double rooms (all of which have en-suite bathrooms), a lounge with a chimney and sofas, a dining area, a spacious terrace and a fully-equipped kitchen. Breakfast is included in the price.

 

Visitors can choose to enjoy lunch or dinner in the adjoining restaurant and can also take part in a range of activities in the winery-museum, including: guided tours, wine- and grape-tasting courses, etc.

galeria.titulo: Bathroom in the Duquesa de la Victoria bedroom

datosGenerales.descripcion:
The Igeretxe is a small, picturesque establishment overlooking Ereaga beach.

 

All the rooms are en-suite with a Wi-Fi connection, satellite television, minibar, safe and other miscellaneous services. Most of the rooms also have a sea view. The Igeretxe's facilities include a cafe (La Veranda), bar (Afterwork), and a restaurant (La Brasserie) renowned for its charcoal-grilled fish and meat and extensive wine list.

 

With three halls and two galleries capable of accommodating up to 500 guests, the hotel is an ideal venue for weddings, business conventions and private events.

Aginaga is a modern, energy-efficient hotel with the charm of a traditional establishment. All the rooms have free Wi-Fi internet access. The hotel also has its own cider bar and a restaurant specialising in traditional Basque cuisine.

Yeguada Isasa, a stud farm on the edge of the Aiako Harria Nature Reserve, offers accommodation in a natural setting. Its wide range of facilities include a garden, swimming pool, children's play room and a car park. There are 12 stables for guests and the possibility of accommodating horses.

Pensión Astigarraga is located in Astigarraga, 6 km from San Sebastian.

Built in an old industrial building, it has a simple and modern decoration, without losing its essence, making it a different type of accommodation from the rest.

Its rooms and flats are fully equipped.  The self-catering flats are ideal for families of up to 5 members. It also has a 44m2 suite with a huge whirlpool bath, King Size bed, 75" Smart TV...

It has a professional gymnasium, Basque pelota court and soon, a spa.

Mendizabal comprises four appartmets -Lurra (earth), Ura (water), Sua (fire) and Haizea (wind)- situated in a building on the edge of a village and overlooking Mount Txindoki. All the apartments have a bathroom, living room and kitchen, and one of them is adapted for guests with reduced mobility.
The Basque Boutique is an establishment in the heart of Bilbao's old quarter, just 150 metres from Santiago Cathedral. Every room has its own unique character and decor inspired by Basque culture.

A centrally-located, recently-refurbished establishment located 300 metres from the Victoria Eugenia theatre and the Kursaal conference centre, with pintxo bars and restaurants around it. It has single, double and family rooms, some of them with private bathroom. It has free Wi-Fi throughout, 24-hour reception, private car park and lift.

Since 2013, Pensión Grosen has offered modern, comfortable accommodation in San Sebastián, very close to the centre and the old quarter. From here you can discover the city’s main landmarks on foot, as well as the best neighbourhoods in which to try Basque cuisine. Pensión Grosen offers its guests spacious, well-lit rooms with all the comforts: heating, television, fully-equipped individual bathroom, safe, minibar, breakfast included and Wi-Fi. Close to the guest house there is a public car park in which you can reserve a place when you book your room.

The Izetaerdi farmhouse is located just 3 kilometres from the centre of Zarautz. With a garden stretching over more than 6,000 square metres, this completely refurbished rural guesthouse enables guests to enjoy views of the sea, Zarautz and Pagoeta Natural Park.

 

Breakfast is available and Wi-Fi is provided free of charge.

Lusarbe is made up of three apartments: Kukuarri, Mendizorrotz and Tontor-txiki. Surrounded by nature and looking out onto the sea, each of the apartments boasts a fully-equipped kitchen as well as a Wi-Fi internet connection.

galeria.titulo: The interior of one of the apartments

datosGenerales.descripcion: Iriarte is a farmhouse surrounded by nature and with views to the sea. Dedicated to producing ecological products, it is a 5-minute walk away from a bus stop. It has a car park, a dining hall (breakfast is served) and one of its bedrooms is equipped for people with disabilities.
A four-star hotel located in the municipality of Urnieta, 15 minutes’ drive from San Sebastián. The hotel has free wifi and parking for guests.

The Mutiloa guesthouse enjoys a privileged location boasting views of the Aizkorri Nature Reserve. One of its rooms is fully adapted for disabled access. The guesthouse also offers a communal room with a TV and reading corner, Wi-Fi connectivity and a spacious terrace.

Guesthouse in the village of Urnieta, just 12 km from San Sebastián. All the rooms face onto the street and have a WiFi connection. There is also a lounge with a computer and a small cooking area for use by guests.

Amazkar is a modern guesthouse with excellent connections to the A-8 motorway and a bus stop just 100 metres away. Among the services offered, all the rooms have free WiFi and a desk. The guesthouse also has a restaurant specialising in traditional Basque cooking and a bar.

Country house lodge situated in one of the most scenic parts of the Carranza Valley, surrounded by nature. All the rooms have a sun terrace, internet connection and multi-jet shower or jacuzzi bath, among other comforts.

 

There is also a restaurant service offering traditional cuisine and dishes made from the home-grown fruit and vegetables.

The Torre Zumeltzegi hotel is located in a completely refurbished 13th-century building. All of the bedrooms have preserved their medieval essence, although each of them has its own unique personality.

 

The lower floors stand out for their stone walls, while the higher floors boast a stunning original wood structure. On the very top floor, the glass perimeter offers guests the opportunity to enjoy spectacular views.

 

The hotel is surrounded by nature and its terrace looks out onto the Oñati Valley. Five minutes walking distance from the town square.

La Pikurutza consists of four rural apartments located in Bernedo's old town, just 15 kilometres from the Rioja Alavesa. The apartments are: Las Lúrdigas, La Fuente Segoviana, La Carrancha and Las Fontanillas. Each of them has been decorated with intricate attention to detail and they all boast their own lounge and kitchen.

El Lagar de Elciego is located in Elciego's old town, just a few minutes walking distance from the famous Marqués del Riscal winery. It boasts five apartments, each of which are equipped with air conditioning, free WiFi connection and a small lounge, in addition to other facilities. The company organises romantic weekends and guided visits to some of the Rioja Alavesa's main attractions.

Apartments located in the heart of Portugalete, alongside the metro and bus stops.

 

Each of the apartments boasts its own (fully-equipped) kitchen and lounge. They are perfect for long stays (minimum two weeks).

 

Please check rates with the owner.

Hotel located in Vitoria-Gasteiz's shopping and business district. It is located 300 metres from the train station, alongside some of Vitoria's most famous attractions, such as the Plaza de la Virgen Blanca and La Florida Park. All of the bedrooms, which boast a modern and functional design, come equipped with free WiFi connection and a desk. Some of the rooms also have a private balcony.

The Art7 apartments are located in the Amara district, on the first and second floors of one of San Sebastian's emblematic buildings, the former Astoria Cinema. It is a 15-minute walk from the La Concha beach and the Old Quarter, close to the bus station and surrounded by shops.

 

As for the decoration, which is modern and contemporary, it is inspired by cinema and traditional Basque style, with a modern touch. The accommodation facilities include five apartments, with different capacities and features.

Gaintza is the ideal place to enjoy nature and views to the sea. It is a small hotel surrounded by vineyards. One of the bedrooms is adapted for people with disabilities and the hotel itself offers information on hiking routes. In addition, Gaintza is a family-run winery that has been making txakoli for four generations.

This hotel in Mendexa is in a natural setting on the Bay of Biscay. On clear days the coastline is visible as far as Biarritz. The spacious, well-lit rooms in the Hotel Garazar are equipped with TV, private bathroom and terrace with sea view. The Hotel Garazar offers its guests a free WiFi connection, bar, open-air terrace and large gardens with swimming pool.

This country guest house is close to the Cantabrian mountains, in an excellent setting just two minutes from Villa de Laguardia, the wine capital of Rioja Alavesa. The house is rented as a whole and features one double bedroom, one twin bedroom, one single bedroom, bathroom, fully-equipped kitchen and a living/dining room with a fire place. It also has an attractive garden with views of the area around Laguardia.

Arkamo Atea is a country holiday home in which to spend your spare time or for group, association or business meetings. The owners believe in a future for the rural world linked to sustainable development, which means that Arkamo Atea is a quiet place to stay with plenty of room to move about and breathe in peace. Everything in the rooms is comfortable; sheets, blankets and towels are all made of natural cotton and wool fibres. All visitors looking for experiences connected with the countryside and nature are welcome, especially those who show an interest in observing the wildlife and landscape, choosing walking as the best way to approach them.

“Mirando a la Concha” have apartments in different parts of San Sebastián: some are located near La Concha beach and others in the Gros district or the city’s old town. The apartments are decorated in a modern, minimalist style and stand out for their excellent locations. All of them are fully-equipped and include a full bathroom, kitchen, heating, kitchen and tableware, bed linen, towels, plasma TV, etc. The apartments also feature free internet access (wifi).

The house is situated 2 kilometres from Elorrio, and in less than an hour from the coast in the provinces of both Bizkaia and Gipuzkoa.

 

As it situated in a central position you can arrive in 45 minutes to Bilbao and Vitoria-Gasteiz and 1 hour to San Sebastián. The house has 6 double bedrooms with bathrooms, TV, free cot and free WIFI internet access throughout. 50 metres away from the house there are a wooded area with public barbecues and tables, open ground and a chapel with excellent views of the Duranguesado hills and the village of Elorrio.

 

The area is ideal for mountaineering and climbing.

Gorosarri country guest house is a 15th-century farmstead refurbished in 2011 and conserving many of the features of the old building. Strategically located in the centre of the Basque Country, it is just a short drive from all 3 Basque provincial capitals: Vitoria-Gasteiz in 15 minutes, and San Sebastián and Bilbao in 45 minutes. The house has apartments with heating, kitchen, fully-equipped bathroom and TV. “Slow food” breakfasts and evening meals (made using organic garden produce) can be served to guests by prior arrangement. There are a host of possibilities for walks from the house including Monte Aitzorrotz (738m), one of the least-known gateways to the Aizkorri-Aratz nature park, discovering stretches of the former Basque-Navarrese railway line, visiting the Hiruerreketa area, including the source of the river Deba and more.

San Prudencio is a small country hotel situated outside Getaria and surrounded by vineyards. It offers fine views and is just 5 minutes from the centre of Getaria, 10 minutes from Zarautz, 30 from San Sebastián and only an hour from Bilbao and Vitoria. The hotel was fully refurbished in 2013 and has 10 rooms: eight doubles, one single and a suite with hydromassage bath and a terrace with sea views. Free wifi access is available.

The Arrobi Ostatua hotel is in Hernani, less than 20 minutes from San Sebastián, in an area with numerous cider houses and plenty of options for eating out. Its rooms, for 1, 2 or 3 people, have everything you need to feel at home. They are spacious, with their own bathrooms and windows looking out onto the surrounding natural setting, making waking up in them a truly pleasant experience. They are also fully adapted for people with disabilities. The Arrobi also has public areas where guests can relax and soak up the warmth of an open fire or play billiards.

Epotx-Etxea country guest house is a typical Basque rural building of recent construction . Situated between Zarautz and Getaria, it is in an excellent setting. With mountains around it but open to the sea, it has fine views of the area. The top floor of the house is divided into 2 separate, fully-equipped units, making it ideal for families who love nature and the seaside and are in search of peace and quiet. Since 2010 it has had a building adjoining the main house, with a fully-equipped holiday home for disabled people.

The hotel Okako is located in the Gros district of San Sebastián, right in the city centre, very close to the Zurriola beach, the Kursaal conference centre and the Old Town, where you can try some typical Basque pintxos in the bars. This cosy hotel, where art meets the avant-garde, has taken care of its decor down to the last detail. The rooms, each with a personality of its own, are decorated in a mixture of styles ranging from contemporary art to restored furniture, and all of them share one common feature: comfort. The public areas have free wifi access. Breakfast is always included in the price.

Garaizar country guest house is a restored traditional Basque farmstead. It is in an unspoilt natural setting at the foot of Monte Jata, and opened its doors to the public in 1991. It has 6 double rooms with views, a lounge/dining room with a fireplace for guests only, a spacious terrace, porch and garden. It also has a water mill of the same name and guided tours are run for visitors to find out about it. The house is well-connected, lying between Bilbao and the airport, and is just a short distance from Zamudio technology park. Staff at the house speak Spanish, Basque, German, English and French.

Urresillo is located in an unspoilt natural setting on the outskirts of the village of Meñaka. The house has apartments for 6, 4 or 2 people, all of them with fully-equipped kitchen and bathroom. This is a place in which to enjoy nature and the numerous attractions to be found nearby. Activities available within easy reach of the house include walking, mountain biking, surfing, diving, climbing and more. It is less than an hour from the Guggenheim museum in Bilbao, the chapel of San Juan de Gaztelugatxe, Urdaibai Biosphere reserve and the forest of Oma.

Biezko Baserria is an old farmstead dating back to the 16th century which has been fully refurbished. It is located in Atxondo, beneath the Anboto mountain and very close to the Urkiola nature park. Paragliding, rock climbing, mushrooming and walking are among the activities available in the surrounding area. It has 6 spacious double rooms, plus a large kitchen and a big living room with a fireplace, and is ideal for families. It offers the option of buying organic seasonal produce cultivated by the owners, who produce organic vegetables, fruit, eggs, honey and beer.

“Zuhaitz-etxeak" or tree houses offer nature lovers the chance to be in direct contact with nature and sleep in a different, intimate setting. The Sabizar farmstead in the municipality of Zeanuri, very close to the Gorbea nature park, has four tree houses on its land, as well as offering another original alternative place to stay in the form of caravans, the traditional means of transport of the Gypsies of Hungary. The tree houses have 30m2 of floor space each and sleep 2 or 4 people. All of them have a terrace and lighting, water, basin and heater. Breakfast is included in the price and can be taken in the tree house itself or out on the terrace. The Gypsy caravans for 2 and 4 people are located in the garden of the farmhouse and have electricity. The toilet and showers are in an adjoining building. Breakfast is included in the price.

The Barrika Surf Camp hostel is in Barrika, a small townperched beside the cliffsin a country setting that is idealfor surfing enthusiasts and nature lovers. The hostel is housed in the 16th-century farmhouse of Garramune, fully refurbished with shared roomsfor 6 and 20 people. It runs surfing courses for beginners, as well as a range of workshops and other activities, such as learning to make your own surf board, yoga classes and English courses. Barrika Surf Camp is within walking or cycling distance of 7 beaches where experienced surfers can put themselves to the testin truly demanding waves.

Moana Surf Hostel is located in the small locality of Urduliz, in a forested, green setting just a few minutes from Sopelana and Barrika beaches. As well as rooms and common areas for guests, this hostel has comprehensive sports and leisure facilities, especially for surfers and skaters as well as adventure sports enthusiasts. The Moana has a mini ramp for skating, a street circuit, an archery range, a heated swimming pool, a climbing wall, barbecue area, bar, cafeteria, open air cinema and more. A place to enjoy the seaside and the mountains, well-connected for visiting the area: Bilbao is just 30 minutes away by Metro.

Ganbara Hostel in Bilbao’s Old Town is fun, modern accommodation with rooms to sleep 4, 6 and 8 people, all of them mixed and with secure lockers.

 

In its common room the hostel offers free wifi access, cable TV and also a free multimedia library. While it is just 50 metres from a metro station, Ganbara Hostel’s central location makes it easy to enjoy the city’s numerous attractions, as it is within walking distance of the Guggenheim museum, La Alhóndiga arts centre and the Museum of Fine Art, as well as offering the option of simply losing yourself in the Old Town, known as Siete Calles.

Pil Pil Hostel is located in the centre of Bilbao, very close to the San Mamés football ground and just a few minutes’ walk from some of the city’s top tourist attractions, including the Euskalduna Jauregia exhibition centre and the Guggenheim museum.

 

It has private rooms for 2, 3 and 4 people and shared rooms for 6 or 12 people. All the rooms have wifi access and individual lockers. The common rooms offer free tea and coffee all day. Its spacious patio is a great place to relax.

 

Cycles can be hired at the hostel itself and it has a car park for both motorcycles and bicycles.

Bilbao Akelarre Youth Hostel is located in the Deusto neighbourhood of Bilbao, considered to be the city’s university district. It has mixed rooms for 2, 4, 6 and 12 people, all of them with certified bunks, bed linen, heating and secure lockers. The bathrooms are outside the rooms and are shared. Its location near the Paseo Abandoibarra places visitors just a short stroll fromthe city’s top attractions, including the Guggenheim museum, the Palacio Euskalduna and the Old Town. The price includes: - Breakfast - Bed linen - Internet, wifi - Coffee and tea.

The Urban house hostel is located in the Plaza Gipuzkoa, in the heart of San Sebastián’s Old Town and very close to La Concha and Zurriola beaches. It offers surf board and bicycle rentals and organises activities on a daily basis. It sleeps 30 people, divided into 7 rooms. Reception is open from 10.00am to 10..pm.

Donostia is the Surf City. Our city beaches make us a unique combination of waves and buzz, sea and good vibrations. Green Nest Hostel / Uba Aterpetxea opened in 2012, is located in this attractive setting and designed to accommodate surfers and those looking to take up this sport.

 

Our Surf camp offer includes hostel accommodation, surf tuition by the best surf schools, tuition gear and aids, advice from the hostel regarding sightseeing, and the most attractive activities in the city and discount admission to museums. Don't miss this opportunity to visit us during the week (4/5 nights) or at weekends (2 nights). For information on prices please consult website.

galeria.titulo: GREEN NEST HOSTEL / UBA ATERPETXEA: Photo Detail
GREEN NEST HOSTEL / UBA ATERPETXEA: Photo Detail

datosGenerales.descripcion:
The Arimune Hotel is located in a privileged position on the seafront promenade of Bakio.

 

Is a colonial-style house built in the early 20th century and recently refurbished, keeping the period Franco-Basque architectural features.  It is a colonial mansion built at the beginning of the 20th century and recently refurbished, maintaining the Basque-French architectural features of the period.

 

This beautiful rustic hotel, with a personal and friendly service, personally advises its guests on how to make the most of Bakio, its beaches and its surroundings.

 

And you must not miss San Juan de Gaztelugatxe, one of the landmarks of the Basque coastline.

The Bekale guest house is located right in the centre of Ea, a charming little seaside town in east of the comarca (county) of Busturialdea. Inside, the establishment is decorated in a nautical style and has a frontage typical of the architecture of the locality. It has 5 double rooms and one single, all with full bathroom and television. It also has free Wi-Fi internet access. The guest house is very close to the beach of Ea and less than 15 minutes’ drive from the beaches of Laga and Laida, both within the Urdaibai biosphere reserve.

Berbea country apartments, opened in 2014, are made up of 4 apartments to sleep 3 and 4 people plus a studio apartment for 3 people. Located in the Árcena mountains in Valdegobia, a fine natural setting. This range lies on the western boundary of Álava province, forming a succession of rocky crags rising up between the Valderejo nature park to the north and the Tobalina valley to the south. The nearness of the apartments to the Velderejo nature park makes them a perfect base for discovering this unique natural setting with its rich, varied flora and fauna.

Moon Hostel Bio is a modern, comfortable hostel located in Deusto, a neighbourhood in the centre of Bilbao. Its position places it just a short stroll from the city’s main attractions: the Guggenhaim Museum, the Euskalduna conference centre and the new San Mamés football stadium. Next to the hostel is the Deusto metro station. The rooms have a bathroom and free individual lockers. It has three shared areas, all of them with a free WiFi connection. Highlights include the Bio Garden, a small city plot in the centre of the hostel which is tended by the guests themselves, and the dining room with a range of free facilities. At Reception you can park and hire bicycles, and there is also a left luggage service.

This hostel is located right in San Sebastián’s old town, and is handy for the main tourist attractions as well as for eating out: la Concha beach, Boulevard, La Zurriola beach, the Kursaal conference centre, Victoria Eugenia theatre and more. All the rooms are air conditioned and the establishment has a common area with a free WI-FI connection.

This hostel is located right in San Sebastián’s old town, and is handy for the main tourist attractions as well as for eating out: la Concha beach, Boulevard, La Zurriola beach, the Kursaal conference centre, Victoria Eugenia theatre and more. All the rooms are air conditioned and the establishment has a common area with a free WI-FI connection.

The modern Loaldia guest house is in an ornate “neoplateresque” building with a spectacular frontage. Its location in the heart of San Sebastián is within walking distance of La Concha bay, the cathedral, the Kursaal and a host of bars and restaurants where you can savour the local cuisine. It is open 24 hours a day, all year round.

Zumargain country holiday accommodation is located in Elizmendi, in the upper part of the municipality of Asteasu, in a farmhouse renovated in 2014. Its location at the foot of Monte Ernio is ideal for nature lovers. Places to visit in the surrounding area include the town hall dating from 1760, the church of San Pedro and the chapels of Santa Cruz and Santa Marina. The house has garden areas and 6 double rooms to sleep up to 14 people.

Zenit San Sebastián is a modern 4-star hotel situated in the Amara district. This location allows guests to get around the city conveniently by bicycle or public transport. It has 78 rooms, all with natural light, some of them connecting for families and others, with special length beds ideal for sports people. They feature an XXL shower or bath. Its three function rooms are suitable for holding business events or celebrations. The hotel has a spacious terrace, its own parking and a restaurant.

The Igara campsite is located in a quiet, natural setting just 9 kilometres from the city centre and 6 kilometres from Ondarreta beach. Its 35,000 square metres of space include pitches for tents, caravans and motor caravans. It also has bungalows to sleep up to 6 people. It offers a wide range of facilities and services, highlights among which include a restaurant and a poolside bar specialising in cocktails, as well as a children’s play area, a padel court and a supermarket.

The Blue Bilbao Bed & Breakfast is located in the old part of the city, very close to the Cathedral and the Teatro Arriaga and surrounded by pintxo bars and restaurants. It has 8 double rooms and one single, all with heating, flat-screen TV and free WiFi connection. Some of the rooms have their own balcony.

The five rooms with private bathroom in this accommodation recall the film world: each of them is inspired by a director (Pedro Almodovar or Alex de la Iglesia, for example). Located in Bilbao’s Old Town, they are very close to some of the city’s top tourist attractions, such as the Arriage theatre and the cathedral. They are also surrounded by pintxo bars and restaurants. All the rooms have a smart TV with all the films by the director after whom it is named and a safe, among other amenities.

Located in the city centre, just 50 metres from the Guggenheim museum, it is within walking distance of many of the city’s tourist attractions. It is also very well connected by public transport: the Moyua metro station is just a short distance away, as are a bus stop and taxi rank. The rooms, with modern decor, have large beds (100x180cm singles and 150x200 doubles), bathroom with shower, 32” television and free tea, coffee and biscuits.

In a quiet, peaceful setting, the house is surrounded by woods that are home to a host of animals: squirrels, foxes, badgers, wild boar, raptors and night birds. This beautifully-decorated country guest house is close to one of the premier holiday areas of Bizkaia province. It offers a base for range of activities on both land and sea: hiking, horse riding, canoeing, surfing and more.

The car park is located in 6,000 square metres of green space, divided into 22 enclosed areas with 3 metre-high walls. It offers a full range of automated facilities and services, including showers, power points, sinks for washing, taps and drinking water points. It is open 24 hours a day, 365 days a year.

galeria.titulo: Lanestosa motor home and caravan park

datosGenerales.descripcion: These designer apartments to sleep 1 - 4 people are located beside the Bilbao estuary, in the heart of the Old Town. All of them have a free WiFi connection and an iPad at no extra charge, for browsing the Internet or contacting reception. The apartments are equipped with a practical, modern kitchen but also offer the option of having your shopping purchased and delivered to you. Breakfasts are served in the dining room or in the apartments themselves.

Located 25 kilometres from Bilbao, this farmhouse has a total of 20,000m2 (nearly 5 acres) of land beside the river Butrón.

 

It has 5 rooms to sleep up to 12 people, plus a fully-equipped kitchen, fireplace and area with sofas for watching TV. The veranda has a barbecue, woodstove and a large table to seat 16 people.

 

The property has a minifootball pitch, basketball hoop, swings and a small pool (available in summer only). The farmhouse also has a games room with pool / air hockey and ping pong table.

Urkulu Landetxea nestles in a natural setting at the foot of Kurtzebarri mountain, in a farmhouse dating from 1900. Each of its 6 bedrooms is completely different and original. It is ideal for family stays, enabling you to relax and enjoy the surroundings. The house has a 10x2-metre heated swimming pool 1.60 metres deep, a place to play football, a ping-pong table and a children’s play area. There is also a kennel service for dogs with four separate units.   From the house you can get to a cycle path that runs around the Urkulu reservoir or climb the Aloña Mendi hills or Etxaguen crags.

BBK Bilbao Good Hostel is located in the Bolueta neighbourhood of Bilbao, just 5 minutes by metro from the city centre. Its rooms are versatile enough to host lone travellers, families, groups or pilgrims. It has rooms with 2, 4, 6, 8 and 10 beds, all of the accessed with an electronic key, approved bunks, GB and EU power points, individual lights, individual security lockers, sheets and duvets included, heating and free WiFi throughout the hotel. It is a hostel designed without barriers to people with reduced mobility. It has 2 common rooms, an internet zone, a “coffee corner” and 3 open-air terraces.

Garaiko Landetxea is in the small locality of Garai, in a natural setting at the foot of Monte Oiz, with views of the Urkiola nature park. The house blends a traditional style, in the stone of which the building was originally constructed, with ground-breaking design. Both the dining room and the lounge are surrounded by glass windows, enabling you to be in direct contact with nature. As well as its 8 bedrooms, it has a room in which business meetings and celebrations of all kinds can be held. The area immediately around the house offers numerous possibilities for walks and cycle rides. From Garai you can get to the coast in less than twenty minutes and to the provincial capitals in less than an hour.

Just 10 minutes from Bilbao and the gateway to the Gorbeia nature park, in the Murueta locality of Orozko, is the hotel Osabarena, an old Basque farmhouse, refurbished and equipped with all the comforts: spacious rooms, heating with thermostat, full separate bathroom, meticulous decor, jacuzzi, Wi-Fi, etc.

 

This country hotel offers a pleasant atmosphere and a terrace on which to enjoy your visits.

 

Ideal for discovering the inland Basque Country, strolling through its mountains or savouring its fine food and drink.

Alza, a district outside San Sebastián, is the location of this fully refurbished farmhouse, available for rent as an apartment. Located in a privileged setting, it is ideal for relaxing and visiting the city and the surrounding area.

 

The farmhouse is equipped with all the comforts for you to enjoy a comfortable stay with your family or friends. It has 3 spacious, well-lit double rooms, a comfortable living room, outside terrace to enjoy the fresh air, kitchen, bathroom and outdoor area for barbecues.

 

All the rooms have heating and wooden floors.

Situated in San Sebastián just three hundred metres from Zurriola beach, Grosen apartments offer self-contained accommodation with all the comforts: spacious bedrooms plus living room, TV and fully equipped kitchen and bathroom. From here visitors can easily get to the most interesting parts of San Sebastián through which to stroll and enjoy the best pintxos in the city.

On the Basque coast, very close to Getaria and Zarautz and just 30 minutes away from San Sebastián, Jesuskoa apartments offer guests comfort, a health setting and complete peace and quiet, as well as the chance to enjoy the area’s food and drink.

 

The apartments consist of very comfortable room with double bed, heating and full bathroom, as well as spacious rooms in the house, a very pleasant outdoor terrace and attractive decor. Jesuskoa offers a 24h reception service and meals with local organic produce.

Situated in San Sebastian, on the banks of the river Urumea, next to one of the bridges, this hotel, opened in 2014, offers its guests a different viewpoint on the city, as its services include bicycle or dinghy and kayak hire, to take a trip along the river.

 

The hotel has carefully-decorated rooms with natural light, many of them with views of the river, separate showers, air conditioning and Wi-Fi. It also offers a car park belonging to the building.

Right in San Sebastián’s old town, the Pensión Iturriza is located in a quiet area, from which you can walk to some of the most attractive places in the city: the harbour, the beaches of La Concha or La Zurriola and more.

 

The hotel offers carefully-decorated, spacious rooms with fully-equipped bathroom, double beds, wooden floors, air conditioning and heating, television, Wi-Fi and ambient music in each room.

Located in one of the most attractive holiday areas on the coast, since June 2014 Galerna Zarautz Hostel has offered its guests economical, comfortable accommodation 500 metres from the beach and very close to the old part of the town (5'), and not far from San Sebastián (23' on public transport). The hostel offers shared rooms, with individual lockers and bed linen. It has a shared area for reading and as a lounge, a fully-equipped kitchen (including dishwasher and dishes), as well as free Wi-Fi. It also offers meals and drinks, excursions by van and bicycle hire.

This hostel, located just 5 minutes’ walk from La Zurriola beach and less than 10 minutes from the famous La Concha beach and the old quarter of San Sebastián, offers its guests modern, economical and comfortable accommodation. The hostel has shared rooms with individual lockers and bed linen. It has a shared area for reading and as a lounge, a fully-equipped kitchen (including dishwasher and dishes) for guests, as well as free Wi-Fi. It also offers bicycle hire and parking.

Casa Nicolasa is located in San Sebastián’s old town just 5 minutes from La Concha beach and very close to the areas with pintxo bars and restaurants. It is within walking distance of some of the most interesting parts of the city.

 

Its rooms, modern in style and lovingly decorated, include air conditioning, heating, wooden floors, minibar in rooms, private bathroom with bath or shower complete with amenities and double beds.

This old chapel and inn, refurbished in 2004 to convert it into country holiday accommodation, is in the municipality of Zumaia. The location offers views of the Cantabrian coast and the hills around Zumaia. Here you can walk the different footpaths linking the mountains to the sea by the beaches of Itzurun and Santiago or discover the municipalities of Zumaia, Deba and Mutriku or the unique flysch rock formations. Santa Klara offers spacious rooms decorated to a high standard, with heating, full individual bathroom, television and Wi-Fi.

Ibarrola Txiki, located in the upper part of the town of Usurbil, 5 km from San Sebastián, offers newly-built country holiday accommodation set among fields and surrounded by hills, very close to the Cantabrian sea.

 

For guests wishing to enjoy the finest country holidays in an incomparable natural setting with stunning views of a typical Basque landscape. Lovers of the mountains can enjoy paths and tracks around the valleys and hills in the surrounding area.

 

The house offers the option of renting rooms, an apartment or the whole house; all of them include individual bathrooms, wooden floors, heating, Wi-Fi

This fully-refurbished farmhouse converted into a country guesthouse is located near the municipality of Deba, on a spot with views of both the sea and the mountains of Andutz and Larrun. It is situated in a privileged setting, ideal for relaxing and enjoying the surroundings: the Geopark , the cove of Sakoneta, the cave of Ekain, the chapel of San Telmo and Zuluaga museum, all within a 10-kilometre radius. The house is fitted out with all the conveniences for you to enjoy a comfortable stay. Spacious, well-lit rooms with wooden floors, a comfortable living room, a large garden area around the house, a big kitchen and a fully-equipped bathroom.

In Añana’s salt valley lies Madera y Sal, a house available for rent by rooms or complete, with everything you need to spend a few days relaxing with friends or family.

 

The house, fully refurbished in a rustic style, has a fully-equipped kitchen and spacious, well-lit rooms with heating and wooden floors. The rooms, which can be rented separately, have full individual bathrooms.

 

Guests in the house also have at their disposal a large garden area in which they can have open-air barbecues.

If you have the spirit of a surfer and want to spend a few days in San Sebastián with your friends, Surfing Etxea offers you plenty of space to get together in, plus comfortable rooms where you can relax. Also on offer are a range of activities connected with surfing. Its city centre location makes it the ideal place to stay.

Autocaravaning Kobetamendi offers tourists travelling with a caravan or motor caravan a place to relax with every possible comfort, in a public space offering stunning views of the city. As it is next to the Bilbao hostel, visitors can also benefit from the amenities it has to offer.

The Beko Errota apartment complex is located near the municipalities of Zumarraga and Beasain, very close to the Aizkorri-Aratz nature park, with excellent connections by road to the Basque coast. It offers its guests accommodation which blends perfectly into the landscape of the area, with all the comforts. From here visitors can discover a range of footpaths they can use to savour the local gastronomy and some of the Basque Country’s most beautiful landscape.

Opened in 2013, Bilbao Central Hostel is on a very quiet street in the centre of the city. Its location is ideal for discovering many of Bilbao’s attractions on foot. It is just two minutes’ walk from Azkuna Zentroa (the Alhóndiga arts centre), the shopping areas, the Guggenheim museum, the Museum of Fine Art and the Old Town. To get to know the area around Bilbao including the Puente Colgante or aerial bridge (a UNESCO World Heritage Site) or Getxo… or go on excursions to other places of interest: Mundaka, San Juan de Gaztelugatxe and more. Close to the hostel there are several metro stations and bus stops, for both urban and out-of-town services.

Bilbao Aterpetxea is the largest hostel in Bilbao. With room for 170 people, it is a good accommodation option for groups and even for families and individuals visiting the city. All the rooms are spacious and have outside windows. They are laid out on 6 floors. Bilbao Aterpetxea Hostel organises activity programme for groups to meet their specific needs, and also provides information and bookings for the tours and experiences on offer in the city and its surrounding area.

Located in the historic part of Elciego, one of the most important municipalities in Rioja Alavesa, this accommodation is just 100 metres from the Marqués de Riscal winery, an architectural landmark created by Frank Gehry, who designed the Guggenheim Museum in Bilbao.

 

Its 4 rooms are named after musical instruments in homage to the previous function of the house, as a music school. Individual rooms (for 6 people), just the apartment for 6 people with a separate entrance, or both can be hired.

Pensión Balerdi is situated on the way into San Sebastián’s Old Town, placing it just a few minutes’ walk from the town’s main attractions including La Concha beach, the Kursaal conference centre and the best restaurants and pintxo bars. Refurbished in 2015, the guest house is housed in a building dating from 1846, built partly with stones from the old walls, which were demolished following the siege and fire suffered by San Sebastián in the year 1813. Just 50 metres away there is a public car park and the guest house is very handy for both urban and out-of-town transport links.

This accommodation is in a building over 200 years old, fully restored and located in the historic part of Salinillas de Buradón, in the comarca (county) of Rioja Alavesa.

 

This village, which conserves all the charm of a mediaeval town surrounded by vineyards and mountains, is part of the municipality of Labastida and is very well connected with the different places of interest in the area.

 

The house has 4 double rooms with a hydro-massage cubicle in the bathroom, a living/dining room, a fully-equipped kitchen, garden and wood stove.

 

Individual rooms or the whole house can be hired.

The Urikoa rural house is situated in the Arratia valley, surrounded by nature and really close to the Gorbeia and the Urkiola natural parks.

 

Its a 300 year old "caserio" which has been refurbished although it maintains its original structure and outer Stone Wall.

 

The area is good for hiking and it offers many mountains routes. It is 30 minutes away from Bilbao and 45 from the beaches of Bizkaia.

This hostel is in Lekeitio, one of the traditional seaside towns in Bizkaia province that preserve all the style and tradition of the Basque coastal villages on the Bay of Biscay.

 

Opened in 2015, it is a modern hostel with room for 20 people. It is within walking distance of the Isuntza and Karraspio beaches, as well as the mountains of Otoio and Lumentza that overlook Lekeitio.

Casa de los Arquillos is housed in a hundred year-old building right in the historic heart of Vitoria-Gasteiz, from which the top tourist attractions can be reached on foot: the cathedral of Santa María, the walls and the green ring that runs around the city, among others.

 

It has 8 studio apartments with 30-35 square metres of floor space each, made up of a living room, bedroom and fully-equipped kitchen. Cleaning of the apartments every 3 days is included.

galeria.titulo: La Casa de Los Arquillos Apartment

datosGenerales.descripcion: Hotel with 4 rooms with bathroom included and TV in all of them. It has a Wi-Fi zone, air conditioning and background music. The dining room seats up to 65 people and serves traditional Basque cooking. The municipality of Turtzioz is in the Las Encartaciones area of Bizkaia province, near the border with the Cantabria region in the valley of the river Agüera. This natural setting boasts a wealth of attractions, including the caves of Pozalagua, El Karpin park or the Armañón nature park, as well as walking and cycling routes.

The house is in the Garagaltza district of the municipality of Oñati in Gipuzkoa province, right in the heart of the Basque Country, 73 kilometres from San Sebastián, 64 from Bilbao and 52 from Vitoria-Gasteiz. Oñati boasts the sanctuary church of Arantzazu, a spectacular place both for its heritage value and because it is perched over crags and gullies. It was also home to the first university in the Basque Country, founded in 1540: the University of the Holy Spirit, housed in an outstanding Renaissance building. Arregi 2 has 4 rooms, which can be hired individually or as part of the whole house, plus a fully-equipped kitchen, living room and a large terrace with views of Monte Aloña. Possible activities in the area include walking and mountain biking.

El Castillo country holiday accommodation is located in the comarca (county) of Montaña Alavesa, just 5 km from the Añana Salt Valley, one of Europe's most spectacular, well-preserved “cultural landscapes”. Half an hour from Rioja Alavesa, this idyllic place offers you the chance to discover vineyards, ultra-modern buildings and charming villages. This historic house also features a spacious living/dining room, a fully-equipped kitchen and a private garden covering about 1500 square metres, all fitted out for you to enjoy a pleasant stay in a natural setting.

This accommodation is located in Gaztelu, in the comarca (county) of Tolosaldea. Mikelenea offers country holiday accommodation in a carefully-decorated traditional building dating from the 19th century. As well as the bedrooms, it has a living room with a fireplace. It is surrounded by pastures and hills, so it offers plenty of opportunities for walking and hiking. Carefully-chosen furniture and a pleasant décor, living room, fireplace and six double rooms with three shared bathrooms. Attractive walks.

Kutxatxuri offers modern, well-lit country holiday accommodation situated in the small locality of Arakaldo, in Bizkaia province. Despite its nearness to the built-up area of Bilbao, the house is in a natural setting and there are several footpaths nearby. The house has a sauna and jacuzzi as well as a Wi-Fi connection and private parking, both free. The house can be booked as a whole or by rooms. It is very well connected thanks to the AP-68 motorway and Arakaldo also has a local train station and two bus stops.

The Ocean guest house is situated in the Zaramaga neighbourhood, north of the "Mediaeval Almond", the old quarter of Vitoria-Gasteiz, from which it is about ten minutes' walk.

 

It has green spaces around it, especially around the Plaza de Llodio.

Centrally-located accommodation on the same street at the Artium museum, which houses one of the top collections of contemporary Basque and Spanish art. The main landmarks of the city can be visited nearby, including the Plaza de la Virgen Blanca, the Parque de la Florida and the old town.

This guest house is in the centre of Amurrio, next to a park and 5 minutes’ walk from the railway station and the shopping and restaurant area. It has comfortable, traditionally-decorated rooms with balcony, central heating and private bathroom. It is halfway between Bilbao (30 km) and Vitoria-Gasteiz (40 km), and very close to the Gorbeia nature park.
Accommodation with 8 double rooms located close to the town’s mediaeval quarter, just a short walk from the top tourist attractions.

Situated in the locality of Vírgala Mayor, 30 minutes from Vitoria-Gasteiz, this establishment is an excellent base from which to discover the Izki nature park, one of the most unspoilt natural areas in the Basque Country, ideal for rambling and hiking. The establishment has 8 rooms and offers a restaurant service.

Right in the heart of Vitoria-Gasteiz, very close to the Plaza de la Virgen Blanca, this establishment is housed in a recently-refurbished building within easy walking distance of the main tourist attractions, including shopping areas and nightlife, as well as the city’s main bars and restaurants. There are a bus stop and several public car parks within a few metres. The rooms have fully-equipped bathrooms, televisions and Wi-Fi.

This guest house is located on the Alava plain, at the foot of Monte Baio in San Román de San Millán. It is in a predominantly rural municipality belonging to the Salvatierra area, made up of 15 small villages. Nearby is the dolmen of Eguilaz, one of the best-preserved prehistoric sites in the Basque Country. As well as offering accommodation, El Ventorro has a restaurant specialising in local produce.

This is located in the city centre, very close to the railway station. All the rooms have Wi-Fi, TV and private bathroom, as well as a coffee-making kit. There is the option of cycle hire and an iron and board can be provided. It offers a left luggage service and tourist information.

Very centrally-located guest house in a quiet part of Irun, a stone’s throw from the railway station. The establishment has rooms with natural light, equipped with bathroom and television, as well as a free Wi-Fi zone. It has a private car park for guests. The border town of Irun is just a few minutes’ drive from the airport and Hondarribia beach.

This is simple but comfortable accommodation with a family atmosphere located in the historic centre of the locality of Bergara and just a few metres’ walk from its main places of interest. It has 6 double rooms and 14 singles.

This establishment is housed in a refurbished historic building situated in the centre of the locality of Tolosa, the former capital of Gipuzkoa province whose architecture bears witness to its past importance. Tolosa is right in the heart of Gipuzkoa, about 15 minutes’ drive from the sea. It is an excellent base for travelling about and discovering other parts of the Basque Country.

 

All the rooms are equipped with free Wi-Fi, heating and television. There are rooms with their own bathroom and others with shared bathrooms. The establishment has parking very nearby and 24-hour reception.
Located in the border town of Irun, it is just a few minutes’ drive from the airport and the beach at Hondarribia. All the rooms have TV and a free Wi-Fi connection. There is a concierge service.
Guest house situated in Lizartza, with room for 29 people in 9 double rooms and 11 singles. This small locality, in a natural setting, is 8 kilometres from Tolosa.

Accommodation situated in the centre of Hernani, with 5 double rooms and 1 single. Just 10 km from San Sebastián, it is an option for pilgrims passing through on their way along the inland St. James’ Way.
Accommodation situated in the Bergara industrial area, less than an hour from all three Basque provincial capitals. As well as accommodation, it has a restaurant specialising in traditional cooking.

It is in a natural setting in the rural part of the municipality and has outstanding views of the mountains and the sea. All the rooms have a veranda, TV, heating, Wi-Fi connection and fridge. A shared kitchen is also available, where breakfast and lunch can be prepared. Free parking. This accommodation is an option for pilgrims on the coastal route of St. James’ Way.

Guest house situated in the historic town centre of Tolosa, in the heart of Gipuzkoa province, about 15 minutes’ drive from the sea. Tolosa, capital of the comarca (county) of Tolosaldea, is a municipality with a host of cultural, shopping and gastronomic options and an ideal base from which to discover the inland Basque Country. The accommodation has 4 double rooms.

This modern guest house is right in the old part of San Sebastián, handy for the bar, restaurant and pintxo district and a few minutes’ walk from La Concha and La Zurriola beaches.

 

From here you can visit the town’s main tourist attractions on foot. The establishment has fully-equipped rooms with natural light and a full private bathroom

Situated in the romantic part of the city just behind the cathedral of the Good Shepherd, this location is within easy reach of the shopping, food and sight-seeing areas, as well as the beaches. The rooms have flat-screen TV, wardrobe and access to a shared bathroom with a hair dryer and toiletries. Most of the rooms have under-floor heating and a balcony. The establishment has a lift and a free Wi-Fi connection.

Housed in a building with over 100 years of history, the San Martín guest house is located in the centre of San Sebastián, beside the cathedral of the Good Shepherd, 5 minutes’ walk from La Concha beach and 10 from the old town with its pintxo bar area. It has single and double rooms, all with fully-equipped private bathroom, television and heating. Very close to the guest house there is a public car park that offers special rates for guests.

This is situated 450 metres from La Concha beach and 100 metres from the cathedral. Around it there are large numbers of shops, bars and restaurants. The railway station is 5 minutes’ walk away. The rooms in the Lo Egin guest house have heating and shared bathrooms with a shower. It offers a Wi-Fi connection and tea and coffee from 9am to 10pm.

Its location in the city centre, beside La Concha beach, allows guests to enjoy the old town and is within easy walk of the main tourist attractions, such as the harbour or the Kursaal conference centre. Check in is from 9am to 11pm.

This establishment is situated in the Old Town, 5 minutes’ walk from La Concha beach and 150 metres from the church of San Vicente, right in the traditional tapas and restaurant area. It offers rooms with balconies and free Wi-Fi connection. The rooms in the San Jerónimo guest house are well-lit and have heating, cable TV, wash basin and a shared bath room with hairdryer. The RENFE railway station is 15 minutes away, while the bus station is a 20-minute walk.

The Amaiur guest house is situated in the heart of San Sebastián’s Old Town. It is located within reach of the main places of interest in San Sebastián: the harbour, the beaches and in particular the most famous area of pintxo bars and restaurants in the city. Some of its rooms have balconies and private bathrooms, and all of them have flat-screen satellite television and heating. It is open 24 hours a day and has free Wi-Fi in the rooms and public areas.

Accommodation situated very close to San Sebastián’s old quarter, just 200 metres from La Concha beach. It is surrounded by the city’s pintxo bars and traditional restaurants and is very close to the shopping area. All its spacious rooms have plenty of natural light, and some have their own bathrooms.

Situated in the old town, a well-known area of pintxo bars and restaurants, it is very close to La Concha beach and the Kursaal conference centre. It has double rooms with the option of a camp bed, shared bathrooms and also a lounge. The rooms have heating, television and Wi-Fi. Check-in closes at 7pm.

This accommodation is in the centre of San Sebastián’s old town, within walking distance of the main areas of tourist and leisure interest, the beaches, the Kursaal conference centre, the harbour, the Aquarium and so on. High-speed internet access is available and there is a left-luggage service. It is open 24 hours.

The Loinaz guest house is in the city’s Old Town, With its innumerable bars and restaurants this is one of San Sebastián’s top areas for eating out. The Old Town is also within walking distance of the different tourist attractions: the three beaches, the harbour, monuments, the whole of the so-called romantic area… The rooms have heating, flat-screen TV and Wi-Fi. Bathrooms are shared. The Loinaz guest house is recommended by different travel guides.
Accommodation situated in the Santa Lucia-Anduaga neighbourhood, in the municipality of Ezkio-Itsaso. It has 18 single rooms.

Situated in the Amara neighbourhood, close to the Anoeta stadium and very well connected with the city centre and its old quarter. It has rooms with double and single beds plus the option of camp beds.

El puerto guest house is situated in the heart of San Sebastián’s Old Town.

It is located within reach of the main places of interest in San Sebastián: the harbour, the beaches and in particular the most famous area of pintxo bars and restaurants in the city.

This is located right on the harbour of Mutriku, in the building of the old fishermen’s association. All the rooms have a bathroom and heating. The lounge has a TV. The building houses the Bentalekue museum in the former fish auction room, with period objects. It also has a restaurant where the speciality is the fish dish of the day.

Pensión Buenpas is beside the  Buen Pastor Cathedral, in a romantic area of the city just 300 metres from La Concha beach. It has rooms with air conditioning free Wi-Fi connection, flat-screen TV and views outside.

They have either a private bathroom or access to a shared one. Bed linen and towels are included. A 10-minute stroll takes guests to the old quarter of the city, where they can find shops, restaurants and traditional pintxo bars.
Accommodation situated in a quiet part of the town, in the Loiola neighbourhood, very near the railway station. It sleeps 6 people in three double rooms.

The Aries guest house is in the old quarter of the city, beside the harbour. Its location is within easy walking distance of San Sebastián’s tourist attractions. All the rooms have natural light and a Wi-Fi connection. Reception is open 24 hours a day.

Located in the historic centre of San Sebastián, beside the Plaza de la Constitución, right in the area of pintxo bars and restaurants, 2 minutes’ walk from the waterfront and La Concha beach.

 

The guest house, with a tasteful, modern décor, has double rooms and shared rooms ideal for groups. Some have a private bathroom and others a shared one. It offers a left luggage service and can arrange bicycle hire.
This three-room guest house is right on the harbour in San Sebastián, placing it a short walk from the city’s main attractions.

This is located on a pedestrian street in the San Sebastián’s historic Old Town, 5 minutes’ walk from La Concha beach, 3 from the Kursaal conference centre and 5 from La Zurriola beach. The San Telmo museum is 300 metres away. The establishment offers rooms with shared bathrooms. Some of them have flat-screen TV and a balcony overlooking the street. Towels and bed linen are included. It has a free Wi-Fi connection, left luggage service and 24-hour reception.

The Anne guest house is located in the historic centre of San Sebastián, within easy walking distance of the pintxo, restaurant and bar area in the old quarter. La Concha beach is 3 minutes’ walk away and La Zurriola, one of the most popular with surfers, is not much further. The establishment offers a free Wi-Fi connection and TV in rooms. Breakfast with sweet and savoury items is served every day in the restaurant opposite the guest house.

Right in the heart of San Sebastián, this establishment is housed in a building over 150 years old, built of wood with exposed beams, brick and stone. It is a family business run by people who were actually born in the same building.

 

Situated amid the pintxo bars and just a few minutes’ walk from the beaches of La Zurriola and La Concha, it has single and also double rooms. They all have an Internet connection, telephone, TV and heating and towels are provided. It is an excellent base from which to discover and experience the city without using your car.

Situated in the heart of San Sebastián, right in the Old Town with its typical bars and restaurants, where pintxos are among the star dishes. Two minutes’ walk from La Concha beach, the harbour and the Aquarium, the location is an ideal base from which to explore the city without any need for a car.

This is situated in the Old Town of San Sebastián, close to the harbour, the Aquarium, the Kursaal conference centre and the Victoria Eugenia theatre. It has single and double rooms with fully-equipped bathrooms and hairdryers included. All of them have television and radio, Wi-Fi connection and a small fridge.

The Ira guesthouse is located in the old quarter of San Sebastián, famed for the food and drink on offer in its restaurants and bars. It offers simple rooms with shared bathroom and a free Wi-Fi connection.

The Santa Clara guest house is located in the Old Town, just a few minutes walk from the San Telmo museum and La Concha beach and bay. All rooms have private bathrooms and fridges, heating and TV. Free Wi-Fi zone.

Situated in the centre of the city’s old quarter, it is surrounded by San Sebastián’s traditional pintxo bars and restaurants. The shopping area is just a few minutes’ walk away, as are La Concha and La Zurriola beaches.

This is located in the centre of San Sebastián, beside the Plaza de Gipuzkoa, right in the most romantic part of the city and 300 metres from La Concha beach. The rooms have free Wi-Fi, heating, TV and balcony. Most of them have a private bathroom. There is a public car park nearby.

The Atxiki guest house is situated at the foot of Monte Ulía, less than 100 metres from La Zurriola beach, a surfing hotspot. It has rooms with flat-screen TV, private bathroom and free Wi-Fi connection as well as a desk and a hairdryer in the bathroom.

120 metres from La Concha beach and about 10 minutes’ walk from La Zurriola beach, this establishment is right in the Old Town, the area with the traditional pintxo bars and restaurants. The rooms have heating, flat-screen TV and a free Wi-Fi connection. The bathrooms are shared and are equipped with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

Just 50 metres from La Concha beach and the Alderdi Eder gardens, it has rooms with heating, private bathroom and free Wi-Fi connection. Located in the city’s top shopping area, it is a short walk from the harbour and the old quarter, which is well-known for the wide range of pintxos on offer there.

This guest house is in the Gros neighbourhood, 5 minutes’ walk from La Zurriola beach and the Kursaal conference centre. The rooms have air conditioning, heating, soundproof walls, desk and flat-screen TV. Some of them have balconies. There is a Wi-Fi network covering the whole establishment. Discounts are available on a nearby public car park.

The Salesian guesthouse of Pake-leku is in Urnieta, a locality just 12 kilometres from San Sebastián and very well connected by road, bus and train.

It is open to groups of all kinds but is particularly intended for religious communities. It has gardens and areas for relaxing.

Breakfasts, lunches and dinners can be provided by arrangement. It has an Internet connection.

Pensión C7 is 150 metres from the Palacio de Congresos Kursaal and La Zurriola beach. It is about 10 minutes from the old quarter of the city, where the best-known and most popular pintxo bars and restaurants are to be found. The rooms, all with a different décor, are designed to offer guests maximum comfort. They have heating, minibar and safe. The bathrooms have free amenities and a hairdryer.

Pensión Narrika is on the street of the same name in the old quarter of the city and just a stone’s throw from La Concha beach. The rustic-style rooms with stone walls and wooden beams have heating, Wi-Fi connection, flat-screen TV, safe, writing desk and wardrobe. All of them have natural light and a private bathroom with shower and hairdryer. Reception is open 24 hours a day and offers a left luggage service.

Situated on the landmark Calle 31 de Agosto right in the city’s Old Quarter, well-known as one of the top places for eating out. Its central location places it within a short walk of San Sebastian’s main attractions. All the rooms have heating, fan, flat-screen TV and private bathroom. There is free Wi-Fi. There are public car parks nearby.

This is an apartment located in the centre of Zarautz, 250 metres from the beach. It has heating, a living room with sofa and flat-screen TV, a small dining area with a microwave, fridge and coffee machine, washing machine and bathroom with shower and hairdryer. It is 4 minutes’ walk from the area of bars, restaurants and supermarkets and 1.2 km from the golf club. It is also within easy reach of the nearby surfing school. Free Wi-Fi connection.

Right on the Plaza de la Constitución, in the heart of the city’s old town where the famous “Tamborrada” is held every year on 19th January. It has double and triple rooms as well as other shared one for groups. All of them have central heating and TV. There is a bathroom for every two rooms and there is the option of a private bathroom.

An establishment right beside the beach in the seaside locality of Zarautz, internationally famed in the surfing world for the quality of its waves. It has rooms with sea views and a veranda and a lounge perfect for relaxing in a cosy, intimate atmosphere.

This guest house is located in Elgoibar, a municipality less than 50 kilometres from the Basque provincial capitals and known for manufacturing machine tools.

 

All the rooms have flat-screen satellite television, as well as a private bathroom. Free Wi-Fi and a dry cleaning service are offered. The establishment also has a restaurant. Pets welcome.

This establishment, with an outside terrace and garden, is 5 km from Zarautz, one of the Basque Country’s top holiday destinations. Bilbao is 1 hour away on the motorway and it is just 24 km from San Sebastián. There are footpaths to discover the surrounding area on foot. All rooms are equipped with TV, wardrobe, desk and private bathroom with hairdryer and bathroom amenities. The establishment offers a laundry service

This guesthouse is in the municipality of Urnieta, just 10 kilometres from San Sebastián. It is well connected, with a bus stop right in front and the railway station just 300 metres away. The rooms have flat-screen TV and shared bathroom. Some of them have a lounge area and some have views of the mountains. The establishment has 24-hour reception and free parking for motorcycles.

The Andoain guesthouse takes its name from the municipality where it is located, 11 kilometres from San Sebastián. It is one of the most important towns in Gipuzkoa province, standing out for its cutting-edge industry that rubs shoulders with the green landscape typical of the Basque Country. Around the guesthouse there are several cafés and restaurants. All the rooms have TV and private bathroom with bath or shower, as well as Wi-Fi and TV.

This is situated in the quiet neighbourhood of Amara, 20 minutes’ walk from the beach and very close to the football stadium and the bullring. The establishment has a garden, solarium and free car park and offers the possibility of playing table tennis. Its rooms have natural light, bathroom and satellite TV. Open 24 hours.
Accommodation situated in the municipality of Aia, close to the Pagoeta nature park, which has marked footpaths, guided tours of the Agorregi ironworks and more.

The Pensión Don Claudio is next to the railway station in Bilbao, 2 km from the BEC (Bilbao Exhibition Centre) and 4 km from the city centre.

 

Its modern, spacious rooms have heating, free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV and a private or shared bathroom.

 

The establishment has a lift and left-luggage service.

Located in the centre of Santurtzi, very close to leisure and other facilities (metro, bus , shops and so on). This municipality, situated on the left bank of the Nervión estuary, is just 20 minutes from Bilbao by main road and very well connected by public transport. It has rooms with bathroom, cable television, heating and free Wi-Fi Internet connection.

A fully-refurbished guesthouse with rooms including private bathroom or with shared bathroom. It has a laundry and ironing service. Located in the centre of Santurtzi, very close to the harbour and the municipality’s bar and restaurant district. Very well connected by metro, bus and train, the centre of Bilbao is less than 30 minutes away by public transport. The establishment is within walking distance of the Bizkaia bridge, listed as a World Heritage Site.

Located in the coastal locality of Santurtzi, on the left bank of the Nervión estuary, 11 km from Bilbao and 15 minutes from the beaches. The rooms in the establishment are equipped with TV and reception is open 24 hours a day.

Txikote is located in Zalla, in the Las Encartaciones area. This town preserves valuable historic heritage, highlights of which include the baroque palace of the Murga family and the chapel of San Pedro de Zarikete This accommodation is an option for pilgrims on the coastal route of St James’ Way.

Right in the centre of Bilbao, very close to the Gran Vía, beside the Old Town and 10 minutes’ walk from the Guggenheim museum, this accommodation is an ideal base for visiting the city and its surrounding area without any need for a car.
