The establishment offers friendly personal service. Its rooms have flat-screen TV and access to a shared bathroom. Guests are offered tourist information, a tea corner and a library.

 

There is a free Wi-Fi connection throughout the establishment.

The Martínez guest house is situated in city-centre neighbourhood of Abando, in an ideal spot for anybody wanting to stay in the heart of the city. Its location is within walking distance of some of the top tourist attractions such as the old quarter, the Guggenheim museum and the fine art museum. The rooms are spacious and have plenty of natural light, with views of the Ría and the Arriaga theatre, and have heating, cable television and Wi-Fi.

Emilio is accommodation situated in Bilbao’s famous old quarter, next to the area of shops, bars and restaurants. It is within walking distance of many of the city’s tourist attractions, including the Arriaga theatre, La Ribera market and others. It is also very well-connected by public transport: Casco Viejo metro station is just a stone’s throw away, as is a bus stop and taxi rank.

Juego de Bolos is a fully-refurbished hotel with modern décor.

 

All the rooms have a fully-equipped bathroom, television and hairdryer. A cot and camp bed are available.

 

Located in the centre of Durango, this municipality is very near the Urkiola nature park, where visitors can go for pleasant walks or climb to the top of its mountains.

Next to the Hospital de Cruces, this establishment is 10 minutes’ walk from BEC, the Bilbao Exhibition Centre, where trade fairs, concerts and other events are held. The rooms, double and single, have television, heating and handbasin. Free Wi-Fi.

The Mardones guest house is situated in the heart of Bilbao’s old quarter, an area of interest to tourists, shoppers and lovers of fine food. Its location close to the railway, metro and bus stations makes it easy to get to other parts of Bilbao and its surrounding area. It has single and double rooms with private or shared bathrooms, with hairdryer, towels and bed linen. Pets are welcome.
This accommodation is located very close to the old quarter, handy for the area of shops, bars and restaurants and near the city’s top tourist attractions. It has room for 12 people in single rooms.

The Avenida Euskadi guesthouse is within walking distance of the Bilbao Exhibition Centre, recognised as the most modern in Europe. This accommodation, situated in the centre of Barakaldo, is just 15 minutes from Bilbao and 15 from the airport. The guesthouse has spacious, fully-equipped rooms with a shared bathroom.

This establishment is located in the Bakiola industrial estate, and as well as accommodation it has a bar and a restaurant specialising in traditional Basque cooking. It has double and single rooms, all of them with natural light and bathroom.

This fully-refurbished establishment has rooms with their own bathroom and television. There is a public car park very nearby. It is in the centre of Galdakao, within walking distance of its main tourist attractions: the church of Santa María, the Isasi Goikoa tower and the Gallo monument, among others.

This accommodation, with room for 8 people, is situated in Bedia. Nearby you can discover the Mandoya and Matiloarre mountains or the river Ibaizabal, which runs through the municipality. The municipality has a wide range of historic and cultural heritage and has been able to preserve the traditions of the Basque countryside.

The Pensión Buena Vista is the ideal accommodation for pilgrims on St. James’ Way who pass through Portugalete. Those arriving by bicycle can store them at no extra cost. The establishment has a lounge / dining room in which guests can prepare their own meals. The rooms, some with their own bathroom and others sharing bathrooms, have heating, television, and free Wi-Fi. Portugalete is very well connected with Bilbao by public transport (metro, train and bus), and is just 5 minutes’ drive from the Bilbao Exhibition Centre and 10 minutes from the beaches.

The accommodation is in a central location in Bilbao, 5 minutes’ walk from Ametzola railway station and 20 minutes from the old quarter and the Guggenheim museum.

The rooms, with shared bathrooms, have heating and flat-screen televisions. The establishment offers a left luggage service and can provide tourist information about the area, as well as having 24-hour reception.

The Manoli guest house is situated in Bilbao’s old quarter, one of the most interesting parts of the city for visitors and particularly handy for its top museums. From here it is very easy to get to the area with pintxo bars and restaurants. All rooms have flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi connection, and some have balconies. Bathrooms are shared and bed linen and towels are included.

The Albino guest house is in the Santutxu district, five minutes’ walk from the Basílica de Begoña, the church dedicated to the patron saint of Bizkaia province that overlooks Bilbao from a hill. It has both single and double rooms.

The accommodation is situated right in the old quarter, close to the area with shops, bars and restaurants and handy for the city’s top tourist attractions. It is very well-connected by public transport, with a metro station a stone’s throw away, as well as a bus stop and taxi rank.

Housed in a traditional building in the old part of Bilbao, it is within walking distance of the city’s top tourist attractions: the Guggenheim museum, the Arriaga theatre, the Cathedral of Santiago and the pintxo bars. It has spacious, comfortable rooms with balconies, equipped with television and free Wi-Fi. There is a public car park very near the establishment.

In Bilbao’s old quarter, the Casual Fuentes guest house is located five minutes from the railway station and from the Abando metro station, in a historic building.

It is within walking distance of the city’s main tourist attractions, including the Arriaga theatre, the Guggenheim museum and the cathedral of Santiago, all of which are within 15 minutes’ walk. The rooms in the establishment have heating, television and, in some cases, a private bathroom.

This is in the historic town of Gernika, gateway to the Urdaibai Biosphere Reserve. It is a town steeped in history, with outstanding architectural heritage. The Casa de Juntas and the Tree of Gernika are a must. Its weekly market is considered one of the most important in Bizkaia province.

This accommodation is in a central location in Bilbao, a 5-minute walk from Abando railway station and 15 minutes from the old town and the Guggenheim Museum. It has room for 10 people in single rooms.

Very close to Bilbao’s bullring, after which it is named.

 

The rooms in this guest house have a washbasin, access to a shared bathroom, flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi connection. The guest house has 24-hour reception and a shared room with a TV. This establishment is open all year round.

The Belmar guest house is situated in Portugalete, a town that stands out for its history and for the elegant buildings in its old quarter. Located in the old quarter near the Bizkaia bridge a World Heritage Site. Across the Ría is Getxo with its beaches. The rooms are simple but comfortable. The guest house has a breakfast room. It has a Wi-Fi connection and 24-hour reception.
The accommodation is in a central location in Bilbao, 5 minutes’ walk from Ametzola railway station and 20 minutes from the old quarter and the Guggenheim museum.

The Pensión Areeta is right in the centre of Las Arenas, in Getxo. It is within walking distance of Ereaga beach, the Old port and the Bizkaia bridge, among other places of interest to visitors. It is also very well connected with Bilbao by public transport. It has single and double rooms with large beds, all with a fully-equipped bathroom.

Situated in a quiet area very close to the sea, between the fishing ports of Lekeitio and Ondarroa and next to the campsite of the same name. It is within cycling or even walking distance of the beaches of Isuntza and Karraspio. As well as rooms it has a supermarket, children’s play area and terrace and parking.

Located in the small municipality of Errigoiti, in the Urdaibai biosphere reserve, this country establishment is in an old house built of stone and wood in the 17th century. The house has a garden, vegetable plot, heating, washing machine, microwave, jacuzzi, fireplace and a living room with a TV. It serves breakfast and dinner. It offers Internet access and a laundry service

Accommodation located in the fishing locality of Ondarroa, beside the mouth of the river Artibai. It is situated at the western end of the coast of Bizkaia, on a section marked by steep cliffs. Nearby is the beach of Arrigorri, which in turn is within walking distance of Saturraran beach, which belongs to Mutriku.

This establishment is in a house with a garden just a few metres from the historic centre of Orduña, listed as a historic-monumental site. Nearby the impressive gorge where the river Nervión is born can be visited. The guesthouse has its own car park.

A hotel located in the centre of Sestao, 10 minutes from Bilbao and 15 from the coast. This establishment is very well connected by public transport (bus, metro and train). The rooms, all of them on one floor, have televisions. Reception is open from 10am to 8pm.

This hotel is close to Bilbao, 10 minutes’ drive from the city’s main attractions. The rooms in this establishment have air conditioning, flat-screen TV, a living room area with a desk and a private bathroom with shower. A free Wi-Fi connection is available throughout the premises and pets are welcome.

This is a typical town house right in the historic old town of Orduña, fully refurbished with artistic decoration by the painter Porrilló. It has rooms with their own bathroom, as well as a fully-equipped kitchen and a lounge/dining room. Located at the foot of the Sierra Salvada, Orduña has an outstanding old town listed as a historic monumental site. Nearby you can visit the impressive canyon where the river Nervión is born.

Located in the centre of Las Arenas, the part of Getxo where the shops are, on the right bank of the Ría and connected to Portugalete by the Bizkaia bridge, listed by UNESCO as a World Heritage Site.

The Port of Bilbao cruise terminal is in this municipality.

The guesthouse has rooms with bathroom and TV.

This accommodation is situated in the Carranza valley, in a beautiful natural setting in the heart of Las Encartaciones. A host of tourist attractions can be visited in the surrounding area: the caves of Pozalagua, Karpin Abentura park or the Armañón nature park, as well as walking and cycling routes. It offers a laundry service, fridge, microwave, lounge with television and Wi-Fi.

Hotel in the coastal locality of Santurtzi, 10 minutes from Bilbao and 15 minutes from the beaches.

 

The hotel is within walking distance of the Bizkaia bridge, listed as a World Heritage Site.

 

It has spacious double and triple rooms, all of them with free Wi-Fi, television, heating and a fully-equipped private bathroom.

The Ibis Budget Barakaldo is located very near to BEC (Bilbao Exhibition Centre), 5 minutes from Bilbao and 15 minutes from the airport.

 

Its modern, comfortable rooms have air conditioning and a private bathroom with a shower. The hotel has a shared lounge with vending machines and computers with internet access.

 

It also has a free private car park for guests. It offers a buffet-type breakfast service.

The Pensión Bide-Ondo is located in the countryside near Amorebieta, 10 km from the Urkiola nature park. Its rooms, with views of the mountains, have free Wi-Fi and flat-screen television. Some of them have a private bathroom. As well as offering accommodation, it has a restaurant specialising in regional cuisine

This accommodation, located in the centre of Barakaldo, is just 5 minutes from Bilbao and 15 from the airport. BEC (Bilbao Exhibition Centre) and the Mega Park and Max Centre shopping centres are very nearby.

 

It has 6 double rooms and 3 singles.

Hotel with 4 rooms, with bathroom and TV in all of them. It has a Wi-Fi zone, air conditioning and background music. The dining room seats 65 people and serves traditional Basque cooking.

 

The municipality of Turtzioz is situated in the Basque comarca (county) of Las Encartaciones area, where the border with the Cantabria region runs along the valley of the river Agüera. There are a host of natural attractions in the surrounding area: the caves of Pozalagua, the Karpin Abentura eco-park and the Armañón nature park, as well as the option of trying walking and cycling routes.

This is located in Durango, very close to the Urkiola nature park, with attractive options for outdoor excursions. Bilbao, San Sebastián and Vitoria-Gasteiz are between 30 and 50 minutes away. The rooms in Olajauregi are spacious and have a desk, private bathroom with hairdryer, free Wi-Fi connection, flat-screen TV with cable channels and safe. It has very well-lit meeting rooms. Its smart restaurant is suitable for holding weddings and functions.

Situated in the centre of the city’s old town, it is surrounded by the traditional pintxo bars and restaurants of San Sebastián. The shopping area is just a few minutes’ walk away, as are La Concha and La Zurriola beaches. The rooms have balconies, flat-screen TV, minibar and safe. The guesthouse offers a free high-speed Wi-Fi connection, a left luggage service and discounts on the nearby public car park. Guests can have breakfast in a local cafeteria at special prices.

This country holiday accommodation is in a fully-refurbished old farmstead located in the Cuadrilla de Añana area, in an ideal setting for outdoor activities: walking, mountain biking and so on. The house has a dining room, living room, heating and rooms with bathroom and TV. Outside there is an area for relaxing in, with a barbecue.

This hotel is built in an old industrial building, combining concrete, steel, glass and wood with big pictures and skylights. Located in the Zarautz town centre, it is just 150 metres from the beach, a favourite with surfers. It has its own car park and all the rooms have a bathroom with shower, air conditioning, LED TV, free Wi-Fi and coffee machine.

This rural guest house is located in the old part of the mediaeval town of Laguardia, in an outstanding setting, ideal for discovering the wine region, visiting its wineries and try its excellent range of food and drink. This locality in Rioja Alavesa, dotted with wineries, is home to one of the gems of Basque art: the colourful doorway of the church of Santa Maria de los Reyes.

This accommodation is located in the industrial zone one the left bank, just 15 minutes from Bilbao and very well-connected by public transport. It has single and double rooms, all with their own bathroom, television and heating. As well as accommodation it has a cafeteria-restaurant which serves daily set meals.

Located in Urnieta, in a natural setting at the foot of several mountains, the country holiday accommodation of Etzabalzar is perfect for enjoying with your family. As well as a garden with pool and barbecue, the house has horses, sheep and chickens. Among other facilities it offers a kitchen-dining room, living room, fully-equipped bathroom, terrace and Wi-Fi.

This campsite, located in Zumaia, is surrounded by green hills that roll down to the sea, where the flysch cliffs can be found, in the Basque Coast Geopark. Its modern facilities include 2 swimming pools, a solarium area, children’s playground, games area, shop and bar-restaurant. A host of activities of all kinds are organised for all ages: music, games, sports and more. The campsite reception is open from 8am to 10pm.

The Bide Ona hostel is the perfect accommodation for pilgrims travelling St. James’ Way on the coastal route when they come to Portugalete. Cyclists have a cycle store service. It has bedclothes, lockers with a security lock, fridge, microwave and laundry. Access is 24 hours using an electronic card. The leisure area, with TV, Wi-Fi and snack and coffee machines, is a good place to relax or have a snack in a relaxed setting.

This is country holiday accommodation in a rebuilt traditional barn, keeping the original location and orientation. It is located between the sanctuary church of Aranzazu and the Aizkorri-Aratz nature park, among the crags and meadows of Urbia. Your chance to enjoy unsurpassed views in quiet, relaxing surroundings.

A newly-built country establishment very close to the town of Azpeitia, which it overlooks from a hillside. It is near the sanctuary church of Loiola, one of the top landmarks in the Basque Country and the starting point of the Ignatian Way. The house has rooms with their own bathrooms and a fully-equipped kitchen. It also has a lounge with a fireplace, a garden with a sun terrace and a vegetable plot.

This hostel, which sleeps 40 people, is in a setting that combines nature with art, culture and people. The rooms are for at least 4 people and up to 14. Lizarrusti Parketxea also houses the Aralar nature park visitor centre, which has several classrooms where activities to get to know the area are organised. It also offers guided routes, workshops and more. Lizarrusti Parketxea also has a bar, restaurant, exhibition room and terrace.

Country holiday accommodation situated in the village of Itziar, part of the municipality of Deba, with room for 12 people. This seaside locality is visited by numerous holidaymakers every year, attracted by its beautiful landscapes. A highlight are its beaches, ideal for surfing, and its quiet coves.

The Serantes guest house is situated in Bilbao’s old quarter, one of the most interesting parts of the city for visitors and particularly handy for its top museums. From here it is very easy to get to the area with pintxo bars and restaurants. With room for 8 people in 3 double rooms and 2 singles

A guest house located very close to the Cruces hospital and just a few minutes’ walk from the BEC (Bilbao Exhibition Centre) and several shopping centres. It has single and double rooms, all with private bathroom, heating and TV.
A guest house situated in the centre of Artea, facing the lower slopes of the Gorbea nature park. As well as accommodation, it offers restaurant service.
The guest house is located in an Abadiño peaceful setting close to the Urkiola Natural Park. It has a capacity of 23 guests.

Guest house situated in the centre of Bilbao, a stone’s throw from its main shopping street. This location is within walking distance of the city’s main tourist attractions, including the Guggenheim museum, the Arriaga theatre and the Palacio Euskalduna. It is also very well connected by public transport: Indautxu metro station is just a short distance away, as well as a bus stop and a taxi rank.

Accommodation located in the village of Elguero in the municipality of Trapagaran, just 12 km from Bilbao, 2 km from the BEC (Bilbao Exhibititon Centre) and very handy for Bilbao airport. The rooms have free Wi-Fi,TV, heating and towels. The guesthouse has a free car park.

The Bizkaia guest house located in Zeanuri, inland Bizkaia. The rural setting has an area of outstanding natural beauty and great value regarding monuments. Gorbeia and Urkiola Natural Parks are some of the beautiful places to visit, that is why it is such a good idea to go hiking, take strolls and follow mountain routes.

Located in Egino, between the Altzania and Entzia mountains, this accommodation is on the main road. It has 2 double rooms and 1 single. As well as accommodation it has a restaurant and sells cheese and roast lamb.
This guest house is in the centre of Amurrio, next to the shopping and restaurant area. It is halfway between Bilbao (30 km) and Vitoria-Gasteiz (40 km), and very close to the Gorbeia nature park.

Accommodation on a cliff overlooking the sea, at Cape Apikale (Ea), a privileged spot in the Busturialdea region. 

Next to the Udaibai Biosphere Reserve, close to the beaches of Laida and Laga and the charming villas of Ea, Elantxobe and Lekeitio.

Basque farmhouse completely renovated, with 5 double rooms, surrounded by nature. 

Accommodation with breakfast included, without the possibility of renting the whole house.

The Bizkaia guest house located in Zeanuri, inland Bizkaia. The rural setting has an area of outstanding natural beauty and great value regarding monuments. Gorbeia and Urkiola Natural Parks are some of the beautiful places to visit, that is why it is such a good idea to go hiking, take strolls and follow mountain routes. It has 11 single rooms.

A family winery converted into a hostel, in a fully refurbished building. Situated in Rioja Alavesa beside St. James’ Way, it offers two large dormitory with bunks, as well as four bathrooms, a fully-equipped kitchen and a common room. You can visit the family winery and it serves evening meals for groups by arrangement.

Guest house situated in the Bilbao neighbourhood of Zorroza, 5 km from the city centre and very well connected by public transport. It has rooms with private bathroom, heating, TV and free Wi-Fi connection.

A stone’s throw from the famous Zurriola beach, a favourite with surfers, opposite the Kursaal conference centre. The establishment is very near the city centre and the old town, where you can enjoy the best-known pintxo bar and restaurant area in the city.

This hostel is housed in a converted barn at the foot of Monte Arno and right on St. James’ Way, making it an ideal stopping place for pilgrims. It has a lounge with a fireplace, TV, bar and shop. It has sheets and pillows for hire, a washing machine and dryer and offers a rucksack transfer service. It can also organise guided tours. It has a bicycle parking service

Lots of space, in a natural setting, especially oriented towards eco-tourism; workshops and games organised. This is the ideal accommodation for school groups, clubs and families. The hostel offers midday and evening meals made using local produce according to principles of responsible consumption. Guests can also cook (please check availability). It organises guided tours of natural areas, heritage sites and farms to find out where local produce comes from.

Accommodation situated just 50 metres from Ondarreta beach, close to the Miramar palace and El Peine de los Vientos, the famous sculpture by Eduardo Chillida. The rooms have central heating, electric kettle, fan and TV. Some of them have their own bathrooms and views of the bay. It has a terrace with sea views and green areas at guests’ disposal. Breakfast and a Wi-Fi connection are included in the price.

This hostel is situated in Urretxu, in the Alto Urola area, beside the river of the same name and at the foot of Monte Irimo. Designed to accommodate large groups, it has rooms for between 8 and 24 people sleeping on bunk beds. Group activities and workshops are run, and it has a mountaineering library with maps, guides and the like. As well as accommodation it offers a restaurant service.

The Guikuri country guest house is a farmhouse located in the Gorbea nature park, 15 minutes from Vitoria-Gasteiz. Renovated in 2011, it offers a range of solutions, including two self-contained apartments in the garden that can be joined together to provide room for up to 10 people. They have a fully-equipped kitchen, a living room with a fireplace and a bathroom with hydromassage, as well as a free Internet connection and their own garden. The house has a relaxation area with hydromassage, Finnish sauna and Turkish bath. Possibilities in the surrounding area include walking, caving, horse riding and renting mountain bikes and canoes.

The Oasis Apartments, located just a few metres from the Zarautz beach, offer you the chance to enjoy the beautiful Basque Coast, the mountains and its famous gastronomy. 

 

The area is ideal for swimmers and surf lovers with a surf school next to the flat for courses.

 

 Each flat is a fully renovated open space, prepared for four people, a single bed, a double sofa bed and a double bed. The space consists of a kitchen equipped with two electric cookers and a fridge, followed by private bathrooms and showers. 

 

It has Wi-Fi connection, air conditioning and direct access to the street to enjoy an open space.

Situated in the locality of Pobes, 15 minutes from Vitoria-Gasteiz, this country holiday accommodation is in the heart of the Añana area of Alava, close to the Valderejo nature park and the Salt Valley, one of the most spectacular, best-preserved man-made landscapes in Europe. It is a two-storey detached building with bedrooms, a fully-equipped txoko/kitchen and two terrace areas. All the bedrooms have bathroom and flat-screen television. Advice is available on excursions or activities in the area.
Larrabide is a 16th-century farmhouse on Monte Ulía, beside Pasaia bay and just 15 minutes from the centre of San Sebastián. All the rooms have TV and the establishment has 3 bathrooms.

Establishment located just 10 minutes’ walk from the beach. It has an open-air swimming pool, garden terrace and panoramic views over Txingudi bay. The rooms have heating, free Wi-Fi connection, TV and private bathroom with shower and hair dryer. Breakfasts are served and guests have at their disposal a fully-equipped kitchen and a barbecue area. It offers cycle hire and free private parking.

This hotel is situated in an exceptional setting, in Ondarroa, overlooking the bay made up of the beaches of Saturraran and Arrigorri. It is a 5-storey building that originally opened its doors in the last century as a spa. It has rooms with sea views, some of them with their own bathrooms. The ground floor has a room with a children’s area, a reading area and a Wi-Fi area. As well as accommodation it offers restaurant service, with daily set meals and single dishes, in close contact with local producers. Guided excursions on different themes can be arranged (history, fishing, the Spanish Civil War and others).

Situated in Aduna, a small municipality just 18 km from San Sebastián, beside the church and the town fronton court. A quiet setting, with a spectacular landscape ideal for outdoor activities. The versatility of this accommodation makes it well-suited to families and groups. The whole hostel or individual rooms or beds can be rented. It serves breakfasts as well as having a washing machine, dryer and sheet and towel hire.

This country guest house is housed in a 16th-century building, restored in such a way as to preserve the traits of Basque rural architecture. Its location, at one of the points of entry to the Aitzkorri-Aratz nature park and on the border of 3 historic regions, is a highly appropriate starting point from which to discover the Basque Country and its provincial capitals. The rooms, each of them linked to a traditional Basque legend, are equipped with bathroom, TV, Internet, heating and desk. It has a lounge, dining room, fully-equipped kitchen and terrace.

Situated in the Gros neighbourhood, very close to Zurriola beach, a landmark for surfing enthusiasts. Close at hand are the Kursaal conference centre and the Victoria Eugenia theatre. San Sebastián’s traditional pintxo bar and restaurant district and the shopping area are just a few minutes’ walk away. The rooms have flat-screen TV and a free Wi-Fi connection.

This guest house is in the historic centre of the mediaeval town of Laguardia, right on the Calle Mayor or main street, opposite the church of San Juan. This is a privileged setting, ideal for discovering the land of wine, visiting its wineries and sampling its excellent range of food and drink. It has a car park, bar, restaurant, cellar, television in rooms and the option of a cot.

A hostel situated in the Lastur valley, right in the heart of the Basque Coast geopark and very close to Deba and Zumaia beaches. Its position beside the Camino de Santiago (St. James’ Way) makes it perfect for pilgrims arriving in Deba on their way along the coastal route. It has rooms for groups of up to 12 people and others suitable for families or small groups. It has a common room, a multi-purpose room and a kitchen for guests to use.

Located in the heart of San Sebastián’s old town, the top tourist attractions are within a few minutes’ walk of this guesthouse: the harbour, the beaches, the museums, the Kursaal conference centre and the city’s most famous pintxo bar and restaurant district. It has spacious rooms with TV, heating and Wi-Fi and two shared bathrooms.

Accommodation located in Idiazabal, a town known for the famous cheeses whose designation of origin takes its name from this municipality. Situated in the comarca (county) of Goierri, between the Aralar y Aizkorri massifs, it is the ideal setting for nature lovers and walkers. The guest house has room for 13 people, in 5 double rooms and 3 singles.

Guesthouse located in San Sebastián’s old town, a short walk from the beaches, museums and the city’s most famous pintxo bar and restaurant district.

 

The rooms, with shared bathroom, have a Wi-Fi connection, heating and TV.

The accommodation is in a renovated farmhouse in Legorreta, in the Goierri area, in a rich natural setting surrounded by mountains where Basque traditions are kept alive. All the rooms have their own bathroom and TV. As well as accommodation, it offers restaurant and cafeteria service.

Accommodation situated in Oiartzun, 25 minutes from San Sebastián, in a rural area overlooking the Aiako Harria nature park. The area is ideal for walkers. The rooms have heating and private bathrooms with shower. The house has a garden and a lounge with a fireplace. It offers breakfast service.

Located in the mediaeval town of Segura, in a natural setting surrounded by hills, this hotel also has a restaurant specialising in local produce. The rooms have air conditioning, flat screen TV and hair dryer.

Ikustieder is country holiday accommodation located right in Rioja Alavesa, in the municipality of Lapuebla de Labarca. The area is great for walking, as well as visiting some of the many wineries in the area.

 



It is fully refurbished, with modern decor. It has a lounge area, dining room, terrace and barbecue, as well as free Wi-Fi.

Family accommodation located in the old part of Aretxabaleta, in a fully refurbished building dating back to 1672. It has a terrace at the back which is available to guests wishing to enjoy the setting. All the rooms have their own bathroom, Wi-Fi and television. Breakfasts are served.

Fully refurbished accommodation, located right in San Sebastián’s old quarter, within a few minutes’ walk of the beaches, Plaza de la Constitución, the Kursaal conference centre and the best-known area for pintxo bars and restaurants in the city.

 

It has single and double rooms, all of them with private bathroom, Wi-Fi connection, television, air conditioning and heating.

This fully-refurbished hostel has rooms for 2, 4, 5, 6 and 7 people with shared bathrooms.

 

A perfect alternative both for groups and for family breaks.

 

Located in the seaside town of Lekeitio, the hostel is just a few minutes’ walk from the beaches and is in a natural setting.

This hostel is located in La Torre de Barrón, in Ribera Alta, in a rural setting, part of the Cuadrilla (county) of Añana.

It has rooms to sleep two, three, four, five or six people, making it perfect both for couples and for groups and families.

It has a fully-equipped kitchen, a shared area with a large dining room, a living room with a television and a toilet, and is equipped with heating, a wood-burning fireplace, parking, terrace, garden and barbecue, as well as a place to keep bicycles.

The hostel is housed in the old school in Zerain in the comarca (county) of Goierri. It has several rooms of different sizes, a dining room and a living room. This accommodation is specially designed for large groups, as well as for pilgrims stopping in Zerain on their journey along St. James’ Way. Its location at the foot of the Aizkorri massif makes it the perfect place to stay for nature lovers.

This cottage is placed in the municipality of Alkiza, in a rural area of the region of Tolosaldea, surrounded by nature and tranquillity. 

 

The building has been built where there were before the vegetable gardens of Lete palatial home, a fine house built before 1600 with coat of arms and a hall considered as historic heritage by Gipuzkoa Provincial Council. It has a garden, green areas for relaxing and recreation and children´s facilities.

 

It´s rented as a whole and has capacity for 15 people.

Located in the historic centre of Elciego, the cradle of wine in Rioja Alavesa, this accommodation is very near to the Bodega Marqués de Riscal, designed by Frank Gehry, the architect of the Guggenheim museum in Bilbao. The town has many high-quality wineries and boasts an unbeatable range of wine tourism options.

The house is decorated in a rustic style and is rented out as a whole. As well as the rooms, it has a spacious living room with a fireplace, a fully-equipped kitchen, two full bathrooms and central heating.

Housed in a converted building that used to be the school in the locality of Ermitabarri, this municipally-owned accommodation is 30 km from Bilbao, in a natural setting, beneath the slopes of Gorbeia nature park. It has four fully-equipped, furnished holiday apartments with their own kitchens. Three of them are designed for couples and one for groups of between 4 and 6 people.

This is a century-old farmstead, fully refurbished and situated in natural surroundings overlooked by the peak of El Ernio, very close to the Pagoeta nature park, just minutes from the coast and 22 kilometres from San Sebastián. It has room for 30 people, making it especially suitable for groups. It has private rooms with bathroom and rooms for groups with bunks and shared bathroom, as well as a fully-equipped dining room, kitchen, terrace, garden and vegetable patch. As well as accommodation, it serves breakfast, lunch and dinner by arrangement.

This accommodation is housed in a romantic-style building in the centre of San Sebastián. It has themed rooms, each of them inspired by a place in Gipuzkoa province. Some of them have a balcony with views of La Concha beach. There is the option of connecting rooms together for families or large groups. It has a public area for relaxing in plus computers, left luggage, air conditioning and a Wi-Fi connection.

Petraenea country holiday accommodation is located in IZORIA, one of the small villages making up the municipality of AYALA, right in the heart of a large comarca (county) with more than 50 fortified houses, authentic architectural gems of outstanding social historical value.

 

This accommodation, surrounded by mountains of middling height, is about 40 km from Vitoria-Gasteiz. It has bedrooms with bathrooms, as well as a fully-equipped kitchen, fireplace and garden with barnecue

This accommodation is located in San Sebastián, overlooking the river Urumea. Situated in the city centre, it is about 15 minutes’ walk from the Old Town, where visitors can enjoy the most famous pintxo bar and restaurant district. With a modern design in which attention has been paid down to the last detail, this accommodation has a garden and terrace at guests’ disposal. The single and double rooms have beds of 2 metres, and of 1m 50, or 1m 80 long . All have their own bathroom, individual heating, flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi connection. Services include left luggage and the availability of umbrellas for guests’ use.

This accommodation is situated on the street of the same name right in the centre of San Sebastián, in the city’s so-called romantic district, 1 minute from the Old Town and La Concha beach. All its rooms have a balcony or terrace and fully-equipped bathroom and all of them are also equipped with the latest technology: air conditioning, flat-screen TV, free high-speed WiFi, high-end mattresses, pillow menu and door opening by mobile. Just a minute away from the hotel, the establishment offers its guests special prices in La Concha car park.

Apartments located in the town of Bermeo, in a natural setting of outstanding beauty just 5 kilometres from San Juan de Gaztelugatxe and next to the Urdaibai Biosphere Reserve. They have tiled floors, a fully-equipped kitchen, bed linen, flat-screen TV, heating and free WiFi connection. Family rooms available. The surrounding area offers snorkelling, walking, canoeing and diving, among other activities.

Located in the Gros neighbourhood, it is 50 metres from Zurriola beach, a favourite with surfing enthusiasts and opposite the Kursaal conference centre. Some of the rooms have balconies with sea views. The city centre with its pintxo bars and restaurants is just five minutes’ walk away. The rooms, all with natural light, have shared bathroom, TV, heating and Wi-Fi.

Accommodation in a natural setting in a quiet part of the municipality of Amurrio.

 

It is very well connected with both Bilbao (30 km) and Vitoria-Gasteiz (40 km). It is surrounded by a large garden with two shared open-air terraces offering views of the Sierra Salvada.

 

It has a fully-equipped kitchen, heating, air conditioning, double or king size beds (1m 80), free WiFi and its own parking.

Located right in the centre of Bakio and just 80 metres from one of the favourite beaches of surfing enthusiasts. The hostel has modern rooms with bed linen included and free WiFi. It has a restaurant where lunches, dinners and pintxos are served at weekends and there is a bar service during the week. Its location makes it ideal to enjoy the local food or visit San Juan de Gaztelugatxe, one of the must-see spots on the Basque coastline.

A typical Basque farmhouse in Durango, at the foot of Monte Mugarra.

 

Bilbao, San Sebastián and Vitoria-Gasteiz are between 30 and 50 minutes away.

 

The house has a fully-equipped kitchen and a living room with a fireplace. Outside it has a garden, barbecue, vegetable plot and its own parking.

 

A range of different activities are possible in the immediate vicinity, including rock climbing, abseiling, walking, mountaineering, caving, cycling and guided tours in the Urkiola nature park.

Elai Etxea or “Swallow House” takes its name from the nests that hang beneath the eaves of the house. The apartments are set in a large private estate, with apple, hazelnut and walnut trees which are perfect for watching birds and other wildlife.

 

They are spacious and well-lit and have a fully-equipped kitchen, full bathroom, terrace, television and WiFi.

 

Situated in the locality of Pobes, these country holiday apartments lie in the heart of the Alaña area of Alava province, beside the Valderejo nature park and the Valle Salado or Salt Valley, one of the most spectacular man-made landscapes in Europe.

This country holiday accommodation is an 18th-century dressed stone building that has been fully restored and fitted-out. It is located in the village of Villanueva de Álava, in the heart of Rioja Alavesa. The house’s 240 m2 of floor space is laid out on three floors, with three bedrooms, all of them with natural light and magnificent views. It also has a kitchen, dining room, lounge, a small cellar, a terrace with views and a garage for several cars. The village belongs to the Cuadrilla (area) of Laguardia-Rioja Alavesa, famous for its landscapes carpeted with vineyards and its wineries. Villabuena de Álava is notable for the many prosperous houses dotted all around the village.

This modern accommodation lies in the heart of San Sebastián’s old town. All the rooms have a bathroom, heating, TV and Wi-Fi, and there is a shared kitchen at guests’ disposal. Its excellent location in one of the most popular parts of the city with visitors means it is within walking distance of the main attractions, both gastronomic and sightseeing: La Concha beach, the Boulevard, La Zurriola beach, the Kursaal conference centre, the Victoria Eugenia theatre and more. Its streets, filled with pintxo bars, shops and restaurants bustle with life at any time of year.

T-5 Suites is a modern guest house with spacious, well-lit rooms. It is located close to smart La Concha bay, without a doubt one of the most photographed places in San Sebastián. All the rooms, both single and double, have free WiFi, air conditioning, heating, safe, fridge, flat-screen TV and private bathroom. The guest house is in El Antiguo district, a residential neighbourhood 500 metres from Ondarreta beach and very close to the Peine del Viento (Wind Comb), Miramar palace and Igeldo hill with its funfair. The city centre is just 20 minutes' walk away, making it easy to enjoy the top tourist and gastronomic attractions of San Sebastián and visit its 3 city beaches by taking a pleasant walk.

Larrain Etxea is country holiday accommodation located in Baños de Ebro, right in the heart of Rioja Alavesa and beside the river that gives the village its name, the Ebro. This is a privileged setting, ideal for discovering the wine region, touring its wineries, sampling its excellent range of food and wine and visiting its charming historic villages The accommodation (4 rooms) can be booked individually or the whole house hired. It has a fully-equipped kitchen, living/dining room, fireplace and garden with barbecue.

The Domaika guest house is in an industrial area of Vitoria-Gasteiz, where some of the leading firms in the city are clustered. It is very well-connected by public transport and has a bus stop just a few metres away.

All the rooms have their own fully-equipped bathroom and flat-screen television.

It has a bar restaurant on the ground floor, which serves a daily set meal and à la carte menu.

The Hotel Mariñerune is located in Mungia, in a quiet setting within 15 minutes of some of the most beautiful beaches in Bizkaia province. It is less than 15 minutes from the centre of Bilbao and 7 km from the airport. The municipality has several architectural gems, highlights among which include its Romanesque bridges, its water mills and the oldest farmhouse in the province. The fully-refurbished rooms have air conditioning, TV, hair dryer and Wi-Fi. A full breakfast is available, made with local produce and served on a glass-enclosed terrace with wonderful views.

This country holiday accommodation is located in Artzentales, in the Palacio Horkasitas, built in 1662 and listed since 2013 as a historic site because of its cultural value.

 

The "palace" lies in a natural setting of outstanding beauty, and the views of the mountains of Kolitxa and Ganekogorta from the garden are unbeatable. The fully refurbished house is laid out on three floors, and has a large living/dining room with a fireplace, plus a fully-equipped kitchen and a hydromassage bath.

 

Around the house, its 10,000 square metres of land include a wood, a waterfall and a pond. Its 100 square-metre terrace has a relaxation area with garden sofas for enjoying the views. Options in the surrounding area include rambling, trekking, gastronomic tours, horse riding, mountain biking and more.

This accommodation is located in a rural setting, beside the Gorbeia nature park, a mecca for Basque mountaineering which offers an incredible variety of landscapes. The rooms have bunks and there is a shared bathroom.

Some of the rooms have a terrace or balcony with stunning views. It has a solarium, bar, restaurant and free private car park. Reception is open 24 hours. As well as accommodation, it offers the option of half board or full board.

It has a well-equipped children's play area and organises themed courses and horse rides. It is a perfect place to stay for walking and horse riding enthusiasts.

Salbide apartments are located near Zarautz beach: less than ten minutes' walk away.

 

The beach itself, open to the sea and flanked by cliffs, is a favourite among surfers from all over the world. The apartments are fully refurbished to a meticulously minimalist design, and are the perfect size for families or small groups.

 

They also have a private car park in the same building.

All Iron Hostel is in the Begoña neighbourhood, beside the church of the same name, on a hill overlooking Bilbao. The hostel offers a spectacular view of the city and stands right on the Camino de Santiago (St. James' Way), making it very popular with pilgrims. It is very well connected by public transport, with a metro station 500 metres away and a bus stop right outside. The city's Old Town is less than 15 minutes' walk away. The hostel is fully refurbished and has shared rooms with beds or bunks which are perfect for large groups. It has a terrace and garden, shared kitchen, free Wi-Fi, heating, individual lockers and cleaning service. Airport transfers can also be organised.

datosContacto.direccion: Calle Jose María Ugarteburu, Nº 2 ENTREPLANTA 1ª

datosGenerales.descripcion:
Room and Kitchen apartments are located in the Deusto neighbourhood of Bilbao, about 600 metres from the city centre.

 

Their position is perfect for discovering Bilbao and taking a pleasant stroll to visit its main tourist attractions: the Guggenheim museum, the famous San Mamés football stadium or the Ria (estuary).

 

These modern apartments boast a highly contemporary décor and open-plan kitchens, Wi-Fi and daily cleaning service.

This original accommodation dedicates each of its rooms to one of the arts: painting, architecture, sculpture and so on. It displays the work of young artists linked to the city of Bilbao.

 

As well as being a unique place to stay, it is located right in the centre of the city, 15 minutes' walk from the Guggenheim museum and less than 10 minutes from the Arriaga theatre and the Old Town, where visitors can try the city's best pintxo bars and restaurants.

 

All the rooms have a private bathroom, heating, 40-inch Smart TV, free Wi-Fi and a capsule coffee machine.

Modern apartments located right by the beach, in the seaside town of Zarautz.

 

The sandy beach open to the sea, stretching over 2,500 metres, is a favourite with surfers from all over the world.

 

The entirely newly-built apartments are carefully designed in a minimalist style. They are the perfect size for families or small groups. Every one of them has a dining room, fully-equipped kitchen, air conditioning and WiFi, as well as amazing sea views.

Quartier Bilbao is a welcoming, modern hostel situated in the heart of Bilbao's Old Town, between the Ría (Estuary) and the Cathedral of Santiago.

 

It is in a fairly quiet pedestrianised area, surrounded by shops and very close to the liveliest areas with bars and restaurants in which to sample the city's food and drink. It is very well connected by public transport, with a tram stop 50 metres away and 3 minutes from the metro station. The 6-storey building, which formerly housed one of Bilbao's leading drapery stores, has been fully renovated and has rooms and common areas on several floors.

 

It has rooms of different sizes, from doubles to groups of up to 10 people. All the common areas have a free Wi-Fi connection.

Arriagaetxea is country holiday accommodation located in Lagran in the Montaña Alavesa area, just 20 minutes from Rioja Alavesa.

 

The house is hired whole and is fully refurbished and beautifully decorated. Its size makes it perfect for families or small groups. It has 3 bedrooms, a living room with fireplace, a fully-equipped kitchen and a garage for several cars.

 

It offers a cycle hire service, and its location right on the Wine and Fish Trail (GR-38) and very close to the Izki nature park makes it ideal for walkers and nature lovers.

This country holiday accommodation is in the locality of Tuyo, in a quiet rural setting in the Cuadrilla (county) of Añana. It is a converted Alava farmhouse that has preserved its traditional décor. It has two lounges, bedrooms with their own bathrooms, a garden with panoramic views, barbecue, private parking and free wi-fi throughout the house. As well as rooms it has a 4-person apartment. Local produce such as potatoes, beans, quince cheese and eggs for sale. Tuyo is a base for countless routes, and the Camino de Santiago (St. James' Way) passes very near the locality, just 1.5 km away.

The guesthouse is in a 19th century building right in the centre of San Sebastián, in its so-called romantic district. The rooms are decorated in a welcoming, personal way inspired by the essence of Basque gastronomy. Breakfast is served both in the dining room and in rooms, featuring produce straight from the farms in nearby villages. All rooms have Wi-Fi, a 5-star bed, a digital Smartphone key, LED television and private bathroom with hair dryer. There is parking less than 5 minutes away from the establishment and umbrellas and beach towels are available for guests to borrow.

Casa Rural Mahasti is in Gatika, just a few minutes from the impressive castle of Butrón, a mediaeval building set in natural surroundings.

 

It's in a three-storey farmhouse packed with history and personality. It has spacious rooms which combine the original antique furniture with new fittings. There's also a lounge with a fireplace, a library, a fully-equipped veranda and a garden in which to stroll among the oak trees and sheep.

The Riberas del Urumea guesthouse is a modern establishment in San Sebastián, overlooking the river of the same name. The rooms have private bathrooms and a minimalist décor, and some of them offer beautiful views over the river. The guesthouse has an automatic check in and check out system using a nearby cash machine. It is just a few minutes' walk from the bus station and has a car park nearby. Both the shared lounge and the rooms have a free WiFi connection.

The Izal country holiday accommodation is located in Bergara, in a fully-converted former farmhouse 40 minutes from Bilbao and 45 from San Sebastián. Its spacious, well-lit rooms have a minimalist, modern décor, combined with some original features of the house to retain its rural essence. The house has a terrace, garden and a place for relaxing with an arched window offering fine views of the mountains. It can serve a full buffet breakfast and has a private car park for guests.

Right in the centre of Bilbao, just five minutes from the Guggenheim Museum and very close to the shopping, leisure and food areas, Cosmov Bilbao offers a practical service in a pleasant, modern setting. In their cosmopolitan décor, the different parts of the hotel have a predominantly white colour scheme to give a feeling of space and calm, combined with features in colour to add a touch of warmth. All the rooms have a private bathroom as well as WiFi, safe and 42" television. Depending on each guest's needs, the hotel has four types of room: Basic, Standard, Family and Superior. While its location is just a pleasant stroll away from anywhere in the city, Cosmov offers a car hire and parking service.

This is a fully-refurbished 16th-century stately home in San Millán, in the heart of the Llanada Alavesa. It is very close to the Camino de Santiago (St. James' Way) and just a few minutes from the dolmen of Eguilaz, some of the best-conserved prehistoric remains in the Basque Country. Casa Rural Lecea is ideal accommodation to enjoy in a group, with family or with friends. It has a fully-equipped kitchen, living room, porch and garden with barbecue. It location makes it perfect for lovers of walking, the mountains, mountain biking and mushrooming, as well as for pilgrims on the Camino de Santiago.

Perlakua was built as a farmhouse in 1897, located on the open ground on the heights of Itziar, in a natural setting with beautiful views of the sea and the village of Deba. It is just 3 km from the coast and the beaches and half an hour from San Sebastián. The bedrooms are restored and decorated consistently with the age of the farmhouse, with subtle touches of modernity but without losing their rural essence and charm. Different and cosy, all of them have a private bathroom, TV, heating and views of the sea or the mountains. The establishment also has a restaurant, where guests can enjoy traditional home cooking in which local meat products play a large part. This holiday accommodation and its surrounding area offer a host of leisure possibilities: leafy woods, footpaths, panoramic views and spectacular beaches.

Located in the El Antiguo neighbourhood of San Sebastián, just 8 minutes' walk from Onderreta beach, the Koisi Hostel is very close to the centre and to numerous tourist attractions in the city. With the option of choosing between four types of room, private or shared, all of them in a modern, comfortable style and most with a private bathroom. The establishment has a shared lounge and a glassed-in terrace on the flat roof, housing the bar and restaurant, which serve traditional pintxos and a wide variety of home-cooked dishes. It has a wi-fi connection and offers its guests free breakfast.

In the wonderful natural setting of Oiartzun, just 12 km from San Sebastián, lies this fully refurbished country holiday accommodation, Txikierdi Alde. Here visitors can find all the comforts at their fingertips, with two types of room to choose from, standard or de luxe, all of them with an internet connection, flat-screen TV, coffee maker and so on. For you to try some typical dishes from the area, the hotel has a fully-equipped restaurant serving fresh local produce in an indoor dining room with panoramic windows and two outside terraces. The facilities allow big events to be organised, offering maximum comfort and perfect surroundings in which to experience unforgettable moments.

Pensión Txingurri is in the locality of Astigarraga, capital of the cider makers, just 6 km from San Sebastián and very well-connected with the city centre. Equipped with the latest technology, it offers comfortable rooms, all of them with a private bathroom, flat-screen TV, heating/air conditioning and safe. There are a range of amenities on the premises to make guests feel at home. Free wi-fi connection, "non-stop" kitchen, free car park and 24-hour reception, among other things. The guesthouse recommends various cultural and gastronomic activities to make your stay a memorable experience. From finding out how cider is made to visiting the 16th-century monastery of San Telmo.

Recently refurbished, this accommodation in San Sebastián is by the Paseo Salamanca, beside the sea and very close to the beach. The rooms, single or double, have natural light and wi-fi connection, heating, fan and safe, with use of the shared bathroom and kitchen. It also offers services such as laundry, left luggage and the option of ordering breakfast, lunch and dinner. Its location in the old part of the city means leisure and cultural attractions, bars, restaurants and so on are all within walking distance.

Just 15 minutes' drive from La Concha beach in San Sebastián, these apartments were built in a recently-converted industrial building in Hernani. In bright, light colours, all of them are fully equipped, with one or two bedrooms, bathroom, living/dining room, plasma TV, table and open-plan kitchen. Other amenities in public areas, like wi-fi and private parking. Ideal for families or groups of friends, they are a great option for both short and long stays and are close to two large supermarkets.

The accommodations offered by Don Cecilio perfectly reflect the spirit of San Sebastian: A cosmopolitan city that stands at the forefront of modern culture, yet one that does not forget its roots and traditions, which visitors can savor in every bite of the town's famous pintxos, as well as in every step along the historic downtown and port. Precisely for this reason, this venue, located in the heart of the capital of Guipuzcoa, took the inspiration for its colorful and modern decoration from the old boats of local fishermen. Don Cecilio creates a pleasant and warm atmosphere and offers many extras, including free WiFi, a garden/terrace common area, easy access for the disabled, a safe, and air conditioning and heating, among other amenities.

San Sebastian is a magical city, an enchantment that is enhanced by staying at the delightful Talo Urban Rooms, making your stay even more special. In Norwegian, "Ta Lo" means "home," while "Lo", in Basque, is sleep. This venue affords the option of feeling truly at home in a new city. It offers a bright and urban environ, decorated in wood finishing, with cement floors and tiles. Visitors are rewarded with an essentially Scandinavian look that dovetails perfectly with the family values and at-home feel cherished by the culture of Euskadi. Talo Urban Rooms is located within just a 20-minute walk from the center of San Sebastian, and offers all the amenities needed to thoroughly enjoy the city, including a view over the city thanks to its spacious terrace.

Located in the Bilbao neighborhood of Altamira, in this charming apartment the visitor will find all the amenities needed for a pleasant stay in the capital and its surroundings. The accommodations include a master bedroom with a king-size bed and two sofa beds, and a living room with two other sofa beds. It is an ideal place for visiting the city with friends or family in a practical and reasonably priced fashion. Altamira 15 is located in a peaceful and quiet area, where visitors can take in the day-to-day life of the Biscayan capital, and also enjoy a panoramic view over Bilbao and see the buildings so emblematic of the city, such as the San Mames Stadium, the Carola Crane, the Iberdrola Tower, or the Guggenheim Museum.

A rural home located in the heart of nature, Atxispe Etxea offers visitors the opportunity to immerse themselves in the countryside while enjoying the cozy warmth of home. With its practical and simple decoration, it stands out for the many opportunities for relaxation offered by the home itself, and by the place in which it is situated. Visitors can opt for a sunny visit to the beach, or choose to tour the center of Bilbao, reachable by public transport. You can also enjoy the delight of holding an outdoor barbecue in its gardens during summer, or a cozy meal basking in the warmth of the fireplace, with space for up to twenty five diners in its large living room and kitchen. Atxispe Etxea allows the visitor not only to feel at home, but also offers all the facilities and amenities needed to enjoy time with friends and family. Every room has its own bathroom. The option of renting the entire house is available.

The Nebarrebak Hostel is the ideal choice for those looking for something practical and affordable, without sacrificing comfort and quality. Located in the town of Erandio, it lies on the right bank of the Ria de Bilbao and is just 10 minutes from the center of the capital by metro. Nebarrebak offers guestrooms equipped with all the amenities needed to make your stay pleasant, including a television and private bathroom. In addition, Nebarrebak offers a variety of options for those looking to recharge. In the common room, guests have at their disposal all the facilities required to store their food, while in the hostel restaurant, you can savor typical dishes of Basque and Argentinian cuisine, as well as combo platters, burgers, and sandwiches.

The New Bilbao Airport hotel is located in Derio, just 500 metres from the airport, 5 minutes from the Technology Park and within 10 km of the centre of Bilbao. Its strategic location and quiet atmosphere make it the perfect accommodation both for short stays and for business trips. It has meeting rooms and wifi throughout the hotel. All its rooms have windows giving plenty of natural light, and are fully equipped and carefully designed with a personalised decor in each one. The hotel has a self-service offering a continental breakfast every morning.

Bilbao Museums Apartments are in a great location on the Museum Trail, just a short walk from the city's top museums: 100 metres from the Guggenheim, 500 metres from the Museum of Fine Art and also very close to the Maritime Museum next to the Palacio Euskalduna. The city's shopping area and its renowned Old Quarter are also just a few minutes' walk away. Belonging to the Forever Apartments group, these flats with one or several bedrooms are fully-equipped and have a modern, warm décor in pastel shades, with industrially-inspired decorative features.

Elegance and well-being The Villa Magalean Hotel & Spa in Hondarribia is the perfect combination of elegance with the homespun tradition of this famous fishing town.

A timeless, classic style that has adapted to modern times, both in aesthetics and in service: king-size beds, wifi, smart TV, mini bar, safes, private terrace or balcony and more. Rooms that can be connected to create small apartments.

This hotel, located right in the old part of town, also has a spa with hammam, exfoliation table, hydromassage shower with aromatherapy and light therapy, sauna...

The comforts of a hotel at home Diván Apartments in Vitoria-Gasteiz offer the warmth and space of an apartment, but with all the amenities of a hotel included. All accommodation is equipped with amenities like wifi, kitchen, video door phones, televisión and double sofa beds to make you feel right at home. However, they also have a reception and information service, optional private garage, weekly cleaning and check-out until 7pm. All this practicality and convenience is complemented by an original, modern, light-filled décor that is both warm and welcoming. In short, a great option for discovering Vitoria-Gasteiz as if you were at home.

The light of Valdegovía Gaubeako Ekhia is a place filled with light and warmth, set in the village of Valdegovía, home to the Valderejo nature park. The rustic style of this accommodation is ideal to enjoy this green Álava setting, with its abundant fauna and flora. The stone walls contrast with the wood to create cosy surroundings for families, couples or friends. However, tradition is blended with modernity, and details rich in colour and creativity are to be found throughout the establishment.

Right by the beach This accommodation is located in one of the most beautiful holiday settings in the Basque Country, in the seaside locality of Zarautz, very close to its famous beach, a favourite with surfers. The apartments are fully refurbished in a meticulous minimalist style. They offer the basic amenities you need for a pleasant, practical stay. They are a perfect size for families or small groups.

Because of its privileged location, close to the mountains and to the sea, this charming farm-guest-house is the ideal place for you to spend your holidays.

 

The farmhouse is located within the agricultural area of the holding of 10.000m2, which consists in one part of a beautiful garden whereas the other part of land is processed according to the high standards to grow certified organically vegetables. All the rooms have a fully equipped bathroom and television.

Situated at the heart of the Rioja Alavesa region, in the town of Lanciego, the house is located in natural surroundings, close to a small river.

 

From Casa Rural Ardetxal, you can head out for walks along paths surrounded by vineyards. Formerly a mill with thick stone walls, the building has now been converted into rural tourist accommodation. Outdoors, there is a garden, a barbecue and garden furniture.

 

The house has three double rooms, a full bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a wood-fired oven and a living/dining room with a fireplace. Heating is also provided. As well as free parking.

 

Casa Rural Ardetxal is perfectly suited to meeting guests’ needs during longer stays.

The Urain apartments are located in a rural district of the coastal town of Deba known as Itziar, where the well-known Sanctuary of Itziar can also be found.

 

The sanctuary serves as a starting point for hiking trips along the Flysch Route of the Basque Coast Geopark. The accommodation has a private parking area and free WIFI connection. All the apartments have a fully equipped kitchen, a flat-screen TV and bathroom. A bicycle rental service is also available for guests to make the most of the area, which is perfect for cycling and hiking.

Koba Hostel is located in Gros, one of San Sebastian's trendiest neighbourhoods. It's just 200 metres from La Zurriola beach, famous for its great waves and lively surf vibe. Once an old mechanics workshop, the building which houses Koba has now been transformed into a modern hostel. Koba Hostel has double, family and shared rooms (all of which feature a private bathroom), as well as a terrace, kitchen, dining room and lounge. There’s a bike rental service and free WIFI throughout the building.   As well as the common areas, which include a kitchen, dining room, chill-out area and terrace, and storage for bikes and surfboards, the hostel also offers a bike rental service.

This accommodation stands out for its modern design, centric location just a 5 min walk from the beach and breakfast that is full of surprises. SÖMN HipSuites is located in the coastal town of Zarautz.

 

This accommodation is inspired by the Scandinavian model, in which functionality and practicality are key. Privacy and technology play an essential role in its modern and high-quality rooms.

 

This guest house has rooms with double beds and rooms with single beds. In addition, all rooms are equipped with a private bathroom, towels, sheets, a flat-screen TV, air conditioning, heating system and free WIFI. It’s located on the ground floor and is adapted for people with reduced mobility.

This accommodation is located in the central neighbourhood of Amara, just 500 metres from La Concha seafront promenade and a 5-minute walk from the beach. It’s very close to the station, several bars and lively areas. There are rooms with a double bed and private bathroom and single rooms with a single bed and shared bathroom. Guests have access to the lounge and balcony with beautiful views. All rooms have free WIFI and a flat-screen TV with cable service.

Casa Rural Lazkano-Enea is located in the coastal municipality of Getaria, on mount Santa Barbara, in a natural area surrounded by fruit trees and Txakoli wine vineyards. It’s located on a section of The Way of St. James (El Camino de Santiago) . The house sleeps up to 10 people and is divided into two floors. It has double rooms, a full bathroom and balconies with ocean views. It also has common areas, an eat-in kitchen, a living room with a fireplace and a breakfast room. The house offers a cozy outdoor area for breakfast, lunch or dinner. On the ground floor, in front of the main living room, there are two outdoor spaces offering great views of the sea and of Getaria. The house offers free WIFI.

The Shelter Apartments are in the town of Zarautz. They are located in a quiet area belonging to the Pagoeta Natural Park and just 400 metres from the beach and the centre of town. Both apartments are fully equipped with kitchen and complete bathrooms, as well as a living room, television and WIFI connection. One of the apartments is adapted for individuals with limited mobility. Guests can ask for additional beds and there is a travel cot available. In the garden, guests will find chill-out-style furniture, including hammocks and a barbecue. The house offers free parking.

Arrizul Congress Hotel is a luxury hotel located in the Gros neighbourhood of San Sebastián, just 300 metres from Kursaal Conference Centre and 2 minutes from Zurriola Beach, which is very popular among surfers. In close proximity to the city’s main landmarks, the neighbourhood also offers a wide range of leisure activities and Basque cuisine.

 

The hotel features carefully decorated, modern rooms, which are fully equipped with flat-screen TVs and private bathrooms. Suites and duplex rooms with a lounge area and free minibar are also available. Guests can use the gym, meeting rooms and cafeteria area on the hotel premises. A bicycle hire and parking service are provided, along with free High Speed Wi-Fi.

Bilbao Metropolitan Hostel is a modern hostel located in the very centre of Bilbao, in the Zabálburu area, allowing the city’s main tourist attractions to be visited on foot. Just 100 metres from the train and tram stations, the hostel is also a convenient base for visiting other local places of interest. The hostel offers rooms of various sizes, all with bunk beds, private bathrooms, air conditioning, heating, sheets and lockers. It also features a shared kitchen and free Wi-Fi throughout the whole premises. Bilbao Metropolitan Hostel is an excellent base for visiting Bilbao.

Lô Luxury Bilbao Guest House is located in the well-known Plaza Nueva in Bilbao, at the very heart of the old district. Plaza Nueva is near all the main sights and is filled with restaurants and bars, creating a lively atmosphere all day long. The guest house features double and single rooms, as well as a specially adapted room for persons with reduced mobility. All of the rooms have a private bathroom and flat-screen TV. Free Wi-Fi is also available throughout the whole building. Three breakfast options are served at Víctor Montes Restaurant, one of the most well-known and popular in the city.

The Spa Hotel Orduña Plaza is located in the heart of Orduña, in a neoclassical building from the 18th century perfectly adapted to the needs of todays's travellers. Its rooms have a modern interior design and are fully equipped. They also have a deposit box, free WIFI connection, satellite TV and a whirlpool bath (except for the room adapted for people with limited mobility). Furthermore, the hotel has multifunction rooms of different sizes that are equipped for holding business meetings and other events. Regarding health and aesthetics, the hotel spa offers mineral and medicinal waters from the Muera-Arbieto spring and hydrotherapy treatments. It also has a dynamic pool with underwater jets, sauna, spa and wellness centre. All services are provided by qualified personnel.

Kanala Etxea is located in front of the Urdaibai estuary in the Busturialdea region of Biscay, just a few minutes’ walk from Laida beach. From the house you can see the municipality of Mundaka, a place of pilgrimage for surfers who come to catch it famous left wave from different parts of the world. 

The rooms with sea or mountains views have their own name linked to the figure of the American writer Ernest Hemingway, because of his connection with the region. 

Todas las habitaciones disponen de cama grande  de 2x2m de alta calidad y además de TV, sofa y baño completo,  tienen un office con microondas, cafetera, nevera…etc.

All rooms have a large 2x2m bed and besides TV, sofa and complete bathroom, it has an office with microwave, coffee maker, fridge…etc.

Ganexa Home apartments are in the coast town of Zarautz, 7 minutes walk to the beach and 5 minutes from the town hall. 

The accommodation has a study and an apartment with full equipped kitchen, bathroom, television and free WiFi. Suitable for people with reduced mobility. 

These apartments have a modern deco and comfortable to make you feel at home.

Maddiola apartments are in the coast town of Orio and are located in a quiet place and with a wonderful view to the sea and the mountains. 

The building, of new construction, has a rustic style in stone and wood, with garden zones. The house arranges of different apartments, all of them with a private bathroom and roof, living-room with TV and chimney. Also it have kitchen, glazed porch and barbecue zone. It provides free WiFi in all the facilities.

Kantabriko Zarautz apartments are situated in the coastal town of Zarautz. A perfect location 500 meters from the center and a few minutes from the popular beach to the locality. 

Kantabriko Zarautz is equipped with apartments with private bathroom, equipped kitchen, television, free WiFi, dressing room, living room and a sideboard.

Inside Bilbao Apartments is located in the center of the Biscayan capital, which allows you to visit the Casco Viejo (450 meters), the Guggenheim Museum of Bilbao (100 meters) or the shopping and leisure areas. 

These apartments with modern and functional decoration are adapted for people with reduced mobility. The apartments can accommodate 2 or 4 people and all have a fully equipped kitchen and TV, bathroom with hairdryer and hair iron, laundry area with washer-dryer, iron and ironing board. 

Inside Bilbao also offers free Wifi in all the accommodation and air conditioning. 

This accommodation is very well connected to all means of transport in the city.

“Camping Bungalows Igueldo San Sebastián” is located in a beautiful place between the mountains and the sea, just 5 kilometers from the beach of Onsarreta in San Sebastian. 

A first-class campsite offers standard pitches of 70m2 and small parcels of 20m2. The bungalows and mobile homes of different capacities have fully equipped kitchens; rooms with bed linen and towels and bathrooms with WC and shower with hot and cold water. Garden furniture, TV (bungalows) and a parking space next to them. 

The campsite has an outdoor swimming pool with two solarium areas, sun beds and sunshades. 

It also has a social lounge with a barbecue area right next to the playground, equipped with 3 barbecues and picnic tables. 

Municipal bus service between the campsite and the city center runs all year round.

It is a luxury hotel where Chef Pedro Subijana elevates the experience of his iconic three-star Michelin restaurant. It`s situated in a magnificent place between the mountains and the sea, a few kilometers from the capital of Gipuzkoa, with panoramic views of the Bay of Biscay.  

The hotel has spacious rooms of between 50 and 100 meters, all decorated with a sober and elegant style, in which the noble materials, the high quality of the finishes and the equipment stand out. Each of the room has its own spacious and furnished terrace where you can relax. 

Akelarre Suite, of 1000m2, has a dressing room, a large terrace with huge windows and a small outdoor swimming pool.  

This luxurious accomodation of elegant and contemporany spaces has a Spa&Wellness area and a winery that, with its iconic restaurant, makes Akelarre a unique experience with the best views over the Basque coast.

Arima Hotel is located in the heart of Bosque Miramón, San Sebastián, close to the city centre but surrounded by a natural space that allows you to live different natural and authentic experiences. 

Arima Hotel keeps in its soul an innovative and ambitious concept of respect for the environment to which suppliers and collaborators who share its sustainable philosophy join. 

The rooms of between 22 and 41m2 have the latest generation of acoustic insulation, humidity and temperature control, as well as low CO2 concentration. In their decoration they combine materials such as wood, stone, iron and natural fabrics, creating a warm and welcoming space. They are all exterior and have huge windows. 

You will be able to enjoy its restaurant that offers a mixture of haute cuisine and natural and seasonal ingredients that bet on local producers that make sustainable dishes and healthy creations.

Bilbao Centric Aparments se encuentra en el tranquilo y céntrico barrio del Ensanche-Moyua, cerca de los principales puntos de interés de la ciudad de Bilbao. 

Los apartamentos de lujo, dependiendo de su capacidad tienen 38, 42 o 58 metros cuadrados modernos y están completamente equipados.  Desde las cocinas, lavandería con secadora y plancha, baños con secador de pelo y plancha, ropa de cama y baño, Wifi, Smart TV…

Siéntete como en casa a un paso de los principales puntos de los principales puntos de interés de la ciudad.

Maidanea holiday cottage is a country house rebuilt and renewed, located in a natural environment, 5 minutes away from the centre of Hondarribia.

All rooms in these lodgings are double and have full bath. The house has living rooms with TV, chimney and library for guests to enjoy. It also has a large balcony where breakfast is served while the weather allows it. It has a car park available for clients.

Due to its good location and the proximity of the coast, it can be done both mountain activities as hiking, mountain biking or horseback ridings and those related to the sea.

SANSEbay Hotel is located on the edge of Donosti´s old town, right in the harbour, and it has a matchless view of La Concha Bay.

SANSEbay offers elegance, comfort and high-level facilities up to the most demanding people. It has single, double and family rooms and apartments with a capacity of 4 and 6 people. All of them spacious and equipped with private bathroom, SMART TV with Netflix, free high-speed WIFI…

You will enjoy an inner peace stay that you won´t forget.

BoulevArt Donostia guesthouse is located right at the heart of the city, in Boulevard donostiarra, which allows people staying there to discover it through pleasant walks.

It has three kind of rooms in which the most up-to-date equipment is merged with town´s art and culture.

The different rooms have, among others, the following common features:

King Size bed 70 by 78 inches or two twin beds 35 by 78 inches, full bath with rainfall shower bathroom amenities and hairdryer, apart from free coffee service in the room.

HC Ignaciano rural house is located in Bujanda, council of the municipality of Campezo (Alava), in a rural and perfect environment to practise trekking and to enjoy the nature.

 

The accomodation, adapted also for persons with reduced mobility, arranges of different types of rooms and apartments, between them, double, familiar, fourfold and double rooms of two beds. Al lof them completely equipped, with private bath and with amenities, clothes of bed, TV of flat screen… Also, offer service of breakfast buffet and some of the rooms have kitchen with dishwasher.

 

WIFI in whole accommodation, free parking…

Tierra y Madera a rural house located in the small town of mountains and forests is an excellent starting point for hiking trails and a few miles from the Salt Valley and its region with much to visit.

 

The rural house with capacity is rented whole so it is very appropriate for small groups and offers everything necessary for customers to have a pleasant stay.

Niño Jesús Pension is located in the Alto de Miracruz, next to the famous arzak Restaurant, the first one three stars Michelin of the city.

 

This accommodation is to approximately 10 or 15 minutes walking of the beach of the Zurriola and of the Gros quarter, one of the áreas along with the Old Parto f more ambience of the city and that is provided with a big offer of bars of pintxos and fashionable restaurants as well as commerce of surfing and shop of clothes.

 

The Niño Jesús Pension has private garden and wifi in the whole accommodation.

The Miru B&B is located in the Ulia area in a quiet residential area close to Zurriola Beach and the many attractions offered by the dynamic Gros district with its pintxos bars, terraces and restaurants.

The accommodation between its rooms has one of them with living room. It has private parking and offers free Wifi throughout the establishment.

Numad Studios located in San Sebastian, next to the Miramón Forest and close to the Basque Culinary Center Foundation, surrounded by green and pure air will make your stay an unforgettable experience.

 

With the characteristics of a hotel, Numad Studios has fully equipped studios, kitchen, individual bathroom, double bed, Smart TV, Wifi... A total of 14.000 m2 with extensive facilities taken care of in detail: lounge area, coworking spaces, restaurant, cafeteria, gym, laundry as well as terrace overlooking nature.
