If you are a student at the Basque Culinary Center, you will be able to put into practice what you have learned in professional cuisine with the latest technology available at Numad Studios.

Olaizola Rural House is a modern accommodation placed in a traditional hamlet of more than 500 years in the municipality of Oiartzun to the feet of the Aiako Harria Natural Park.

This rural house has in addition to a double room of an apartment with independent entry adapted for persons with limited mobility. 

It has WIFI in the accommodation and free parking.

 

Its place allows to make trekking, running, bike on the Arditurri Route… as well as to do excursions to Hondarribia or San Sebastian.

Good Duke Apartments are located on the beachfront at Zarautz, facing the longest beach on the Gipuzkoa coastline, which is very popular among surf lovers. 

Good Duke offers spacious, light-filled apartments which are fully equipped with a double bed, kitchen, full bathroom, living-dining room with a flat-screen TV and sofa-bed.

It’s a comfortable place to stay in the heart of the village with direct access to the seafront promenade and the beach, delimited by the Ratón de Getaria and Mollarri mounts.

EIBAROOMS Auto Check-in is located in the centre of Eibar. It is simple and practical, but also welcoming. It offers spacious rooms with views, which are fully equipped so that guests can relax in comfortable surroundings: facilities include private bathrooms, WIFI, air conditioning, heating, a large desk, a safety box and a TV.

 

The accommodation is conveniently located near the main train and bus stations, which offer regular public transport connections to the three main cities in the Basque Country, Loiu-Bilbao airport and other locations in Euskadi. Guests can also reach the main services and points of interest in Eibar quickly on foot.

The Itxaropena apartments are 350 metres from Zarautz beach, in quiet surroundings but also handy for the old town, where many of the shops and restaurants are located.

 

The apartments are designed in a modern, cosy way, and are fully-equipped with everything you need to enjoy a pleasant stay and feel right at home.

Getaria Apartamentuak is located in the centre of Getaria, opposite the imposing Cristobal Balenciaga Museum and 5 minutes’ walk from two beaches of Getaria: Malkorbe and Gaztetape.

 

The apartments with a very luminous decoration, have a surface of between 25 and 40 square meters have rooms with double bed and sofa-bed. The fully equipped kitchen even has a small recipe book to reproduce the dishes of the local gastronomy.

The two apartments in Museum Zarautz, so called because it's opposite the Photomuseum, are named Surf and Beach. This gives some idea of the atmosphere you'll find there, as they're decorated with boards and large photographs of waves and sand to make surfing enthusiasts feel as if they're in their natural habitat.

 

But because nothing can replace the feeling of actually being on the beach, the rooms are just 200 metres from the beach in Zarautz, with nearly three kilometres of sand, where you can try water sports, stroll along the coast to nearby Getaria, sunbathe or have dinner beside the sea.

Atotxa Rooms is a modern guest house created to make visitors to Donostia / San Sebastián feel at home. It's just two minutes from the bus and train stations, at the entrance to Egia, one of the liveliest neighbourhoods in the city. This makes it a good starting point whatever you're doing, whether you've planned it in advance or you rely on your hosts' advice.

The rooms are named after important towns on the Gipuzkoa coast such as Zumaia, Donosti and Getaria, as well as artists like Oteiza, Chillida, Basterretxea and Ibarrola, and all of them are decorated with spectacular photographs taken by José Luis Diz. So Atotxa Rooms are filled with art and culture, but also with a whiff of the sea and waves.

Services include wheelchair hire so that people with reduced mobility can get about the city without difficulty.

The Hotel Bidebide is in the Plaza Euskal Herria in Tolosa, a large pedestrianised public square surrounded by buildings dating from the 19th century. The most notable of these, the Palacio de la Justicia, today houses TOPIC, the Tolosa International Puppet Centre.

 

A distinctive hotel decorated using materials like natural stone and wood, whose location at the heart of Gipuzkoa province makes it an ideal base to visit the coast and inland, the mountains and open land of Aralar or the woods of Urbia.

Villa Victoria, despite what the name might suggest, is a hotel housed in a modern building. It stands out for its modern lines and cutting-edge design, breaking with classical norms to take its guests into a new dimension.

 

Highlights among its amenities include the terrace reserved for clients, equipped with sun loungers and designed to really switch off after a day spent visiting the old town of Donostia-San Sebastián or strolling on nearby La Concha beach.

Erlete Goikoa country holiday accommodation is located within the Basque Coast Geopark, in the quiet locality of Mardari de Deba. The rooms are decorated in a modern rustic style with stone walls and wooden ceilings, and all of them have views of the txakoli vineyard that surrounds the house. 

 

Erlete Goikoa is a good place from which to visit the nearby cove of Sakoneta, just two kilometres away, where you can discover all the beauty of the flysch rock formations and cliffs. Also, as it is just 20 metres from the coastal Camino de Santiago, it offers special services like rucksack transfer.

The Hotel Lasala Plaza stands in the port of San Sebastián, a stone's throw from must-see areas like the old town, allowing guests to experience at first hand its culture, its love for good food, the sea and the art of fine living and its people.

 

Lasala Plaza offers "seaview" rooms with views of the bay and La Concha beach, and "historical" rooms overlooking the square after which the hotel is named. However, the best sights can be seen from the solarium and swimming pool on the roof terrace, which offers a stunning 360º view over San Sebastián.

 

Free entry by car for clients into the area restricted to residents of the Old Town. Parking arranged in the area.

Unanue Zar is a historic building: it is the oldest farmhouse in the municipality of San Sebastián. Its history goes back to the late 15th century, when the original fortified house was built on the site. The house was the home of the Olaizola family for many years, until it was gutted by fire in 2003.

Today this symbol of history and heritage has been rebuilt and converted into a boutique hotel which lives at nature's pace. Because it is located in the locality of Añorga, in an attractive country setting just a few kilometres from the city centre.

Ulle Gorri is country holiday accommodation in a farmhouse that has been restored using original materials to bring out the beauty of buildings of this kind: exposed stonework and beams, doors with a distinctly aged look... all without sacrificing the amenities and comforts of modern accommodation or contemporary artistic features.

Thanks to its quiet location, groups or families renting Ulle Gorri can combine a peaceful stay with country walks - taking in the magical Altube beechwoods or the impressive Nervión falls - with visits to the cities of Bilbao or Vitoria.

Sagarlore country hotel takes its name from the apple blossom and this is no coincidence, as it lies right in the heart of Astigarraga, the cider region par excellence. Its location makes it ideal for anybody wanting to try the experience of eating at a typical cider house, and who also wants to visit the city of San Sebastián, which is just 7 kilometres away.

 

Sagarlore is a 16th-century farmhouse which for many years housed a brick and tile factory. The building has been fully refurbished while preserving features like the brick frontage.

 

It is a place designed for enjoyment and relaxation, where time has the value it deserves. This is shown in its breakfasts, to be enjoyed slowly, prepared using fresh, ecological produce from the farmers and shepherds of Astigarraga and its surrounding area.

Hostal Txalupa is accommodation designed for people doing the Camino de Santiago on the coastal route. It offers shared rooms with bunks fitted with curtains for privacy, individual light and power point, bedclothes and towels.

After a hard day's walking or cycling along the coast, guests at Txalupa can enjoy a well-earned rest or choose to carry on having fun for what remains of the day by sampling the charms of Getaria.

La Casona de Alútiz is country holiday accommodation attached to the Alútiz winery in Samaniego, in the heart of Rioja Alavesa. Lovers of wine and wine tourism, landscapes and nature can enjoy a stay in a place surrounded by vineyards, bathed in different colours depending on the time of year.

 

La Casona de Alútiz is a traditional cereal farmer's house. The house is built in the local style with 18th-century stone walls and wooden ceilings, and has its own wine cellar.

 

Groups can hire the whole house, with use of a kitchen.
A centrally-located guest house in Usansolo, near the railway station and just a few minutes from Galdakao hospital.

Urdaibai Km0 apartments are located in the heart of the Urdaibai Biosphere Reserve in Bisturia, near the Biodiversity Centre in Torre Madariaga. This means that families and groups can find a wide range of things to do in the area.

 

They are in a newly-constructed building carefully designed to fit into the natural and ecological setting of Urdaibai. In fact, the accommodation is powered by renewable energies to ensure clean electricity, heating and natural comfort. There is also an online supermarket service selling local produce.

 

There is the option of renting the whole house.

Haizatu apartments are located in Manurga, one of the 17 localities that make up the municipality of Zigoitia. It is in a country setting perched on the lower slopes of the mountain of Gorbea, giving it spectacular views extending as far as Vitoria-Gasteiz. As well as being a traditional transit point, it has some grand old buildings which still conserve their family crests.

 

Haizatu apartments are built in the place where the wheat used to be winnowed to separate the grain from the chaff. Each of them has a fireplace to make it cosy for those who want to spend time in the house, as well as those returning from a busy day exploring the beautiful landscapes around Manurga.

Hotel Urban Sondika is accommodation close to Bilbao airport and just a few minutes from the city centre. Its rooms have views of the mountains, the interior vegetable garden and the city.

 

Urban Sondika has a restaurant where you can try local food and a lounge bar, as well as facilities for holding business events, including a conference room and meeting rooms.

The Hotel Onyarbi is located right in the centre of Hondarribia, in the landmark Miramar building. It is notable for its nearness to the picturesque fishermen's neighbourhood of La Marina, today turned into a district of bars and restaurants, as well as the old town and the promenade running along the mouth of the river Bidasoa.

Its rooms are decorated in a modern but cosy style and its pillow menu is a highlight among a whole series of services and amenities.

Balea Hostel is located in the Loiola district of San Sebastián, near the railway station connecting Irun to Brinkola (Oñati) and just one stop away from San Sebastián's Estación del Norte. Thus, it is well-connected to the centre of San Sebastián by public transport, including by bus, though anybody who wants to can stroll in beside the river Urumea.

 

Balea Hostel has family rooms and shared dormitories. The bunks are equipped with their own light and power point, as well as drawers in which to keep your belongings. It also has a common room and kitchen.

Villa Birdie is an exclusive hotel in San Sebastián, converted from the former residence of the Austrian consul, in a setting that aims to go beyond luxury to be a home for its guests.

 

This early 20th-century villa in neo-Basque style has a dining room boasting a dome that  matches the bamboo marble floors, plus a cosy reading corner redolent of bygone days. The dining room also gives out onto the terrace and the pool with jacuzzi, solarium and places to relax.

Bergaretxe Geltokia is country holiday accommodation in the locality of Legazpi, in the heart of the Iron Valley and at the foot of the Aizkorri nature park. This makes it a good base for anybody wanting to discover the countless tourist attractions of the comarca (county) of Urola Garaia, as well as enjoying a quiet stay in a natural setting.

 

In fact, the house combines modern design with features of the old farmstead from which it was converted, and is surrounded by 6 hectares of land, including a verdant wood of birch and cherry trees.

 

Also worth mentioning is the care taken to make Bergaretxe Geltokia a low-energy building by fitting extra insulation and using biomass for heating and hot water, among other things.

Txokoetxe is country holiday accommodation set in natural surroundings which combines beach and mountains, just a few minutes from sandy beaches like that of Bakio and also of peaks like Sollube, as well as towns like Mungia and Bilbao.

 

However, the biggest attraction of this house is the services it offers, based on its Txoko-Workshop. This is a spacious area which combines indoor and outdoor areas designed for celebrations and activities of all kinds, equipped with a full kitchen, dining room with fireplace, library, garden with barbecue and even a trampoline, bar football and ping-pong table.

The Pensión Arroka is located in the centre of San Sebastián, a stone's throw from the old town, La Concha beach and the Buen Pastor cathedral, as well as the bus and train stations.

The rooms in Arroka are designed to help guests get a rest: natural light, quiet surroundings, cosy design and all kinds of comforts.

Possibility of private parking in the same building.

Distrito Oeste is a hotel located in El Antiguo neighbourhood of San Sebastián, in the Lorea residential district, well-connected with the city's most important tourist attractions.

 

Distrito Oeste's mission is to make a stay in San Sebastián comfortable, convenient and easy for its guests, and this is why it emphasises practicality. Thus, it offers services like a gym to work off tension and free wifi to share all the photographs from a busy day's sightseeing in San Sebastián.

A Room in the City is a guest house that allows its visitors to discover the charms of the city of San Sebastián for themselves, at the same time serving as a meeting place for people who like to travel. It’s right in the city centre, in a former convent converted into a multi-purpose space with lively cultural programme, the Convent Garden.

 

Like this, after trying the local food, sunbathing on the beach, going surfing or having fun in San Sebastian's old town, guests can make themselves comfortable in its common areas both outside and inside to chat and meet people, try the dishes in its restaurants or make their own in the shared kitchen, as well as enjoying the cultural activities that take place on the premises.

galeria.titulo: Rooftop of A room in the city

datosGenerales.descripcion:
Arritxulo Aterpetxea is a hostel located in the municipality of Oiartzun, beneath the peaks that give their name to the outstanding natural setting of the Aiako Harria nature park.

 

This makes Arritxulo ideal accommodation for groups both young and old, to enjoy a few days getting away from it all in natural surroundings, trying games and sports including rock climbing, slackline or hill walking at different levels of difficulty, as well as mountain biking.

 

The hostel has a restaurant service offering home cooking.

Just a few yards from the Sanctuary -Church of Arantzazu, cradle of Basque contemporary art, the Arantzazu Aterpetxea hostel is especially suitable for anybody wanting to find out more about the roots of Basque history, culture, language or traditional trades while enjoying stunning countryside.

 

From the work of Eduardo Chillida, Jorge Oteiza and Néstor Basterretxea to the unparalleled natural setting of the Aizkorri-Aratz nature park, guests can enjoy a stay in a cult location for the Basques and their visitors.

 

The hostel has spacious common areas, like the kitchen and the dining room, as well as various recreation areas including swings, a climbing wall, frontón courts and covered areas.

 

As well as special offers for groups and people on pilgrimages, it also has space set aside for dogs.

Patxila-Borda apartments are in a renovated farmhouse on the slopes of the mountain of Jaizkibel, in the municipality of Lezo.

 

The surroundings are quiet and peaceful and people staying here can go walking, cycling, mountaineering, mountain biking or simply enjoy the peace and quiet and the natural setting. In fact, the house stands in spacious gardens with trees, a car park and animals including hens, cockerels, cats, donkeys and a pig.

 

It is also a good base for exploring places as attractive as Hondarribia and San Sebastián.

datosGenerales.nombre: CASUAL DE LAS OLAS SAN SEBASTIAN
datosGenerales.descripcion:
Casual de las Olas is accommodation which, in line with the rest of the Casual chain, is characterised by its themed décor. In this case, something as typical of San Sebastián as waves, the sea and surf served as this inspiration to design each of its rooms.

 

Its services include a range of free packs to make your stay easier, such as the Baby Pack, which includes a backpack, pushchair and bath, among other things, the Pet Pack, with a bed, food and drinking bowls and a pack made up of a wifi connection in the city centre, an external battery for mobile devices and a selfie stick.

Bizkar Bare are holiday apartments on the hillside of El Acebal, in the locality of Sopuerta, in the Encartaciones area, where guests can enjoy a stay in fully-equipped accommodation in a natural setting.

 

Bizkar Bare is a low building: the entrances to the apartments are in the large shared garden area, equipped with tables and a barbecue. This makes it ideal for couples, families and groups of up to 25 people. Pets are welcome as long as they are well-behaved and do not bother the other guests.

The Hotel Flysch is just a stone's throw from the essential things to visit in Zumaia, including the chapel of San Telmo and the viewpoint from which to take the essential photograph, beautiful Itzurun beach and the famous coastal rock formations that give the hotel its name.

 

Rooms in the Hotel Flysch are decorated by local artist Antón Eguiguren, each on a different theme. There are different options, ranging from double rooms, superior rooms that can sleep three adults or families of four, deluxe rooms and studios with kitchen included. All of them have a sun terrace.

Pensión Plaza Nueva, as its name suggests, is in an unbeatable location if you are looking for accommodation in the centre of Bilbao. In fact it is right in Bilbao's old town, in the square of the same name, itself a historic/artistic site as well as an ideal base from which to explore the main places of culinary, artistic and cultural interest.

 

Each of the rooms in the Pensión Plaza Nueva is in its own style. They are designed to offer all the comforts, the latest technology and security to make guests there feel right at home.

 

A feature is the choice of breakfast, with three options served at the Restaurante Víctor Montes, a landmark in the Plaza Nueva.

SÖMN DonostiOndarreta is in the Antiguo neighbourhood of San Sebastián, a place with a personality of its own that has managed to reinvent itself without losing its identity. It is just five minutes' walk from Ondarreta beach and the promenade leading to La Concha and the Old Town.

 

The name SÖMN, which is Swedish for "sleep", is a nod to its essential function as accommodation. In fact, taking its inspiration from Scandinavian pragmatism, it offers guests carefully-designed but highly practical rooms, with clean, simple features to achieve an uncluttered but welcoming atmosphere.

Axel Hotel San Sebastián is a hotel specially designed for a LGBTIQ+ audience, but open to everybody. This hotel chain in fact specialises in accommodation where diversity and respect are valued and everybody is welcomed, valued and respected regardless of their sexual orientation.

 

Axel Hotel San Sebastián features interior design and architecture where curves and blue and copper tones predominate; its rooms with their rusty iron theme are inspired by the sea.

 

Its amenities include a sun terrace with swimming pool, wellness club and ground bar.

Bilbao Urban Apartments are holiday apartments in the centre of Bilbao designed for independent visitors to the city without sacrificing the amenities offered by accommodation with all the comforts.

 

Their nearness to several of the city's cultural landmarks and areas of pintxo bars make Bilbao Urban Apartments a great option both for people who like wandering round cities and for those who like to get about on public transport.

Our grandfather's house is country holiday accommodation with the option of booking either the whole house or else apartments or individual rooms. It is a place designed for everybody, a comfortable, modern place which is also welcoming and friendly.

 

Located in the locality of Vírgala Mayor, in the municipality of Arraia-Maeztu, our grandfather's house is a base from which to explore this beautiful setting, of which the Izki nature park and the Vía Verde del Ferrocarril Vasco Navarro, a cycle path along the route of a former railway line, are the main attractions.

Gure Naia country holiday accommodation is located in Karrantza, in the quiet locality of Ahedo, which has some places of interest including the ruins of the College of San Lorenzo but is mainly attractive because of the surrounding countryside.

 

Gure Naia is rented as the whole house, with a cosy living room to relax in, a garden to feel at one with the nature that surrounds you, a place for reading and a fully-equipped txoko to make its guests feel right at home.

HiBilbao holiday apartments are in an excellent location in the centre of Bilbao, within easy walking distance of the city's essential attractions, such as the Guggenheim museum, which is just 5 minutes away.

 

HiBilbao Apartments have everything you need to make you feel at home, including a fully-equipped kitchen with a dishwasher.

Apartamentos Zarautz are designed for anybody who wants to enjoy a stay with all the comforts in Zarautz, one of the best-known places on the Basque coast among people who love the beach or activities like surfing.

 

The apartments have a modern, cosy and practical décor, including photographs of the neighbouring localities of Getaria and San Sebastián, which give their names to each of the rooms. They are equipped to make sure guests lack for nothing, and have a full range of services, including the option of arriving to find the fridge full.

Lurralde apartments are designed and equipped for their guests to enjoy convenient holidays in Zarautz. Decorated in a simple, cosy and practical style, they have spacious rooms and well-lit places to relax after a day enjoying the charms of this seaside locality.

 

In fact, Lurralde apartments have a full range of amenities and services ranging from a kitchen with oven and dishwasher to transfers to and from nearby airports.

Just a few steps from Gaitxurizketa station is the Erletxe hostel.

 

It stands in a quiet spot at the foot of the mountain of Jaizkibel, between the locality of Lezo - to which it belongs - and Hondarribia.

The Arbaso boutique hotel stands in the shadow of the Cathedral of the Good Shepherd in San Sebastián, right in the centre of the city. Its design is based on respecting the integrity of architecture of this 19th-century building, combined with the latest technology and unique, exclusive top quality materials worked by hand, and with luxurious, iconic decorative features cared for down to the last detail.

 

The staff at Arbaso are at the service of their guests to open the doors to the culture, cuisine and roots of the Basque Country. A good starting point for this is the hotel restaurant, Narru, headed by chef Iñigo Peña.

Hotel located in Zabalburu, an area within easy reach on foot or by public transport of the essential attractions of Bilbao, from strolling round the streets of the Old Town to visiting museums like the Guggenheim or Bellas Artes or going out for some pintxos along the Gran Vía or Indautxu.

The Vincci Consulado hotel is situated between the Guggenheim and the Isozaki towers, making it ideal for anybody wishing to stay in the centre of Bilbao with all the comforts.

 

Guests can enjoy a neighbourhood with beautiful squares and pleasant avenues lined with buildings where traditional architecture rubs shoulders with futuristic design.

 

The hotel's design is inspired by nautical themes and it has an à la carte restaurant with a terrace offering views of the Bilbao's Ría (estuary) and the Guggenheim Museum.

The Sobrón Natura hostel is set in one of the most impressive natural landscapes in Álava province. In fact, Sobrón is an area of outstanding ecological and landscape interest, including a spectacular gorge through which the river Ebro flows.

 

This means guests at the Sobrón Natura hostel can enjoy activities like walking, vias ferratas and observing the local wildlife and flora, as well as visiting some of the area's tourist attractions, from the Salt Valley or Salinas de Añana to the Tower of Varona.

Puerta del Camino apartments are located on the Calle Miribilla in the old quarter of Bilbao, just a stone's throw from the route of the Camino de Santiago.

 

It is handy for neighbourhoods like the old quarter of Bilbao, reached over the San Antón bridge or the Conde Mirasol footbridge, and the Miribilla district with its green spaces.

Country holiday accommodation at the foot of the mountain of Jaizkibel in the municipality of Lezo, just 5 kilometres from the coast and very close to Errenteria. It is also a good base from which to discover essential places like Hondarribia or San Sebastián.

 

It is ideal accommodation for pilgrims as the municipality is located on the coastal route of the Camino de Santiago.

The Alarpe hostel is part of the riding holiday centre of the same name, offering equestrian enthusiasts a place in which to plunge into the world of horses 24 hours a day.

In the locality of Zaldibia, a municipality right in the heart of Goierri and between the nature parks of Aralar and Aizkorri-Aratz, Alarpe is a place to enjoy nature in its purest state.

Asitxo country holiday accommodation is in the locality of San Miguel, on a hill reached by the road to Bilbao. This location means its guests can enjoy splendid views of the Bermeo coastline.

 

The house has shared areas including a kitchen and a lounge, as well as a terrace surrounded by a large garden, where guests can relax and enjoy themselves.

The large house of Montehermoso contains country apartments designed to bring guests into contact with the outstanding natural setting of Valdegovía / Gaubea.

 

In fact, environmental balance is a feature of the project, for which bioconstruction materials were used, together with re-used ones like the wood from the salt pans of Añana which now makes up the rails at the entrance to the apartments. The building is heated using biomass. It also offers its guests vegan amenities and guidance in reducing waste, recycling and composting.

 

To round off the experience, the host organise activities like workshops in healthy cooking, shinrin-yoku ("forest bathing"), yoga, massages, Nordic walking and gourmet dinners prepared by a local chef.

Mugarri country holiday accommodation is a building with 180 m2 of floor space located in the locality of Pobeña, near Muskiz. To get there, you pass through the wetlands of La Arena beach or, to the west, along the Itsasur Green Way, opening up a range of possibilities for those who want to spend their time in an active way.

 

The house, which is rented as a whole, has rooms to suit all tastes and needs, named: El Corro, La Bárcena, La Ermita, El Conde and Itsaslur. Each room has its own entrance, bathroom, strong box, coffee maker and TV.

Asieran is a guest house located in Euba, a locality 3 kilometres from Amorebieta-Etxano town centre and 7 km from Durango, well-connected to both places by train and bus services.

 

In fact the guest house is beside Euba station, opposite a children's play area and frontón court.

Moana Eco Surf House is surf-friendly accommodation in the Uribe Kosta area. Standing 400 metres from surfing beaches like Arrietara and Atxabiribil in Sopela, as well as the beaches of Barrika and Plentzia. Guests at Moana can get to the beaches on foot to go surfing.

 

One of its most outstanding features is that it is green accommodation designed, built and run in an eco-friendly, sustainable way.

 

It also runs free meditation and yoga classes in the dome available to guests. In addition, it has a spa area.

The Pensión Miribilla is perfect for exploring the city's points of interest as it is just a short walk from the centre. In addition, the area is very well connected thanks to public transport. 

 

It offers comfortable, modern and soundproofed rooms with free Wi-Fi, private bathroom, flat-screen TV and a common room.

Laga Surf Camp is a surf hostel located in the town of Ibarrangelu, in the Urdaibai Biosphere Reserve, one of the most beautiful landscapes in the Basque Country.

 

This surf-friendly accommodation has various large rooms with recessed bunk beds, shared and private bathrooms and a garden area to relax after a day surfing at Laga, Laida-Mundaka or any other of the nearby beaches.

 

In addition to running the hostel and country holiday accommodation, Laga Surf Camp organises surf camps for adults and young people, as well as hiring out surfing gear.

Agroturismo Basitegi is a rustic-style house built recently according to principles of sustainability and accessibility.

 

Guests staying at Basitegi benefit not only from the peace and quiet of a rural setting like that of Urnieta, but have a choice of excursions as it is handy for San Sebastián and other places of interest on the Basque coast and inland Gipuzkoa province.

 

The house itself is designed for an enjoyable stay, with a lounge with television and fireplace for guests to use, a swimming pool and a children's play area with pool, bar football, table and board for drawing and colouring board games, reading area, sofa and television. The house is by the Basitegi riding club, with horses and ponies for hire or for riding classes.

Sercotel Ayala is a hotel in the centre of Bilbao, on Calle Canciller Ayala, making its location one of its main attractions for those visiting Bilbao for both work and leisure, with the family, partner, individually or even with pets (please enquire about terms and conditions).

 

All rooms in Sercotel Ayala have a television with international channels, telephone, free wifi, desk, strong box, hair dryer and bathroom amenities.

Usandi is a hostel on the Camino de Santiago coastal route, in the locality of Ziortza-Bolibar. As well as pilgrims, it is also a good accommodation option for anybody wishing to visit the Simón Bolivar museum or the collegiate church of Ziortza.

 

This recently refurbished building has rooms for families and groups, as well as the necessary facilities including a kitchen, dining room, closed bicycle store, self check-in and so on.

CV33 takes its name from its address, number 33 on Campo Volantín. This is because its location is one of its greatest attractions, being handy for the main places of interest in Bilbao, including the Guggenheim museum and the old town, both of which are easy to get to on foot.

 

It also has an open kitchen area where guests can have breakfast or dinner.

Txoriene is located in Arrieta, a small locality of about 500 people near the town of Mungia in Bizkaia province, making it an attractive option for those wishing to stay in a natural setting and visit some of the must-see places such as Urdaibai or San Juan de Gaztelugatxe.

 

It is in a quiet spot, ideal for getting away from it all while enjoying views of the green landscape and listening to the birds singing.

The Bilbao Place hotel is located in the Matiko-Ciudad Jardín neighbourhood, close to the Artxanda funicular station and a few hundred metres from Bilbao city hall.

 

Within walking distance of some of the essential attractions on a visit to Bilbao, including the Guggenheim museum or the old town, this hotel is a good accommodation option for visiting Bilbao.

Siete Huertas country holiday accommodation is located in Valluerca, a small village belonging to the municipality of Valdegovía. Without sacrificing any of the comforts, it's a place to get away from it all and enjoy the open air, with plenty of walking in outstanding natural surroundings, a highlight of which is the nearby Valderejo nature park.

 

It consists of two separate houses, a larger one with room for 20 people and a smaller one for 6. A feature in spring is its porch with barbecue and its "txoko". The smaller house has a porch with barbecue and a small wooden swimming pool.

Casa Rural Kañiko is in the village of Okina, part of the municipality of Bernedo. Despite being close to Vitoria-Gasteiz, which is just 15 km away, it is in a natural setting, carpeted with leaves in autumn, covered in snow in winter, where life is reborn in spring and the water fills the river in summer.

 

Casa Rural Kañiko is a converted former stable which you can rent by rooms or as the whole house. It is a good place to stay to explore the comarca (county) of Montaña Alavesa or walk routes like the GR-38 (the wine and fish trail).

One Shot Tabakalera House is a hotel that forms part of the Tabakalera international contemporary arts centre in San Sebastián. This unique, unrepeatable hotel which backs art is set among exhibition galleries, cinemas, libraries and the headquarters of institutions such as the San Sebastián international film festival.

 

With its meticulously exclusive interior design by the Alfaro-Manrique studio, the hotel has different categories of room, with highlights being the suites and duplexes.

 

 

It also stands out for its excellent connections, being close to the city's train and bus stations, which are just 300 metres from the hotel.

Izarrate country holiday accommodation is in a century-old house built of stone and an attractive structure of oak, in the village of Apellaniz, part of the municipality of Arraia-Maeztu in Álava province. It is a former inn, strategically located on the Wine and Fish Trail.

 

The accommodation is divided into three individual partments, which are named after the three localities of Apellaniz: Bengara, Elespara and Goikara. All the apartments have cooker, fridge, oven, washing machine and dishwasher, as well as options for entertainment.

Etxebarri country holiday accommodation is in one of the most spectacular places in the Basque Country, Olaeta. This locality belongs to the municipality of Aramaio and close to the village of Otxandio, which is one of the main ways to it. Olaeta lies in a small valley surrounded by some of the most imposing ridges in the Urkiola nature park, with Anboto as a backdrop.

 

In this setting, guests at Etxebarri country holiday accommodation can enjoy walking and mountain activities, as well as surroundings in which to just relax and gaze at the landscape.

Areeta Etxea is a house located in the heart of the Valdegovía valley, in the locality of Espejo, the most important village in the area. Thanks to its rural surroundings, within a radius of just a few kilometres you enjoy a range of outdoor activities, including swimming in the river, hiking, horse riding, mountain biking, an adventure park with ziplines, rock climbing and boating.

 

Built in the late 19th century, Areeta Etxea was recently refurbished to be rented out as a whole.

Etxeartzi country holiday accommodation consists of two houses in the locality of Mendieta de Artziniega, near the chapel of La Encina which, together with the mediaeval quarter, is one of the attractions of Artziniega.

 

Each house is divided into two parts with several bedrooms, equipped with bathroom, living room and kitchen. There is also a spacious terrace and a large garden with a barbecue.

Located at the tail of the Ullíbarri-Gamboa reservoir, Mendixur is a place to get in close contact with nature and discover a wetland of international importance with a bird park.

 

Aware of the natural riches of the surroundings, Mirador Ardea is designed to enjoy panoramic views of the bird park and the hills of the Sierra de Elgea. The interior is decorated with iron and wood, making the house very much Basque Style. The accommodation is rented by rooms only.

 

Mirador Ardea is sustainable accommodation that encourages guests to eat local, seasonal produce, surrounded by native plants and powered by sustainable sources such as geothermal energy.

Casa Rural Sierra Salvada takes its name from the mountains overlooking it, a natural setting in which to enjoy walks in the woods or beside the Maroño reservoir, a day's bird watching or a climb to one of the peaks, such as Tologorri or Ungino.

 

The house has all the comforts to relax after a day spent outdoors, including rooms with jacuzzi, a barbecue in the garden and a large fenced-in area.

Etxeartzi country holiday accommodation consists of two houses in the locality of Mendieta de Artziniega, near the chapel of La Encina which, together with the mediaeval quarter, is one of the attractions of Artziniega.

 

Each house is divided into two parts with several bedrooms, equipped with bathroom, living room and kitchen. There is also a spacious terrace and a large garden with a barbecue.

Satia Berri is an estate consisting of wooden houses surrounded by gardens and recreation areas in the locality of Ayala, under the Sierra Salvada hills and on the banks of the river Ibaizabal, where it is still possible to take a dip in a beautiful setting.

 

Each of these houses has two rooms, kitchen, living room and bathroom. There is also a shared open-plan txoko to be used as a dining room or for other purposes.

 

The houses were laid out according to bioclimatic and environmental criteria, as well as being supplied with energy from renewable sources.

Angus Etxea country holiday accommodation, located in the municipality of Bernedo in the Montaña Alavesa area, takes its name from a breed of cattle, the Aberdeen Angus, kept by the Martínez Crespo brothers in their organic herd in the neighbouring locality of Kintana.

 

This is accommodation in town from which to plunge into the landscapes of the Montaña Alavesa area and the nearby Izki nature park and put into practice some of the philosophies of its owns, such as slowlife and kilometre zero.

Castillo de Portilla is country holiday accommodation that takes the name of the main heritage site in this Álava locality situated in the Cuadrilla (county) of Añana. It is a project set up by two country holiday enthusiasts who have also organised guided tours that offer the chance for both adults and children to find out more about the history of Portilla and its castle in a fun way.

 

Preserving the traditional local architecture, the house has a shared area that includes a garden, porch and barbecue, as well as rooms with their own bathroom. It was renovated using bioconstruction materials and with a view to energy efficiency, in order to be sustainable accommodation and help to reduce its environmental impact.

 

It also has a multi-purpose room that can be rented independently. 

 

Guided tours of the Portilla-Zabalate Monumental Complex are available.

Mercedes Etxea is country holiday accommodation located in the municipality of Kripan, in the wine-growing region of Rioja Alavesa. This makes it an excellent option to discover this area with its countless attractions and to do some wine tourism.

 

Mercedes Etxea is a house dating from 1748, renovated while preserving the stone walls and wooden beams of the house, leaving part of the structure visible to give it a special charm. It has a shared area on the ground floor, while the upper floors have the rooms with private bathroom.

A small family hotel just 3 minutes' walk from Zarautz beach - so close, they say, that you can go to the beach and come back barefoot.

 

Blai Blai Hostel encourages a friendly atmosphere with everybody who stays there, whether they are pilgrims on their way to Santiago, surfers or beach lovers... To do this, we have areas like a kitchen and a shared area, while at the same time offering a certain privacy in shared rooms thanks to nest beds with curtains.

Aterian runs holiday apartments on the Basque Coast, with a wide range of apartments in Zarautz and Getaria, as well as houses in the country, villas and even a pop-up space.

 

Aterian apartments are designed for guests to feel the flavour of the fishing villages where the food, the txakoli wine and the finest grilled fresh fish play a starring role.

 

Moreover, along with accommodation, Aterian offers services like an in-house cook to enjoy traditional seasonal Basque cookery or getting the first shopping in so that you can find the fridge full when you arrive.

Brunet 9 apartments in San Sebastián take up a whole building in the garden neighbourhood of Ondarreta, among detached villas and just a stone's throw from Ondarreta beach.

 

Equipped with a kitchen, living-dining room and terraces of up to 20 square metres, these apartments have between 2 and 4 bedrooms with a smart, modern décor to create a pleasant, comfortable atmosphere.

Holiday apartments in Zarautz, five minutes' walk from one of the best beaches for playing, surfing, sunbathing or just strolling along the promenade.

 

Kaixo Family apartments in Zarautz are run by tireless travellers who enjoy other cultures and peoples. Guests will find that decoration is another of their passions, with features like the mural-size photographs by Ramón García or the paintings by Pablo Azkue.

Oar Cottage is in Garai, a country town at the foot of the mountain of Oiz. This is a spot that is very popular with visitors from the surrounding area at weekends and on holidays, because of its charm, peace and quiet and views of the Duranguesado valley, the Anboto massif and the Aramotz hills.

 

Thus, guests coming to Oar Cottage can enjoy a natural setting into which the house fits perfectly, a refurbished traditional farmhouse that conserves all its essence, offering an elegant décor and a comfortable stay.

Located right in Orio's old town, these apartments are the perfect choice both for spending a few days and for longer stays. They have an auto check-in system to allow access to the accommodation without worrying about timetables.

 

All rooms have a modern, practical décor, private bathroom and 5-star bed.

 

Standing where the mountains and the mouth of the river Oria meet the sea, Orio has many attractions. Not far away, in neighbouring Aia, is one of the most spectacular natural settings in Gipuzkoa: the Pagoeta nature park.

Located right in Orio's old town, these apartments are the perfect choice both for spending a few days and for longer stays. They have an auto check-in system to allow access to the accommodation without worrying about timetables.

 

Standing where the mountains and the mouth of the river Oria meet the sea, Orio has many attractions.Not far away, in neighbouring Aia, is one of the most spectacular natural settings in Gipuzkoa: the Pagoeta nature park.

From Enea Rooms you can get to the city's main points of interest on foot in a few minutes. Located in a quiet area close to the Atocha tower, the bus station and the railway station. 

 

It has rooms made to measure, with the option of setting them up to suit you and a common area with a fully-equipped kitchen. 

 

Online check-in service with 24-hour access straight to your room with a password provided in advance.

Located right in the centre of Getaria, opposite the Cristobal Balenciaga Museoa, these apartments allow guests to enjoy the town's two beaches, which are just a few minutes' walk away.

 

Perfect for family stays, they are fully equipped with kitchen, bathroom, air conditioning and SmartTV.

 

Each of the apartments has a private garage included in the price.

Mendia Goikoa Bekoa is country holiday accommodation in the locality of Axpe-Atxondo, in Bizkaia province. It is a farmhouse built in 1815 at the foot of the mountain of Anboto, which preserves the essence of its ancestors.

 

Made up of 12 rooms, it has panoramic views of the valleys and mountains around it. It has individual, double and deluxe rooms and suites, all of them inspired by Basque custom and this culture's most deeply-rooted traditions.

The H30 Salces guest house is on the Calle Salces in Bilbao, 200 metres from the Artxanda funicular and 300 metres from the Calatrava bridge. It is very centrally located, as it is a strategic base in Bilbao for getting anywhere in the city in a very short time.

 

It's perfect for a stay with your family or partner, as it's made up of cosy family rooms and ideal accommodation for couples.

Hotel Boutique Bahía stands beside the estuary in Plentzia, surrounded by nature and beaches, a setting in which to enjoy water sports, walking, mountain biking and lots more.  

It has three terraces, one of them upstairs, with some spectacular views. 

 

Also, its excellent location makes it easy to visit Bilbao, Vitoria-Gasteiz, Donostia-San Sebastián or any of the picturesque towns on the Bizkaia coastline.

Lasarterooms is in Lasarte-Oria, very close to the centre of this municipality in Gipuzkoa province. It is particularly handy for Donostia-San Sebastián, which is just 9 kilometres away.  

 

With its modern, spacious rooms, it is the ideal base to visit this beautiful town with your partner or your family.

Lur apartments in Getaria are in an excellent spot, opposite the Cristobal Balenciaga Museoa, right by the beach. They also have free parking and are right next to a children's playground, ideal for the youngest members of the family. 

 

They are handy for the old town, packed with bars and restaurants to enjoy local food and drink.  

 

 Very well-connected for trips to nearby places like Zumaia, Zarautz and/or San Sebastián, by car or bus, the latter stopping just 50 metres from the apartments.

It is equipped with cutting-edge technology to ensure that energy consumption is efficient and sustainable. Another feature is that it is fully accessible, as it has facilities aimed at people of disability such as wheelchairs, luminous alarm clocks, luminous signage, adapted furniture and much more.  

 

Located right beside Bilbao Intermodal bus terminal, it has cosy rooms, interior parking, a meeting room, buffet-style breakfast and 24-hour reception, among other services.

Andikoetxea is country holiday accommodation in a fully-refurbished farmhouse dating from the early 18th century. Located in Aulestia, just 10 km from Lekeitio, a beautiful fishing town between the beaches of Isuntza and Karraspio. 

 

It serves breakfast made from local produce. It has a large terrace, WiFi and free parking.

Apartments in Getaria with sea views, overlooking the fine sandy beach of Gaztetape, a favourite with surfers.  

 

The names of its studio apartments, Olatu, Hondar and Izar, evoke the sensations to be found in the area.   

 

With sea and mountain views, they are just a stone's throw from Getaria's main attractions: the Cristóbal Balenciaga Museum, the fishing harbour and the Elcano monument.

Right in the old quarter of Bilbao, its location is perfect for strolling to the city's top places of interest. Some 50 metres from the guest house is the Plaza Nueva, whose arcades are home to lots of bars and restaurants.  

 

Each of its rooms, designed in a style of its own, bears a woman's name in honour of the staff.  

 

All the rooms have air conditioning and doors with electronic locks with personal codes. There is free WiFi throughout the guest house.

The Hotel Catalonia Gran Vía Bilbao is on the Calle Don Diego López de Haro, a stone's throw from the Parque Doña Casilda and close to the Guggenheim museum and Palacio Euskalduna.

 

It stands on the most important avenue in Bilbao, with a wide range of shops and restaurants for maximum convenience. It is perfect for a stay with your partner or for business travellers, as it has a swimming pool with terrace, a city garden, a wellness zone and also meeting rooms.

datosContacto.direccion: Gran Vía Don Diego López de Haro, 73

datosGenerales.descripcion:
With spacious rooms, the Hotel Nafarrola has been proposed as a historic building, as it is mentioned in records dating from 1285.

 

Overlooking the sea but surrounded by mountains in a natural setting, its rustic, minimalist interior goes perfectly with its exterior, a fusion of history and modernity.

 

The rooms have hydromassage baths, fireplace and large balconies. Guests are also provided on arrival with a welcome kit consisting of sustainable hygiene products.
This is ideal accommodation for wine tourism enthusiasts, as the area is full of wineries, where you can find out how their wine is made as many of them offer guided tours.

Hotel Abba San Sebastián is a palatial baroque town house on the Paseo de Francia in San Sebastián, beside the river in a spot listed as a protected area.

 

It is just 5 minutes from the old town, the Kursaal and the city centre and just 900 metres from La Concha beach. Its location, its luxurious rooms and personalised service make it ideal for enjoying the capital of Gipuzkoa province.

The Iturriaga Ostatua guest house is accommodation designed for resting, where the guest comes first. All the rooms have a private bathroom, television and internet connection, and a shared open area with a coffee machine and microwave.

 

Half an hour from the famous Seven Streets and not far from the centre, it is perfect for walking everywhere, but it also has bus routes and the metro very nearby.

Cruces Metro Rooms is a totally new guest house with cosy rooms. They all have a private bathroom, wifi, wardrobe and flat-screen TV.

 

Located in Barakaldo, just opposite the Cruces hospital, it is next to a metro stop that will take you to Bilbao in 5 minutes and the centre of Barakaldo in 2 minutes. There are restaurants, supermarkets and a full range of services within easy reach of the establishment.

The Hotel Bidaia in San Sebastián is in an excellent location in the city, in the central Gros neighbourhood. It's just 15 minutes from La Zurriola beach, a favourite with surfers, and very close to the old town and the Victoria Eugenia theatre.

 

Each of the rooms has been designed to conserve the original wood and stone, to create unique spaces that are all different.

 

It has 24-hour reception, bar and restaurant, and a beautiful garden with a terrace for relaxing on. It also has its own parking and offers an airport transfer service at an extra cost.

Arriet apartments in Bilbao are located very close to the museum of fine art, the Guggenhaim museum and Zubuzuri, the famous Calatrava bridge.

 

They have a fully-equipped kitchen, air conditioning, flat-screen TV, free WiFi and shared bathroom with shower and hair dryer.

 

Arriet is 10 minutes from the Artxanda funicular, the Palacio Euskalduna and the Arriaga theatre, and just 5 kilometres from the airport. A centrally-located establishment to see the whole of Bilbao.

Ixua stands in a natural setting, on the road linking Eibar to Bizkaia province across the mountains. It has a restaurant, bar, garden and free WiFi, and all its rooms are soundproofed to make sure you sleep soundly.  

 

All of them have views of the mountains, air conditioning, heating, a desk, a bathroom with shower or bath, hair dryer and a wellness and beauty service on request.  

 

The restaurant, a local landmark, serves traditional food and grilled specialities.

Hotel Palacio de Luko, in the locality of the same name, stands in a green setting bursting with nature, a stone's throw from Ullibarri-Gamboa reservoir and just 10 kilometres from Vitoria-Gasteiz. 

 

Art, architecture and design rub shoulders in this fine house; past and present mingle in the place packed with history.  

 

It has 10 rooms, two of them suites, and reading rooms to relax in after a day's sightseeing. It also has rooms for private functions like weddings or company events.

This establishment, classic in design, is beside the Plaza Gipuzkoa in the city centre, 5 minutes' walk from beautiful La Concha beach.

 

The hotel has spacious, well-lit rooms equipped with free WiFi, flat-screen TV, air conditioning, fully-equipped bathroom with hair dryer, toiletries, gym, meeting and function rooms and a bar with terrace, among other facilities and services.

 

It is 30 minutes from the airport and very handy for train and bus stations.

The name of this hotel is a nod to the fire that devastated San Sebastián on 31st August 1813. The street where the hotel stands, Calle 31 de Agosto, was the only one not to burn, hence the name, an allusion to the city's rebirth.

 

It is very handy for the old quarter, and just a few minutes' walk from the harbour and La Zurriola beach.

 

It has seven spacious, modern rooms, among them a 46 square-metre suite with a French-style balcony. All of them have free WiFi, flat-screen TV, air conditioning, private bathroom and desk.

The establishment is located in a part of San Sebastián that is highly popular with tourists, beside the Victoria Eugenia theatre, between the beaches of La Concha and La Zurriola.

 

Housed in a romantic 19th-century building, it has 11 rooms and 6 studio suites inspired by local food, with a décor that pays homage to the culinary artists of the Basque Country.

 

All the rooms are equipped with LED TV, free WiFi and a private bathroom with hair dryer and toiletries. The hotel also has services like loan of umbrellas and beach towels, tourist information, event and restaurant booking and baggage storage, among other things.

This hotel and grill restaurant is in Eibar, a perfect base for exploring the whole of the Basque Country. At the centre of the country's three provinces, the place combines history, fine food and culture.

 

Arriarte is in a natural setting, ideal to switch off and relax for a few days. It has 15 double rooms with panoramic views of the green hills, hydromassage shower, full private bathroom with hair dryer and amenities and free WiFi.

 

Highlights among its facilities include an asador restaurant specialising in grilled dishes, two spacious terraces and a car park for guests.

Líbere Bilbao La Vieja apartments are 5 minutes from the Muelle de Marzana, La Ribera market and the old town, right in the heart of the city.   

 

Located in one of the most atmospheric, culturally vibrant neighbourhoods of the city, this accommodation is very well-connected via public transport, with bus and tram stops, a metro station, railway stations and taxis to get around the whole of Bilbao and its surrounding area. 

 

It has smart TV, wifi, wardrobes, sofa bed, air conditioning, fully-equipped kitchen, hair dryer, amenity pack and much more. It also has online 24/7 reception where you can consult tourist information and change your booking at any time.

Líbere Bilbao Museo apartments are the perfect base from which to discover the capital of Bizkaia province. They are just 20 metres from the Guggenheim museum, in a very lively area with a full range of facilities at your fingertips.

 

The accommodation is very well-connected, on several city bus routes and very close to the metro. Packed with restaurants, museums, shops and lots of leisure options.

 

It has smart TV, wifi, wardrobes, sofa bed, air conditioning, fully-equipped kitchen, hair dryer, amenity pack and much more. It also has online 24/7 reception where you can consult tourist information and change your booking at any time.

Located between the mountains of Upo and Artanda, this accommodation in the locality of Zaratamo is in a very quiet country setting.  

 

All the rooms have a free wifi connection, heating and television. There are also common areas in which to relax and make yourself comfortable.  

 

It also has a restaurant serving midday and evening meals every day.

This accommodation is located in Las Arenas, Getxo. On the Bizkaia coast, from here you can get to Las Arenas beach or the Bizkaia Bridge in a few minutes. It is also just 25 minutes' drive from the airport.  

 

The apartments have a fully-equipped kitchen, a dining area, flat-screen TV, private bathroom with shower and hair dryer and bed linen.

La Escondida is located in Muskiz, just 2 kilometres from La Arena beach. It is country holiday accommodation for adults only, made up of three floors and an adjoining cabin fitted out as a suite. 

 

This colonial-style house consists of a dining room, bathrooms, a porch, a corner with a computer and wifi connection, a space to relax in with a kettle and a coffee machine, spacious rooms and a cabin: a romantic suite equipped with everything you need to relax in privacy. 

 

It also has free parking and a laundry and ironing service.

Tabernaldeko Soloa is charming country holiday accommodation a stone's throw from Bakio beach. It stands in an attractive natural setting at the foot of the mountain of Jata and just a few minutes from San Juan de Gaztelugatxe. It is in a strategic location, perfect for visiting the biosphere reserve of Urdaibai and the surrounding area.

 

It has comfortable, cosy rooms with everything you need for a good rest and with no need to worry about a thing: airport transfers, cleaning service, free wifi and parking, km 0 breakfast, laundry service and special dietary needs catered for.

 

It also offers a service to contact local guides for guided tours and visits around the area.

Located on the Plaza circular in the Abando district, this accommodation is a perfect base from which to visit the whole city in a short time and soak up all its atmosphere. It is very close to the Gran Vía and a few metres from the Old Town, in an area with plenty of public transport: the Renfe railway station, the tram, city buses and a metro station.

 

It has different types of room to suit different kinds of guest, as it is a hostel suitable for families, groups, couples or people travelling alone. It also has various public areas for socialising. On one side is La Granja, with reception and a bar where you can have a snack or a drink; on the other is El Txoko, which serves breakfast and organises events.

In the municipality of Zuia, in Álava province, these apartments boast a natural setting. Moreover, they are the perfect base for countless sporting and cultural activities and just getting away from everyday routine.

 

The accommodation has a place to keep bicycles, a workshop and cleaning area and private cycle parking. It also has an electric charging point for electric vehicles and breakfast and/or evening meal can be ordered in advance.

datosContacto.direccion: Calle Campo de la Cruz 8, bajo

datosGenerales.descripcion:
Country holiday accommodation in the small village of Ataun, in the Goierri valley. Surrounded by mountains, caves and dolmens and nature parks like Aralar.

 

It has spacious rooms, a living room and a kitchen and two fully-equipped bathrooms.

 

A country house in a natural setting, perfect for getting away from it all, going walking and enjoying the best cider breweries with your family or friends.

Líbere Vitoria apartments are just a few minutes from the cathedral of María Inmaculada (the New Cathedral). They are in a very well-connected area, with several bus stops and just a stone's throw from the tram line.

 

All the rooms are air conditioned and have a fully-equipped kitchen, wifi, wardrobes, amenities and hair dryer. It also has a car park, laundry service and 24/7 online reception.

Bakubitxi is country holiday accommodation in outstanding surroundings: in a natural setting very close to the Gorbeia nature park. It is in the locality of Zuia in Álava province, in a quiet area full of green spaces.

 

The house has an area for barbecues with outdoor tables and chairs and a spacious garden to enjoy with all the family. It is very handy for places of interest like Vitoria-Gasteiz and/or the Añana salt pans, and the area offers a wide variety of things to do.

Accommodation located close to the Añana Salt Pans, a World Heritage Site. The locality of Añana has a rich heritage and several places of great interest.

 

It has spacious rooms and a modern bar restaurant serving a wide range of pintxos and midweek and weekend set meals.

Located in Labastida, in the heart of Rioja Alavesa, this country holiday accommodation is perfect for discovering all the secrets of the culture of wine and simply relaxing, as it is in a very quiet area.

 

The rooms have private bathrooms with shower and hair dryer, and the accommodation also has free parking and a large garden to relax in.

Rumin Enea  is in a perfect natural setting for taking a break from routine. In Villaverde, at the foot of Monte Toloño, it consists of several apartments.

 

Each of the apartments has a fully-equipped kitchen and bedrooms, including a washing machine, dishwasher, oven coffee machine, toaster, towels, ingredients for breakfast, gel, shampoo and everything you need for a perfect stay. It also has a wifi connection.

This 17th-century baroque town house is in the Cuadrilla (county) of Añana, in the small municipality of Armañón. It is in a quiet area full of places of interest. The house is booked as a whole for family breaks and/or private events.

 

It has a lounge, rooms with private bathrooms, a dining room, kitchen, garden and even a wine cellar. It also has a secret passage to take you to a wonderful dome in a journey to another dimension.

Hotel very close to the centre of Bilbao, with various places of interest within a few minutes' walk. It is a perfect base to see the city, as it is very well connected by public transport: metro stations, a railway station and bus stops.

 

The rooms are spacious and modern, equipped with air conditioning, wifi, strong box, flat-screen TV and fully-equipped private bathroom with hair dryer, amenities, towels and shower.

Accommodation located in a privileged place, in the middle of a Biosphere Reserve. Situated in an ideal environment for hiking, cycling routes, visiting the coastal area and enjoying dream beaches.

 

The flats feature a fully equipped kitchen and bathroom, WiFi, underfloor heating, free parking and a communal outdoor terrace. A bicycle rental service is also available.

Hotel located in the municipality of Errigoiti, an enclave with an extensive historical heritage. It is located in a natural environment full of leafy trees and paths where you can stroll and disconnect.

 

With spacious rooms, all of them have a bathroom, balcony or terrace, television and WiFi. In addition, the hotel offers breakfast service, and the area is accessible for parking.

The Katu Kale flats are in Getaria, in the heart of the old town and a two-minute walk from the beach. The location is perfect for hiking, cycling and diving.

 

The accommodation features a fully equipped kitchen, flat-screen TV, desk, seating area with sofa, ironing facilities, private bathroom with shower, hairdryer and toiletries.

Located in Bilbao, less than 1 km from the Arriaga Theatre and Old Town, perfect for discovering the whole city in a short time. With several points of interest such as the Museum of Fine Arts, the Euskalduna Conference, and Music Centre, and the Artxanda Funicular.

 

The hotel stands for a sustainable and healthy philosophy as it offers ecological products and services and a professional gym open 24 hours a day.

 

The rooms include a desk, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels, and a flat-screen TV. There is a 24-hour reception, and a continental or buffet breakfast is served in the mornings.

Located in the municipality of Asparrena, it is full of natural treasures such as the source of the river Zirauntza or the cave of Leze. It is also known for its monuments: the baroque building of the town hall and the 15th-century church of San Pedro, among others.

 

It is ideal for people who want to enjoy nature and pilgrims on the Ignatian and Santiago pilgrimage routes.

This adults-only luxury hotel was inaugurated in 2020. It has exquisitely decorated rooms, as well as a delicious gastronomic offer, Amelia by Paulo Airaudo, awarded with 2 Michelin stars.

 

The hotel is in one of the best areas of San Sebastian, centrally located and ideal for visiting tourist attractions such as Paseo de La Concha, Peine del Viento, and/or Parte Vieja, among others.

 

 The rooms are equipped with a kettle and coffee maker, flat-screen TV and minibar, and some have sea views.

The Martiamuno farmhouse is in the middle of nature, just 4 km from Zumarraga. Surrounded by forests, green meadows, and mountains, it is perfect for disconnecting, hiking, and cycling.

 

It has free parking and WiFi, a common area for relaxing with a wood-burning fireplace, a fully equipped kitchen option, a garden area with tables, chairs, barbecue, and homemade and organic breakfasts.

This Victorian mansion is in San Sebastian, between Mount Ulia and Zurriola Beach, in the district of Gros. Its location is perfect for getting to know the whole city and being a quiet area surrounded by bars and restaurants.

 

The hotel has a swimming pool, a self-service bar, common areas to relax, private parking, free WiFi, laundry and dry cleaning, continental or buffet breakfast, and online check-in and check-out.

 

A welcome pack awaits you in your room and free coffee is available throughout your stay.

This accommodation is located in an environment full of nature in the municipality of Lemoa.

 

It offers the perfect place to relax, surrounded by the Aramotz and Arraño mountains.

The Basoan agrotourism is located in Mungia, in the middle of nature. It is 10 km from Bilbao and very close to the Basque Coast.

 

The flats feature a flat-screen TV, free WiFi, air conditioning, a living room with a sofa, an equipped kitchen with a dining area and a private bathroom with toiletries and a hairdryer.

 

The property offers continental breakfasts and has an outdoor swimming pool. An airport shuttle service is available for a surcharge.

This guesthouse is located in the municipality of Oiartzun, surrounded by green mountains and just a few kilometres from the sea. Nearby is the Aiako Harria Natural Park, the perfect place to recharge your batteries and spend a few days in the heart of nature.

 

The accommodation has been recently refurbished. It has spacious, modern rooms, private bathroom and common areas such as a garden with terrace and a living room with sofas and television.

M&uga is located in the historic centre of Elorrio, in an ideal setting for rest and relaxation. This municipality is home to a valuable historical heritage and is also surrounded by green valleys where you can enjoy nature.

 

Thanks to its location, those staying at M&uga will be able to visit Bilbao, Vitoria-Gasteiz, San Sebastian and the Basque Coast in less than an hour.

 

Its services include a garden, a terrace and free WiFi in all its facilities. It also has a flat-screen TV, safe, private bathroom, desk and bed linen and towels in all rooms.

Livensa Living Bilbao is a student residence located in Deusto, next to the Estuary. It is just a few steps away from Sarriko University and a short walk from Deusto University, and it is also very well connected with the Leioa Campus thanks to public transport.

 

It has everything necessary to make the people who live there feel at home. The rooms have a private bathroom and a fully equipped kitchen, as well as WiFi, Smart TV and air conditioning.

 

It also offers common areas such as library, cinema, gym, terrace and lounges and services such as catering, cleaning, access control and 24/7 security.

The Hotel Nirea was born from the idea of creating a space for rest and disconnection in downtown, in fact, it is located in one of the main streets in the heart of Vitoria-Gasteiz.

 

Very close to Florida Park and the Cathedral of María Inmaculada, this accommodation has spacious and modern rooms. In addition, each of them has a private bathroom with all the necessary toiletries.

This farmhouse is located on the Basque Coast, in the seaside town of Getaria. It is in a very quiet area surrounded by vineyards and with views of the Bay of Biscay. Perfect for people who love wine tourism.

 

It has spacious rooms and a suite, all of them facing the sea. It also has outdoor terraces, a lounge with a viewpoint, a dining room, a reading area, a tasting room, a relaxation area and even its own wine cellar.

This rural accommodation is located in Rioja Alavesa, in the municipality of Elvillar. In a setting full of prehistoric remains and vineyards, this rustic complex is perfect for resting and disconnecting.

 

It is located between two dolmens, on the one hand, the famous dolmen of La Chabola de la Hechicera, and on the other, the dolmen of El Encinal, two highly recommended points of interest.

Flats located in the surfing town of Zarautz, very central and next to the beach. Perfect for a holiday enjoying the coast and tasting its rich gastronomy.

 

Isaga consists of flats, studios and suites fully equipped with bathroom, full kitchen, coffee maker, air conditioning, WiFi, Smart TV, sofa bed, hairdryer and even a cot or highchair if necessary.  

 

It also offers personalised attention via Whatsapp, non face-to-face check-in and check-out and parking subject to availability.

Gozamena are flats located in the centre of the coastal town of Zarautz, just a few metres from the Old Town and with all kinds of services close to the establishment. They are ideal for people who want to disconnect while enjoying the surf and the beach.

 

There are two flats, Surf and Mendi, and they have services such as parking, WiFi, breakfast, kitchen, TV, areas to work with your laptop, washing machine and dryer, air conditioning and heating, smart lock and a complete bathroom.

Hator Apartamentuak are modern flats very close to the Old Town and the beach of Zarautz. They are located in a central and quiet area, with all the necessary services close at hand.

 

They have spacious beds, television, sofa, private bathroom, WiFi, air conditioning, parking and everything you need for a comfortable stay.

Donibanea is located in one of the most charming towns on our coast, in Pasai Donibane, closely linked to the sea. It is located in the old town, very close to the port of Pasaia.

 

It has spacious and modern rooms, with private bathroom, television and all the necessary comforts to rest.

This farmhouse is located in Santa Cruz de Campezo, the perfect destination for people who love hiking and nature in general.

 

Inta Landetxea offers the option of booking the whole house or renting just one of the two rooms. It has spacious rooms with private bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen and a large garden with barbecue.

 

They also allow pets and provide high chairs and cots for babies to make your stay more comfortable.

Milimara is made up of suites designed for relaxation. It is located in a very quiet area of San Sebastian which, in turn, is ideal for enjoying the city.

 

The studios are spacious and bright and have a bedroom with a double bed and built-in wardrobes, a living room with a sofa bed, a private bathroom with gel and shampoo and a small office.

 

In addition, all suites have a microwave, toaster, juicer, iron and ironing board, coffee maker, blender, WiFi and all kinds of amenities.

This hotel is perfectly located to explore Bilbao, as it is close to the center. In addition, there is a wide variety of public transport in the area: tram, bus and metro stations among others.

 

In terms of accommodation, it houses modern and spacious rooms. Each of them has high-speed internet, cable TV, desk and private bathroom.

Kora Green City is located in the heart of our green capital, a 15-minute walk from one of the most important areas of Vitoria-Gasteiz: the Old Town, known as La Almendra Medieval (the middle ages almond).

 

This aparthotel houses spacious studios and apartments in a building designed to reduce noise and provide the best conditions for rest. In addition, it is made up of spaces such as coworking areas, a txoko where you can cook, sports facilities of 4,000 square meters free for people staying and a roof terrace with a swimming pool and hammocks.

This accommodation is designed for university students who want to study in the Gipuzkoan capital. These studios are located next to the most important campuses in San Sebastian.

They are perfect for resting, studying and sharing the experience with more people, since they have several common areas such as games rooms, cinema, gym, library and other spaces to rest.

The rooms are spacious and equipped with everything you need to make your stay comfortable: full kitchen, private bathroom, Wi-Fi and television.

Gran Zubieta La Concha is just a few metres from San Sebastián's most famous beach. 

 

Made up of apartments and studio flats, the establishment offers a full range of services to make guests feel at home: double bed, room with sofa bed, fully-equipped kitchen and bathroom, all with top-quality designer interiors.

 

Among other things it has wifi, towels and sheets, amenities, cots and high chairs plus 24-hour service.

This hotel in San Sebastián is in an outstanding location, on a natural viewpoint but also in the centre of the city. 

 

It is housed in a historic building, a former convent dating from the 17th and 18th centuries perched on a hill offering spectacular views of La Concha bay. 

 

It has spacious, elegant rooms, a bar, a gastronomic restaurant, panoramic pool and terrace, gym, wellness zone with spa, parking and free wifi. It also has a laundry service, dry cleaner, rooms for meetings and events, a library and a car rental service.

This hotel stands just 10 minutes from one of the most popular beaches with surfers, Zurriola. The neighbourhood is perfect for visiting the whole of San Sebastián, as it is near the city's main places of interest. 

 

With regard to rooms, they are large and equipped with all the comforts: smart TV with Chrome Cast, personalised temperature control, air conditioning, free wifi and full bathroom - and some of them have terraces with sea views.

The Bed4U hotel is beside the Palacio de Aiete in the mark of the same name, just a couple of kilometres from the spectacular Concha beach. It is in a central location with a full range of services to make the most of your stay in the city.

 

It has double and single rooms with air conditioning, free wifi, smart TV with Chrome Cast, personalised temperature control, full bathroom and the option of a terrace.
Luxury country house in the middle of nature, located just 20 minutes from Donostia - San Sebastián, it is an excellent place for those who are looking for exclusivity and privacy.

El Retiro del Obispo is country holiday accommodation in the mediaeval town of Laguardia, the capital of Rioja Alavesa. Surrounded by vineyards and wineries, it is decorated in the timeless style of a castle. 

 

The house stands in one of the charming streets of the walled town, right next to one of the town gates. It has four floors that can be rented individually. Each of them is named after one of the Seven Heavens and has one or two bedrooms with private bathroom and access to a kitchen and terrace. 

 

One of the floors also offers the option of having a private kitchen during your stay, making it a self-contained apartment.

datosGenerales.nombre: La Palmera Landetxea - Casa Rural La Palmera
datosGenerales.descripcion:
La Palmera country holiday accommodation is located in Lasarte-Oria, just a few minutes from San Sebastián, in a natural setting perfect for relaxing and disconnecting for a few days. 

 

It has a garden covering over 2,000 square metres, full of fruit trees and a large palm tree which gives the accommodation its name. The rooms are spacious and cosy and include continental breakfast, smart TV, extra-large beds, online check-in and smartphone door opening. 

 

The rooms also have a terrace and bathroom. Heating, dining room, living room, microwave and washing machine, among other amenities.

This accommodation is in a favourite place for surfers, the seaside town of Zarautz. It is located 500 metres from the beach and offers cycle hire. 

 

Zarautz Loft is made up of fully-equipped apartments with private bathroom, air conditioning, kitchen with washing machine and a full range of comforts and a living room. Guests can also use the free car park.

Santa Marina includes a series of apartments in a perfect place to enjoy the seaside town of Zarautz. They are in the centre, a five-minute walk from the beach in a neighbourhood packed with pintxo bars and restaurants. 

 

The rooms are modern and recently-built, with a full range of amenities within easy reach of the apartment. Each apartment has air conditioning, private bathroom, a living room with flat-screen television and a fully-equipped kitchen.

The Goxo-Goxo country house is located in Errezil, a municipality in the province of Gipuizkoa that offers a natural environment full of rural landscapes. Green meadows, typical farmhouses and old hermitages full of history make up this village full of stone houses. 

 

The accommodation consists of two bright flats with terrace, private garden and parking.

 

They also have a barbecue for the garden, a kitchen equipped with all kinds of utensils and electrical appliances, a sofa-bed for two people and, if necessary, cots and other comforts for families. 

 

The flats can be booked separately or both at the same time.

Agerre Berri Rural House is located in Larraul, a municipality in Tolosaldea surrounded by an interesting natural environment, perfect for pleasant walks and disconnecting from routine. 

 

This accommodation has a living room with a fireplace, two double rooms and a single room, a fully equipped kitchen, bathroom, terrace and car park. 

 

Moreover, those who stay here will not have to worry about anything, as bed linen, towels, toiletries, etc. are provided.

The Aristondo Guesthouse is located in the coastal town of Getaria, a strategic point for exploring the Basque Coast. It is a very central accommodation, as it is in one of the main streets of the town. 

 

It has spacious and modern rooms and flats, intimate spaces where you can relax with all the comforts.  The rooms have private bathrooms and viscoelastic mattresses as well as amenities. The flats have large beds, a fully equipped kitchen and sofa beds.
