The accommodation has a 24-hour check-in service so you don't have to worry about your arrival time.

This hostel is located in Portugalete, right next to our architectural jewel: the Bizkaia Bridge, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. It is also 8 minutes walk from the metro station and the train station. 

 

It has 10 beds made up of well-equipped bunk beds: pillow, duvet, towel, curtain, lighting and plug. It has a kitchen-dining room with all kinds of electrical appliances and the stay includes breakfast.

 

They also have WiFi connection and electronic lockers under the bunk beds.

The Ondarbaso rural flats are perfect for discovering the inland and the coast of Gipuzkoa, as they are located in a strategic enclave for enjoying both. They are located in Zestoa, a rural municipality that has a lot to offer: springs with curative properties, archaeological sites, caves, palaces and much more. 

 

The Ondabaso flats have a kitchen-dining room, a living room, a private bathroom and comfortable rooms perfect for resting. In addition, the kitchen is equipped with dishwasher, cutlery and electrical appliances. 

 

There is also wifi, heating, hairdryer, bed linen, smart tv, clothes hangers, a desk and everything necessary for guests to have everything they need.

The Mundaka Surf Camp Apartments are located in the heart of the Urdaibai Biosphere Reserve. Located in the heart of Mundaka, very close to the port, with a great attraction for surfers.

 

The building, completely refurbished in 2021, has 8 flats, all of them with private bathroom and kitchen. Each flat is named after one of the Basque Coast's essential spots: Laga, Izaro, San Juan, Ogeia, Laida...

 

A parking space in a nearby building is guaranteed with the reservation. They have a lockable room for storing sports equipment.

The Emieta farmhouse is located in the Aiako Harria Natural Park, a natural spot where you can disconnect and go hiking. Once a family farmhouse, it has now been converted into tourist accommodation and welcomes people who want to get to know Oiartzun and the surrounding area. 

 

Visitors will have the opportunity to taste homemade apples, honey and beef, as the three pillars of agrotourism are apple trees, beehives and cows. They also have homemade cheese and lamb, as well as the option of mountain routes and excursions. 

 

The whole house is for rent, with four bedrooms: three doubles and one with two beds and two cots. It has three bathrooms equipped with washbasin, shower and hairdryer and a kitchen equipped with all the necessary utensils. It also has a barbecue and a txoko, fireplace, two televisions, heating, washing machine and wifi connection.

The Pillotegi 12 flats are located in the capital of Gipuzkoa, 3 km from la Concha Promenade. The apartments are perfect for visiting any part of San Sebastian and relaxing after a day of sightseeing.

 

They have free parking for all guests, air conditioning, flat screen TV, washing machine, coffee machine and fully equipped kitchen and even a small living room incorporated into the flat.

Tradition and avant-garde come together in this hotel that reflects the history of Bilbao in the best way. It is located in the Old Quarter of the city, very close to the Estuary, right next to the Merced Bridge. 

 

The rooms are spacious and soundproofed as they have been designed to rest and recharge your batteries. Each room has premium Wifi, kettle, safe, climate control, smart TV, king size bed, climatic windows and complimentary water. 

 

They also have a private car park in front of the hotel, cots for babies, a chill out area, a free gym, a gastronomic wine cellar, a restaurant, luggage storage, parking assistance and even a laundry service.

These flats are located in the rural municipality of Aia, surrounded by mountains, vineyards and natural parks and, at the same time, close to the coast. They are located in the Zipiotegi farmhouse, a 19th century stone building typical of the area. 

 

The accommodation consists of two flats, both modern and very cosy. They are equipped with all kinds of comforts: internet, television, equipped kitchen and living-dining room in an open space, private bathroom and bedrooms with double beds and, in the case of one of the flats, with bunk beds. 

 

In addition, Arbela has common areas such as a games room, a porch, a free car park and a delicious txakoli of the same name that you can taste during your stay.

The Kaixo Bilbao flats are located in the city centre, less than 2 km from the Intermodal Bus Station and very close to the Bilbao Fine Arts Museum. 

 

All accommodation features spacious bedrooms with modern air conditioning, private bathroom, flat-screen TV and fully equipped kitchen. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property.

The Ederrena flats are perfect for people who want to enjoy the Basque Coast as they are located in Zarautz and very close to other coastal towns in the area. 

 

They are centrally located, 15 minutes walk from the beach and surrounded by all kinds of services, bars and restaurants. At the same time, the area where they are located is very quiet.

This house is located in Las Encartaciones, in the natural setting of the municipality of Lanestosa. It is surrounded by green meadows and, at the same time, very close to all kinds of services as it is next to the centre.

 

Casa Vizcaya has 8 bedrooms, 5 bathrooms with shower and bathtub, equipped kitchen and parking for guests. It is also surrounded by a beautiful garden and offers free wifi in all rooms.

This accommodation is located in the Zorroza neighbourhood of Bilbao, very well connected to the city centre by the local train and bus lines. It is also very close to the town of Barakaldo, full of parks and leisure areas.

 

The rooms offered by Bilbao Rooms and Kitchen Zorroza are very spacious and have a desk, flat screen TV, private bathroom with shower and amenities and some of them have a balcony. They also have common areas that include a lounge, kitchen, laundry, lounge area and a bar very close to the accommodation with a terrace and kitchen open all day.

The BMA flats have an excellent location as they are only 100 metres from the Guggenheim Museum Bilbao and 500 metres from the Fine Arts Museum. They are also very close to the Old Town and the commercial area of the capital.

 

They are modern accommodations with all kinds of comforts as they have everything you need for a pleasant stay: shower, hairdryer, coffee maker, kettle, towels, sheets, TV, free wifi and kitchen equipped with the necessary utensils and appliances.

Launtzin Landetxea is very close to the Gorbea Natural Park, specifically in the medieval village of Areatza, declared a Cultural Asset with the category of Monumental Site.

 

It has a large terrace with barbecue and garden, free parking, wifi throughout the establishment and a shared room. As for the rooms, all of them have heating and private bathroom and are fully soundproofed. 

 

The kitchen is also shared and there is tourist information in the accommodation itself.

La Venta de Bodegas Ostatu is a rural house located in Samaniego, in the heart of Rioja Alavesa. In addition to the accommodation, they have a wine cellar where they make and preserve wine in a traditional way. They have a txoko, wine bar, restaurant, shop...

 

Samaniego is an obligatory stop on the famous Rioja Alavesa wine route. Its wineries and vineyards form a characteristic landscape of this land.

The Deustown flats are located in the Deusto neighbourhood, in an area very well connected by public transport, as it has metro and bus stops. In addition, they are located a few steps away from the most interesting places in the city: Euskalduna Palace, Guggenheim Museum Bilbao, Arriaga Theatre... 

 

The accommodation has free wifi throughout the establishment, flat screen TV, private bathroom with shower and hairdryer, kitchen equipped with oven, microwave, toaster, coffee maker and kettle in each of the flats.

 

There is also a washing machine and heating.

The Ibis Budget Vitoria-Gasteiz Hotel is located very close to the main points of interest in the city and very well connected with public transport. It is also surrounded by all the necessary services to make your stay as pleasant as possible.

 

Just a few minutes walk away, you will find the Old Town, known as the Medieval Almond, where you can taste the best of our gastronomy, visit museums and, in general, enjoy your leisure and free time. 

 

The rooms are comfortable and modern and all have private bathroom with amenities, free Wifi, Smart TV, side table and hairdryer on request. Perfect for business or leisure trips. 

 

There is also a car park very close to the motorway.

The Gernihost flats are in the heart of Gernika-Lumo, a town steeped in history and culture. Located just a few steps from the famous Gernika Tree and the Peace Museum, you will be immersed in the unique atmosphere of this iconic town.

What's more, they are located in Urdaibai, a Biosphere Reserve dotted by the sea.

These modern flats offer amenities such as free Wi-Fi, equipped kitchen, washing machine, air conditioning and heating. Each flat has a private bathroom and a contemporary design for a comfortable and pleasant stay.

Urbaia is the perfect retreat for those looking for a relaxing and unforgettable stay near San Sebastian. 

 

With a total of 18 rooms, all with private bathrooms, this accommodation offers a unique experience of comfort and elegance. They are fully equipped with all the amenities: from a comfortable working space to luxurious beds for the perfect rest.

 

In addition, the strategic location of the accommodation allows easy access to the most emblematic places of San Sebastian, from La Concha beach to the picturesque neighbourhoods of the old town.

At Poshtel Bilbao, located just a short walk from the Guggenheim Museum Bilbao, you have the option of sharing a room in comfortable bunk beds or booking a private room for more privacy. It's the perfect place to relax and be close to the area.  They also offer a lively programme of activities so you can make the most of your visit.

 

It offers free Wi-Fi, private lockers in the rooms and a bar-restaurant called Txio.

Enjoy a unique getaway in a cosy rural house. This charming house, located in the heart of Ayala, is rented out completely, giving you the privacy and comfort you need to relax and unwind.

Aldamoli combines rustic charm with modern comforts, creating the perfect setting for your getaway. With spacious interiors and stunning natural surroundings, you'll have everything you need to escape the hustle and bustle of the city and recharge your batteries.

 

A perfect stay for people who love nature, as you will be able to explore the iconic trails of the Sierra Salvada, discovering its rich wildlife and natural surroundings.

Located just 15 minutes' drive from Vitoria-Gasteiz, the house is on two floors, with the owners living on the first floor and sharing the main entrance with the guests. Its single-storey design makes it perfect for family gatherings, from babies to the elderly, as well as for get-togethers with friends.

 

They also offer space for personal development retreats, yoga or other activities and workshops. With a total of 4 bedrooms, including 3 doubles and 1 single, up to 14 people can be comfortably accommodated. 

 

Also, if you have an idea in mind and you think that Zarrian Barri could be the right place to carry it out, you can consult us.

Stay at Aista Landetxea and immerse yourself in the cultural and natural wealth of Ajangiz, a municipality that forms part of the Urdaibai Biosphere Reserve in the region of Busturialdea. Surrounded by Atlantic forest and coastal holm oak groves, the town offers a splendid view from the monumental church of the Assumption of the Lord and the neoclassical town hall in the town square.

 

In this agritourism you can enjoy the surrounding nature and relax in a peaceful setting that is also close to towns such as Gernika, Bermeo and other beautiful coastal villages.

Located in Ordizia, in Goierri, it is an enclave of history and tradition with more than 750 years of medieval legacy. With cobbled streets and buildings that tell ancestral stories, the town is known for its weekly market, a traditional market full of typical products.

 

The hotel has 28 rooms with flat-screen TV, air conditioning, towels, private bathroom, WiFi and breakfast included. It has both single rooms and standard and superior double rooms. In addition, this accommodation has a cafeteria, restaurant and lounge with terrace. 

 

The restaurant is run by a team of renowned chefs who offer a unique gastronomic proposal, with exclusive dishes based on seasonal flavours and committed to the KM 0 philosophy and local products.

Located in Oiartzun, this accommodation is immersed in an exceptional natural landscape, in a mountainous area just a few kilometres from the sea. Moreover, part of Oiartzun belongs to the Aiako Harria Natural Park, the only granite massif in the Basque Country, a natural space characterised by its rich landscape.

The farmhouse offers everything necessary for a perfect stay, it is ideal for experiencing the tranquillity and beauty of nature, as it is a unique enclave where guests can enjoy the serenity of the surroundings and discover the cultural richness of the area.

Pensión Zaragoza is located in Hondarribia, just 7 minutes from the historic centre of the town. Due to its good location and proximity to the coast, it is possible to enjoy both mountain and sea-related activities.

 

The establishment offers 6 rooms designed for comfort, some of which include a private bathroom. It also has free parking on site and WiFi throughout the building.

This accommodation is in Laguardia, capital of the Rioja Alavesa region. It is an incomparable place for wine tourism lovers and for those who want to enjoy unique landscapes.

 

This town was founded in the Middle Ages and still preserves the medieval essence that characterises it and for which it receives thousands of tourists every year. Rest in Casa Garabitero after walking through the charming and narrow streets of Laguardia, visit the church of Santa María de los Reyes or go tasting in the surrounding wineries.

In the idyllic Biscayan municipality of Aulesti, less than 20 minutes by car from Lekeitio, you will find Ubilla Aterpetxea, an accommodation that fuses local tradition with contemporary comforts. This establishment offers visitors a unique experience, surrounded by the natural beauty of the Lea-Artibai region.

 

The rooms, all with private bathrooms, provide a cosy and peaceful space for people staying at Ubilla. On-site facilities include a restaurant, a bar and a garden, providing a relaxing atmosphere for those looking for a quiet getaway.

 

With amenities such as free WiFi, daily newspapers and a cash machine, Ubilla Aterpetxea strives to ensure a comfortable and convenient stay. Whether exploring the town centre and the seven neighbourhoods of Aulesti or simply enjoying the comforts of the accommodation, visitors will find a haven in this charming corner.

Ziortza-Bolibar is full of magical places full of nature in the heart of Bizkaia. Here you will find Karakate Baserria, an accommodation with the cosy charm of the traditional baserris and the comfort of a modern stay. 

 

The surroundings transport you to ancestral times and sensations in which to enjoy the tranquillity and tradition of the area. From the centre of Bolibar, a walk along the road will take you to the monastery of Zenarruza, an ancient collegiate church declared a National Monument of the Basque Country and of great importance for the passage of the Pilgrim's Route to Santiago de Compostela along the coast.

Surrounded by nature and green landscapes, Abaraxka Hostel is located in Azkoitia, 70 kilometres from San Sebastian. An old but modern Carmelite convent that combines the essence of a rural house with capacity for 50 people. 

This accommodation offers you a unique experience with rooms of different sizes to share in couples or groups. In addition, you can opt for full board (breakfast, lunch, dinner, picnic, lunch ...) and relax in the lounge with panoramic views (old chapel with high wooden ceilings).

The Hostel is bikefriedly and offers information on nearby routes for cycling enthusiasts. It is located in an environment with many possibilities. Ask about climbing areas and hiking trails, they will recommend you the best places in the area.

Oroimena country house is located near the centre of Andoain but in peaceful surroundings. This accommodation gives you the unique possibility of enjoying a place to rest while you explore a landscape with many possibilities.

The house is spacious, with capacity for 12 people and offers a garden, covered terrace with chill out and swimming pool. It has a fully equipped kitchen and a txoko with barbecue and grill, ideal for preparing meals.

Visit Vitoria-Gasteiz and feel at home in the Limehome Hotel-apartment in the heart of the city centre. With capacity for 100 people, the hotel offers flats with everything you need. From full kitchens to premium beds, everything you need to feel at home.

 

Vitoria-Gasteiz has a lot to offer for those looking for cultural visits or nature activities among others. The Gothic Cathedral of Santa María is one of the key points to visit in the capital, authors such as Kent Follet or Toti Martinez de Lezea have been inspired by it to write their novels. 

 

Take a stroll through the many green spaces in Vitoria-Gasteiz. Salburua Park is a migratory passage for the birds that rest in its lagoons.

Live an experience of luxury and history at the Arriluce Palace Hotel in Getxo. This palace was built in 1912 next to the beach of Ereaga and after its refurbishment it opens its doors as a 5-star hotel. It has its own gastronomic offer, croquet court, gym and spa among others.

 

Visit the cliffs and beaches of Getxo and get to know its surroundings, from cities like Bilbao to small charming villages like Sopela. In fact, one of the main attractions of Getxo is the Punta Galea promenade that runs along the coast until it reaches Sopela, passing through places of tourist interest.

In Ibarrangelu, in the Urdaibai Biosphere Reserve, we find Maison Landa, an accommodation on the coast of Bizkaia. Enjoy a unique space in Euskadi with a protected nature environment.

 

The municipality also has a rich historical heritage. Stroll through its streets to the chapel of the Sacred Heart of Jesus and contemplate its landscapes. Continuing on to the rural neighbourhood of Akorda, you will find the church of Santa María Engracia, built in 1520.

Located in Zarautz, a tourist destination par excellence, the Kaixo Marina Apartments are the ideal accommodation to enjoy a stay in one of the best located areas to discover the wonderful Basque Coast. They are very close to the beach and the historic centre of the town.

 

The flats in this air-conditioned accommodation are equipped with a full kitchen (dishwasher, oven, microwave, toaster, coffee maker, kettle), living area, flat-screen TV, washing machine and private bathroom with shower and hairdryer. Bed linen and towels are provided. 

 

It is perfect for excursions as it is close to many points of interest, and also for relaxing, as it has a garden and free WiFi.

The Apartahotel Eire is a series of new and modern flats located in the centre of the capital of the Basque Country. It is located just a few minutes from the Plaza de La Virgen Blanca and the Old Town and is the perfect accommodation for exploring the city from one side to the other. 

 

All the rooms are air-conditioned with underfloor heating and are soundproofed so that guests can rest. The flats are ideal for families, couples or individuals, and all have a fully equipped kitchen, kitchenware, smart TV, WiFi, large double bed and hairdryer. 

 

It also has private parking.

The Apartahotel Salburua is very close to Ataria, the Salburua Wetlands Interpretation Centre, to the north of the park of the same name. It is an area made up of several lagoons that offer routes, ornithological richness and even the possibility of observing herds of deer in their natural habitat.

 

As for the accommodation, it is a complex made up of spacious and bright flats in the heart of the green ring of Vitoria-Gasteiz. The flats have 1, 2 and 3 bedrooms and all of them have a double bedroom, terrace, an open space with kitchen and living room and a bathroom with shower. 

 

The accommodation has a fully-equipped kitchen, television, sofa-bed, desk, hairdryer, cot if necessary, laundry area and WiFi. There is also a cleaning service once a week.

This rural house is located in Azazeta, Arraia-Maeztu, a village in Alava very close to Vitoria-Gasteiz, our Green Capital. In an area with an important artistic and cultural heritage, Mara Mara is perfect for resting and enjoying the natural surroundings while hiking, as it is close to the Izki Natural Park and the Basque-Navarran Railway Greenway.

 

It has been recently refurbished in a modern and contemporary style and has two double bedrooms each with its own private bathroom, a common area with living room, kitchen and dining room and an outdoor area with private parking, porch and garden.

 

The whole house can be rented with a capacity for 6 people. It also has underfloor heating, washing machine and free WiFi throughout the accommodation.

Logune Rooms is located near the medieval centre of the capital of the Basque Country, the ideal location to enjoy the leisure activities that the city has to offer as a group or as a family. 

 

This accommodation is designed for groups  who want to share a room, as it has dormitories with capacity for groups of 4, 6, 8 or 10 people with private bathroom and shower.

 

Each room is equipped with lockers, free WiFi, heating and, in addition, guests can enjoy a communal kitchen and dining room and use the public car park 250 metres away.

Located 7 kilometres from Laguardia and 8 from Elciego, this beautiful country house is perfect for discovering all the ins and outs of Rioja Alavesa and, at the same time, disconnecting from the daily routine. Aldapa is the ideal accommodation to discover the places of interest that the region has to offer.

 

This accommodation has a capacity for up to 7 people as it has two double rooms, one with a double bed and the other with two large single beds, each with its own private bathroom. 

 

It has a private garden with views of endless vineyards where you can enjoy quiet breakfasts, unforgettable snacks and dreamy sunsets.

datosGenerales.nombre: ALOJAMIENTOS COSTA DEL VINO - APARTAMENTOS EL MOZO Y EL LAGAR
datosGenerales.descripcion:
Located in the municipality of Labastida, these two flats are the ideal accommodation to discover the best kept secrets of Rioja Alavesa. Stay at El Mozo or El Lagar de Labastida and enjoy a wonderful stay in this region. 

 

The El Mozo Apartment is designed for 2 guests. Situated in a privileged location in Labastida, you will be able to admire beautiful views of the endless sea of vineyards that surround it. It has a double bedroom, fully equipped bathroom and kitchen and a living room, all in a modern style.

 

As for the Lagar de Labastida penthouse, it is designed to accommodate up to 4 guests, as it has two bedrooms. It is surrounded by walks and gardens and only 30 metres from the Plaza de la Paz. It has a fully equipped kitchen and bathroom and a lounge-dining room.

 

Both flats offer free WiFi and public parking nearby.

Located in the historic centre of Manzanos, in Ribera Baja, this hostel belonging to Cuadrilla de Añana is perfect for disconnecting and enjoying nature. Discover its cultural heritage walking through its beautiful streets.

 

It has a capacity for 7-8 people and has two rooms, a single room with bathroom and a shared room with bathroom and bunk beds. It also has two common areas, a fully equipped kitchen and a living-dining room.

This flat located in Astigarraga is perfect to stay during the cider season, as the municipality where it is located is considered the "cider capital". It is also very close to San Sebastian, a city you cannot miss. 

 

In this region, the extensive apple orchards flourish thanks to the climate and the optimal conditions of the terrain. The cider industry is booming, attracting visitors to the establishments where cider is produced, especially during the season from mid-January to the end of March.

 

Enjoy an authentic cider feast and sample dishes such as cod omelette, grilled cutlet and cheese with quince jelly.

Itxaiz Baserria offers you the possibility of staying in Deba, one of the most charming villages on the Basque coast. Surrounded by small peaks, this region attracts numerous tourists every year, seduced by the beauty of its landscapes and the hospitality of its inhabitants. In one of the most impressive stretches of the Basque Coast, marine erosion has sculpted steep cliffs and a geologically intriguing plain that reveals itself at low tide, providing shelter for a variety of migratory birds. 

 

In addition, the municipality is distinguished by the peaceful coves of Mendata, Aitzuri and Sakoneta, as well as by its beaches, Santiago and Lapari. Accompanying these natural wonders are picturesque walks such as Sorozabal, Cárdenas and Arrantzales, which lead along the estuary to the town's marina.

Petit Goierri is a jewel of the 19th century, from a mill to a chicory and horseshoe factory, today it is a charming hotel located in Ormaiztegi, very close to natural parks such as Aralar or Aizkorri-Aratz. The ideal accommodation for people who love green tourism.

This quiet hotel has 11 rooms, single, double and family rooms, all of them prepared so that the rest of the guests is paramount, they even offer a pillow menu. In addition, each room has a different decoration inspired by nature and the green countryside.

All rooms include breakfast, a spectacular continental buffet that satisfies all tastes.

Just 3 km from the centre of Hernani and a 10-minute drive from San Sebastian is Pardiola Baserria, an accommodation offering stunning views of the surrounding mountains. It is perfect for hiking and disconnecting from the daily routine.

Amenities include air conditioning and free parking. The bright rooms have colourful and cheerful décor, flat-screen TV and private bathroom. The house also has a shared lounge-dining area with a fridge and microwave.

It is located 20 km from San Sebastian Airport and less than 25 minutes' drive from charming towns such as Orio, Zarautz, Getaria and Zumaia.

Pensión Irune ll is located in the picturesque old town of San Sebastian, a cosy gem just two minutes' walk from the beaches of La Concha and La Zurriola and points of interest such as the Aquarium, the Kursaal Conference Centre and the Plaza de la Constitución. 

 

The rooms at this accommodation are bright and equipped with air conditioning, flat-screen TV, heating, private bathroom and balcony, creating a cosy atmosphere with wooden floors and large windows. 

 

It also has free Wi-Fi connection and a 24-hour reception, everything you need to make your stay as comfortable as possible.

Located in the heart of San Sebastian's Old Town, the Pensión Artea Narrika ll is situated on the Boulevard, just a few minutes from the beaches of La Concha and La Zurriola. The accommodation combines modern design with a cosy atmosphere, seeking to make every visit to San Sebastian unforgettable.

 

Its fully equipped rooms harmoniously blend modern and rustic elements, creating the perfect atmosphere to relax after exploring the city. All rooms are equipped with flat-screen TV, safe, desk and wardrobe. They also have a balcony and a private bathroom with shower and hairdryer.

Off Beat Guesthouse defines itself as an eco-conscious tourist accommodation, located in the heart of San Sebastian's Old Town, specifically on the historic 31 de Agosto Street. Facing the challenge of revitalising a charming building that withstood the historic fire of 1813, the property offers a unique experience where no two rooms are alike.

 

With an original and eco-friendly approach, this centrally located accommodation fuses love and reuse to create a vibrant and artistic space, maintaining high standards of cleanliness and quality at all times, ensuring a comfortable stay for guests.

 

Off Beat Guesthouse seeks to provide a deep rest for visitors, conscious of the environmental impact of tourism. From recycled furniture to green electricity and the planting of one tree per booking, every detail contributes to a unique and sustainable experience that is felt throughout the stay.

Located in Berrobi, this country house is on the slopes of Mount Uzturre, in a captivating rural setting. Numerous farmhouses spread across the landscape, creating a cosy atmosphere in an enclave full of mountains and green meadows.

 

It has a double room, a living room and a kitchen exclusively for guests and a private car park to make your stay even more comfortable. The building has been refurbished, providing a modern and renovated atmosphere.

Located in San Sebastian, less than 1 km from the beautiful Zurriola Beach, Boutique Hotel Mendi Argia offers centrally located accommodation. Nearby, you will find points of interest such as the Kursaal Conference Centre and the Victoria Eugenia Theatre.

 

This boutique hotel has family rooms and a pleasant terrace as well as a restaurant, seasonal outdoor swimming pool and garden, providing a unique experience for guests.

 

The air-conditioned rooms have mountain views, air conditioning, wardrobe, free Wi-Fi, desk, flat-screen TV and private bathroom with shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. A buffet breakfast is included.

Located in San Sebastian, just 100 metres from Ondarreta beach, Satori Suites is the ideal accommodation for exploring the city's most important points of interest: La Concha promenade, Santa Clara Island, Peine del Viento, Miramar Palace and the Monte Igueldo funicular railway. Moreover, the nearest airport is only 18 km away.

 

This guesthouse offers the convenience of fast check-in and check-out, as well as free WiFi throughout the property. The air-conditioned rooms feature a desk, coffee machine, fridge, minibar, safety deposit box, flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower, as well as bed linen and towels.

Located in Oiartzun, 5 km from the charming port of Pasajes and 11 km from San Sebastian, this guesthouse is a welcoming option. Its location provides easy access to such highlights as FICOBA, 12 km away, and San Sebastian Airport is just 11 km away. 

 

The rooms feature amenities such as air conditioning, free Wi-Fi, a wardrobe, flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with hairdryer included. 

 

In addition, the guesthouse has a restaurant serving authentic local cuisine, and a bar that provides an ideal atmosphere to enjoy and relax. Free parking is available on site.

This guesthouse is located in one of the most central areas of San Sebastian, just a few metres from La Concha and close to points of interest such as the Old Part, Zurriola beach and the shopping area.

 

It is composed of comfortable rooms, intimate spaces designed in light and natural tones. In addition, in each room you will find teas and a bottle of water to relax after a day at the beach or a stroll around the city. They also have fully equipped en suite bathrooms.

 

In order to adapt to the needs of its guests, the guesthouse offers two check-in options: self check-in, which allows guests to arrive without the need for human contact, and assisted check-in, for those who prefer a more traditional service.

Right in the centre of San Sebastian is Colo Colo, a hostel with a new concept. Guests can enjoy their own "Casita", a private and independent bed designed to ensure privacy and comfort in shared rooms. The beds include an ipad to enjoy multimedia content. There are also common areas to share with other travellers.

 

The hostel is located less than 10 minutes walk from La Concha beach and the Old Town. It is a perfect alternative for travellers wishing to discover the whole city due to its location and services such as lockers where travellers can leave their backpacks, wetsuits or skates.

The Gaztainuzketa Apartments are located in Leintz-Gatzaga, in the heart of the Basque Country. They offer privileged access to a wide range of activities and places of interest, as just a few kilometres away there are picturesque places such as the Landa reservoir, full of routes and offering the opportunity to cool off in its crystal-clear waters.

 

You will be able to live a unique experience in high quality rural cabins, far exceeding the common standards of typical camping bungalows. Each one of them is built with wood and has a private terrace that invites you to immerse yourself in the natural surroundings and an atmosphere of peace and tranquillity.

 

In addition, these flats are fully equipped with all the amenities necessary for a pleasant stay, from bed linen and towels to kitchenware and plasma TVs.

Located in Urnieta, a municipality in Gipuzkoa, this Casa Rural is the perfect accommodation for people who love nature and, at the same time, want to discover the capital of the province, the beautiful San Sebastian, as it is only 10 km from Bidegurutzeta. 

 

This country house offers free WiFi, a garden, a children's play area and free private parking. It consists of two flats and a double room, with a total capacity for 13 people.

 

All rooms are equipped with flat-screen TV, private bathroom with everything you need for personal hygiene, hairdryer and shower and kitchen. You can also enjoy a good breakfast without leaving Bidegurutzeta.

Txoko Goxoa is a cosy guesthouse located in the heart of the picturesque medieval part of Hondarribia. The building of the guesthouse is literally built on the old wall, giving it a unique character and a privileged location in the historic centre of Hondarribia.

 

Recently renovated, this historic guesthouse has six rooms, five of them double and one single, all of them designed to provide comfort and tranquillity to the people who stay here. 

 

In addition, at certain times of the year, the guesthouse offers the unique opportunity to enjoy the guesthouse on a self-catering basis for groups of 8 to 9 people, allowing them to make use of the communal facilities, which include laundry service and fully equipped kitchen. This option gives visitors the freedom to enjoy their stay at their own pace, creating unforgettable memories in this historic and charming setting.

Balentziaga farmhouse offers an unrivalled experience for people looking to immerse themselves in nature and enjoy country life. Located in Azkoitia, at the foot of the impressive Sierra de Izarraitz, this country house is a haven of tranquillity and serenity, where nature creates a truly memorable stay.

 

Surrounded by the imposing peaks of Erlo, Xoxote and Kakute, this haven of calm invites you to disconnect and reconnect with nature. In addition, its proximity to the Ignatian Way and just 1.5 km from the Basilica of Loiola in Azpeitia, offer the opportunity to explore places of historical and spiritual importance while immersing yourself in the tranquillity of the rural environment.

 

It offers 5 rooms, each of which is linked to one of the features of our history or to one of the most significant elements of the valley and its surroundings. From long walks in the mountains to relaxing afternoons in the countryside, Balentziaga invites you to enjoy a unique experience where the connection with nature and outdoor life take centre stage.

The Iriarte Apartments are rural flats located in the heart of nature, specifically in the municipality of Orexa, a village with a markedly rural character. From the top of the village, you can see the Aralar mountain range, the Ernio massif and the Araxes valley. 

 

These rural flats are made up of two studios, each with a double bed, a double sofa bed, a private bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen, a living room with television and wifi throughout the room. The building also has a communal kitchen-dining room. 

 

Thanks to its location, people staying in these flats will be able to enjoy excursions to natural parks and points of interest such as museums, cromlechs and cultural parks that are close to Orexa.

The Hotel Villa Katalina by Intur, inaugurated in 2021, is an architectural jewel located in the old town of San Sebastian. This boutique hotel has been meticulously restored, fully preserving original features such as façades, staircases and courtyards. Its privileged location next to the Buen Pastor Cathedral and close to the city's main cultural and gastronomic attractions makes it an ideal destination for the most demanding travellers.

 

Villa Katalina by Intur offers comfort in each of its cosy rooms. The hotel is distinguished by its commitment to quality and attention to detail, offering healthy breakfasts with local and certified products of origin. The variety and freshness of the food available each day reflect the care and dedication that defines the experience at this exclusive establishment.

 

For people looking for an intimate and private space for celebrations or business meetings, Hotel Villa Katalina by Intur has a lounge in the basement of the building. This versatile space can accommodate up to 12 seated guests and is equipped with a modern 70-inch television.

At Casa Mendilore, the essence of Basque nature takes centre stage, creating a unique refuge for people who want to disconnect from the hustle and bustle of the city. It is located in a unique setting in Hondarribia, among lush forests and green fields, and offers a tailor-made experience where every detail is carefully thought out to meet guests' needs. 

 

The rooms are spacious and bright and have spectacular views of the natural surroundings. Each one is carefully prepared to suit all tastes, decorated expressly to convey a sense of calm and well-being. In addition, they are equipped with a minibar, private bathroom, satellite television and some of them have a terrace and/or hydromassage bathtub. 

 

The country house has communal areas that invite you to relax, such as the cosy lounge with a fireplace or the panoramic porch, ideal for enjoying the views while sipping a glass of wine.

 

For food lovers, the porch is the perfect place to gather around a good meal, prepared with the traditional flavours of the region and accompanied by a careful selection of wines.

Goiko Errota is only three kilometres from Arrasate, but far from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. Surrounded by the imposing Anboto and Udalatx mountains, Goiko Errota is strategically located between the three Basque capitals, making it the ideal starting point for exploring and discovering the treasures of the Basque Country.

 

It has 5 rooms, all of them with private bathroom WiFi connection,  sofa, desk and TV. Breakfast is included and, and some rooms have a balcony or terrace.

 

This accommodation offers endless possibilities to delve into the rich history, the exquisite gastronomy and the impressive nature of the region thanks to its location.

Located in San Sebastian, Casa Bakio is a peaceful place that offers its guests a unique experience in a natural and serene environment. Overlooking the garden, this cosy accommodation is the perfect place for people who love nature and relaxing in it. Just 4.5 kilometres from the Monte Igueldo Funicular, it provides easy access to the most important attractions in the area, such as the Paseo de La Concha and the famous Peine del Viento.

 

This rural house offers amenities such as a spacious terrace with mountain views, 2 comfortable bedrooms, a cosy living room and a fully equipped kitchen with fridge and dishwasher, perfect for preparing delicious home-cooked meals. In addition, the accommodation features a modern bathroom with shower, ensuring a comfortable and relaxing stay for all guests.

 

Whether enjoying the views from the balcony, exploring the natural surroundings or visiting every corner of San Sebastian, at Casa Bakio every moment becomes an unforgettable experience.

Located in the town of Elgoibar, Casa Rural Akei offers a unique experience in a privileged setting. This rural house offers breathtaking panoramic views of the Debabarrena valley, providing guests with an escape from the routine of everyday life. Strategically located away from the hustle and bustle of the cities but close to the most outstanding points of interest in the Basque Country, Casa Rural Akei is the perfect place to disconnect and explore our land.

 

Completely renovated with a modern design and all the necessary amenities for a comfortable stay, this accommodation has air conditioning, private bathroom and balcony, free WiFi connection, free parking and access to a communal kitchen. 

 

Elgoibar, known as the birthplace of the machine tool, combines natural beauty with a fascinating history, offering visitors an unforgettable experience full of discovery and adventure.

Hotel Astigarraga is located in the heart of the cider houses, just 15 minutes from San Sebastian. It offers unique accommodation, as access to its facilities is via an industrial lift, providing an experience similar to that of a New York loft.

 

This architectural accommodation stands out for its open and luminous spaces. In addition to its design, it has amenities such as a professional gym, a stone garden and a Basque pelota court, ideal both for people who want to visit the local cider houses and for those who want to explore San Sebastian and its surroundings.

 

At Hotel Astigarraga you can book flats for groups of 4 people with private bathroom, one large or two small beds, a sofa bed, two flat screen TVs and a fully equipped kitchen.  On the other hand, you can book a standard room, a suite with jacuzzi or deluxe rooms, all of them designed with a modern touch and with all the necessary comforts. All accommodations have free parking, air conditioning and wifi.

At Zarautz Surf House you can immerse yourself in an unforgettable experience, a place where learning and fun merge. A team of qualified instructors will accompany you on your surfing adventure from the very first moment, transmitting the passion and fundamental values of this culture. Furthermore, it is located in Zarautz, one of the most beautiful coastal towns in the Basque Country, just 50 metres from the beach.

 

Apart from exciting surf lessons, a wide variety of alternative activities await you at Zarautz Surf House, such as Yoga classes, Tai-Chi, Surf-Skate and exciting excursions in the surrounding area. The villa is completely renovated and every detail has been carefully designed, using top quality ecological materials and a sustainable heating system that guarantees a comfortable temperature all year round.

 

This four-storey accommodation offers a cosy and relaxed atmosphere. On the ground floor, you will find a common area, a fully equipped kitchen, a living room with a giant TV screen and an adapted bedroom with en-suite bathroom. You can also enjoy our private garden with terrace, chill-out area, barbecue and a relaxation area with SPA for cooler days. On the upper floors there are 7 rooms designed for groups of 2 to 12 people.

Aldabea are sustainable flats located in Legazpi, in the heart of the Iron Valley. Here, responsible energy management and the use of local renewable energy sources are a fundamental part of their philosophy. Thanks to their 17 photovoltaic panels, they make the most of the energy to produce hot water.

 

The flats are fully equipped with renewable facilities and offer a cosy and comfortable atmosphere. In the common areas, such as the terrace, you can enjoy solar cookers and leave bicycles or carts. They also promote food sovereignty, allowing guests to harvest the fruits of their organic urban garden.

 

Enjoy the best experiences in Valle del Hierro and take advantage of the practical workshops offered by the accommodation on energy and efficiency.

Located in the surfing town of Zarautz, these flats are situated close to the beach and the town centre. The town offers a complete hotel service and a historic quarter of great artistic and architectural interest, complemented by an exceptional natural environment.

 

Each flat is designed to provide you with every possible comfort throughout your stay. From studios ideal for couples to affordable options and spaces for small groups or families, you'll find a variety of options to suit your needs.

 

The rooms include air conditioning, fully equipped kitchen, living area with Smart TV and bathroom with shower and hairdryer. You can also enjoy the communal courtyard with tables and chairs for relaxing outdoors.

Located in the heart of San Sebastian's Old Town, Hotel Atari offers guests an unrivalled experience in this iconic seaside city. Nestled among the picturesque cobbled streets, it is just a few steps away from the imposing Basilica of Santa Maria del Coro, an architectural work of remarkable beauty dating back to the 18th century that captivates visitors.

 

On the ground floor of the accommodation is the famous Amama restaurant, renowned for its excellence in Basque gastronomy. Here, the traditional flavours of the region are fused with innovative culinary proposals, offering a unique and memorable gastronomic experience. With an atmosphere of comfort and charm, the hotel offers a perfect balance between the rich history of its surroundings and the comforts of its modern facilities. Each of the rooms has been meticulously designed to combine elegance and modernity, while maintaining the essence of traditional Basque charm.

 

One of the main attractions of the Hotel Atari is its exquisite buffet breakfast, served in the Amama restaurant and accompanied by panoramic views of the impressive basilica. Guests have the opportunity to start the day with a wide variety of choices, from fresh fruit to local specialities, while enjoying the sunrise over the characteristic rooftops of the old town.

This 18th century farmhouse, carefully restored to preserve its traditional charm, is located just 2 km from Orio, 5 km from Zarautz and 15 km from San Sebastian. It is an accommodation that offers a family atmosphere where you will feel at home, surrounded by nature and with stunning mountain views.

 

It has 7 family rooms, designed for comfort and connection with nature to offer a unique experience. Each room represents a native animal, inviting guests to learn more about their life and customs.

 

As for the common areas, there is a shared kitchen on the ground floor, equipped to prepare meals and share special moments with other guests. Perfect for enjoying authentic Basque hospitality in a relaxed and welcoming environment.

Translated with DeepL.com (free version)

Located in the vibrant city of San Sebastian, this guesthouse is nestled in one of the most captivating destinations in our territory. Known for its stunning beaches, exquisite cuisine and rich cultural history, San Sebastian offers visitors an unforgettable experience at every turn.

 

This accommodation offers nine rooms, doubles and singles, each with its own bathroom, designed to guarantee your comfort during your stay in the city.

 

Amenities include daily cleaning, wifi, fridge, wardrobe, small desk and television.

Located in Oiartzun, near the FICOBA convention centre, Fagoaga dorretxea offers cosy accommodation with a garden, terrace and room service. Oñati is known for its stunning natural surroundings and rich cultural history, which is reflected in its historical monuments and rural atmosphere.

 

It offers air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. In addition, a delicious à la carte continental or American breakfast is served every morning to start the day with energy.

 

To complete the experience, the accommodation offers a variety of additional activities, such as horseback riding to explore the beauty of the region, visits to local wineries to discover the tradition of txakoli, boat trips combined with unique gastronomic experiences and even bicycle rentals to explore the area, among others.

Casa Rural Olivi 1948 is located in Usurbil, on the outskirts of San Sebastian, and offers exclusive accommodation that combines all the comforts of a modern hotel with the charm of a rural setting. Surrounded by four hectares of apple trees, the house produces a sparkling apple wine using the Charmat method, in honour of Olivia Ibarguren, matriarch of the family, and her husband Esteban Lertxundi, pioneers of the Saizar group. Here, you will find peace and harmony in the midst of nature.



Discover the rooms at Olivi 1948, decorated with noble and strong materials, in homage to the land that surrounds us. The soft colours, the comfort and quality of the beds, together with the silence that characterises the accommodation, will allow you to disconnect and reconnect with the essentials.



The establishment offers three categories of rooms to suit the needs of the people who stay here. Its services include a large garden, breakfast in the room, amenities, private bathroom with shower, heating, air conditioning and free wifi and parking.

Located in the heart of San Sebastian, next to the majestic Buen Pastor Cathedral and just a five-minute walk from the emblematic La Concha beach, Hotel Arrizul Catedral is a charming boutique hotel that offers an unrivalled experience in one of the most captivating cities in our territory.



From single, double, triple rooms to suites, all with breakfast included, the hotel is designed to provide a comfortable and relaxing stay. The suites also have private terraces offering exceptional views of the city.



To make your stay even more enjoyable, the accommodation offers a range of exclusive services such as valet parking, free Wi-Fi and meeting rooms if you are in town on business. Guided tours are also available for you to discover the charms of the city. And if you need private transfers or bike hire to explore the region, the hotel will take care of it.

Discover refinement and comfort at Elegant Rooms Lasarte, a pressure offering an accessible luxury experience in Lasarte, just 10 minutes from San Sebastian. 

The rooms are designed and equipped with the latest technologies, guaranteeing an unforgettable stay for guests. It is also located in a natural environment, offering several hiking trails to explore the beauty of the region.

It also has a fully accessible room for people with reduced mobility, where every detail is carefully selected to ensure a memorable stay.

Urbizixa is an accommodation that offers accommodation in a rural house, rooms or guesthouse. It is located in the heart of the Basque Country, in Elgoibar, in a place of rest and connection with nature.

 

The accommodation offers all the comforts, wifi, bed linen and rooms adapted for people with functional diversity. 

 

It is a privileged space for disconnection, rest and meditation.

In Andoain, just 15 kilometres from San Sebastian, you will find the Plazaola guesthouse, opened in 2023. The guesthouse is just a few minutes from the train station, which makes it the ideal accommodation for exploring the surrounding area in comfort. 

 

You can stay with half board or full board while enjoying the modern and cosy rooms, private bathroom, TV and free Wi-Fi offered by the guesthouse. 

 

Stay in a charming, modern guesthouse with all the comforts while you discover the surrounding area. Tolosa and San Sebastian are just a few minutes away and you can't miss out on all they have to offer.

The hotel has a bicycle rental service with which you can explore all the corners that Zarautz has to offer.

 

Surf on the beach, which attracts thousands of surfers every year, or stroll along the promenade and its bars with terraces. The accommodation has a sauna to relax after a day exploring the wonderful surroundings.

Located in the beautiful fishing village of Mutriku, this accommodation is in a strategic location for exploring the Basque Coast. It is very close to the centre of the town, you can walk around its historic quarter, declared a monumental site, and enjoy magnificent walks around its charming port, its beach and its natural swimming pool.

 

The accommodation has an open garden of more than 2,500 square metres, free private parking and indoor parking for bicycles and motorbikes. The rooms are spacious, designed for families or groups of friends as they consist of a double bed, two singles and a sofa bed. In addition, each room has a terrace with table and chairs. 

 

These rooms do not need to be booked in advance, you can make the automatic self-check-in and pay on the spot without the need of anyone. Even so, you can book them in advance, both options are available.

San Sebastian is a vibrant and lively city but if you are looking for accommodation close to the city but in a quiet and relaxed atmosphere, Pensión Donostia Rooms is what you are looking for.

 

The views of the city from La Concha or from the top of Mount Igueldo are world-renowned. Walk around the Old Town while you try the pintxos and the gastronomic offer or visit the emblematic buildings reminiscent of the Belle Epoque.

The UneOnak Hostel offers you a unique proposal for disconnection near the centre of San Sebastian but in an environment where you can breathe tranquillity and nature. Choose from its sporting activities to improve your health and wellbeing or join the Feldenkrais retreat. 

 

The accommodation is located in Aiete, a neighbourhood in the city of Gipuzkoa that is connected to the centre but enjoys peace and quiet in the heart of nature. Take the opportunity to visit La Concha beach or admire the city's architecture while enjoying pintxos praised by international critics.

This accommodation for 8 people is located in Ikaztegieta, in Tolosaldea. The natural environment that surrounds this welcoming urban centre offers visitors the opportunity to explore various trails, allowing them to appreciate the beauty of the many farmhouses that dot the area. From these high points, you can enjoy breathtaking views of the entire municipality and its surroundings.

 

In the town centre, the parish church of San Lorenzo stands out, a jewel built in the 16th century with notable characteristics of the Basque Gothic style. The nearby chapel of Nuestra Señora del Pilar, located next to the bridge that leads to Ordizia, also captures the attention of visitors.

The Gaztandizabal Baserria country house is located in the town of Aia in the province of Gipuzkoa, in a green setting surrounded by natural parks such as Pagoeta, ideal for hiking and enjoying the peace and quiet. 

 

The accommodation is rented as a whole and has 5 beds in total: 3 double beds, one single bed and an extra bed. It has a fully equipped kitchen-dining room, a spacious bathroom, heating and a garden area with outdoor furniture, terrace and free private parking. 

 

Inside you will also find a collection of games and a cot available.

This spectacular holiday flat, located in the quiet neighbourhood of Aiete (San Sebastian), offers exceptional amenities. With air conditioning, free parking and a large private terrace, your comfort is guaranteed. Its excellent location allows you to reach the highlights of the city in minutes by bus.

 

San Sebastian offers a unique experience in a cosmopolitan, modern city with a great cultural and gastronomic tradition. Visit every corner of the city while you rest in a privileged accommodation. 

 

It also offers free wifi, a fully equipped kitchen, double bed and double sofa bed, it is ideal for families or groups.

Located in the heart of San Sebastian, one of the gastronomic capitals of Europe, Nobu offers elegant rooms and suites overlooking the stunning La Concha Bay. With the iconic Nobu restaurant within walking distance, guests can enjoy an exceptional dining experience while exploring local attractions.

 

The stylishly designed rooms and suites combine traditional Basque craftsmanship with contemporary Japanese sophistication. Choose from deluxe, premium rooms and suites that include all the amenities. 

 

In addition to La Concha beach, the hotel is just a few minutes away from the city's main attractions, such as the old town and Igueldo Park.

Etxelaia is a new and suggestive proposal for luxury accommodation and events in a rural setting. The value of Etxelaia lies in the attractiveness of the house itself, from the point of view of the building and its aesthetics, the history that accompanies it, the quality of the services and the surroundings.

 

The interior decoration of the Etxelaia is another element to highlight. The coherent mixture of classic elements of the house with other more modern ones aims to maintain the essence of the two hundred year old building without renouncing the comforts and conveniences of a modern home.

 

Etxelaia stands out for the quality of its services. This quality of services is accompanied by a permanent customer service, being available 24 hours a day to attend to any need.

 

Finally, another of Etxelaia's values lies in its location in Gautegiz Arteaga, in the heart of the Urdaibai Biosphere Reserve. A unique natural environment, which, in addition to its scenic value, offers a wide range of leisure activities: hiking, water sports (canoeing, surfing, paddle surfing, etc.), cycling, art, gastronomy, culture, history, etc.

The Bilder Boutique Hotel is located in the centre of Bilbao. History and modernity are intertwined in this former mansion that once housed the renowned Café Suizo, part of the city's history. The hotel offers a privileged location less than 5 minutes from the main public transport stations, and for those arriving by car, parking is available in the Arenal car park. 

 

It offers rooms designed to give you a close and personalised stay, where you will find tranquillity and security. Its rooms include all the comforts and complete soundproofing for your rest.

 

In the hotel, you will breathe the history of this metropolis with a steel soul and a unique spirit, embracing modernity without losing sight of tradition.

datosGenerales.nombre: Radisson Collection Hotel, Gran Via Bilbao
datosGenerales.descripcion:
Discover the unparalleled charm of the Radisson Collection Hotel on Bilbao's Gran Vía, a five-star gem that seamlessly blends modern elegance with the city's rich culture. With 137 exquisitely designed rooms and suites, this hotel invites you to immerse yourself in an oasis of luxury and comfort.

 

From its iconic rooftop speakeasy bar, where you can enjoy panoramic views of Bilbao while sipping handcrafted cocktails, to the exquisite NKO Restaurant by Eneko Atxa, which offers a fascinating fusion of Basque and Japanese flavours, every corner of the hotel offers a unique experience.

 

Whether you are here for business or pleasure, the Radisson Collection Hotel, Gran Vía Bilbao is equipped with everything you need for an unforgettable stay. It also includes the service of a Clefs d'Or concierge, who will be happy to help you with any personalised requests and recommend the must-see places in the city.

datosContacto.direccion: Gran Vía Don Diego López de Haro, 4

datosGenerales.descripcion:
This flat is located close to the centre of Bilbao, a vibrant city with a lot to offer. Less than 10 minutes away by public transport is the San Mamés stadium and the Euskalduna conference and concert centre.

 

Make the most of its excellent location to explore all the city's attractions in a fully equipped accommodation, with wifi included.

Discover Pensión Camino del Norte, located in Sestao, just 1.7 km from Las Arenas Beach. Its rooms offer city views and feature free WiFi, flat-screen TV and Smart TV for your entertainment. Bed linen and towels are provided, as well as top-of-the-range hotel mattresses.

 

Enjoy a comfortable and relaxing stay at this establishment, which is also close to attractions such as the Bizkaia Bridge and the Bilbao Exhibition Centre. With a convenient location and amenities such as free WiFi throughout the accommodation, Pensión Camino del Norte is the perfect choice.

Discover Lastoetxe, an eco-sustainable rural house in Meñaka. This rural house is fully integrated with the surrounding nature, built without a single brick, its thatched walls and wooden structure transport you to a unique and ecological experience. 

 

At Lastoetxe, you will be welcomed by spacious rooms with en-suite bathrooms, perfect for couples, families and even your pet. In addition, the accommodation offers gastronomic experiences such as tastings and show cooking.

 

Meñaka is located in the heart of nature, close to the coast and villages such as Mungia and cities such as Bilbao.

Discover Agroturismo Azkarraga, a cosy accommodation located in Amorebieta.  With rooms equipped with double beds and private bathrooms, it guarantees you a comfortable and relaxing stay.



This rural house not only offers a spectacular interior, but also incredible outdoor spaces. Enjoy the large garden and stunning forest views from the terrace, how about a hike in the mountains, a bike ride or just relaxing and enjoying nature?

 

In Azkarraga, you will find a restaurant with homemade dishes made with local products. Located in an idyllic setting, the accommodation offers you the perfect opportunity to disconnect from the city without getting too far away.

URI Hostel, is located in the vibrant Uribarri district of Bilbao. The hostel is just 50 metres from the Uribarri metro stop, and is conveniently located close to the city's main attractions. From the accommodation, you can easily explore the City Hall, the famous Guggenheim Museum just a 10-minute walk away, and the charming Old Town just 5 minutes away.

 

There are rooms with private bathrooms and rooms with shared bathrooms. Toilets have one shower for every two guests, guaranteeing comfort and privacy. There is also a shared office, equipped with vending machines and coffee for your convenience.

 

Its aim is to provide you with a unique experience where you can discover Bilbao like a local.

Laga&Laida is located in Gernika-Lumo. Immerse yourself in the beauty of Urdaibai from this cosy flat, located in a privileged setting where nature and history intertwine.

From here, you can explore the charms of Urdaibai, declared a Biosphere Reserve by UNESCO. Discover the natural wealth of the area with its stunning landscapes, beaches and wetlands, home to a variety of flora and fauna.

Don't miss the opportunity to visit Gernika, famous for its history and Basque culture. Explore the iconic Tree of Gernika and the Peace Museum, which commemorates the tragic events of the Spanish Civil War.

The Eguen Goiko flats are located in a cosy and peaceful setting just 8 kilometres from Lekeitio. All the flats have a kitchen, full bathroom, wifi and everything you need for a comfortable and charming stay. 

 

Its location gives you the opportunity to discover incredible natural landscapes. Discover the beach of Ogeia, visit the island of San Nicolas or stroll through the streets of Lekeitio. Very close to the accommodation is the Urdaibai Bird Center, a nature museum in the middle of the biosphere.

Neguetxea is located in Gernika-Lumo, where much more than simple accommodation awaits you. Live an authentic experience that goes beyond the conventional, offering unique rooms with a soul of their own that will surprise you from the moment you arrive.

 

Relax in the suites, where every detail has been carefully designed to guarantee an exceptional stay in the heart of Urdaibai, surrounded by the lush nature of the Biosphere Reserve.

Mundakaport offers a complete experience with modern flats in the port of Mundaka with views of the sea and the charming town. In addition to accommodation, you can enjoy breakfast and dinner in the cafeteria, a spa service and a gym. 

 

The surroundings of Mundaka are perfect for those who want to enjoy all kinds of plans. The waves of Mundaka are known by surfers from all over the world, so dare to take a board and surf. Or you can discover the charming villages in the surrounding area and go for a stroll or sample their gastronomy.

Hotel Luruna is located in Mundaka, in a 19th century neo-baroque palace, just 300 metres from the beach. The rooms include all comforts and the hotel also has a restaurant with a unique gastronomic offer. 

 

While staying at the hotel, you can enjoy all that its surroundings have to offer. Surf on Mundaka beach, stroll through the Urdaibai marshes while you see nature in all its splendour or visit emblematic locations such as San Juan de Gaztelugatxe.

Discover comfort and hospitality at Bilbao Rooms and Kitchen, located in the Zorroza neighbourhood. Each room is equipped with a full set of amenities including a desk, flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries.

 

This accommodation goes further by offering communal areas such as a shared lounge and kitchen, laundry facilities and a comfortable lounge area. Enjoy the excellent location of this accommodation in Zorroza, a quiet neighbourhood just a few minutes from the centre of Bilbao.

Discover an easy, quick and cosy stay in the B48 Abando flat, located in Bilbao's emblematic Plaza Circular. Designed with guests' comfort and convenience in mind. 

 

At B48 Abando, you'll find a homely and relaxing atmosphere, perfect for resting and recharging your batteries after a day of exploring the city. From a fully equipped kitchen to a cosy living area, every detail is carefully thought out to make guests feel at home.

10 Apartamentos Turísitcos is located next to the picturesque Larreagaburu Park in Santutxu. This neighbourhood offers an authentic and vibrant experience for those who wish to immerse themselves in the daily life of the city.

 

With its lively streets and friendly atmosphere, Santutxu is known for its cultural diversity and numerous gastronomic options. From traditional pintxos to international dishes, you will find a wide variety of restaurants and bars where you can enjoy delicious Basque cuisine.

 

In addition, Larreagaburu Park offers an oasis of tranquillity in the middle of the city. With green areas, playgrounds and walking trails, it's the perfect place to escape the hustle and bustle of the city and connect with the natural environment.

Discover Bilbao from Unamuno House. Immerse yourself in the vibrant cultural life, exquisite gastronomy and unique architecture of this ever-evolving city. With a privileged location, this flat is the perfect starting point to explore all the wonders that Bilbao has to offer.

 

Located in the heart of Bilbao, Unamuno House offers the opportunity to immerse yourself in the authenticity and charm of this Basque city. With its rich history, cosmopolitan atmosphere and stunning architecture, Bilbao captivates at every turn, and this flat is the perfect place to experience it all.

Discover the rustic charm and tranquillity of Pozueta, a hostel located in a typical Basque farmhouse in Muxika, near Ugarte. Set amidst the lush Basque countryside, this accommodation offers guests the privilege of immersing themselves in a unique and serene natural environment.

 

From Pozueta, you can enjoy breathtaking views of the green valleys and mountains that surround the farmhouse, providing an oasis of calm and disconnection. With trails to walk and explore, as well as the possibility to participate in outdoor activities such as hiking or cycling, this lodge is the perfect retreat for nature lovers and those looking for a break in a peaceful and natural environment.

Errota Hostel in Durango offers a comfortable and entertaining stay just 10 minutes' walk from the historic centre. With a restaurant, free gym and free Wi-Fi, guests also have access to paddle tennis and tennis courts.

 

Facilities include 24-hour reception, luggage storage and laundry facilities. The cosy rooms offer garden views, a TV and a private bathroom. Ideal for exploring Durango and enjoying a carefree stay.

Optimi Rooms brings you a very special accommodation proposal, bedrooms in capsule form and a design as a differentiating value. These capsules include all services, from toiletries and state-of-the-art mattresses to a TV with streaming service.

 

In addition to the capsules, the hostel has a common state-of-the-art kitchen for its guests, hall, lounge and bathrooms with changing facilities. The accommodation is located a few metres from Indautxu metro station and a 10-minute walk from San Mamés stadium.

Bilbao is a city that offers a unique experience for those who visit it. From the Guggenheim Museum Bilbao, representation of contemporary art, or the streets of Casco Viejo where you can enjoy one of the largest pintxos offerings. 

 

Bcool Guitar Hostel offers you exceptional accommodation in a perfect location to visit all the attractions that Bilbao has to offer. Just a few metres from the hostel you will find Abando station and 5 minutes from Moyua square from where you can go to the Guggenheim Museum Bilbao.

The Urdaibai Biosphere is the perfect place for people who love birdwatching, as its marshes are home to migratory birds all year round.

 

The Urdaibai Bird Center hostel offers a unique experience where you can stay in the heart of the natural park in harmony with nature. Its large windows allow you to observe the animals without disturbing them. Each room includes a private bathroom, toiletries and towels, as well as free wifi and a garden with views.

The Amalurra Hostel is a small oasis set in a privileged natural environment. The well-tended gardens, the forests of indigenous trees and the green meadows that surround it make it an ideal place to relax and disconnect from the hustle and bustle, whether you plan to come alone, with your family or in a group.

The hostel is ideal for young people, families or groups. Here, you can enjoy the quality of its comfortable and spacious duplex rooms, which can accommodate up to six people.

This is a good option for groups or families looking for a more economical stay that will allow them to enjoy the common areas, such as the living room, as well as the bar-cafeteria, the restaurant and the open-air spaces.

The establishment has a wellness centre, sauna, massage service, cold water pool and swimming pool during the summer season. It also has a cafeteria and restaurant with high quality cuisine prepared with local produce (km0), as well as spacious multifunctional rooms.

An inspiring environment for events and meetings both indoors and outdoors, which favours connection, wellbeing and enjoyment.

datosGenerales.nombre: BILBAO CITY CENTER BY ABBA APARTMENTS
datosGenerales.descripcion:
Abba Apartments has fully equipped studios and flats in Bilbao, close to Calatrava's Zubizuri Bridge. Discover the city and its surroundings with the possibility of resting in a flat where you will feel at home.

 

The rooms include private bathroom, equipped kitchen, living area, queen size beds and smart TV among other amenities. In addition, guests have the possibility to enjoy the parking service or the massage service.

 

If you travel with pets, this is your accommodation because dogs up to 20kg are allowed in the rooms.

The H30 Bilbao guesthouse offers the opportunity to get to know this beautiful city with the possibility of staying close to its main tourist attractions. As well as being close to the centre, the Guggenheim Museum Bilbao and Abando station are also nearby. 

 

The rooms have everything you need for a comfortable stay: flat screen TV, air conditioning, private bathroom and minibar among other services. In addition, if you have to work, the rooms include a desk and wifi service throughout the guesthouse.

The Araize country house is located on the outskirts of Mungia, in peaceful surroundings. It is a place to enjoy as a couple or with the family, as the establishment has a covered play area and barbecue area. 

 

The accommodation offers yoga classes for guests. In addition, the environment in which it is located offers multiple possibilities for outdoor activities such as hiking or cycling routes. The rural house itself has a bicycle rental service for the convenience of its guests. 

 

Make the most of it and get to know Mungia and its surroundings while you enjoy this accommodation in a privileged setting.

The Ozamiz farmhouse is located in the heart of nature in one of the most privileged spots in the Basque Country, the Urdaibai biosphere. It is a biosphere protected by its marshes full of life where you can observe different birds that migrate through the area.

 

Urdaibai not only surprises you with its unique marshes, but also with some of the most beautiful beaches in the Basque Country. The beach of Laida, which constantly changes shape and size, and the spectacular beach of Laga, located under the imposing rock of Ogoño, described by many as "the closest thing to paradise".

This accommodation is located just a few metres from the city centre with all amenities within easy reach. It offers free Wi-Fi, private parking and accommodation with flat-screen TV, air conditioning, private bathroom and full kitchen.

 

Nearby is the Bilbao Fine Arts Museum and it is easy to get to the Old Town where you can enjoy the energetic street life. The town has a lot to offer, from tourist attractions to a gastronomic offer you won't find anywhere else.

Zumintxaz is located in a privileged enclave in Mungia, an environment of pure nature in which to enjoy this rural house. Its large garden has a games area, barbecues and unique views of the Bay of Biscay and San Juan de Gaztelugatxe. 

 

Bizkaia enjoys an enviable natural environment. Take a walk along the hiking routes or enjoy the peace and quiet of the area. Furthermore, close to the accommodation is San Juan de Gaztelugatxe, an internationally renowned tourist attraction.

B75 Apartments is located in Bilbao, less than 2 km from the renowned Bilbao Fine Arts Museum and 2 km from the iconic San Mamés Stadium. This modern accommodation offers cosy, air-conditioned space, panoramic views of the peaceful surrounding garden and free WiFi access.

 

The accommodation is equipped with amenities that will make your stay more enjoyable, such as a flat-screen TV for your entertainment, a private bathroom with shower and hairdryer, and a full kitchen including microwave, toaster, fridge, cooker, coffee maker and kettle.

 

Bilbao is a cosmopolitan city worth visiting to admire its museums or stroll through the streets of the Old Town. The town preserves its industrial past after its transformation into a comfortable and modern city.

datosGenerales.nombre: THE SOCIAL HUB DONOSTIA - SAN SEBASTIAN
datosGenerales.descripcion:
The Social Hub opens its doors in San Sebastian with a unique accommodation proposal, designed to meet the needs of all its guests. It is located in a quiet yet central area where you can rest or work in its spaces. 

 

In addition to being a hotel, The Social Hub is a student residence and coworking space where you can work with professionals from different areas. It also has a restaurant that can be rented for celebrations.

 

Whether for a tourist visit or as a residence during your studies, San Sebastian is a city with a lot of potential. Visit the old town and discover the pintxos that attract so many food lovers. Create unforgettable memories by strolling through its streets and enjoying its beaches and viewpoints that offer a unique landscape.

Immerse yourself in the serenity and rural charm of Simonan Borda, a cosy country house located on the picturesque outskirts of Oiartzun. Surrounded by lush nature and a tranquil atmosphere, this accommodation offers guests an authentic experience in the heart of the Basque Country.

 

From Simonan Borda, you can explore the magnificent natural landscapes that surround the farmhouse. With hiking trails and nooks and crannies to discover, this is the perfect place for outdoor enthusiasts and those looking to disconnect from the daily routine. In addition, the proximity to Oiartzun gives you the opportunity to visit San Sebastian, just 15km away, with its architecture and rich history.

Discover the essence of rural life at Aska Etxea, a traditional rural house in the Arana Valley. Located in San Vicente de Arana, surrounded by lush vegetation and rich local fauna, this house reflects centuries of history and care for the environment.

 

At Aska Etxea, they are committed to sustainability by using renewable energy such as geothermal and solar panels. Live an authentic and ecological experience in this refuge in the mountains of Alava.

localizacion.nombreLocalidad: San Vicente de Arana/Done Bikendi Harana

datosGenerales.descripcion:
Located in the heart of Gipuzkoa, in Asteasu, Lizolagoiena is much more than just accommodation, it is an immersive experience in Basque culture and agrotourism.

 

With just 1,500 inhabitants, Asteasu offers a peaceful haven in the midst of stunning natural landscapes. Surrounded by mountains and small villages, this corner is the perfect setting to reconnect with nature and immerse yourself in the Basque essence.

Agiñaga farmhouse is a refuge in the mountains of Irun. Immerse yourself in the authentic Basque experience in a typical Basque farmhouse, where you will find three charming studio flats immersed in a large property.

 

The farmhouse is surrounded by a large garden full of nooks and crannies to relax and enjoy the tranquillity of the surroundings. A unique and isolated place that invites you to completely disconnect.

 

If you are looking for a place to disconnect, in Agiñaga, just 10 minutes from Irun, an oasis of peace awaits you. Wake up in the middle of nature, surrounded by silence and fresh air. They will also suggest plans in the surrounding area to explore the many places of interest that surround it. From hiking or cycling, to discovering natural gems within a radius of 5 km or even up to 30 km away.

Located in the historic town of Gernika-Lumo, the Lurgorri flat offers you a comfortable stay in the heart of the Basque Country.

 

With modern services and amenities designed for your comfort, this flat is the perfect place to explore this fascinating region. Enjoy free Wi-Fi throughout, air conditioning to maintain a comfortable temperature at any time of the year, and a fully equipped kitchen.

Immerse yourself in the serenity of the southern slopes of Mount Jaizkibel in Hondarribia where Kostoenea stands as a haven away from the hustle and bustle. This rural house is nestled in nature and in the surrounding area you will find trails to explore on foot or by bicycle, between the sea and the mountains. 

 

Just a few minutes from this rural oasis, the charming fishing village of Hondarribia awaits, with its beach, shops, bars and Michelin-starred restaurants. The proximity to the French border invites you to explore new horizons: San Sebastian in 25 minutes, Biarritz in 40 minutes and Bilbao in 90 minutes by car.
