For those who love sustainability, eco-friendly options such as public transport and bicycle hire make it easy to get around without leaving an environmental footprint.

Book your room at Arialdegi, a carefully restored 18th century farmhouse in the Ibaizabal river valley in Iurreta.

Surrounded by impressive mountains and the Urkiola Natural Park, it is the ideal starting point for exploring nature on horseback, on foot or by bicycle.

The spacious rooms (one of them adapted), preserve the rustic charm of the farmhouse to guarantee a cosy stay. Towels, soap and shower gel are provided and hairdryers are available on request.

Discover authentic Basque hospitality in Arialdegi.

This rural house is located in Aia, surrounded by incredible mountain views and only 20 km from the Monte Igueldo Funicular in San Sebastian. 

During your stay you can enjoy a cosy lounge for common use and a charming patio where you can relax and enjoy the fresh air. It also has a garden, a barbecue area and free Wi-Fi, along with free private parking.

With a terrace offering sea views, the rooms are equipped with all the necessary amenities for a comfortable stay. From a living room with a flat-screen TV to a fully equipped kitchen, you will feel right at home.

Discover Hotel Tres Reyes, where comfort and design come together to offer you an unforgettable experience in San Sebastian.

The rooms are equipped with everything you will need for a pleasant stay, from washbasins and desk to air conditioning and heating. 

Enjoy moments of relaxation and fun in the swimming pool surrounded by lush gardens, the perfect place to cool off and unwind during the hot summer months.

At Hotel Tres Reyes, pets are part of the family, so dogs are allowed up to a maximum weight of 15 kilos.

The Passage immerses you in luxury in meticulously designed flats, ranging from cosy one-bedroom spaces to a majestic penthouse with three bedrooms and three terraces.

Each flat has been carefully decorated to blend design and comfort, offering an elegant and welcoming ambience. Each flat has been carefully decorated to blend design and comfort, offering an elegant and welcoming ambience.

Our commitment to accessibility is reflected throughout the building and flats.

Discover the charming town of Getaria from the comfort of our holiday flat.

Located on the Basque coast, Getaria captivates with its seaside charm, cobbled streets and stunning sea views.

Immerse yourself in the local culture by tasting the famous txakoli at the nearby wineries, where you can learn about the making of this unique white wine of the region. Don't miss the opportunity to try the exquisite fresh fish in the port's restaurants, where Basque gastronomy shines.

3Kabi is located in Zarautz, just 100 metres from the beach. Newly built and designed with every detail to make the most of the surroundings and the charming coastal towns.

The flats offer a wide range of services, such as free WiFi connection, heating and air conditioning. In addition, you will find a fully equipped kitchen with appliances and utensils, as well as small appliances such as hairdryer, toaster and electric kettle.

At Apartamentos 3Kabi, we offer you an exceptional accommodation experience in Zarautz, where every detail is designed for your comfort and enjoyment.

Immerse yourself in the vibrant energy of Bilbao from the Líbere Bilbao Ledesma Apartments, strategically located on Músico Ledesma Street. With a modern design and all the necessary amenities, the flats offer you a cosy and functional space in the heart of the city.

From here, you can easily explore the rich local culture, nearby attractions and enjoy Bilbao's varied gastronomic offer.

Reception staff are available 24 hours a day to make sure your stay is comfortable.  Plus, dogs are welcome so your pet can enjoy the trip too!

Located on the picturesque Basque coast, this cosy hostel offers the perfect retreat for pilgrims on the Camino de Santiago along the coast and for those wishing to enjoy the natural beauty and rich culture of the Basque Country.

Getaria, known for its seaside charm and historic txakoli vineyards, is an ideal destination to relax and recharge your batteries. From the hostel, you can easily explore the area and enjoy stunning sea views, delicious fresh seafood and the genuine hospitality of its inhabitants.

Akarregi Hostel stands out for its warm and familiar atmosphere, providing its guests with a quiet and comfortable place to rest after a day of walking.

Nestled in the picturesque neighbourhood of Barainka, in the coastal town of Ispaster, is the Belaustegi farmhouse, a 16th century architectural jewel that offers a unique experience in the heart of nature. This accommodation is the perfect place for those seeking peace and quiet and close contact with the local wildlife, surrounded by lush indigenous forests.

From the Belaustegi farmhouse, there is a track that leads to the three highest mountains in the region: Mendi Txiki, Galarregi and Iluntzar. These routes are ideal for hiking enthusiasts and offer spectacular panoramic views of the Urdaibai region.

For those who prefer the coastal atmosphere, we offer a flat in the old town of Lekeitio. This charming maritime setting boasts a picturesque harbour, three beautiful beaches and the island of Garraitz, a perfect place to enjoy the sea and its magnificent views.

If you are looking for a place to stay in the charming town of Laguardia, Hotel Pachico is your best option. Located just 200 metres from the emblematic Church of San Juan, one of the town's most popular landmarks, this cosy hotel offers air-conditioned rooms, guaranteeing a comfortable stay at any time of the year.

Laguardia, known for its impressive medieval old town, offers visitors a variety of attractions, from the well-preserved walls and the Plaza Mayor to the underground wine cellars and panoramic views of the vineyards.

Hotel Pachico invites you to discover the magic of this town from a privileged location.

If you are travelling around Gipuzkoa or looking to disconnect from the big cities, the Altzoko Ostatua guesthouse is your ideal option.

In this charming accommodation you can enjoy the surroundings of the Tolosaldea region, in the centre of Gipuzkoa.

Start your routes on foot or by bicycle from this village that will amaze you and take advantage of the excellent location of this guesthouse to rest in one of the best settings in the Basque Country.

Welcome to Apartahotel Eire 2, where elegance and comfort meet in the best location in Vitoria-Gasteiz, in the centre of the capital of the Basque Country.

Opened in early 2022, its flats offer exterior views and abundant natural light, providing a welcoming and bright atmosphere. 

Each flat is equipped with a full kitchen, Smart TV, Wi-Fi and a queen-size double bed, ensuring you have all the comforts you need for a pleasant stay. With underfloor heating and optimal soundproofing, it guarantees a perfect rest for guests. Aparthotel Eire 2, facilitates a hassle-free check-in and check-out with state-of-the-art technology.

Discover Larraitz Aterpetxea, a cosy hostel located in the charming village of Aizarnazabal, Gipuzkoa.

Surrounded by nature and tranquillity, it is the perfect place to disconnect and enjoy the beauty of the Basque Country. With comfortable facilities and a family atmosphere, Larraitz Aterpetxea is ideal for hikers, groups and families looking to explore the region.

It has two facilities, the general building, with reception, activity room, dining room, kitchen, bathroom and terrace of 50m2. 

On the other hand, there is the rooms building, with bathroom, private shower and terrace.

Immerse yourself in the beauty and tranquillity of the Araotz Valley in Oñati, one of the most hidden corners of Gipuzkoa.

Araotzeko Ostatua offers you cosy and comfortable accommodation in a naturally stunning setting, surrounded by the Aizkorri, Zaraia and Elgea mountain ranges. 

Discover the Jaturabe gorge, where the road descends to the foot of Mount Orkatzategi through a ravine surrounded by lush forests. Marvel at the impressive eye of Aitzulo.

Apartamentos Iparraguirre is a cosy tourist accommodation in Ispaster, just one kilometre from Lekeitio. 

Enjoy the tranquillity and beauty of the Basque coast in an incomparable natural environment. With comfortable facilities and a relaxing atmosphere, Apartamentos Iparraguirre is the perfect place for your holidays, whether as a couple, with family or friends.

This guesthouse is located in Bermeo, a cosy seaside town close to the main tourist attractions of Bizkaia. 

The islet of San Juan de Gaztelugatxe is just 10 kilometres away and only 20 minutes away. You also have the possibility of visiting Bilbao, which is 30 minutes away.

The flat is located in Zarautz just a short walk from the beach and the promenade that runs along it. The beach is usually frequented by surfers and next to it there is a golf course overlooking the sea. 

Stroll through the streets of Zarautz and its promenade along the beach while you sample the gastronomy in the town's restaurants.

Irita Studios offers fully equipped flats just a few metres from Zarautz beach. The flats feature a fully equipped kitchen with dining table, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower.

Enjoy Zarautz and its beach during your trip and visit Donostia/San Sebastian, just 20 minutes away.

Located in the old town of Bilbao, the Goien Boutique Hotel is located in the emblematic Somera Street, the oldest street in Bilbao.

This fully restored building combines exclusive design and top quality materials.

Enjoy services such as: free WiFi, luggage storage and laundry service on request. It also offers buffet and à la carte breakfast, a bar and public parking near the hotel.
